WHY DO WE DO IT? 

WE TAKE PRIDE IN TURNING REAL WHEELS INTO SOLID SOLES AND PLACING NATURE RIGHT AT YOUR FEET
column2:
>

All Martinycas keep intact the recipe from the XVIII century, recovering an ancient tradition from our original native footwear.

Handcrafted with Wheel + Leather + thread + 8 hands (shoe-last man, tanner, seamstress and shoemaker)
column5:
SUSTAINABLE LOCAL LIFE

MMARTINYCA was founded with a Mission: To leave sustainable footprint in our planet. We begin creating an authentic and honest footwear, inspired on this principle: The economic benefit has the same importance as PEOPLE and NATURE.
column7:
>

We are committed to providing something unique for 3 REASONS:

column2:
>
 
 
 

1) THE POPULAR LOCAL COLLECTION :
column3:
>

Based on the original spanish fishermen design innovating in 3 unique leather colours that define the main motives of the project.

  •  MARTINYCAS "" PISTA ROJA "" (Red Court leather colour)

column2:
>

Inspired by the red clay of the trails of Menorca, which will colour the floor of the basketball court .
column3:
>
  • MARTINYCAS "" HUELLA ""(Black footprint leather colour)
column4:
>

The distinctive black of our wheels.
column5:
>
  • MARTINYCAS "" ARENA "" (Sand Leather colour)
column6:
>

Inspired by the immense Sahara Desert. The magic place where we will place the Basketball court.
column8:
> 

                                                  

HOW TO CHECK YOU SIZE:
column9:
>

2) A LIMITED EDITION WITH UNBREAKABLE SOLES: 

Sustainably produced with unique soles made by recycling Bridgestone tires (World’s Nº1 tire brand). This will be a Limited Edition: 1 to 6.000unique pairs in the whole world that will support us to build 4 Sustainable Basketball Courts in the Sahara Desert.
column10:
>

3) A UNIQUE TRIBUTE TO THE SUSTAINABLE SIDE.
column11:
>
 

MMARTINYCA believes in the ""trueque sustainable"" Model. This means we employ master artisans’ shoemakers from Menorca to make abarca sandals for you and you help maintain this tradition alive. We recycle the wheels to make an unbreakable soles for you while you take care of the planet leaving sustainable footprint.

THE REWARDS

We have designed for our Kickstarter bakers special rewards based in the ""trueque"" model:
For each pair of Martinyca’s you order, we will recycle one wheel to make your soles and you will also be donating another wheel to build the basketball court in the desert for the kids.

DRIVING AN OASIS OF JOY IN THE DESERT
<div data-id=""21432958""><figure style=""margin: 0px

We Respect for the balance of desert ecosystem. The basketball court will be a green oasis built 100% on recycled materials, respecting the environment, while offering the kids and future generations a durable and resistant magical place be happy and play.
• Menorca, Balearic Islands, Spain
<div data-id=""21432802""><figure style=""margin: 0px
<div data-id=""21570954""><figure style=""margin: 0px
THE ART OF CRAFT: A POPULAR PROCESS THAT WE KEEP INTACT.

All Martinycas are Exclusively Reinvented with the real recyled wheel´s car. 150 Footwear factories closed last year only in the Balearic Islands, (Menorca) due to the presence of ""low-cost"" fashion and the entrance of Asian market, where the value of handmade footwear has been lost. We are proud to say that we make our Martinycas as nobody no longer does. First, we follow an artisan statement that keeps a tradition alive that we are loosing in Spain.
<div data-id=""21432971""><figure style=""margin: 0px
<div>
Small changes can make a big difference, that`s why we let you know all the details...
<div data-id=""21433087""><figure style=""margin: 0px
<ul><li>
THE HIDEN SECRET OF THE HEEL STRAP
The strap must be  made of real tire. The key to remain in place
<div>
The real tire never lost elasticity .The strap is made of  tire, reinforced with leather and is the only way to deal with perfect-fitting abarcas.

Letter of the founder:
"" Due to my family tradition and despite my 160 cm´s I started playing basketball in my backyard when I was only 7. After more than 20 years playing basketball, I still can’t dunk
column2: ) but it has been a key guide to my principles and values: happiness and learning continuously. Sports has the power to change, and today it has brought us here to bring an oasis of joy to the desert for kids that are born in the Sahara and don’t have the opportunity to find those guides to overcome everyday obstacles. A shoe should do something more than just cover pretty feet. That is why MMARTINYCA has joined quality and comfort, without forgetting fashion, with a clear purpose: a conscience sustainability, where the economic benefit has the same importance as the benefits for people and Nature.

column1: We have designed this special collection to start building on sand. I hope you like it and enjoy helping create this dream in the desert!
Many Thanks for the support! María

Check out Kim in our latest video! http://vimeo.com/62646079
What would we do with $50,000?  MAKE A LOT OF NOISE!  Focused, targeted, broad and far-reaching, all over the planet!  We’d really get the word out!  MOOD WATCH!
Hi. My name is Kimberly Knox. I am an inventor, and it just so happens that I also have Bipolar I.

Not long ago I was sitting in the art room of a psychiatric hospital at about 4:00 a.m.  Again. Crazy, right?  You bet, and at the time, nothing weighed heavier on my mind than figuring out what I could do about this condition once and for all.

I decided to begin tracking my different moods so I could understand myself better. I assembled five colored pencils and a notebook and began creating charts that tracked how I felt, my blood pressure and pulse before and after meditating, my sleep patterns and changes in medications. Day after day I kept track of all of this information with the hope that one day I would better understand how my mind was functioning.
One of my original hospital charts.
Charting all of this information three times each day took an enormous amount of time and energy. I knew there had to be an easier way. That’s when I began thinking:

“What if I were to create a quick and precise way to size myself up mentally, emotionally and physically throughout the day? What if I could create reminders to take my medications and supplements?  And what if I could accurately chart all of this information – including how I was feeling, sleeping and meditating for my personal reflection, or to share with my physician or therapist? This might help me start to pull my life together.”

With the help of two brilliant program developers – Adam Harris and Carson Whitsett of Ditty Labs – I put all of these ideas into a new mobile app available on the iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad, and Android devices called Mood Watch. Endorsed by the International Bipolar Foundation, Mood Watch empowers people who have mood disorders (like me) with tools that can help them live happier and more productive lives.
Kim Knox, sporting Mood Watch and her very solid weekly chart!

And better still, Mood Watch isn’t just for the few who are very sick, but for the many who have a depression that hangs on a little too heavily and for too long, for anxiety that unsteadies the hand and a feeling of an unnamed uneasiness that colors whole days—chalked up to “normal” when we know it’s not.  Poor feelings we have no words for, we just don’t feel right even though nothing’s really wrong.  Mood Watch is perfect for a whole lot of us.

column2: Working Device "" class=""lazy"" data-src=""https://d2oadd98wnjs7n.cloudfront.net/medias/683063/pictures/original/20130228091023-week_charts.jpg?1362071422"" src="""" style="""" title=""Mood Watch Chart ""/>

column1: Original storyboard drawing--and the working device!

Mood Watch makes it simple to keep track of how you’re feeling throughout the day so you can better understand your mood patterns. It also makes it easier to have a proactive discussion with your doctor or therapist about the unique feelings you’ve experienced between office visits.
Here's how it works:
<ul>
• When you wake up in the morning you evaluate your overall feeling, mark the number of hours you slept and the quality of your sleep.

• Next, take your blood pressure and pulse with a wrist monitor. We recommend a wrist monitor which costs about $18. It’s worth every penny, and the measurements lend a powerful biofeedback aspect to the program.

• After you take your blood pressure and pulse we advise you to meditate for 3 - 5 minutes before taking your blood pressure and pulse again. If you don't notice a difference before and after, you will with a bit of practice. Over time you will become calmer and you'll find that your body will remain calmer (with practice) even when your mind might be a few steps ahead.

• Next, with Mood Watch you will begin constructing your chart.  By sliding buttons into place, you are able to rate your levels of anxiety, your overall mood, level of calmness, focus and/or mindfulness and energy on a scale of negative 5 to positive 5.  You’ll see these patterns immediately reflected in the weekly view. And each of these categories are fully customizable.  For example, just tap on the word, ""calm"" and change it to ""joy"" if you'd like to track this emotion instead.

• If you have specific details about your day that you'd like to record, you can add personal notes describing your morning, afternoon and evening.  These notes can be particularly valuable in interpreting your chart later.

• Clicking on the Report icon at any time during the week will allow you to examine all the information you’ve recorded. These beautiful and easy-to-read reports can be used for your personal reference, or emailed to your physician or therapist for discussion during your next office visit.

• Mood Watch also offers you the ability to enter the names of the supplements or medications you are taking so you can track whether you're following your regimen as planned or as directed by your physician.

• For more general information, the Info button provides general information about the app, an ""Alarms"" button to serve as a reminder to chart your overall well being, and a ""Feedback button to share your Mood Watch experience. It’s that simple.

Here’s what people are saying about Mood Watch:

""I want to applaud you for your giant undertaking in terms of understanding the connection between internal reactions and their affect on mood and our body systems.  Something I have been trying to achieve for decades.  It looks like you are doing a great service.  I totally enjoyed working with it.""
Dr. L.
Why Indiegogo?
Because we need the world to know.
According to the National Institutes of Mental Health more than 21 million people in the U.S. alone suffer from mood disorders.

We believe that closely tracking one's feelings throughout the day, every day is a great way to better understand one's mood patterns, and that daily mood tracking also has the potential to make discussions with a physician or therapist even more constructive by providing insight into a person's mood changes over time.

Mood Watch is currently available on the iPhone, iPod touch and Android devices in English. Come June 2013, with the help of your donation, it will also be available in French, German, Italian, Japanese, Mandarin Chinese, Spanish, Dutch, Macedonian, and Ukranian.
Mood Watch is endorsed by:
International Bipolar Foundation (http://www.internationalbipolarfoundation.org/)
What will $50,000 of your Indiegogo support allow us to fund?
The translation of Mood Watch into six languages - French, German, Italian, Japanese, Mandarin Chinese, Spanish, Dutch, Macedonian, and Ukranian.
Speaking engagements at conferences around the world
Marketing and public relations
Global wire/press release services

Thank you to everyone who contributes to the Mood Watch IndieGoGo campaign. Your donation will help people worldwide gain access to tools that can help them live happier and more productive lives. You are a hero!
THANK YOU!
BiPolar perk:
Haute Apiculture: Kim's handmade bee veil
You KNOW the honey's gonna bee good!

Introduction

Whenever I say that I am going to be commencing my PhD in War Studies, I am always asked why I like to study something as terrible as war. My response is always the same, “Peace cannot be kept by force, it can only be achieved by understanding.”

While Einstein had a slightly different context in mind for this statement, I have adopted it to the belief that by understanding conflict, and the root causes of it, we can find new innovative ways to approach, manage and prevent it. In the case of my research, this will be done by focusing on and promoting the unique and positive role that women in politics can play in addressing critical human security issues, and the important link this has to managing and preventing hard security issues (ex. terrorism).

In September 2013, I will begin my PhD at King's College in London, UK, in the Department of War Studies and am raising funding for this research and field work. This department is considered the best in the world for its field, and the university itself in the top 20. More importantly than just the research, I aim to prove the many practical benefits gained by bringing more women to the political table and show what positive impact this can have in ensuring more stable and secure societies, as well as publish my findings and contributing to the larger policy discussion so we can find more hand-ons ways to get women involved.
Summary

I am a journalist, researcher and project manager that has lived and worked across the globe. My international work and volunteer experience around the world, as well as my academic research into the topic of women’s political participation undertaken in my undergraduate and graduate studies, has proven that there can be significant benefits to states experiencing conflict or security concerns that ensure the inclusion of women in significant political roles. These expand far beyond the idea of ‘fairness’ and universal human rights and include economic stability, a focus on key devlopment issues (such as education, food security and health care) and unique approaches to issues of human and state security. A full thesis outline can be found under Gallery - Files. This idea was initially sparked by the touching story of a woman named Consolée Mukanyiligira I interviewed in Rwanda for my first documentary, who following the genocide was finishing her law degree while raising twelve children (six of which were not her own) and was focused on promoting reconciliation and moving her country forward. Her insipirational story, as well as other similiar interviews and research of countries such as Turkey, Palestine, Mozambique and Yemen, which led to my meeting Nobel Peace Prize winner Tawakkol Karman in 2011, the importance of this topic has only increased.

My predominant motivation behind this research is to show why women’s political representation is imperative for the long-term economic advancement, security and stabilization of not only countries experiencing high levels of conflict, but how this is also relevent to our own backyards. Having come from the crime capital of Canada, where some of our own rates of poverty and violence match those in former conflict zones, this research is as relevent to managing security at home as it is to the countries which we are helping to secure. This is a topic I have dedicated many years of my life to and am now making this a full-time research and career focus.

My research was also promoted in a recent Leader Post article and also had UN Women's Watch ( https://twitter.com/UNWomenWatch/favorites ) favourite me on Twitter. I have also had support from Deputy Leader to the Liberal Party Ralph Goodale as well as CBC 'Q's Jian Ghomeshi.
What I Need and What You Get

I aim to raise $21,877.53, for this research. This will help cover a fraction of the costs related to my research, fieldwork in Mali and Yemen and related expenses. To give an idea of the cost of research, by the time I will have completed this project, I will have spent over $100,000 on tuition alone (largely self-funded and excluding living and travel expenses).

I have already contributed articles to international publications as well as done presentations for government bodies, such as the Ministry of Social Services. As such, I am offering some 'perks' for donations, which you can see on the top right of the screen.
Your support, even $10 or $20, will help bring voice to a critical topic that currently has little voice in the policy field.
Other Ways You Can Help

If you, or anyone you know, may be interested in this, please spread the word! You can share this on Facebook, Tweet it, or email it (all options are available below). Even if you cannot donate, I would like to at least spread awareness about this topic and encourage your thoughts and feedback.
The Impact

This research will play two distinct roles: helping to draw attention to two countries whose current security situations have affected and engaged countries as far away as Canada and the U.S. and also helping promote an emerging, alternative policy perspective that we can use in analyzing security approaches at home.

Yemen and Mali are states with severe levels of poverty, high youth populations and a number of similar problems related to development, particularly in the areas of education, literacy, and health. Both countries are struggling with transitional governments and separatist movements which threaten to further destabilize the country and worse. Yemen and Mali have also both become hubs for international terrorist organizations (the latest threats by al-Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula in August 2013 shut down embassies across the region), providing training grounds and bases from which to strike in the region and abroad creating clear and distinct threats not only within the country, but around the world. The two countries also share a number of other characteristics, such as low levels of women’s political representation. The original research within this thesis could greatly contribute to the future considerations within both countries in the areas of national security policy as well as international engagement and assistance.

Though it may seem a world away, these two countries can also offer unique insights to us. Looking at some of the key factors currently affecting the development and stability of Mali and Yemen, we can take these countries as case studies to reflect on some of the fundamental building blocks of human security, defined as security of the individual in his or her personal surroundings, community, and environment, in our own backyard.

I already have a strong academic record for which I have acheived distinction, awards and honours for my international research. This will continue during my doctoral studies. My PhD proposal is available at the bottom of the 'Gallery' tab to anybody who wanted to look into this further and I would be happy to answer any questions anyone may have about my research or background more generally.
","Introduction

Whenever I say that I am going to be commencing my PhD in War Studies, I am always asked why I like to study something as terrible as war. My response is always the same, “Peace cannot be kept by force, it can only be achieved by understanding.”

While Einstein had a slightly different context in mind for this statement, I have adopted it to the belief that by understanding conflict, and the root causes of it, we can find new innovative ways to approach, manage and prevent it. In the case of my research, this will be done by focusing on and promoting the unique and positive role that women in politics can play in addressing critical human security issues, and the important link this has to managing and preventing hard security issues (ex. terrorism).

In September 2013, I will begin my PhD at King's College in London, UK, in the Department of War Studies and am raising funding for this research and field work. This department is considered the best in the world for its field, and the university itself in the top 20. More importantly than just the research, I aim to prove the many practical benefits gained by bringing more women to the political table and show what positive impact this can have in ensuring more stable and secure societies, as well as publish my findings and contributing to the larger policy discussion so we can find more hand-ons ways to get women involved.

Our planet is currently experiencing the highest levels of human displacement in history. In 2016 alone, over 65 million people were forcibly displaced worldwide. On top of that, 20 more people are displaced every single minute. Seek Refuge uses our voice and products to increase awareness around this crisis, and donates a portion of proceeds to refugee aid programs. Currently, we are working with two schools in Jordan which educate Syrian children living in refugee camps, who otherwise would not have access to education.

We want women to feel empowered when they wear a Seek Refuge piece. Too often, we are subjected to the stereotypes that surround us as Muslim women. It is time to dismantle those stereotypes. Our clothes are designed to allow women who practice all levels of modesty to represent their faith in a hype and fashion-forward way. Seek Refuge is edgier and more versatile than the typical modest fashion brand, so our clothes can be worn as streetwear or as modest fashion. (Because modesty is a badass choice and not a form of oppression... #wakeup.)

Seek Refuge combines Islamic aesthetics with American style to produce artistic, fashion forward clothing for the millennial Muslim. In today's social and political climate, it is more important than ever to accurately represent American Muslims in society. We must reclaim Islam for what it is—a peaceful religion surrounded by beautiful, diverse cultures. By incorporating Arabic and Islamic themes into our designs, Seek Refuge is closing the gap between the East and the West.

column2: >Images and videos seen on this campaign are of prototype samples. When we move to production, items will have finer details, brighter colors, and even richer fabrics!

column1: The Refuge Jacket is our flagship piece. It features high quality, carefully selected Turkish denim, branded vintage copper buttons, and subtle distressing. The oversized fit was meticulously designed to be both modest and edgy. This jacket is the embodiment of our mission to aid refugees. The Arabic script on the back was handwritten by a Muslim calligrapher. The poem, written by a Syrian refugee, reads:

column2:
>“Once we were at least happy. There once was peace where we resided
In our land of birth
column3:
our homeland. We never anticipated this
That war would tear us apart and leave us miserable this way
We witnessed so powerlessly our brothers and sisters brutalized
Our homes and properties burnt, and then came our displacement
We have hopes but in despair. We cried peace but in bloodshed
That oh, we’d better seek refuge. We ran for our dear lives
Hunting for safety across the borders our dreams seem direly shattered
As we seek for a new homeland, in a land where no one wants us.”

column1: You will want to LIVE in this hoodie. This cotton fleece blend is built to last long and provide ultimate comfort, with extra-long bell sleeves. The No Nazr design brings light to a side of Islamic culture often unseen (or appropriated) by the west. It was inspired by the Islamic concept of seeking protection from the envious—also known as the evil eye. Nazr carries the meaning of evil eye in Urdu and Hindi.

The Search For You tee represents the spiritual journey of the Muslim woman. We guarantee that you'll want to wear it more than your other tees, which is okay because it'll outlast everything else you own. The sleeves are made with mesh, allowing the tee to breathe in all the right places, and feature a branded border. The text on it reads Seek Refuge in Arabic, while the graphic represents the journey we are all on to find God. It is a nod to the strength of women who face more obstacles and critics in their journey to find peace and balance between religion and culture, which is often just handed to their male counterparts.

Seek Refuge is not only dedicated to raising awareness around the refugee crisis, but also to aiding those affected by the crisis. That's why we are working with two schools in Jordan which educate Syrian children living in refugee camps. We believe that education is crucial to empowering people displaced from their homes. As Nelson Mandela said, ""Education is the  most powerful weapon which you can use to change the  world.""

column3: '>The Mafraq School in Mafraq, Jordan has 100 children enrolled between the ages of 5 and 10. The Amman Senior School in Amman, Jordan has enrolled 150 pupils aged between the ages of 17 and 20, of which 27 students recently secured admission to universities and colleges. Seek Refuge funds will be used for teacher salaries, school supplies, and necessities for the students.

column1: If you didn't already know, fast fashion seriously sucks. When clothes are made quickly and cheaply, they are almost always a product of harmful labor practices and unethical sourcing. Seek Refuge is taking a stand against fast fashion by creating high quality products using an ethical and fair supply chain. We manufacture in Istanbul, Turkey, where the factories we partner with are Sedex certified, and create jobs for refugees. From production to purchase, Seek Refuge products are creating a positive impact.

Hi, I’m Shazia Ijaz, founder and CEO of Seek Refuge. I'm a 25 year-old Pakistani American Muslim, born and raised in Michigan. I attended the University of Michigan Ross School of Business and graduated with a BBA. After graduating, I went on to work at Poshmark, a Silicon Valley fashion-tech startup. There, I learned the ins and outs of the startup world. Unfortunately, multiple concussions from horseback riding made working regular hours extremely difficult. I realized that I would have to forge my own path, one that allowed me to take care of my health as well as fulfill my life ambitions. So, I decided to combine my love of fashion with my determination to change the world by starting Seek Refuge.

As a Muslim woman, I saw too few lines catering to girls like myself. There were no Islamic women’s brands which appealed to all Muslim women, who practice different levels of modesty. Furthermore, the modest fashion brands that did exist were all fairly feminine in their designs. Nothing fit the style of the fashion-forward, edgy, millennial Muslim woman. This gap inspired Seek Refuge.

The Seek Refuge mission was created to represent three groups that have been heavily targeted since the 2016 election: refugees, women, and Muslims. While Donald Trump was admitting fewer refugees, reinforcing misogynistic attitudes, and banning Muslims from traveling, Seek Refuge was raising awareness around these issues. Even before the brand has sold a single item, it has been able to educate people about the refugee crisis through social media marketing.
I hope you join our movement to change the narrative around these groups, and make a difference in refugee children's lives. Seek Refuge can't be a reality without backers like you!

Our team is confident in our ability to fulfill your orders and bring you high quality products. But as with any new venture, things could go wrong. The funds raised are largely going to manufacturing expenses, and we have a strong relationship with an ethical manufacturer in Istanbul, Turkey. However, there could be unforeseen circumstances during production and fulfillment. If this does happen, Seek Refuge will update you accordingly so you are always in the loop. Our end goal is to deliver high-end clothing that empowers Muslim women and contributes to refugee aid. We will do everything possible to reach that goal!

Seek Refuge has already funded the design and development of our prototypes. For each item, we have tech packs, patterns, grading, and design files. Now, we need $20,000 to produce the collection. This includes purchasing fabrics, visiting the factory in Istanbul, refining trims, paying for production, designing packaging, and getting your orders to you. Plus, a portion of proceeds will be donated to two refugee schools in Jordan.
Do you make men's items?

For this campaign only, the Refuge Jacket is available in a men's style! When checking out, you'll have the option to select your style (men's vs women's) and your size (small, medium, or large). Men should select their standard t-shirt size.
Where do you manufacture?

We're saying no to fast fashion and unfair labor. Seek Refuge uses an ethical manufacturing facility in Istanbul, Turkey that has been certified by a non-profit organization to practice fair labor standards. Furthermore, the facility employs refugees who have resettled in Istanbul.
How much goes to refugee aid?

We're working hard to make the biggest impact possible on the refugee crisis. At this stage, at least 10% of our funding will be donated to refugee schools in Jordan. The more money we raise, the higher that percentage will be. Essentially, we are committed to donating all funds remaining after expenses are paid.
Can I wear Seek Refuge if I'm not Muslim?

Yes! We've been asked this by more than a few allies, and it is a seriously woke question. If you aren't Muslim, but consider yourself a Muslim ally or have Muslim friends, we encourage you to join our movement. Just be sure to understand the message behind the brand and the pieces before you rep!

column3: '>Are the images on this page the final products?

column1: What you see on this page and in the video are prototypes, so they do not represent the final production quality. When we move to production, items will have finer details, brighter colors, and even richer fabrics. We'll update you along the way if you back this project so you know exactly what to anticipate!
What size should I get?
Check out our size guide here!
I want a personalized jacket. Where can I add the personalization?
We'll send out a survey at the end of the campaign period to ask for this and other details!

column2: >The Mongolian winters are very long and cold. Nights of minus 40 Celsius are common in the mountainous regions, yet Yaks can survive the freezing temperatures with their “heavy armor” – their long woolly coats. With a Woolie shirt, you can feel the same warmth.

column1: <h3 style=""text-align: center

column2: >We are a team of friends that work in the mining industry in Mongolia. Mining sites occupy big territories and affect the life of herders, in both good and bad ways.  We believe each one of us has a role in protecting the cultural heritage and traditional values of Mongolia.

>The herders live off the products of their animals. But many of them are selling all their livestock and leaving their homeland to become the urban unemployed. It is not the city lights that attract nomadic herders. It is a lack of adequate income that makes herders sacrifice their way of life.

>To help reverse this trend, we decided to create a product using this wonderful organic source and contribute to the preservation of our traditional nomadic life and culture.  As a result, we can provide warmth that everyone deserves in cold winters.

column3: >Note: If you ordering XXXL size Select size XXL and please type on Address line 2 (optional) ""XXXL""

column2: >The connection between herder and animals in Mongolia is unique.  Yaks shed their winter coat when spring comes. Our yak fiber is sourced only by hand-combing at that time, making it completely cruelty-free.

>An excessive increase in the number of cashmere goats in Mongolia has led to overgrazing and our grassland is in danger of desertification. Unlike goats, Yaks graze in high mountains, so they don’t contribute to overgrazing.
>Woolie is made with undyed, 100% organic fiber. It is hypoallergenic, and resistant to odor and water. Even if you're allergic to wool, you can wear Woolie worry-free.

>Woolie shirts are 100% organic, cruelty-free and environment-friendly just like the traditional Mongolian way of nomadic life which is all about harmony between nature, animal, and human beings. Woolie needs your support because:

column1: Woolie helps to preserve the nomadic way of life

column2: >Mongolia’s herder culture, one of the last on earth, is viewed by some as not being relevant in today’s modern world. But the herders are the only carriers of tangible and intangible heritages of nomadic culture. Your support will help nomads feel engaged and valued.

column1: We are trying to anticipate every possible risk we may face and are ready to overcome them and achieve our goal.
<ul>
<li style=""text-align: center
column2: >Quality control is the biggest challenge for mass production. We will ensure each product is checked fully before it gets to you.

column1: <li style=""text-align: center
column2:
>

Shipping can also be a bit challenging, as Mongolia is a landlocked country. We will try our best to make sure the Woolie you choose comes to your door efficiently. To do this, we may contact you once or twice during the shipment.
>CAN I SUPPORT WOOLIE IN OTHER WAYS THAN GIVING MONEY?
>Yes! Sharing our story with your friends and family both online and offline would be a huge support to us. You can share our campaign using link: http://igg.me/at/woolie or

column1: ","The Mongolian winters are very long and cold. Nights of minus 40 Celsius are common in the mountainous regions, yet Yaks can survive the freezing temperatures with their “heavy armor” – their long woolly coats. With a Woolie shirt, you can feel the same warmth.

We are a team of friends that work in the mining industry in Mongolia. Mining sites occupy big territories and affect the life of herders, in both good and bad ways.  We believe each one of us has a role in protecting the cultural heritage and traditional values of Mongolia.

The herders live off the products of their animals. But many of them are selling all their livestock and leaving their homeland to become the urban unemployed. It is not the city lights that attract nomadic herders. It is a lack of adequate income that makes herders sacrifice their way of life.

To help reverse this trend, we decided to create a product using this wonderful organic source and contribute to the preservation of our traditional nomadic life and culture.  As a result, we can provide warmth that everyone deserves in cold winters.
Size chart (women)
Size chart (men)
Note: If you ordering XXXL size Select size XXL and please type on Address line 2 (optional) ""XXXL""

The connection between herder and animals in Mongolia is unique.  Yaks shed their winter coat when spring comes. Our yak fiber is sourced only by hand-combing at that time, making it completely cruelty-free.

An excessive increase in the number of cashmere goats in Mongolia has led to overgrazing and our grassland is in danger of desertification. Unlike goats, Yaks graze in high mountains, so they don’t contribute to overgrazing.
Woolie is made with undyed, 100% organic fiber. It is hypoallergenic, and resistant to odor and water. Even if you're allergic to wool, you can wear Woolie worry-free.

Woolie shirts are 100% organic, cruelty-free and environment-friendly just like the traditional Mongolian way of nomadic life which is all about harmony between nature, animal, and human beings. Woolie needs your support because:
Woolie helps to preserve the nomadic way of life

Mongolia’s herder culture, one of the last on earth, is viewed by some as not being relevant in today’s modern world. But the herders are the only carriers of tangible and intangible heritages of nomadic culture. Your support will help nomads feel engaged and valued.
Risk and challenges
We are trying to anticipate every possible risk we may face and are ready to overcome them and achieve our goal.
Quality control is the biggest challenge for mass production. We will ensure each product is checked fully before it gets to you.

Shipping can also be a bit challenging, as Mongolia is a landlocked country. We will try our best to make sure the Woolie you choose comes to your door efficiently. To do this, we may contact you once or twice during the shipment.
CAN I SUPPORT WOOLIE IN OTHER WAYS THAN GIVING MONEY?
Yes! Sharing our story with your friends and family both online and offline would be a huge support to us. You can share our campaign using link: http://igg.me/at/woolie or",25.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/woolie-extremely-warm-yak-fiber-clothing/pica

Reality

Everyday. On our way to work, to school, to the store...we pass them. Homeless people, people who need our help, we pass them. We may smile, we may give some change, we may pretend they don't exist. Everyday. 
I could easily be one of those people. I often live paycheck to paycheck, struggling to make sure that my children have what they need.
If not for my family...I would have been homeless a few years ago when my husband was hurt and unable to work. I would have been that person that you pass on the street everyday, someone that you would judge, or think ""why doesn't she get a job,"" someone who needs help. 
Homeless people deserve respect, deserve not to be judged, and deserve our help in their time of need.
My sons and I are going to be putting together backpacks filled with necessities... things that we take for granted, things that just may give someone else a little hope, another chance.
Please donate so that we can purchase backpacks, toiletries, non-perishable food items, books, notebooks, etc.  We will share these backpacks with the homeless of Central Ohio. We will remind them that they are just like us and sometimes everyone needs a little help.

<h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >Jinni works independently of any Echo or Google home devices.

column1: <h3 style=""text-align: center

column1: ​
<h3 align=""center"">
“Okay Google” is great at answering questions, getting directions and sending messages.
<h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >“Hey Siri” is great for controlling your phone and automation.

column1: <h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >“ Hello Jinni?” is great at reading notifications and receiving calls.

column1: <h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >The best virtual assistants in a single portable device.

>                                    Jinni + Mobile Phone = All of your Voice Assistants.                                             Forget the other devices and make it simple! (Echo/GoogleHome not needed)

column1: **All backers who pre-order by December 20th will receive an e-mail certificate that you can gift to friends or family over the holidays.**
What if you could speak to whichever voice assistant you wanted, anytime and anywhere you wanted?  ""Alexa"" ""Okay Google"" ""Hey Siri ""Hello Jinni""...
Jinni is:
<ol>
• Wearable: Wear it with your Shirt or a Jacket
• Magnetic: Stick it on your Fridge or a Shower wall (Metal Sticker is required)
• Mountable: Mount it on a Steering Wheel of your Car (Car Mount is required)
• Portable: Carry it on your keychain or clip it on your Bag/Belt
• Water Resistant: Use it in the shower for music, information and never miss a call/notification
Advantages over popular device:

Versus Amazon Echo/Echo Dot: Smaller, Portable (wireless), Wearable, includes calls and messaging, Wi-Fi not required.
Versus Google Home/Mini: Smaller, Portable (wireless), Wearable, Wi-Fi not required.
Versus Amazon Tap: Smaller, includes Calls and Messaging, Wearable, Wi-Fi not required.
Your support of this product will bring take Jinni from prototype to production.
Jinni's form factor makes it convenient to mount to a steering wheel for hands free calling and voice commands.
<h3>What You Get &amp
Here we go:
<ul><li>If you back the Jinni, you will get one or multiple Jinnis depending on the perk you choose.<ol>
• Jinni allows you to automate your home/office, order stuff from the web, check facts, get directions, hail a ride, play music, read notifications, send messages and make phone calls.
• Jinni is the smallest and most portable form factor to utilize Alexa and other voice assistants to date.
Our goal is to reach $50,000 to bring the Jinni prototype into production.
<ul><li>We have completed the first batch of PCB assembly and we need to:<ul>
• Complete the final plastic tooling.
• Finish the FCC certification.
• Complete the training of the wake words.
• Improve APP design
• Complete the packaging design.
We are confident that we will complete the production rapidly and will deliver the Jinni(s) to you in promised time.
<ul>
• PCB’s are assembled (As seen in the video)
• Plastic soft tooling is complete (Jinni shown in the video was created using soft tool plastics).
• Software and APP are functional.
• Alexa integration is complete using Alexa Skills Kit (ASK).
Jinni is great at the gym with its built-in clip.
<h3 style=""text-align: center
About Voice Assistants

Amazon’s Alexa, Apple’s Siri, and Google’s Voice are revolutionary systems that include thousands of built-in features. Amazon Alexa is also an OS that boasts an ever-growing list of third-party applications, designed to allow you to control your technology with your voice. All three of these systems are getting better by the day, and they can control an increasing number of devices.

About Jinni
Jinni is a lot like a Sci-Fi Communicator that integrates Okay Google, Alexa, and Jinni (Android) – or Siri (iOS). Jinni allows you to experience all the great things about your favorite virtual assistants without having to pick favorites. It is the best of both worlds. And, with Jinni, you get a brand new virtual assistant to read your notifications or tell you time out loud without having to pick up your phone. Get a text? Jinni will read it out loud for you so you can instantly respond with a voice command or you can just touch-and-talk too.

The Jinni is a small Bluetooth button that integrates the power of Alexa, and Okay Google into one portable device for Android or Siri for IOS. Jinni is both wearable and magnetic. She can seamlessly go from your lapel to your refrigerator door, to your shower wall, to your steering wheel, to your purse. Jinni connects to your phone via Bluetooth and uses your phone’s data to connect to the Alexa, Siri, and Google Voice servers.
Unlike Echo, Echo Dot, or Tap, Jinni allows you make and receive phone calls and text messages from your existing phone number and is not bound to one room in your home/office.
Jinni is magnetic and water resistant, it is great in the shower with the optional metal sticker.
TECH SPECS:
Bluetooth:                                        Qualcomm 4.1 Dual BLE &
Audio:                                                Bi-directional Wideband Audio
Speaker:                                            Micro 1Watt
Mic:                                                    Micro High Sensitivity Mic
Touch:                                                Capacitive touch controller
Radio Frequency:                             2.4GHz to 2.48GHz
Waterproof                                      IP67
Charger                                              Custom magnetic Waterproof
Charging Time:                                 1 Hour
Charging Input:                                5V 200mA
Battery Type:                                    Lithium Ion Polymer 120mAh
Size:                                                     1.7” x 1.2” x 0.5” (thinner than a slim Zippo lighter)

Weight:                                               15 grams

*Requires a bluetooth enabled phone with a data plan*
HARDWARE FEATURES:
<ul>
• Always on Listening mode (can be disabled)
<li>High Quality Audio<ul>
• High volume (comparable to iPhone speaker mode)
• High sensitivity omni directional
• Auto gain based on ambient noise
• Noise and Echo cancellation
<li>Long battery life<ul>
• Up to 7 days in touch and talk mode
• Up to 10 hours in always listening mode
<li>Dual Touch Buttons<ul>
• Button A tap: Invoke Alexa
• Button B tap: Invoke Okay Google (Android) or Siri (iPhone)
<li>Button A Touch &amp
column2: Hold: Reads Time or Last Notification on phone (Android)

column1: <li>Button B Touch &amp
• Touch both buttons: Toggle Always on listening mode
<li>Multiple Attachments<ul>
• Wearable: Clips to shirt pocket, collar, or any part of a dress or handbag (can be easily concealed)
• Magnetic: attaches to metal surfaces as well as other surfaces (with optional magnetic stickers)
• Car Mountable: attach to your steering wheel and more (With car mount accessory)
• Keychain hole
<li>Water Resistant<ul>
• Use it in shower
• Use it in rain
The Impact
Your contribution goes a long way.
<ul>
• We believe Jinni will integrate voice assistants in a way that hasn't been achieved to date.

• We already have our PCB boards ready and waiting for us to begin manufacturing.  Our senior management has been spending almost all of their time overseeing all the details to have a successful manufacturing experience.  While we acknowledge the risk, we are committed to making this a project without significant delays.
• We have completed most of the hardware and software development so we can deliver a high-quality product in promised time.
<h3>Risks &amp
We understand that technology products face manufacturing challenges.  To that end, we have placed significant effort and expense to achieve the following:
<ul>
• Trustworthy and competent parts vendors.
• Trustworthy and competent manufacturing partners with a history of achieving deadlines.
• To avoid any unforeseen technical issues. We have assembled the first batch of PCB’s.
• We have done extensive testing using the PCB’s assembled in the plastic casing to make sure there no antenna issues and Bluetooth range and voice quality is good.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, you can still help!
<ul>
• Post the Jinni's website or Campaign page on social media
• Send a text with a link in the video to your friends, family, or colleagues.
Our Team of Engineers
<ul>
• We are a team of innovators, software developers, and engineers headquartered in Dallas, TX.  We are passionate about improving technology in daily life.
• We want to bring our Jinni prototype to production and unleash the power of voice assistants everywhere.
• We want to empower our contributors to harness the power of voice assistants wherever they go, whatever they're doing.
Our Expertise:
<ul>
• Mechanical design
• Industrial design
• Electronics and PCB design
• Embedded software
• IOT using Wireless technologies
• App Development

column4:
>

Optimized for - Work | Play | Travel

Our design was inspired by our own busy lifestyle. With a mix between office life, traveling to meet clients, or simply weekend getaways, we needed a bag that could look great yet was designed for maximum functionality. With this goal in mind, we set out to create a bag versatile enough to take on our weekend adventures but stylish and sleek enough for a business trip. 

Using only hand-selected premium materials and hardware, we are confident that your Agile Pack will withstand anthing you throw at it. We built the Agile Travel Backpack to be more versatile than ever. Its modular interior design allows you to pack for your specific lifestyle without missing a beat.

column42:
>

Industry Experience

Together the Agile team has been designing and manufacturing backpacks for over 25 years. We've designed and manufactured bags for companies like American Eagle, Honest Company, Santa Cruz, Independent and many more. With our background and experience, we're confident we can deliver a product of the highest quality, at a fraction of the retail price.

Designed From the Ground Up  

Over the years, we have come across many bag designs and materials we've wanted to incorporate into our own. A bag designed from the ground up with all aspects meticulously thought out to serve a purpose. It's designed to serve as your single backpack that can seamlessly transition between your lifestyles.  

We are excited to share with you The Agile Travel Backpack. It's built with only the highest quality materials on the market - no corners cut, Period. Its modular design allows you to pack for your current lifestyle, allowing you to seamlessly transition from work to travel.
column43:
>

Planned Obsolescence  

At the highest level of manufacturing, they build with a thing called planned obsolescence in mind. Basically, the amount of time they want the products you buy to last before it falls apart...We said enough...and set off to create our own - Better than ever.  

A Backpack Built To Last a Generation  

With over 25 years of industry experience, we've been able to leverage our supply, manufacturing, and distribution partners to source only the highest quality materials at scale - Quality components at a price only the Retail giants get. We're saying No more to ""Planned Obsolescence"". We're building these bags to the highest quality standards - built to last a generation.

Key Knows can be personalized by all

My name is Chloris of Hollywood, FL. and I along with my husband have wanted to run our own toy company. We finally have a chance with a patent-pending new toy we've created. We've saved up what we could and have funded as much as we could from 3D CADs to the engineering for functionality. Theofin and her family are long time family friends that believed in Key Knows and wanted to be a part of seeing this venture succeed.
This campaign is very important to us

The path towards getting our new toy into the market has not been easy and that is why this campaign is very important to us. We initially took our idea to a company for some help in order to get Key Knows in the market but during the meeting they unexpectedly offered to buy us out before we even got our start-up company off the ground. We respectfully declined and decided to continue this venture as we initially intended.

Once we neared manufacturing, we realized we needed more funds for production. We got in contact with an investor that was interested in giving us an interest loan. After he saw more details of our idea, he then wanted to buy equity in the company. The equity he was asking for was too high and he also wanted to rush the product out. We wanted to maintain creative control and also grow with the product we created, so rushing it into the market just to get quick money was not our goal. We're still in contact with the investor but would love to see if we can get Key Knows out and have longevity in the toy market.
Those were both true re-enactments that we included in our video with a bit of humor.
We've got this far but we really need help

What is needed now is the funding for molds and minimum purchase orders for the manufacturing. If we do not make our goal here, the production will be on hold but I along with friends and family will first and foremost, satisfy all the perks to the supporters of Key Knows and continue to save money in order to eventually reach the goal to get Key Knows into the market. It's going to happen and will take longer but the initial push with this campaign will be a much needed help.

We appreciate all the support we get and send our thanks in advance. Get the word out and please let others know about this campaign for Key Knows. A perfect opportunity to use the Indiegogo share tools!

If we more than exceed our goal, we will use the extra funds to green light the other Key Knows units already set-up for development. This would give us the opportunity to speed up the production process, which will enable us to easily make the estimated dates of the perks.
Key Knows

I've noticed how kids love to profess their affection for each other. Friendship bracelets have been a stable in these relationships for decades now. One of the revealing problems with some friendship bracelets is that they are not always easy to personalize. Key Knows are friendship bracelets that each have various amounts of chambers, that can be personalized with regular office tabs/labels. The labels can be printed on or manually personalized with a pen, pencil, crayon or any writing utensil of the users choosing.
Target age range : 5 yrs. and up.
Key Knows is a modern day twist of the age old friendship bracelet. They are easy to personalize and fun to share with friends.
- The chambers will have a spring action once opened with the key
Key Knows last minute addition/feature
We are happy to announce that we've found a manufacturer that will include a clock module into every Key Knows unit.
- Key Knows clock module

This was a last minute decision that we believed would benefit Key Knows as we make an attempt to introduce them into the market. Along with having fun with friends, they can have fun and keep track of time too.
How the Interchangeable key works
- This is the positioning feature on the side to ensure the key enters correctly without hitting the latches.
The Interchangeable Key

Each Key Knows bracelet comes with an Interchangeable key that allows its user to reveal their personalized chamber/tab whenever they want. With the Interchangeable key the user can reveal a single chamber at a time or reveal all the chambers at one time. This is all dependent on the notches the user chooses before interacting the key with the body of the friendship bracelet unit.

The Interchangeable key will be how you will access/open the chambers on the bracelet unit. The key will have labeled corresponding notches to their particular chambers. You can choose to open a single chamber or all of the chambers based on the notches you choose right before you interact it with the bracelet unit. It's kind of like a locket. The chambers will be spring action, which will be triggered open by the key.
- Interchangeable Watchbands
Each Key Knows friendship bracelet will be packaged with an extra watchband of a different color that will be easy to exchange.

The Key Knows bracelets will also come in a variety of fun shapes and future versions will be created to showcase different themes and events. The heart and star versions will be the initial offerings but we've already got specialty versions being prepped for development. Specialty versions will include shapes like footballs, butterflies and four leaf clovers for example. The creative possibilities are endless. We also plan to integrate more of the threading and weaving of traditional friendship bracelets with future offerings of the Key Knows bracelets.
Designed for boys and girls

Key Knows has been created to included everyone in order to promote friendship. Girls have their BFFs or Besties and boys have their BFFs or Best buds. We will have initial offerings for girls that have a cute and cuddly appeal and the boys will have versions that bring out more of a coolness factor.
Nobody knows but the Key Knows. Promoting friendship among our kids.
- Key Knows - The coolest and bestest friendship bracelets ever!!!
Communicating with supporters

Indiegogo has given us the opportunity to pursue this venture. We would like to acknowledge to all the supporters/funders that we will be here to answer any questions and/or concerns you may have. During this campaign, any questions sent to us will be replied to within 24 hours. We will also be more than happy to share more details on the specialy friendship bracelets.
Shop small and you invest big in a small business.
We send our thanks again in advance.
","Key Knows can be personalized by all

My name is Chloris of Hollywood, FL. and I along with my husband have wanted to run our own toy company. We finally have a chance with a patent-pending new toy we've created. We've saved up what we could and have funded as much as we could from 3D CADs to the engineering for functionality. Theofin and her family are long time family friends that believed in Key Knows and wanted to be a part of seeing this venture succeed.
This campaign is very important to us

The path towards getting our new toy into the market has not been easy and that is why this campaign is very important to us. We initially took our idea to a company for some help in order to get Key Knows in the market but during the meeting they unexpectedly offered to buy us out before we even got our start-up company off the ground. We respectfully declined and decided to continue this venture as we initially intended.

Once we neared manufacturing, we realized we needed more funds for production. We got in contact with an investor that was interested in giving us an interest loan. After he saw more details of our idea, he then wanted to buy equity in the company. The equity he was asking for was too high and he also wanted to rush the product out. We wanted to maintain creative control and also grow with the product we created, so rushing it into the market just to get quick money was not our goal. We're still in contact with the investor but would love to see if we can get Key Knows out and have longevity in the toy market.
Those were both true re-enactments that we included in our video with a bit of humor.
We've got this far but we really need help

What is needed now is the funding for molds and minimum purchase orders for the manufacturing. If we do not make our goal here, the production will be on hold but I along with friends and family will first and foremost, satisfy all the perks to the supporters of Key Knows and continue to save money in order to eventually reach the goal to get Key Knows into the market. It's going to happen and will take longer but the initial push with this campaign will be a much needed help.

We appreciate all the support we get and send our thanks in advance. Get the word out and please let others know about this campaign for Key Knows. A perfect opportunity to use the Indiegogo share tools!

If we more than exceed our goal, we will use the extra funds to green light the other Key Knows units already set-up for development. This would give us the opportunity to speed up the production process, which will enable us to easily make the estimated dates of the perks.
Key Knows

I've noticed how kids love to profess their affection for each other. Friendship bracelets have been a stable in these relationships for decades now. One of the revealing problems with some friendship bracelets is that they are not always easy to personalize. Key Knows are friendship bracelets that each have various amounts of chambers, that can be personalized with regular office tabs/labels. The labels can be printed on or manually personalized with a pen, pencil, crayon or any writing utensil of the users choosing.
Target age range : 5 yrs. and up.
Key Knows is a modern day twist of the age old friendship bracelet. They are easy to personalize and fun to share with friends.

Introducing Mu'Ron™
Mu'Ron was created by Amadeusz Topka &
column2: Faisal Afzal in 2010 by a mutual interest in luxury, fashion, and fine fragrances. Our goal is to use the highest quality oils to create a long lasting scent to enhance one's lifestyle. As Mu'Ron, our mission is to use environmental friendly resources and cutting edge technology to deliver the highest quality product. Our current focus was to design a basic air-freshener which will deliver a designer fragrance.

column1: As you may already know, air-freshener's today lack masculine and feminine aromas and are far from resembling the average cologne or perfume. Modern air-fresheners come in a variety of scents such as pine, cherry, vanilla, lemon, etc. however none of them posses the unique fragrance that is present in contemporary perfumes &
*Mu'Ron's M-3 Air-Freshener featured in a Porsche 911 Carrera S, redefining the way you hang.*
About our air-fresheners
A smell contributes a vital role to our degree of happiness and state of life. From sharpening the memory &
column2: influencing our emotions to the Pharaohs of ancient Egypt, scent has been cherished. It has always played an important role not only in our personal life but that of our society and culture. Over the past fourteen months, extensive work has been done in order to perfect the types of notes present in our air-fresheners &amp
column3: their unique way to distribute each scent. A total of ten individual fragrances were composed. Ranging from light to heavy, each one has a unique top, heart and base note arrangement for maximum fragrance disbursement.

column1: Our air-fresheners have been created through inspiration of the hight-end designer perfumes and colognes present in the market today. Plus, we use 100% recycled paper to help out our enviroment !
Let's get a bit technical.
What are fragrance 'notes'?
These are the ingredients used to make up any type of cologne, perfume or air-freshener and can range from plant and flower extracts to synthetically-created molecules.
What do the 'Top', 'Heart' and 'Base' categories mean?
Top Notes: Top notes are evident as soon as the fragrance is exposed. These are usually lighter than the other ingredients, and function by shaping the primary fragrance burst.

Heart or Middle Notes: Shortly after application, the top notes give way to the heart notes. These are usually floral, as most fruity notes are too light for this layer. These middle notes make up the core cologne, perfume or air-freshener as it is exposed to air, and it is these layers that define the ultimate dry down.

Base notes: The base notes determine how long a fragrance will last, and provide a background on which the heart notes can be appreciated. Interestingly, most fragrances have similar base notes, often including sandalwood, amber, musk and vanilla. This is because there are only a certain number of notes that will last long enough to form the base of a fragrance.
Design

Influenced by renowned brands, from automotive to fashion, our distinct design made by Amadeusz Topka is the first of its kind in the world of air-fresheners. A simple, sleek and sexy contour line featuring a golden hue for the gentleman, and a charming roseus pink for the lady will surely add beauty in any setting.

column2: tangy citrus notes. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Chrome by Azzaro.

column1: M-3: This scent is spicy, sweet, refreshing -- a fresh and fruity blend of sweet spice and woods. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Black by Kenneth Cole.
M-4: Offers a mature character punctuated by notes of citron, white pepper, Virginia cedar, vetiver, ginger &
column2: basil flower. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Hugo Boss for Men.

column1: M-5: Made from clary sage, rosemary, Brazilian rosewood, tonka bean, lavender, geranium, honey amber, musk and oak moss. A fragrance that can be enjoyed for all seasons. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of One Million by Paco Rabanne.
Women's Line

W-1: This scent is a composition of fresh and sweetly innocent blend of light florals, teas, bergamot trending down to light musks and patchouli. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Flower Bomb by Victor and Rolf.
W-2: Offers a clean, refreshing fragrance with a touch of floral jasmine, lily of the valley, and carnation. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Happy by Clinique.

W-3: Is composed from a fresh fruity citrus fragrance and has top-notes of grapefruit, apple, strawberries, clementine’s, a middle-note of peach, black currant and rose petals with a sweet white musky base note. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Love Spell by Victoria Secret.

W-4: This Vibrant and sensuous blend, offers a bursting aroma with clementine and cactus flowers, vanilla, orchid, and blackberry, ending with a soft white amber and pimento finish. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Very Sexy by Victoria Secret.
W-5: Has a very refined, flowery mix of fresh rose, ginger, marigold, violet, oakmoss and musk. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Romance by Ralph Lauren.

Introducing Mu'Ron™

Mu'Ron was created by Amadeusz Topka & Faisal Afzal in 2010 by a mutual interest in luxury, fashion, and fine fragrances. Our goal is to use the highest quality oils to create a long lasting scent to enhance one's lifestyle. As Mu'Ron, our mission is to use environmental friendly resources and cutting edge technology to deliver the highest quality product. Our current focus was to design a basic air-freshener which will deliver a designer fragrance.

As you may already know, air-freshener's today lack masculine and feminine aromas and are far from resembling the average cologne or perfume. Modern air-fresheners come in a variety of scents such as pine, cherry, vanilla, lemon, etc. however none of them posses the unique fragrance that is present in contemporary perfumes & colognes.
*Mu'Ron's M-3 Air-Freshener featured in a Porsche 911 Carrera S, redefining the way you hang.*
About our air-fresheners

A smell contributes a vital role to our degree of happiness and state of life. From sharpening the memory & influencing our emotions to the Pharaohs of ancient Egypt, scent has been cherished. It has always played an important role not only in our personal life but that of our society and culture. Over the past fourteen months, extensive work has been done in order to perfect the types of notes present in our air-fresheners & their unique way to distribute each scent. A total of ten individual fragrances were composed. Ranging from light to heavy, each one has a unique top, heart and base note arrangement for maximum fragrance disbursement.
Our air-fresheners have been created through inspiration of the hight-end designer perfumes and colognes present in the market today. Plus, we use 100% recycled paper to help out our enviroment !
Let's get a bit technical.
What are fragrance 'notes'?
These are the ingredients used to make up any type of cologne, perfume or air-freshener and can range from plant and flower extracts to synthetically-created molecules.
What do the 'Top', 'Heart' and 'Base' categories mean?
Top Notes: Top notes are evident as soon as the fragrance is exposed. These are usually lighter than the other ingredients, and function by shaping the primary fragrance burst.

Heart or Middle Notes: Shortly after application, the top notes give way to the heart notes. These are usually floral, as most fruity notes are too light for this layer. These middle notes make up the core cologne, perfume or air-freshener as it is exposed to air, and it is these layers that define the ultimate dry down.

Base notes: The base notes determine how long a fragrance will last, and provide a background on which the heart notes can be appreciated. Interestingly, most fragrances have similar base notes, often including sandalwood, amber, musk and vanilla. This is because there are only a certain number of notes that will last long enough to form the base of a fragrance.
Design

Influenced by renowned brands, from automotive to fashion, our distinct design made by Amadeusz Topka is the first of its kind in the world of air-fresheners. A simple, sleek and sexy contour line featuring a golden hue for the gentleman, and a charming roseus pink for the lady will surely add beauty in any setting.
Our Standard Design
*Standard Air-Freshener design for the Women's & Men's line.*
Our Signature Series Designs
*Signature Series Air-Freshener designs featuring both signatures (Amadeusz Topka & Faisal Afzal) of the creators for the Women & Men's line.*
The Fragrance
Our two lines of air-fresheners are available for Men & Women and have a numerical subcategory which provides more ease in choosing a particular scent.
Note*
Please inform our team by writing in the comments section or by emailing us at muronaf@gmail.com after a particular fragrance has been chosen.
Men's Line
M-1: Has a refined touch of oriental, woody fragrance with a hint of exotic spice, cinnamon, jasmine, honey, tobacco, & vetiver. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Joop for Men.
M-2: This is a very masculine scent which is composed of sharp, crisp, & tangy citrus notes. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Chrome by Azzaro.
M-3: This scent is spicy, sweet, refreshing -- a fresh and fruity blend of sweet spice and woods. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Black by Kenneth Cole.
M-4: Offers a mature character punctuated by notes of citron, white pepper, Virginia cedar, vetiver, ginger & basil flower. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Hugo Boss for Men.

M-5: Made from clary sage, rosemary, Brazilian rosewood, tonka bean, lavender, geranium, honey amber, musk and oak moss. A fragrance that can be enjoyed for all seasons. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of One Million by Paco Rabanne.
Women's Line

W-1: This scent is a composition of fresh and sweetly innocent blend of light florals, teas, bergamot trending down to light musks and patchouli. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Flower Bomb by Victor and Rolf.
W-2: Offers a clean, refreshing fragrance with a touch of floral jasmine, lily of the valley, and carnation. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Happy by Clinique.

W-3: Is composed from a fresh fruity citrus fragrance and has top-notes of grapefruit, apple, strawberries, clementine’s, a middle-note of peach, black currant and rose petals with a sweet white musky base note. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Love Spell by Victoria Secret.

W-4: This Vibrant and sensuous blend, offers a bursting aroma with clementine and cactus flowers, vanilla, orchid, and blackberry, ending with a soft white amber and pimento finish. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Very Sexy by Victoria Secret.
W-5: Has a very refined, flowery mix of fresh rose, ginger, marigold, violet, oakmoss and musk. As a reference, this aroma is similar to that of Romance by Ralph Lauren.
Duration

Spending fourteen months on development of our unique aromas taught us a lot ! In fact we perfected the the art of scent composition to a level which matches that of the leading fragrance brands. We are proud to say that our air-fresheners last 3 to 4 times longer then those currently available in the market.
*The Standard & Signature designs are made to accommodate any enclosed space ranging from automotive to home and office.*
Packaging

We love elegance & perfection !!! When you back our project you will receive our air-freshener/'s in an elegant cellophane package unlike any other currently out in the market. Each Scent will be marked with the appropriate letter and a corresponding number. Below are two examples of how the finished packaging will look like.
*Each individual air-freshener will be packed in a cellophane package with a unique fullback package as presented above.*
Exclusive Mu'Ron Poster

*An exclusive high gloss 36""x 24"" Poster, featuring most of the major automobile brand name's along with the Founder's & Co-Founder's signatures. Poster is only available for the Signature Series & Collector Edition bundles.*

Our vision will eventually lead to more innovative and technological breakthroughs in scent development and its distribution. What sets our air-freshener's apart from others is their unique designer fragrance and distinctive shape. Thus far we (Amadeusz Topka & Faisal Afzal) have primarily been working with designer oils which are blended from the most purest and highest quality materials, as our aim is to alleviate the current air-fresheners in today's market to an entirely different level. There is no doubt that we will set the standard and revolutionize the current air-freshener market, which will develop new trends in fashion and style. Mu'Ron's air-fresheners will be a great addition to your daily life and will surely add a touch of sophistication, class, and elegance wherever you may be.
Why we need your help to make our dream a reality

For the past two years we (Faisal & Amadeusz) have put our heart & soul to make this project live, unfortunately as last year college students we are very limited on funds. We are asking for $16,500 as the minimum to get this project up and running, our goal is to be the first one's to cater designer air-fresheners on the planet !!!
If successfully funded, your generous funds will go towards the following
column2: fragrance oil manufacturing, and the production of the air-fresheners.

column1: However, if our project will not reach its funding goal we will still provide the same quality air-fresheners but without the elegant package (as it requires a minimum order quantity).
Risks & Challenges

We have faced many challenges in development and testing of our Air-Fresheners. Thus far, we have achieved what we wanted and surpassed our expectations. However it wasn't as easy as it may look, over the course of two years extensive amount of work was put in towards product development, research, and longevity of our air-fresheners. In collaboration with our manufacturer (which is located in the United States) we managed to significantly cut down the costs of production while maintaining product integrity. From fragrance to design & everything in between, our dedication (including nights & weekends) made the air-fresheners to what they currently are.
As for the few risks
column2: some may be encountered after our project is successfully funded & mainly pertain to shipping and manufacturing. However, since there will be no control over these circumstances (from our end) we will try to overcome them as best we can.

                                                     A BIG THANK YOU!

We would like to start by saying Thank You for taking time out of your busy schedule to support our project! Whether it's from donations, pre-orders, or spreading the word, we are forever indebted to you because without your support we couldn't make it!
INSPIRATION

This idea was created 4 years ago by my sister who is no longer with us. As an avid shopper she saw a need to create a product that would solve a problem that has been neglected for entirely too long! After damaging several pairs of shoes and wasting her hard earned money, she came to me with the idea. We knew the idea was good but for some reason we never acted up on it. Shortly after, she fell sick and never recovered. A couple of years flew by and the idea was still stuck in my head. It wasn't until I heard two people complain about how they hated driving while wearing their good shoes. The light came on and I knew that it was time! Now, I'm finally excited to introduce this product to the world!
SHOESKINZ

SHOESKINZ is a unique idea. It is designed to protect the shoes from scratches and scuff marks that occur while driving or riding in the car. I'm almost definite that if you have ever driven a car you can relate to this problem. I have several pairs of shoes that have been sitting in my closet for well over a year now because I'm afraid of wearing them due to this issue. Thanks to Shoeskinz, you can now throw away the old  tape tricks.

After making the first prototype we learned that this product has many more uses. With a few adjustments we converted the original design into what we call S2. S2 has broader straps and reflective material to provide visibility to the user while wearing at night. Cyclist, skateboarders, and joggers are just a few examples of people that can benefit from using the S2.

If I may assume, if there is one thing in the world that everyone has in common it is to dress nice. We all work hard for a living and love to treat ourselves sometimes. Money doesn't fall off of trees (unless you all know something I dont know) so you have to take care of what you have. With SHOESKINZ you can feel comfortable about wearing the shoes of your desire.
MATERIALS
I chose to make the Shoeskinz out of neoprene material because it is very durable,     flexible, and easy to clean.
The bottom is made of soling rubber (the same rubber on the bottom of your sneakers) so that your foot doesn't slip.
The S2 has highly reflective material on the back for extra visibility.
FUNDING

With the funds raised I will be able to run my first order. Most factories have minimum order quantities so this is why I need the $10,000. It will cover production and packaging. Anything over will be used to build the website and marketing. We will also test different materials to see if we can deliver you a better product.
*CHECK OUT THE GALLERY TO SEE IMAGES OF THE PRODUCT. THE TAB IS LOCATED JUST ABOVE THE VIDEO.
*PLEASE CHECK BACK FOR UPDATES AS WE WILL CONTINUE TO IMPROVE OUR PRODUCT AND PAGE.

column1:
Notre extraordinaire imprimeur se trouve à Barcelone en Espagne!
Il est le seul à nous permettre d’avoir ce format à prix raisonnable
tout en imprimant sur une presse Offset traditionnelle!

En d’autres termes, la collection se distinguera autant par la qualité
de son contenu photographique que par son design et sa finition.

L’ÉQUIPE

VALÉRIE  C’est elle qui fait clic! Depuis plus d’un an, c’est au pays du fish’n chip qu’elle presse le bouton de sa caméra. Entre deux afternoon teas, elle prend le temps de cogiter, de douter et de créer. Le photoreportage lifestyle est son terrain de jeu et elle y excelle. Telle une éternelle insatisfaite, elle souhaite élever son art à un autre niveau et s’impose, pendant son année d’expatriation, de faire une photo par jour (365). Ces images se doivent maintenant de vivre autrement qu’en pixels.

ELISE C’est elle qui fait déclic! Sa tête pleine d’idées bricole nos mots et nos images pour en faire des histoires. Workaholic et volubile, le design graphique est son carré de sable. Expatriée d'abord à Amsterdam, c’est entre deux coups de pédale qu’elle prend le temps de cogiter, de douter, de créer. C’est désormais de son grenier en France qu’elle accumule les mandats créatifs
et les reconnaissances. Telle une éternelle insatisfaite, elle cherche depuis longtemps un projet où elle pourra explorer pleinement sa liberté conceptuelle.

VOTRE CONTRIBUTION

Vous devinerez que nous n’avons pas les moyens de nos ambitions.
Mais tel Oscar Wilde nous pensons que «toute personne qui vit à la hauteur
de ses moyens souffre d’un manque d’imagination». Nous pensons aussi
que «plus on est de fous, plus on rit!». C’est en mélangeant ces deux leçons
de vie que l’idée du crowdfunding nous est venue en tête. 

Votre aide nous aidera à couvrir les frais de papier, d’impression et une partie des envois postaux. En retour, vous recevrez vos cahiers (1, 3, 6 ou 12 cahiers dépendant de votre participation. Voir colonne des contributions). 
Surtout, vous mériterez notre éternelle gratitude!!!! 

NOTRE ÉCHÉANCIER

Nous projetons d’aller en impression en août. En septembre 2014, vous serez conviés à un lancement à Montréal où vous pourrez collecter vos exemplaires. Si vous ne pouvez y être, vous recevrez un joli colis dans votre boîte à lettres (peu importe dans quel coin du monde vous demeurez). 

LES RISQUES

Si nous n’atteignons pas notre objectif nous ferons tout pour vous acheminer vos cahiers. Nous diminuerons les dimensions prévues (pour acheter moins de papier) et nous devrons peut-être nous tourner vers de l'impression numérique. Les solutions existent mais nous espérons ne pas y avoir recours!

MERCI DE VOTRE INTÉRÊT!


THE CONCEPT

<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
