column1: Our goal is to expose you to interesting topic choices, surprising image associations, inventive layouts and the participation of talented writing collaborators.
column2:
>Want to know more about our conceptual approach?

THE FORM

column1: The albums will come as brochures of 17 in x 13 in (open) and each will include 30, 31 or 28 pictures (spread out over about 20 pages). You could say, they’ll will ressemble morning dailies. Our paper is quite fine and will let the images appear from the back of pages. This type of effect adds playfulness and creates unexpectedness.

Our extraordinary printer is located in Barcelona, Spain! He is the only one able not to compromise the dimensions of the albums, offer a reasonable price AND print on a traditional Offset sheetfed press.

In other words, the collection will distinguish itself by the quality of its photographies as well as by its design and finish.

THE TEAM

VALERIE  She's the one that clicks!!! She just spent the past year snapping away in the land of the fish'n chip. And between two afternoon teas,
she took time to cogitate, to doubt and to dream. Lifestyle photography
is her playground, she excels at it. Fundamentally unsatisfied, she challenged herself to get her art to the next level. Lo and behold her self-imposed one photo a day for a year (365 project). These images now need to take on a life beyond the pixels.

ELISE  She’s a restless craftwoman with unparalleled energy. Her head is full of ideas as she tinkers with words and images to transform them into stories. Workaholic and talkative, graphic design is her sandbox. First as an expat in Amsterdam, she found time between two pedal strokes to cogitate, to doubt and to dream. Now settled in France. it’s from her attic that she accumulates mandates and recognitions. Fundamentally unsatisfied, she has long sought out a project where she would fully explore her conceptual freedom.

YOUR CONTRIBUTION

You’ll have guessed it, we don’t have the means of our ambitions. But as Oscar Wilde puts it, we believe that ""anyone who lives within their means suffers
from a lack of imagination."" We also believe that ""the more, the merryer.""
It’s by mixing these two life lessons that the idea of crowdfunding came to us.

Your contribution will help cover paper and printing fees and a portion of
the shipping. In return, you’ll receive your albums (1,3, 6 or 12! See perk column) But above all, you’ll have our eternal gratitude!!!!

THE RISKS

If we don’t acheive our goal we should still be able to send you the albums. 
We'll downsize the dimensions (in order to buy less paper) and we might turn to
digital printing to reduce costs. Solutions exist but we hope not to turn to them.

OUR SCHEDULE

We’ve scheduled printing in August. In September 2014, you’ll be invited to a launch party to have fun and collect your copies. Obviously, if you can’t make it, you’ll receive your lovely package in your mailbox no matter what corner of the world you live in!

THANK YOU SO MUCH!

","365/12 . Valérie par Eskanazi  Une superbe publication imprimée issue du projet «Une photo par jour pendant un an» de la photographe Valérie Paquette. Une collection en douze cahiers thématiques uniques et originaux que vous serez fiers de laisser sur votre table à café.   365/12 . Valérie by Eskanazi  A beautiful printed publication based on the project ""One photo a day for a year"" by photographer Valérie Paquette. A collection of twelve collectable thematic albums that you’ll want to leave on display on your coffee table.
SEE ENGLISH BELOWLE CONCEPT
Répartir les 365 images en 12 groupes pour créer 12 mises en page différentes et amusantes.
Regrouper à partir de thèmes (concrets ou abstraits) laissant libre cours à notre liberté créative.
Raconter des histoires touchantes ou surprenantes mais aussi intéressantes d’un cahier à l’autre.
Mettre en valeur, trouver sa place à chacune des 365 photographies.

Nous espérons vous surprendre par le choix des sujets, l’originalité des associations d’images, l’inventivité des mises en pages et la collaboration d’auteurs de grand talent. En savoir plus sur notre démarche conceptuelle?LA FORME

Les cahiers seront des brochures de 17 po x 13 po (format ouvert) comprenant toutes 30, 31 ou 28 images. Nous prévoyons une vingtaine de pages par cahier.  Leur look fera écho aux quotidiens matinaux. Notre papier sera fin et laissera paraître les images au verso des pages. Cet effet de translucidité ajoute de l’imprévu amusant dans les mises en page.
Notre extraordinaire imprimeur se trouve à Barcelone en Espagne! Il est le seul à nous permettre d’avoir ce format à prix raisonnable tout en imprimant sur une presse Offset traditionnelle!

En d’autres termes, la collection se distinguera autant par la qualité de son contenu photographique que par son design et sa finition.L’ÉQUIPEVALÉRIE  C’est elle qui fait clic! Depuis plus d’un an, c’est au pays du fish’n chip qu’elle presse le bouton de sa caméra. Entre deux afternoon teas, elle prend le temps de cogiter, de douter et de créer. Le photoreportage lifestyle est son terrain de jeu et elle y excelle. Telle une éternelle insatisfaite, elle souhaite élever son art à un autre niveau et s’impose, pendant son année d’expatriation, de faire une photo par jour (365). Ces images se doivent maintenant de vivre autrement qu’en pixels.

ELISE C’est elle qui fait déclic! Sa tête pleine d’idées bricole nos mots et nos images pour en faire des histoires. Workaholic et volubile, le design graphique est son carré de sable. Expatriée d'abord à Amsterdam, c’est entre deux coups de pédale qu’elle prend le temps de cogiter, de douter, de créer. C’est désormais de son grenier en France qu’elle accumule les mandats créatifs et les reconnaissances. Telle une éternelle insatisfaite, elle cherche depuis longtemps un projet où elle pourra explorer pleinement sa liberté conceptuelle.VOTRE CONTRIBUTIONVous devinerez que nous n’avons pas les moyens de nos ambitions. Mais tel Oscar Wilde nous pensons que «toute personne qui vit à la hauteur de ses moyens souffre d’un manque d’imagination». Nous pensons aussi que «plus on est de fous, plus on rit!». C’est en mélangeant ces deux leçons de vie que l’idée du crowdfunding nous est venue en tête. Votre aide nous aidera à couvrir les frais de papier, d’impression et une partie des envois postaux. En retour, vous recevrez vos cahiers (1, 3, 6 ou 12 cahiers dépendant de votre participation. Voir colonne des contributions). Surtout, vous mériterez notre éternelle gratitude!!!! NOTRE ÉCHÉANCIER

Nous projetons d’aller en impression en août. En septembre 2014, vous serez conviés à un lancement à Montréal où vous pourrez collecter vos exemplaires. Si vous ne pouvez y être, vous recevrez un joli colis dans votre boîte à lettres (peu importe dans quel coin du monde vous demeurez). LES RISQUESSi nous n’atteignons pas notre objectif nous ferons tout pour vous acheminer vos cahiers. Nous diminuerons les dimensions prévues (pour acheter moins de papier) et nous devrons peut-être nous tourner vers de l'impression numérique. Les solutions existent mais nous espérons ne pas y avoir recours!MERCI DE VOTRE INTÉRÊT!THE CONCEPT
Distributing the 365 images into 12 groups in order to create12 different graphic design layouts.
Regrouping images under various themes (from abstract to concrete) always allowing creative freedom.
Telling “stories” each more interesting than the other.
Giving meaning to each of the 365 photos.

Our goal is to expose you to interesting topic choices, surprising image associations, inventive layouts and the participation of talented writing collaborators. Want to know more about our conceptual approach?THE FORM

The albums will come as brochures of 17 in x 13 in (open) and each will include 30, 31 or 28 pictures (spread out over about 20 pages). You could say, they’ll will ressemble morning dailies. Our paper is quite fine and will let the images appear from the back of pages. This type of effect adds playfulness and creates unexpectedness.

Our extraordinary printer is located in Barcelona, Spain! He is the only one able not to compromise the dimensions of the albums, offer a reasonable price AND print on a traditional Offset sheetfed press.
In other words, the collection will distinguish itself by the quality of its photographies as well as by its design and finish.THE TEAM

Workaholic and talkative, graphic design is her sandbox. First as an expat in Amsterdam, she found time between two pedal strokes to cogitate, to doubt and to dream. Now settled in France. it’s from her attic that she accumulates mandates and recognitions. Fundamentally unsatisfied, she has long sought out a project where she would fully explore her conceptual freedom.

YOUR CONTRIBUTIONYou’ll have guessed it, we don’t have the means of our ambitions. But as Oscar Wilde puts it, we believe that ""anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination."" We also believe that ""the more, the merryer."" It’s by mixing these two life lessons that the idea of crowdfunding came to us.

Before we delve
into why I need you help. Step away from your computer and take a peek into
your closet, armoire, dresser and those bins underneath your bed. What do you
see? Clothes that are drab, outdated and don’t fit with your current style?
Look no further for that specific bundle of stores because Scarlette and Indigo
has arrived.
THE
5 LEAPS
Leap Uno: Create a fabulous company and name
it something AMAZEBALLS!
Leap Two: Create a concept, source fabric, get patterns, make samples and
have an awesome photo shoot while remaining as fabulous as usual!   (the
fabulous thing make have lacked in some bits! )
Leap 3:  Launch an
Indiegogo Campaign (have you seen your wallet lately?..It’s a dozy)
Leap 4: Raise enough money to officially launch! Make a grilled cheese in
celebration and kiss my dog! MUAH! (and my boyfriend too for putting up with
Leap Cinco: Were in the final stretch! Send everything out to my American based
production company add a little sprinkle of fairy dust and then when all is
complete the best part of all.. The launch party/trunk show!
For those of you who want to hear a bit more
about the business-y side of things:
My
business plan in a NUTSHELL
column3:
/>

Scarlette and Indigo is a young innovative

column1: clothing company for the 21<sup>st</sup> century and beyond. As a young adult I
understand the need for fresh, new fashion forward garments to add to my wardrobe
that same notion simulates that of millions of young adults facing the same
dilemma where to find fashion forward pieces for my age and my creative style
almost seems like a whirlwind of a task for some but for Scarlette and Indigo
it’s what we design for. Our company is divided into the Scarlettes and the
Indigo’s. The Scarlette’s have a very edgy, sassy and sexy style. Whereas the
Indigo’s have a more hipster style. By combining two major style market in one
store. We plan to optimize profits and take the fashion world by storm.
About Me!!: my name is Alia
White and I am a 19 year old fashion designer and potential fashion school
student. Growing up in Northeast Atlanta I didn’t always have the dreams I have
today because the small town that I live in comes nowhere near the major
fashion cities of New York or Milan. I fell In love with fashion design really
on accident. My mom taught me how to sew pillows at a young age and it really
spiraled from there. I opened Scarlette and Indigo in September 2012 as a
senior in high school and it’s truly been the greatest experience of my life
thus far and I can’t wait to see where we will go next!
The
price breakdown:
-Patterns:
I have an amazing pattern maker but for her to be as amazing as she is I have
to pay
Samples: My pattern maker is also my sample maker and she’s still as amazing as
previously stated because she is doing both my patterns and my samples
Production: My American based production company (specifically in New York
&lt
column2: 3) will also need to get paid to make this amazing line come to life.  So support American manufacturers!

column1: -Distribution:
Most of the money that I generate will go to the shipment of all the garments
but we are hoping for a large amount of orders so I will need help financially

to get all of the clothes to your doors!


                                  A sneaky Peek of the rewards 

Thank You
card forget e-thank you’s and thank you emails. I will personally HAND WRITE
(bring on the hand cramps! No expense will be spared) every single card using
the fabulous thank you cards.
Bow Tie: I absolutely love making bow ties they were one of the first things I started
sewing for menswear. If you would like a bow tie I am willing to do it in any

color scheme, pattern and size!



A signed photo from the first or second photo shoot! Let me explain:
I had a preliminary photo shoot for a few pieces in the collection and then I
will be doing another photo shoot when all the pieces are complete you may
choose from a selected few images from both photo shoots and you can let me
know what you would like!
column7:
/>


A DVD of behind the scenes footage of both photo shoots for ‘Harlette’

column1: along with behind the scenes interviews and commentary.
A look book with images of every garment in the line from the photo
shoot!
column5: >A  pair of leggings from the line in your size!

/>





A signed sketch! My original hand drawn sketches that I will sign that

column1: you can keep forever!!

/>



A hand sewn garment personalized to your

column1: measurements from the line! I will offer a top and a bottom of your choosing!

So what is this Indiegogo thing anyway?

column1: Indiegogo = Crowdfunding
Also the greatest work known to man
How crowd funding works:
Phase 1: You check out someones.. anyone’s
project
Phase 2: Your : “Wow! I
really want to get on board with this!”
Phase 3: You make a donation while keeping
in mind that every dollar counts.
Phase 3b: Even if you cant donate ( no
worries I don’t hate you!) but I’d still love you to spread the word around.
Thank Yous:
A major thank you goes out to my family,
friends and my amazing boyfriend for putting up with me through this amazingly
fashionable adventure.

I’d also like to thank Tess Yaney for producing such amazing photographs.

Josh Saideman for making my indiegogo video possible!
Amy Elizabeth make up artistry for taking
out the time to beautify the shoot and for expressing my vision through hair
and makeup.
All of my Instagram promoters: Kayla Mauro,
Donia (Last name), Rachel Apolloino, Scotland Geurink, Sam Pinkoff and ‘GG’  golnesa gharachedaghi.
A HUGE HUGE HUGE THANK YOU goes out to all
of you BACKERS. Thank you so so so much for believing in me and my company I
appreciate you becoming a team member on this fashion journey.
Risks (bum bum bummm)
As with any project there are always speed
bumps along the way. One of those speed bumps that may occur is timing with my
production company often time things occurs and some times things get delayed
but I formally pledge to do everything in my power to ensure that all
production needs are met and meet all deadlines. In the event that some
unforeseen occurrence.. occurs I am confident that I will be able to think on
my feet and provide everyone with the best resolutions possible.
FAQ’s
What sizes will I be selling garments in? I
will be making all garments in sizes 2,4,6,8 and 10 in there is a demand for 0
or sizes up to a 14 I will consider making larger sizes!
Can I contact you personally? Of course Of
course you can reach me at my personal Email: thefashionista94@gmail.com feel free to shoot me an email if you have any questions or just
wanna say hey hey hey! I promise to reply as road runner quick as possible!
If I’m in plus sizes and I want a custom
garment can you accommodate me? Of course I just need your custom measurements
and I can work with it!
How will you know what colors I want for my
bow tie? EMAIL ME! With all rewards that have a selection option email me which
one you want and your name in the email and I will make sure that you get it!
I didn’t get my invitation to the launch
party what do I do I really wanted to come!: Don’t worry! As long as you donated
something to the Indiegogo shoot me an email and I will make sure that you get

a reprint of the invitation! 


","Before we delve
into why I need you help. Step away from your computer and take a peek into
your closet, armoire, dresser and those bins underneath your bed. What do you
see? Clothes that are drab, outdated and don’t fit with your current style?
Look no further for that specific bundle of stores because Scarlette and Indigo
has arrived.
THE
5 LEAPS
Leap Uno: Create a fabulous company and name
it something AMAZEBALLS!
Leap Two: Create a concept, source fabric, get patterns, make samples and
have an awesome photo shoot while remaining as fabulous as usual!   (the
fabulous thing make have lacked in some bits! )
Leap 3:  Launch an
Indiegogo Campaign (have you seen your wallet lately?..It’s a dozy)
Leap 4: Raise enough money to officially launch! Make a grilled cheese in
celebration and kiss my dog! MUAH! (and my boyfriend too for putting up with
me!)
Leap Cinco: Were in the final stretch! Send everything out to my American based
production company add a little sprinkle of fairy dust and then when all is
complete the best part of all.. The launch party/trunk show!
For those of you who want to hear a bit more
about the business-y side of things:
My
business plan in a NUTSHELL                        Scarlette and Indigo is a young innovative
clothing company for the 21st century and beyond. As a young adult I
understand the need for fresh, new fashion forward garments to add to my wardrobe
that same notion simulates that of millions of young adults facing the same
dilemma where to find fashion forward pieces for my age and my creative style
almost seems like a whirlwind of a task for some but for Scarlette and Indigo
it’s what we design for. Our company is divided into the Scarlettes and the
Indigo’s. The Scarlette’s have a very edgy, sassy and sexy style. Whereas the
Indigo’s have a more hipster style. By combining two major style market in one
store. We plan to optimize profits and take the fashion world by storm.
About Me!!: my name is Alia
White and I am a 19 year old fashion designer and potential fashion school
student. Growing up in Northeast Atlanta I didn’t always have the dreams I have
today because the small town that I live in comes nowhere near the major
fashion cities of New York or Milan. I fell In love with fashion design really
on accident. My mom taught me how to sew pillows at a young age and it really
spiraled from there. I opened Scarlette and Indigo in September 2012 as a
senior in high school and it’s truly been the greatest experience of my life
thus far and I can’t wait to see where we will go next!
The
price breakdown:
-Patterns:
I have an amazing pattern maker but for her to be as amazing as she is I have
to pay
Samples: My pattern maker is also my sample maker and she’s still as amazing as
previously stated because she is doing both my patterns and my samples
Production: My American based production company (specifically in New York
<3) will also need to get paid to make this amazing line come to life.  So support American manufacturers!
-Distribution:
Most of the money that I generate will go to the shipment of all the garments
but we are hoping for a large amount of orders so I will need help financially
to get all of the clothes to your doors!                                  A sneaky Peek of the rewards Thank You
card forget e-thank you’s and thank you emails. I will personally HAND WRITE
(bring on the hand cramps! No expense will be spared) every single card using
the fabulous thank you cards.                 Custom
Bow Tie: I absolutely love making bow ties they were one of the first things I started
sewing for menswear. If you would like a bow tie I am willing to do it in any
color scheme, pattern and size!A signed photo from the first or second photo shoot! Let me explain:
I had a preliminary photo shoot for a few pieces in the collection and then I
will be doing another photo shoot when all the pieces are complete you may
choose from a selected few images from both photo shoots and you can let me
know what you would like!A DVD of behind the scenes footage of both photo shoots for ‘Harlette’
along with behind the scenes interviews and commentary.
A look book with images of every garment in the line from the photo
shoot! With images from the line above!A  pair of leggings from the line in your size!A signed sketch! My original hand drawn sketches that I will sign that
you can keep forever!!          A hand sewn garment personalized to your
measurements from the line! I will offer a top and a bottom of your choosing!            So what is this Indiegogo thing anyway?
Indiegogo = Crowdfunding
Also the greatest work known to man
How crowd funding works:
Phase 1: You check out someones.. anyone’s
project
Phase 2: Your : “Wow! I
really want to get on board with this!”
Phase 3: You make a donation while keeping
in mind that every dollar counts.
Phase 3b: Even if you cant donate ( no
worries I don’t hate you!) but I’d still love you to spread the word around.
Thank Yous:
A major thank you goes out to my family,
friends and my amazing boyfriend for putting up with me through this amazingly
fashionable adventure.
I’d also like to thank Tess Yaney for producing such amazing photographs.Josh Saideman for making my indiegogo video possible!
Amy Elizabeth make up artistry for taking
out the time to beautify the shoot and for expressing my vision through hair
and makeup.
All of my Instagram promoters: Kayla Mauro,
Donia (Last name), Rachel Apolloino, Scotland Geurink, Sam Pinkoff and ‘GG’  golnesa gharachedaghi.
A HUGE HUGE HUGE THANK YOU goes out to all
of you BACKERS. Thank you so so so much for believing in me and my company I
appreciate you becoming a team member on this fashion journey.
Risks (bum bum bummm)
As with any project there are always speed
bumps along the way. One of those speed bumps that may occur is timing with my
production company often time things occurs and some times things get delayed
but I formally pledge to do everything in my power to ensure that all
production needs are met and meet all deadlines. In the event that some
unforeseen occurrence.. occurs I am confident that I will be able to think on
my feet and provide everyone with the best resolutions possible.
FAQ’s
What sizes will I be selling garments in? I
will be making all garments in sizes 2,4,6,8 and 10 in there is a demand for 0
or sizes up to a 14 I will consider making larger sizes!
Can I contact you personally? Of course Of
course you can reach me at my personal Email: thefashionista94@gmail.com feel free to shoot me an email if you have any questions or just
wanna say hey hey hey! I promise to reply as road runner quick as possible!
If I’m in plus sizes and I want a custom
garment can you accommodate me? Of course I just need your custom measurements
and I can work with it!
How will you know what colors I want for my
bow tie? EMAIL ME! With all rewards that have a selection option email me which
one you want and your name in the email and I will make sure that you get it!
I didn’t get my invitation to the launch
party what do I do I really wanted to come!: Don’t worry! As long as you donated
something to the Indiegogo shoot me an email and I will make sure that you get
a reprint of the invitation!",13.0,0,"2 Campaigns
|","Atlanta, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/scarlette-and-indigo-presents-harlette/pica

Become an Microsoft Excel Ninja is a comprehensive video training course that will
make you a Super User at Excel and
make you a Hero at your office as
you can train your colleagues or <b>be your
own boss as a Trainer Consultant
Get trained online on coaching skills
and take home, LIFETIME access to online course, a licensed eBook, 100+ excel spreadsheets and Lecture-mapped
assessment so you’re ready to learn and experiment faster and smarter.
Let's together create this amazing course and make it the ultimate starter kit for you and for
anyone else who wants to become an Excel hero for fun or for profit. Impress potential employers, clients and
colleagues with a strong Excel skills.
Last Update:
1. We have launched a sneak preview last week and are working on a test platform so that we can help you with a customized course
2. You can check the course outline and leave comments if you want to add/subtract few elements. You can reach me at rishabh@yodalearning.com
Join us in this campaign and We will offer you lifetime access to the course that empowers you and helps you lead your career
If I ask you how much time (hours did you spend in learning the practical work-related technical skills that you know today. What will your estimate be?

Let’s say you came up with a number which reflects the time you invested to learn, say programming or using some business software application such as Microsoft Excel. And WHAT IF I told you there was a way to learn the same skill set in 75-80% lesser time? Does it Sounds too good, and too late? My response would be Yes and No, respectively and I’ll share why I say so.

I quit my last job in early 2009 (J.P. Morgan, Mumbai) to start my first business venture in Training. The origin of the idea was based on my experience at KPMG (Assurance) and J.P. Morgan (Investment Banking). I had observed that every individual had learnt and was still learning applications of Excel through trial-and-error and by working on the job. People felt proud on boasting about the “x” number of years in learning those skills. However, I realized that if they would have received early “Excel Coaching” guidance, they could have drastically shortened their learning time from years to days. Additionally, the training has to be based on practical problems related to day-to-day work such as Tax Filing, MIS Reporting, Annual Report charts, cleaning ERP data dumps in Excel, automatic data pull up and so on.

So I spent the next 5 years in training professionals on “Advanced Excel” applications across different companies and cities. With experience of training 6,500+ professionals in 2-day workshops and 3,000+ professionals in various Seminars and Conferences, I refined my “Advanced Excel” program to “Advanced Excel Ninja” program. I was eager to spread this refined flavor of Excel program to a wider audience. And during this time, in mid-2014, I met my current business partner, Rishabh Bhandari (Mumbai), who is an MBA and has worked extensively with education-focused PE Investment fund. His insights on how can we make an excel course  more engaging, interesting and user-friendly helped us develop the methodology of converting my experience into training Videos. We went through 100s of pre-recorded videos of different Trainers and we identified the gaps that prevent a learner from learning online. “Yoda Learning Solutions” was born as an idea to fill the gap that prevents a learner from learning online. Yoda Learning, in short time created 29 courses and a network of 15,000 learners across the globe.
Once Yoda Learning took off,  I told myself, why stop at making someone really “Ninja” level of Microsoft Excel. Why
can’t they be guided and trained to be a Professional Trainer themselves? This could open a
plethora of business opportunities (Training / Consulting) for enthusiastic
professionals. Not only that, for professionals already employed and working
full time with different companies, this gives them an opportunity to train
their team members and propel themselves into next senior position owing to the
value addition to the team .
What’s Unleash an Excel trainer:
From Zero to Ninja?

So finally, we come to this campaign – Unleash a trainer: From Zero to Excel Ninja. This project is brainchild of my interaction with so many HR professionals who work in training and development teams.

Click here for course outline

If you are a Beginner in Excel: I will SAVE you YEARS! I want to propel you from the current proficiency level to a level where you can train professional users and explore a very satisfying and rewarding career opportunity.First, I teach you how the important functions and techniques are used practically by taking examples from different domains of a business. And, as you progress in the program, I will also the tricks which make teaching complex topics super easy.

If you are an Experienced Excel user: I am fascinated by the legends of Ninja. And to me, in today’s context, it stands for the group of elite performers who have developed “super-human” ability to attack a problem using diverse tactics and skills. It requires excellence and more importantly, precise guidance. I will coach you to reach the Ninja level of Excel. Why stop at plain and simple one dimensional VLOOKUP formula if you can know how to use three-dimensional lookup and reverse lookup? Why waste months and years in learning that through trial-and-error, if you can learn all that in a structured and well-defined 11 -15 hours.

If you are an Expert Excel user: Wouldn’t you agree with me that being an Expert Excel user requires different skill set than becoming an Expert Excel Trainer? The trainer has to make the topics easy-to-understand for the learners and teach them the real-world applications so as to keep them engaged and interested. I use mnemonics to help learners remember complex formula strategies and it has been tested with over 9,500+ learners in LIVE interaction. My eBook (PDF) has mostly picture based illustrations to help learners quickly refer to the tricks they learnt. I use my learners’ queries to build videos to help them connect their problems with the learning instantly. So with your existing knowledge and with an additional assistance of my learning program (ready-made Excel Case Studies, PDF eBook), you can create an alternative (or even mainstream) career in the field of Professional Coaching and Consulting.
Share this this campaign and we promise that this will be an enriching experience for you that also opens avenues to be your own boss

column1: What do we need and What you get?
At Yoda learning we have been
striving to achieve the next level in digital learning experience. Being a
startup we are high on ideas and passion to execute those ideas. For our next big
leap we need to develop a module that extensively covers the Microsoft Excel in
the form of video tutorials, working files for practice, eBooks and live
virtual learning on training skills.
I’m ready to put my
time and resources if I’m able to fund production for the project. The major
costs involved in this project is course editing, eBook development and
Assessment test battery with mapped videos and pdf report so the course
experience is personalized for you. So in all, We need $2000 to fund our overheads (and we invest time and energy to make a superb course)

column4: >So what happens once we get the

column1: module up and running!! Our stakeholders get the exclusive chance to work on
the module pre-launch and recommend improvements/modifications. Personalization
will be done exclusively for our backers (The one who supports us in this campaign). Based on the plan selected, you get
multiple licenses for the product and assured cost benefit over buying a
similar product in the market place. You not only get to be our early bird backers but also our brand ambassadors.
You Grow, We Grow!

Please note that the course will go retail at a minimum price of $149 (Starter-pack equivalent). We encourage you to take the benefit of this rock-bottom price and help generate value for all the stakeholders.

With the endless number of electronic devices that we rely on daily, using a conventional power strip has become the standard method for powering multiple devices simultaneously. While simply effective, the power strip does nothing to organize the numerous charging cables that are attached to it, often leaving a tangled mess of wires. BoxTap: The Next Generation Power Strip solves this frustrating issue all in one simple and intuitive design. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Shaped as a simple box console, BoxTap has five electronic sockets and two USB slots to plug in electronic devices while also incorporating a space to store any excess cable.
column11:
>On the front of BoxTap is a button console which organizes all of the power buttons. There is also a main power button to turn all devices ON/OFF.

 

 

 

Each of the power buttons is labelled with icon stickers so you can easily see which power button corresponds to what device. There is no need to fumble around for each individual power switch. Blank stickers are provided to label unique devices. 

 

 

The back of BoxTap contains one socket that is placed lower to fit any adaptor and four sockets lined up to snugly fit any other plug. The perforated back cover keeps the cables contained while allowing air to circulate, thereby preventing overheating.

column1: <figure style=""margin: 0px

By organizing all excess cable in the built-in cable management container, BoxTap not only keeps your living and working spaces incredibly tidy it also prevents safety hazards. There are no jumble of cords to trip over. Additionally, power strips are often left on the floor where small children and pets are vulnerable to mistake it as a toy.
column5:
s=30a91debe5fa1950a12d6ec591f48992"" src="""" style=""""/>

With conventional power strips, cleaning can be a hassle trying to navigate between all those cords. With BoxTap, this daily task is simplified as your living spaces are neat and organized.

column1: Leaving a device plugged in can lead to energy waste that can add up to costly energy bills. With BoxTap save energy my simply turning off the main button.
<div>

column4: >omplements any space whether it be the study or the kitchen. BoxTap can be used as a computer stand and fits in most shelves and book stands.

column1: <div>

","With the endless number of electronic devices that we rely on daily, using a conventional power strip has become the standard method for powering multiple devices simultaneously. While simply effective, the power strip does nothing to organize the numerous charging cables that are attached to it, often leaving a tangled mess of wires. BoxTap: The Next Generation Power Strip solves this frustrating issue all in one simple and intuitive design.       Shaped as a simple box console, BoxTap has five electronic sockets and two USB slots to plug in electronic devices while also incorporating a space to store any excess cable. On the front of BoxTap is a button console which organizes all of the power buttons. There is also a main power button to turn all devices ON/OFF.   Each of the power buttons is labelled with icon stickers so you can easily see which power button corresponds to what device. There is no need to fumble around for each individual power switch. Blank stickers are provided to label unique devices.   The back of BoxTap contains one socket that is placed lower to fit any adaptor and four sockets lined up to snugly fit any other plug. The perforated back cover keeps the cables contained while allowing air to circulate, thereby preventing overheating.
ORGANIZE YOUR STUDY ORGANIZE YOUR LIVING ROOM ORGANIZE YOUR KITCHEN

By organizing all excess cable in the built-in cable management container, BoxTap not only keeps your living and working spaces incredibly tidy it also prevents safety hazards. There are no jumble of cords to trip over. Additionally, power strips are often left on the floor where small children and pets are vulnerable to mistake it as a toy.  With conventional power strips, cleaning can be a hassle trying to navigate between all those cords. With BoxTap, this daily task is simplified as your living spaces are neat and organized.
Leaving a device plugged in can lead to energy waste that can add up to costly energy bills. With BoxTap save energy my simply turning off the main button.

BoxTap was designed to simplify your life. With its simple and clean design, BoxTap complements any space whether it be the study or the kitchen. BoxTap can be used as a computer stand and fits in most shelves and book stands.",40.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Seoul, Korea, Republic of",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/boxtap-the-next-generation-power-strip/pica

column1: <span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0)
is NoName?
Branding on the face of a watch diverts the attention away from the beauty and
craftsmanship of a time piece.  Therefore, we will never have branding of
any kind on the face of our watches, hence ""NoName"".  Instead, we will place our logo on
other parts of the watch such as the crown, clasp, and the back of the watch
casing.
Our watches will be made of the same quality materials as the luxury watches you see day-to-day in advertising, which can be marked up from 400-1000 percent more than our decided retail price.

Our NoName watches will make a statement about the unjustifiable price mark up for the illusion of luxury, and will open your eyes to what pristine quality is honestly worth: an affordable price. 


Our Vision
We hope to have a full collection of

different types and styles of watches, each with their own personality. Our watches will personify our customers and empower them. As long as we meet our projected goal, we will be releasing them very soon! 

 We will send out several updates throughout the entire
process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information
such as competitions, contests, giveaways, etc.  We are excited to share with you our first
collection of watches.
The NoName Collection
For our first collection, we are
offering 6 time pieces made from the highest quality materials

same simplistic design, but with the choice of either a handcrafted genuine leather strap, or an elegant 316 low carbon grade stainless steel band.




The Plan

Our
goal is to provide our customers with <span>two things: a simple, yet elegant watch that can
be worn in any setting, but more importantly, a watch that will not cause
you to give up an arm and a leg.
<h3><b>NoName Watches backed with a
Warranty
We’re so confident in the quality
of our watches, that if there is a defect in craftsmanship within the first
three years we will send you a replacement at no cost. This warranty is only
valid if the watch is purchased through this campaign.  After our campaign
the warranty will only cover up to one year.
Warranty does not cover:
Wear and tear, scratched crystal,
aging/alteration of the color and/or material of non metallic bands and/or
bracelets, such as leather, textile, rubber
Any damage on any part of the watch
resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents
(knocks, dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)
The life of the battery
Specifications:
Display: Analog
Case Material:  316L Carbon
Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 43 mm
Clasp: Pushbutton Deployment Clasp
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Band Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel/Leather
Band Width: 24mm
Dial Window Material: Hardened
Mineral Crystal
Movement: Japanese Quartz
Date Function: Yes

Water Resistant: 5 ATM


We Need Your Support!
In order to turn this dream of ours
into a reality, we need everyone’s support.  Word of mouth is the most
powerful form of advertising and we need your support.  Not only does this
mean pledging for one of our beautiful watches, but also sharing our story and
our passion with a friend.
We are doing everything we possibly
can to help spread the word in a variety of ways, but we know that we cannot do
everything on our own.  We hope that you will join us by connecting with
us through our various social media channels which are listed at the bottom of
this page.  Everything counts, If you could do something as simple as
following us, liking us, or tagging a friend, it will really go a long way.
Remember, if we do not reach our goal, we will not have the funds in order
to place our first order of watches from our manufacturer...which means that we
won’t be able to make watches!
If funded, how will you fulfill
the orders?
Once Indiegogo releases the funds,
we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes
roughly 30 days depending on the quantity of the order.  Our team will
then ship the orders to you, our first customers.

Thank You for your Support.

Welcome to the Good Life.  Welcome to the Revolution!!

FIRST OF ALL - THANK YOU!!!!

GIJ was launched in 2014 with a GREAT Indiegogo campaign - THANK YOU to everyone who supported me - I am glad you are all LOVING and using your bags!  I raised enough to support my first round of production, but not enough to finish my website.  SO... I am doing a small campaign to fund the website + the GIJ vegan bag 'perks' can all be in your hands by the holidays - they make GREAT gifts!  AND be the first to get the latest GIJ bag - the fabulous ""Paige Bag"".
THE STORY OF GIJ

GIJ is committed to offering great vegan bags that are both current and timeless.  Designed and headquartered in Manhattan Beach, California, GIJ bags are meant to be well-used, well-traveled and well-loved and get better with age.
At the heart of GIJ vegan is RESPECT -
• For ANIMALS - All bags are 100% vegan and cruelty free.  No animal products, skins or insect-based dyes are used.
• For PEOPLE - We only source factories and resources that practice fair trade and are actively committed to improving labor conditions in the garment industry.
• For the ENVIRONMENT - We use the most sustainable &
column2: eco-friendly fibers we can find for each bag, use EU approved dyes and finishes, and our makers carefully control and monitor waste water.  Our bags are all mindfully designed and sourced.

column1: • For our local COMMUNITY - The founder of GIJ has been rescuing dogs from the streets of Los Angeles for the past 6 years.  GIJ LLC is committed to GIVING BACK a portion of their proceeds to continue in this effort to rescue, tend to medical needs, train, foster and find forever homes for animals in need.  GIJ is currently supporting a senior dog named Alli and is committed to all of her needs and finding her a FOREVER home.
GIJ FOUNDER AND DESIGNER - KATHY ARTHUN

""With 28 years in the fashion industry as a Designer and Design Director, I realized there was a handbag niche that I could fill with a California casual aesthetic that would appeal to vegans and non-vegans alike.  I decided to name the company GIJ (pronounced 'gidge') after my beloved dog, Gidget, who was the start of my love and respect of all animals.

I have worked for very small companies, mid-size companies, very large companies like Target Corp. and started a clothing company shortly out of college.  My diverse background and entrepreneurial spirit has given me a well-rounded knowledge of design, development, sourcing, manufacturing, production, sales and marketing.  I am very excited to bring this all together with GIJ LLC - a business I have worked very hard to develop up to this point and one that I am very proud of.  CONTRIBUTING TO THIS CAMPAIGN WILL HELP ME COMPLETE THE LAST PIECE OF THE PUZZLE - TO LAUNCH A COMPLETE, FUNCTIONAL WEBSITE!""
WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET
100% of the money raised in this campaign will go to fund the completion of our www.gijvegan.com website, which at this point is just a placeholder site.

In exchange for contributions, you can get one of the very first GIJ PAIGE bags! We are also offering both the Kingsley hemp bags and the California Streets pouches as great ""perks"".  In our retail business, we are targeting accounts like Neiman Marcus Cusp, Barneys, Anthropologie, Urban Outfitters and every hip, trendy boutique in the country.
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
SHARE SHARE SHARE!!!! Whether you can or can't donate, PLEASE share my campaign with coworkers &
column2: friends, post on FB, IG, Twitter, forward in emails, use the handy Indiegogo ""share"" tools!  Please help spread the campaign far and wide and create some great buzz!  It makes a HUGE difference!

column1: PLEASE click on the Facebook link below and ""LIKE"" the GIJ vegan fan page - please ask your friends to do the same!
FOLLOW us on Twitter @gijvegan and Pinterest!  Help us start building a fan base!
PLEASE go to our temporary website at www.gijvegan.com and sign up to join our mailing list!
PLEASE be the first to follow us on Instagram @gijvegan

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

SHARE SHARE SHARE!!!! Whether you can or can't donate, PLEASE share my campaign with coworkers & friends, post on FB, IG, Twitter, forward in emails, use the handy Indiegogo ""share"" tools!  Please help spread the campaign far and wide and create some great buzz!  It makes a HUGE difference!

Short Summary

Passive Resistance is a socially-conscious brand that utilizes fashion trends as a form of empowerment.

My name is Elyse, I'm from Charlotte, North Carolina, and graduated from Boston College this past May. Motivated, driven, and always learning.

As a recent graduate, a black person, a woman, and a liberal it's easy to feel apathetic and powerless, especially now, more than ever.  I'm action oriented so I paired my passion for style with my desire for justice and created the brand: Passive Resistance.

Passive Resistance is a brand with purpose.  Now, more than ever, people want to quantitatively understand the positive return that their purchases conceive.  Help me create a brand of the future! Your contribution will help me keep up with the demand that PR gear evokes, and you'll officially become part of the PR team. Peep the perks for specifics
column3:
What You Get

We are asking for $1,000 to cover the costs of initial product production, shipment, and packaging. The product is developed, all we need is the financial backing to cover the costs of demand!  The safety clasp is made of gold stainless steel, and is attached to a leather bracelet. 

The product is manufactured by a distributer and is shipped to my home address. Funds will cover the costs of shipping the bracelets to me, the marketing, and packaging.  

Passive Resistance currently features one product at a time, but will eventually have it's own promotional section of the website which includes swag such as Passive Resistance branded phone wallets, tees, headwear, and sunglasses. A portion of donations will go towards the production of the promotional section of the website. 

If my entire goal is not raised, available funds will be spent on shipment, product development, and social media reach.

Our Website

https://www.passiveresistance.co

The Impact

Is the safety pin thing, actually a thing? Yes, it's a thing, and together we can make it a movement.

Check these cool articles out:

http://www.snopes.com/2016/11/14/safety-pin-sol...

https://www.nytimes.com/2016/11/14/fashion/safe...

http://www.pbs.org/newshour/rundown/safety-pins...

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow, follow, follow on Instagram!

Like, share, and follow on Facebook!

AS SEEN &
column2:
FEATURED ON:

Interviewed by Dan from 28daysearlier blog: Link Here

Featured by Alvin from Microbrandwatchworld blog: Link Here

Featured by Christina from CrowdfundingPR: Link Here

Featured by Damarkos from Getat: Link Here

MODELS AVAILABLE 

Stainless Steel

column1: • Diameter 44 mm
• Height 16 mm
• Lug Width 24 mm
• Double Domed Mineral Glass with Sapphire Coating
• Japan Miyota Quartz
• Water Resistance to 5 ATM
• California Dial Vintage
• Luminous Vintage ""Old Radium""
• Hour and Minute with Luminous Vintage ""Old Radium""
• 24 mm Full Grain Leather Strap

Watch movements are arguably the most important part of a watch: as the heart and brains of our timekeeping devices, you need to have a movement if you want your watch to work. Quartz watch movements are the new style of movement, they are built to last and extremely accurate. We use Miyota quartz watch movements on AstroHelm which are made by the Miyota division of Citizen LTD.

AstroHelm Rose


 

AstroHelm Black

AstroHelm Silver

DIAL DESIGN

The definition of a 'California Dial' is very simple. It is a watch dial that consists of half Roman and half Arabic numerals. Numbers 10 to 2 are Roman, 4 to 8 are Arabic with 4, 6, 9 &
column2:
12 changing design from brand to brand.

HIGH DOMED GLASS

It uses a highly double domed glass that beautifully brings out the extreme curve to the watch front.

Hardened Mineral glass is a scratch and impact-resistant glass most commonly used in watchmaking. The glass will be having a layer of sapphire coating to provide additional protection (With option to upgrade to pure sapphire crystal). It has superb reflective properties, strength and clarity. The AstroHelm uses a high rise domed glass which need special processing during the production. 

Luminous Index &
column3:
Hands

In bring out the vintage elements in the design, the markers and hands are lavishly equipped with luminous colour which, mimics the appearance of aged radium.

Straps

We have engage a strap specialist whom have being used to make watch straps for luxury brands. Each AstroHelm comes with soft handmade full grain genuine leather straps.

 Screw Bar Design

In our last model, the spring bar is not easy to self change. We have take in the feedback and replacing it with screw type bar to enable you to self change the watch strap easily. 

Special Release (Automatic AstroHelm Version)  

Movement Specification

column1: • Manufacturer: Seiko
• Caliber Number: NH35A (aka NH35) Movement
• Type Automatic: Jewels 24
• Vibrations: Per Hour 21,600 bph
• Shock System: Diashock
• Power Reserve: 41 hours
• Winding Direction: Bi-directional
• Hacking: Yes
• Diameter: 27.40mm (outside) / 29.36mm (casing) Height 5.32mm
• Functions: Hours, minutes, central seconds, date calendar

Case Back Design for Automatic Limited Edition (LE)

Backers Rewards (Perks)

 

WARRANTY  

Watches will be covered with a manufacturer’s one year limited warranty &
column2:
does not cover damages by users. The watch movement is covered under manufacturer's limited warranty as well. Watch that has defects in material or workmanship under normal use, will be repaired or replaced at the sole discretion of Advisor Watches. 

Return shipping &
column3:
handling fee may apply to every warranty service.

Risks and challenges

We have the experience through launching our first founders model. Risks will be kept minimal. Manufacturing orders are in pre-agreement stage and orders will be sent to the manufacturer for production once the required goal is reached and money is received. We will continue to keep backers updated after the campaign until the delivery of every watch to the backers.

column1: Diameter 44 mm
Height 16 mm
Lug Width 24 mm
Double Domed Mineral Glass with Sapphire Coating
Japan Miyota Quartz
Water Resistance to 5 ATM
California Dial Vintage
Luminous Vintage ""Old Radium""
Hour and Minute with Luminous Vintage ""Old Radium""
24 mm Full Grain Leather Strap

Watch movements are arguably the most important part of a watch: as the heart and brains of our timekeeping devices, you need to have a movement if you want your watch to work. Quartz watch movements are the new style of movement, they are built to last and extremely accurate. We use Miyota quartz watch movements on AstroHelm which are made by the Miyota division of Citizen LTD.AstroHelm Rose AstroHelm BlackAstroHelm SilverDIAL DESIGNThe definition of a 'California Dial' is very simple. It is a watch dial that consists of half Roman and half Arabic numerals. Numbers 10 to 2 are Roman, 4 to 8 are Arabic with 4, 6, 9 & 12 changing design from brand to brand.HIGH DOMED GLASSIt uses a highly double domed glass that beautifully brings out the extreme curve to the watch front.Hardened Mineral glass is a scratch and impact-resistant glass most commonly used in watchmaking. The glass will be having a layer of sapphire coating to provide additional protection (With option to upgrade to pure sapphire crystal). It has superb reflective properties, strength and clarity. The AstroHelm uses a high rise domed glass which need special processing during the production. Luminous Index & HandsIn bring out the vintage elements in the design, the markers and hands are lavishly equipped with luminous colour which, mimics the appearance of aged radium.StrapsWe have engage a strap specialist whom have being used to make watch straps for luxury brands. Each AstroHelm comes with soft handmade full grain genuine leather straps. Screw Bar DesignIn our last model, the spring bar is not easy to self change. We have take in the feedback and replacing it with screw type bar to enable you to self change the watch strap easily. Special Release (Automatic AstroHelm Version)  Movement Specification
Manufacturer: Seiko
Caliber Number: NH35A (aka NH35) Movement
Type Automatic: Jewels 24
Vibrations: Per Hour 21,600 bph
Shock System: Diashock
Power Reserve: 41 hours
Winding Direction: Bi-directional
Hacking: Yes
Diameter: 27.40mm (outside) / 29.36mm (casing) Height 5.32mm
Functions: Hours, minutes, central seconds, date calendar

Case Back Design for Automatic Limited Edition (LE)Backers Rewards (Perks) WARRANTY  Watches will be covered with a manufacturer’s one year limited warranty & does not cover damages by users. The watch movement is covered under manufacturer's limited warranty as well. Watch that has defects in material or workmanship under normal use, will be repaired or replaced at the sole discretion of Advisor Watches. Return shipping & handling fee may apply to every warranty service.Risks and challengesWe have the experience through launching our first founders model. Risks will be kept minimal. Manufacturing orders are in pre-agreement stage and orders will be sent to the manufacturer for production once the required goal is reached and money is received. Idea

Imagine a biometric counter that is crafted from precious and semi precious metals, while measuring your physical activity 24/7.  A piece of jewellery that you would actually wear, versus just another rubber band around your wrist.  It does not require constant charging
column2: will not interfere with common activities such as typing
column3: has enough memory to store daily activities for up to a month
column4:
and will automatically learn and adjust the events it monitors, self-personalizing itself based on your use over time.

Bling.  It is the most exclusive biometric counter in the world.

Key Features

column2:
>

Gesture Tagging. Motion algorithms developed through computational biomechanics converts raw sensor data into meaningful metrics. Where the motion profile matches a particular activity, Bling will automatically tag those measures against a sports profile, such as cycling or golfing.
column3:
>

Motion Engine. A 3-axis accelerometer, the standard sensor for physical activity monitors today, continuously logs user activity. In concert with a high-performance, analog-intensive, mixed-signal micro controller, motion data is interpreted intelligently, tracking whether and when you are in REM sleep, being a keyboard jockey, or performing like Hercules. It is always on.
column4:
>

Completely Wireless. Embedded BlueTooth 4.0 LE, or low energy, will send activity measurements directly to your phone - either passively scheduled or on-demand - while preserving battery life. There are no cables, dongles, or any other accessories needed.  Just pick up your smartphone, period.
column5:
>

Water Friendly. Water tight to 1.0 ATM atmospheres means you can submerge your Bling up to 5 meters underwater. We don't expect you to dive down the Mariana Trench - however dishes, washers, beaches, and pools are okay.
column6:
>

No Charging Ever. A standard, available anywhere CR2025 provides up to 2 months of uninterrupted use, while ensuring minimalist weight and form factor. Pop the battery in and out in a couple of minutes.
column7:
>

Self Learning.  Bling will learn your activity patterns over time, based on  your activity inputs and tag settings.  It has customizable activity tags which you can choose based on a range of motion inputs, and will adjust to your sleep patterns based historically on when you go to bed.  It is the only device in its class that will personalize its behaviour to a specific user and usage pattern.
column8:
>

Gamified Software. The companion software comes fully gamified, complete with local and global achievement levels and performance trophies.  Designed to keep you engaged without being annoyed, Bling is not just numeric points and step counts, but a full-fledged activity centre with meaningful accomplishments and trophies that you can earn by yourself, or better yet, with a team of friends or coworkers.
column9:
>

Timeless Luxury. We recognize that you do not spend your life inside a gym. Or think much of rubber. So look good with us, while you live your life healthily and elegantly.

Product Specifications

Activity monitors, now popular as an everyday exercise progress monitor and motivator, vary in design and, more importantly, accuracy.  Our solution is different - better - than other competitors in that we have committed significant effort and resources in researching this field.

How Bling Works

Let’s think about the nature of walking.  The image below depicts a single step, defined as a unit cycle of walking behavior, showing the relationship between each stage of the walking cycle and the change in vertical and forward acceleration.

These motions are translated by Bling into patterns of pitch, yaw, and roll measurements corresponding to vertical, forward, and side acceleration of a walking or running person. At least one axis will have relatively large periodic acceleration changes, no matter how the pedometer is worn, so peak detection and a dynamic threshold-decision algorithm for acceleration on all three axes are essential for detecting a unit  cycle of walking or running.  We use this same technique to compute other activities, such as cycling, rowing, golfing, and tennis.

Bling uses a digital filter to smooth the signals without sacrificing response time to attain dynamic threshold and precision measures of movement, by continuously updating the maximum and minimum values of the 3-axis acceleration measures every 30 samples.  We then set the average value as our dynamic threshold level, which is recomputed every 30 samples thereafter such that the device becomes adaptive to the user. We then use an onboard microprocessor to continuously interpret and calculate step, distance, speed, and caloric parameters, based on strides as recorded by this logic.

Bling's integrated circuit logic, then, is based on a decision flow which we have reproduced as follows
column10:
sans the trade secrets that we have developed internally, of course:

Bored already?  Okay how about some pretty pictures now:

Prototype

It will be possible to create Bling with gold, silver, rose, black, coffee, and pure plated colours.  Consumer studies are currently underway to determine the most optimal combination to bring to market.  Be a part of the decision process!  Send us your comments and preferences and we will respond accordingly.

Software

Currently, our developers are working on an iOS companion app for Bling, and adding new features daily.  If we surpass our funding goal by any appreciable measure, we will begin to build an Android compatible version immediately - this is not a stretch goal, because technology transparently is not a stretch goal of our company.  We wantBling to be completely platform agnostic!

Some screenshots of our beta code below.  Don't worry, the production version will be in the proper language!

Process to Market

Posh.Tech will adopt a product development process based on practiced ISO-9001 standards by its founders to turn Bling from concept to delivery.  We will observe five sequential stages to completion: Planning, Design &
column11: EVT (Engineering Validation Test), DVT (Design Validation Test), PVT (Production Validation Test) and MP (Mass Production), each of which requires specific methodology and criteria be applied to research, design, development, quality assurance, manufacturing and support.  Our project manager and company co-founder will lead our OEM suppliers through an established and itemized list of requirements and processes. Our end hope is that our customers - and backers - will benefit with total quality assurance, overall resource savings, and a faster product and solution development cycle
column12:
all so we can accelerate our time to market.  Once we reach the MP Phase of our project, your local FedEx, UPS, DHL, or TNT courier will be our partner for final delivery to your front door!

Funding and Allocation

column1:
We will use all monies raised through this campaign to take use through to PVT and mass production, to be allocated as follows:

Tooling: $15,000
Certification: $10,000
Pilot Run: $10,000
Production Run: $15,000
Delivery: $5,000
column2:
>

The Team

“This is crap,” as yet another colleague proclaims with great derision. “My life does not revolve around a gym or studio. I want to track my physical output always, but I don’t want to wear a rubber band all the time. And remember to put it on – assuming I didn’t also forget to charge it the night before.”

Chance does indeed favour the prepared mind, and such silly wisecracks would become a devastating epigram of the purest wisdom. It was almost like something banging on the exit out of Charlie’s subconscious, an idea trying desperately to escape from imagination into reality. From there, springing out of the daffodils on our sister’s kitchen counter, Bling was born.

With a background in analogue devices and digital signal processors, Charlie is a seasoned alumnus in the mature personal headphone market, having spent close to a decade in Asia and with established ties to network of mainland factories, including Foxconn. A graduate of Silicon Valley, Charlie has previously lead engineering and design teams in developing white label retail products on behalf of Philips, Huawei, and Asus. Charlie is currently leading the Bling technology effort locally in Hong Kong and China.

Leading the charge on the business front, John brings a diverse breadth of management experiences to the table, having practiced in the technology, utilities, education and retail fields, for both private and public sector organizations. A finance geek at heart, John comes from over 15 years in deploying major ERP systems and has lead the development of over $300M+ in custom software and various other business and accounting applications for clients including Accenture, PeopleSoft and SAP.  John is now incubating Posh.Tech in Vancouver, BC, and has previously helped launch two startups out of Mountain View, CA – ePhysicians and Verplex Systems.

From our auspicious start, we have argued amongst ourselves, screamed and yelled at our suppliers, pulled out some hairs and even threatened genetic testing to prove the lineage of our founders. Thankfully, we are now a team of 6, spread across two hemispheres, and no blood has yet been spilt. Our team is 100% committed to the success of project, and delivering Bling to you in the shortest time possible.

Our product – and our company – is about giving you the machines to enhance your life, and every aspect of it. And do that with uncompromising style
column4:
but to strive is elegant. This is who we are.

Latest Status

As at launch of our funding campaign, we will be nearing completion of our DVT phase with trials against our beta prototype that you see here. The ideas continue to flow from our engineers and industrial designers, and the enthusiasm is admittedly difficult to shut down!  Alas, the iron ring adage holds true: it costs a penny to make a change in design, a dime in production, and a dollar in the field. Our hope is to leave a small window of opportunity for consideration of comments from our backers, before we freeze our Mk. I design at the conclusion of DVT over the next 30 days. 

TO ALL OF OUR BACKERS AND SUPPORTERS, THANK YOU FOR MAKING THIS IDEA POSSIBLE!

“An initiative applauded and endorsed by
Citizen K” - CITIZEN K
“Cambodia’s traditional scarf becomes the
modern gentleman’s must-have accessory” - DANDY BLOG
“A brand that combines fashion and solidarity” - FASHION MAG
“Krama
Heritage is one of those rare brands that don't come around too often. <span>The fact that they are willing to give
back to the place that inspired their company makes me admire them a lot. These
aren't scarves that only Parisian women can wear, these scarves transcend
gender and cultural barriers” - LAURA NEUZETH BLOG
French version below
Collection ""Renaissance""
Heritage is a Parisian brand of scarves with one ambition:  turn Cambodia’s traditional scarf into an international
fashion accessory and achieve social impact in Cambodia.
Our two new
collections ‘Renaissance’ and ‘Les Estivales’ are available for the first time
at a special Indiegogo launch price of €35 ($48) and €45 ($61) with free
worldwide postage. Select a perk on the right hand side to pre-order your
Krama.
Please note: We have a limited amount of stock available for July delivery. Please
order promptly if you’d like to be the first to wear your Krama this summer!
More than a
simple scarf, the Krama is a cultural heritage that has been passed on from
generation to generation for centuries in Cambodia. It is a cotton and
checkered scarf that has many uses in every day’s life in Cambodia:shading from
the sun, carrying infants over the shoulder or being used as a rope to collect
firewood. It has most of all a strong symbolic as the scarf of belonging of the
Khmer people. It bears the values of a whole people, made of dignity, courage,
optimism and thirst for life.
The Krama appeared to us as the best way to share our passion for
Cambodia and to act for this country. Now that Cambodia is initiating the
reconstruction of its society, it is us who inherit the scarf of belonging of
the Khmers, the state of mind it embodies and who have the privilege to wear it
side by side with them.
Krama a Parisian touch (but without altering it for we want the same Krama as
the Cambodian people to be worn outside Cambodia) and turning into a fashion
accessory allows to fund a social project in Cambodia. Thus, every Krama
Heritage is crafted in a responsible and ethical way by a lady weaver in the
pure Khmer tradition and supports the local economy in Phnom Penh.

column4: >As we also wanted to act for education in Cambodia, every Krama Heritage

column1: also contributes directly to the development of the charity
column3: >Pour un Sourire d’Enfant

column1: Smile) – on a par with €3 per Krama Heritage – whose action in schooling
children in Cambodia is as courageous as essential.
An entrepreneurial and human
project, Krama Heritage is the adventure of a whole community of héritiers, the bearers of the Krama.  From Phnom Penh to Paris, from Paris to New
York and Saint Petersburg, they show their adherence to the project and are
seen participating in photo shoots.
This
is also the occasion for us to showcase the works of talented photographers
from all over the world.
started Krama Heritage before graduating from college, we are proud of what we
have managed to accomplish with very little resources. We can’t wait to take
Krama Heritage to the next level, we want the Krama to be for you as easy to
get as it is to wear, but we lack the financial means to do so. We trust that,
with your help, we can achieve so much more. If we reach our campaign goal,
this is how we will use the crowdfunding resources:
1)  Pay for fashion exhibitions. Those are the places where fashion designers meet distributors from
all over the world, and each of them costs several thousand euros. We have
built a brand we trust will appeal to distributors, so the more fashion
exhibitions we attend, the more likely you will find Kramas at your-next-door
shop very soon.
2)  Widen the Krama Heritage team. Outside of those fashion exhibitions, we
would like to enlarge our team, hire interns or salespersons to approach the
distributors in the most effective way.
3)  Turn our website into the worldwide Krama Heritage store. We want to give our website (www.krama-heritage.net  ) a full
revamping for you to be able to purchase the Krama of your choice wherever you
are in the world next September.
4)  Launch new Krama Heritage collections. You might have wondered why there is only one
model in the ‘Les Estivales’ collection! Apart from the minimum order
quantities we have to deal with, we would like our Kramas catalogue to always
reflect your tastes and launch new Kramas collections, in different sizes and

materials 

5) Deepen our social project in Cambodia, namely ""The Showcase project - Entrepreneurs &
column2: Artists from Cambodia"" whereby we would like to give the opportunity to Cambodian people to pitch in their projects through videos we would showcase, to allow exposure and attract investors. That would require too extra budget.

column1: Collection ""Tradition""
column3: >

column1: Here’s how you can support
our campaign and be the first to wear your Krama this summer:
1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your pre-order. You
can select the Krama Heritage bag, a Krama Heritage from the Tradition collection,
the Renaissance collection or the Les Estivales collection at a discounted
price, a Founder Edition Krama Heritage or one of our two Krama Heritage
Designer’s rewards. For the Tradition and Renaissance collections, send us an
email to kramaheritage@gmail.com with the color of your choice.
2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed
by payment details. Note
column2: if you would like to contribute extra over and

column1: above the cost of the perk you have selected, you can change the figure above.
3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card.
4) If we run out of our inventory, we aim to deliver your Krama at

the beginning of October 2014.
