traditionnel du Cambodge devient l’accessoire obligatoire du gentleman
moderne » - DANDY BLOG
« Krama Heritage,
une griffe qui conjugue mode et solidarité » - FASHION MAG
« Krama Heritage
est l’une de ces rares marques que l’on aimerait voir plus souvent. Le fait
qu’ils soient prêts à rendre en retour au pays qui a inspiré leur entreprise
fait que les admire beaucoup. Ce ne sont pas des foulards que seules les Parisiennes
peuvent porter, ces foulards transcendent les barrières de genre et de
culture » -  LAURA NEUZETH BLOG
Collection ""Renaissance""
Krama Heritage est une marque de foulards parisienne qui a
l’ambition de faire du foulard traditionnel du Cambodge un accessoire de mode
international et de créer de l’impact social au Cambodge.
Nos deux nouvelles collections ‘Renaissance’ et ‘Les
Estivales’ sont disponibles pour la première fois  à un prix de lancement spécial Indiegogo de
35€ et 45€ avec envoi gratuit partout dans le monde. Choisissez la récompense
de votre choix sur la colonne de droite et pré-commandez votre Krama
Veuillez noter: Nous
avons une quantité de stock limité pour les envois de juillet. Passez votre
commande rapidement si vous souhaitez être le premier à porter votre Krama cet
été !
Plus qu’un simple foulard, le Krama est un héritage culturel
qui se transmet de génération en génération et depuis des siècles au Cambodge.
C’est un foulard en coton et à carreaux qui a de nombreux usages dans la vie de
tous les jours : se protéger contre le soleil, porter des enfants contre
l’épaule ou servir de corde pour la collecte du bois. Il a surtout une
symbolique forte comme foulard d’appartenance du peuple Khmer. Il porte les
valeurs de tout un peuple, faites de dignité, courage, optimisme et soif de
vivre.
Le Krama nous est apparu comme le meilleur moyen de partager
notre passion pour le Cambodge et d’agir pour ce pays. Alors que le Cambodge
amorce la reconstruction de sa société, c’est à notre tour d’hériter du foulard
d’appartenance des Khmers, de l’état d’esprit qu’il incarne et d’avoir le
privilège de le porter à leur côté.
Ajouter au Krama une touche parisienne (mais sans l’altérer
car nous souhaitons que ce soit le même Krama que les Cambodgiens qui soit
porté en dehors du Cambodge) et en le transformer en accessoire de mode nous
permet aujourd’hui de financer un projet social au Cambodge. Ainsi, chaque
Krama Héritage est confectionné par les soins d’un artisan local dans la pure
tradition Khmère, et de façon responsable et soutient l’économie locale à Phnom
Penh.
Parce que nous voulons aussi agir en matière d’éducation au
Cambodge, chaque Krama Héritage contribue au développement de l’ONG Pour un
Sourire d’Enfant – à hauteur de 3€ par Krama Héritage – dont l’action au
Cambodge pour scolariser des enfants est aussi courageuse qu’essentielle.
Un projet entrepreneurial et humain, Krama Héritage est
l’aventure de toute une communauté d’héritiers du Krama, ses porteurs. De Phnom
Penh à Paris, de Paris à New York et Saint-Pétersbourg, ils montrent leur
adhésion au projet en participant à des shootings photos. C’est aussi
l’occasion pour nous d’afficher les travaux des photographes talentueux du
monde entier avec qui nous construisons le projet.
Nous avons lancé Krama Héritage avant d’être diplômés, et
nous sommes fiers de ce que nous avons réussi à accomplir avec très peu de
ressources. Nous avons hâte de pouvoir passer à la vitesse supérieure, nous
voulons que le Krama soit pour vous aussi facile à obtenir qu’à porter, mais
nous n’avons pas les ressources financières pour le faire. Nous sommes
convaincus qu’avec votre aide nous pouvons accomplir tellement plus. Si nous
atteignons notre objectif de campagne, voici comment nous allons utiliser les
ressources du crowdfunding :
Participer à des salons de créateurs.
Ce sont les endroits où les créateurs de mode rencontrent les distributeurs du
monde entier, et chacun d’entre eux coûte plusieurs milliers d’euros. Nous
avons construit une marque qui, nous en avons la conviction, plaira aux
distributeurs et plus nous faisons de salons, plus vous aurez des chances de
trouver des Kramas dans la boutique près de chez vous très bientôt !
<b>Agrandir
l’équipe Krama Heritage. En plus de ces salons, nous souhaitons agrandir
notre équipe, recruter des stagiaires ou des commerciaux pour pouvoir approcher
les distributeurs de la façon la plus efficace possible.
<b>Faire de
notre site internet la boutique mondiale Krama Heritage. Nous souhaitons apporter
à notre site une vraie refonte afin que vous puissiez acheter le Krama de votre
choix où que vous soyez dans le monde dès septembre prochain.
<b>Lancer de
nouvelles collections Krama Heritage. Vous vous êtes peut-être demandé
pourquoi il n’y a qu’un seul modèle dans la collection ‘Les Estivales’ !
Hormis les minimums associés aux quantités commandées avec lesquels nous devons
composer, nous voulons que notre catalogue de Kramas reflète toujours vos goûts
et attentes et voulons lancer de nouvelles collections, dans différentes
tailles et matières.

5) Approfondir notre projet social au Cambodge, principalement ""Le Showcase project - Entrepreneurs et Artistes du Cambodge"" où nous voulons donner l'opportunité à des Cambodgiens d'exposer leur projet sous forme de vidéos que nous diffuserons, leur donnant une exposition nouvelle et leur permettant d'attirer des investisseurs. Cela nécessiterait aussi un budget supplémentaire.
Collection ""Les Estivales""
Collection ""Tradition""
Voici comment faire pour soutenir notre campagne de
crowdfunding et être le premier à porter les Kramas des nouvelles collections
cet été
1) Choisissez une récompense dans la colonne de droite
pour débuter votre commande. Vous pouvez choisir un sac Krama Heritage, un
Krama Heritage des collections Tradition, Renaissance, Les Estivales à tarif
spécial, un Krama Heritage de l’édition limitée Founder ou l’une de nos deux
récompenses Designer. Pour les collections Tradition et Renaissance,
envoyez-nous un email à kramaheritage@gmail.com précisant la couleur de votre choix.
2) Continuez à la page suivante pour entrer les
informations relatives au transport et au règlement. Si vous souhaitez
contribuer au-delà des montants indiqués, vous pouvez changer le montant.
3) Complétez le paiement via Paypal.
4) Si notre stock vient à s’épuiser, nous nous engageons
à vous livrer votre Krama début octobre 2014.
","“An initiative applauded and endorsed by
Citizen K” - CITIZEN K
“Cambodia’s traditional scarf becomes the
modern gentleman’s must-have accessory” - DANDY BLOG
“A brand that combines fashion and solidarity” - FASHION MAG
“Krama
Heritage is one of those rare brands that don't come around too often. The fact that they are willing to give
back to the place that inspired their company makes me admire them a lot. These
aren't scarves that only Parisian women can wear, these scarves transcend
gender and cultural barriers” - LAURA NEUZETH BLOG
French version below
Collection ""Renaissance""                                                    Krama
Heritage is a Parisian brand of scarves with one ambition:  turn Cambodia’s traditional scarf into an international
fashion accessory and achieve social impact in Cambodia.
Our two new
collections ‘Renaissance’ and ‘Les Estivales’ are available for the first time
at a special Indiegogo launch price of €35 ($48) and €45 ($61) with free
worldwide postage. Select a perk on the right hand side to pre-order your
Krama.
Please note: We have a limited amount of stock available for July delivery. Please
order promptly if you’d like to be the first to wear your Krama this summer!
More than a
simple scarf, the Krama is a cultural heritage that has been passed on from
generation to generation for centuries in Cambodia. It is a cotton and
checkered scarf that has many uses in every day’s life in Cambodia:shading from
the sun, carrying infants over the shoulder or being used as a rope to collect
firewood. It has most of all a strong symbolic as the scarf of belonging of the
Khmer people. It bears the values of a whole people, made of dignity, courage,
optimism and thirst for life.
The Krama appeared to us as the best way to share our passion for
Cambodia and to act for this country. Now that Cambodia is initiating the
reconstruction of its society, it is us who inherit the scarf of belonging of
the Khmers, the state of mind it embodies and who have the privilege to wear it
side by side with them.                                           Adding to the
Krama a Parisian touch (but without altering it for we want the same Krama as
the Cambodian people to be worn outside Cambodia) and turning into a fashion
accessory allows to fund a social project in Cambodia. Thus, every Krama
Heritage is crafted in a responsible and ethical way by a lady weaver in the
pure Khmer tradition and supports the local economy in Phnom Penh.
As we also wanted to act for education in Cambodia, every Krama Heritage
also contributes directly to the development of the charity Pour un Sourire d’Enfant (For a Child’s
Smile) – on a par with €3 per Krama Heritage – whose action in schooling
children in Cambodia is as courageous as essential.
An entrepreneurial and human
project, Krama Heritage is the adventure of a whole community of héritiers, the bearers of the Krama.  From Phnom Penh to Paris, from Paris to New
York and Saint Petersburg, they show their adherence to the project and are
seen participating in photo shoots.
This
is also the occasion for us to showcase the works of talented photographers
from all over the world.
As we have
started Krama Heritage before graduating from college, we are proud of what we
have managed to accomplish with very little resources. We can’t wait to take
Krama Heritage to the next level, we want the Krama to be for you as easy to
get as it is to wear, but we lack the financial means to do so. We trust that,
with your help, we can achieve so much more. If we reach our campaign goal,
this is how we will use the crowdfunding resources:
1)  Pay for fashion exhibitions. Those are the places where fashion designers meet distributors from
all over the world, and each of them costs several thousand euros. We have
built a brand we trust will appeal to distributors, so the more fashion
exhibitions we attend, the more likely you will find Kramas at your-next-door
shop very soon.
2)  Widen the Krama Heritage team. Outside of those fashion exhibitions, we
would like to enlarge our team, hire interns or salespersons to approach the
distributors in the most effective way.
3)  Turn our website into the worldwide Krama Heritage store. We want to give our website (www.krama-heritage.net  ) a full
revamping for you to be able to purchase the Krama of your choice wherever you
are in the world next September.
4)  Launch new Krama Heritage collections. You might have wondered why there is only one
model in the ‘Les Estivales’ collection! Apart from the minimum order
quantities we have to deal with, we would like our Kramas catalogue to always
reflect your tastes and launch new Kramas collections, in different sizes and

materials 5) Deepen our social project in Cambodia, namely ""The Showcase project - Entrepreneurs & Artists from Cambodia"" whereby we would like to give the opportunity to Cambodian people to pitch in their projects through videos we would showcase, to allow exposure and attract investors. That would require too extra budget.

Collection ""Tradition""                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Collection ""Les Estivales""
Here’s how you can support
our campaign and be the first to wear your Krama this summer:
1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your pre-order. You
can select the Krama Heritage bag, a Krama Heritage from the Tradition collection,
the Renaissance collection or the Les Estivales collection at a discounted
price, a Founder Edition Krama Heritage or one of our two Krama Heritage
Designer’s rewards. For the Tradition and Renaissance collections, send us an
email to kramaheritage@gmail.com with the color of your choice.
2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed
by payment details. Note
column2: if you would like to contribute extra over and

column1: above the cost of the perk you have selected, you can change the figure above.
3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card.
4) If we run out of our inventory, we aim to deliver your Krama at
the beginning of October 2014.www.krama-heritage.net

This is Edith Louise.

We are a dynamic French and Finnish duo based in Buenos Aires, Argentina and our mission is to bring a new twist to Latin American lingerie and to propose you a different lingerie experience with innovative designs and perfectly fitted clothing. Nearly two and a half years ago we started with the idea and preparations for the project and now we have finally arrived to the end (or to the beginning?). To make your dream lingerie come alive, we still need a little more help though!

This Indiegogo campaign will allow us to pay the last part of our production and help us set up first sales. Also we'll get to prepare the second collection that is just around the corner! 

THE CONCEPT OF THE BRAND 
 Edith Louise is for all women who assert their modernity in their daily lives. They work, study, take care of their family, play sports, music or do any artistic activities. They take care of their bodies and nourish their spirits. They have a husband, a boyfriend, they seek true love or just have fun. They are involved in their community's life, have a group of friends with whom they share almost everything ...

For the open-minded and natural women, Edith Louise offers an elegant and comfortable lingerie collection that fits their lifestyle and does not give up on them when they need it the most. Edith Louise is made by women for women. It is the lingerie of sensual and spontaneous women and a brand for all those women who are not afraid to show themselves as they truly are with their characters, their passions, their weaknesses, their desires. The Edith Louise woman is bold because she feels confident. She knows who she is and what she wants. She claims her simplicity tinged with originality.

Finally, Edith Louise is the brand ambassador of the French lingerie with its elegance and minimalism. It is the "" dessous chics "" sung by Gainsbourg: it’s the good taste and quality à la française. It is the refinement of cuts and fabrics that enhance the body and make it a tool of seduction. It is the Parisian fashion, the French touch that gives all women the strength to fully embrace their femininity.

Our most sincere goal is to be able to bring this perspective to Argentina and make a stand out brand designed specificly for you. We defend the values which we believe in and this is reflected in our underwear: modernity, spontaneity, sensuality and elegance await you in our collections and in the whole spirit of the brand.
<div>THE PRODUCTION &amp

<div> The Edith Louise brand is entirely designed in Europe and adapted to Argentine style and market. We use only the finest and lightest materials that feel like the fashionable second skin you deserve. You do not adapt to Edith Louise, Edith Louise adapts to you. We value sheer and soft materials, that offer the perfect comfort and fit of the garment. Everything is sawn together with great attention to details and quality.

We are asking for your help to complete the investment we put in the first collection, its production and presentation, to bring you our products at their very best. This money will be used to pay our seamstresses the decent wages they deserve for the work, instead of using bigger and cheaper production facilities that will not pay their workers fairly. Our objective is to grow as a team, where all of our partners including fabric providers, producers and pattern drafters to name a few, could expand their work along ours and become an ensemble with no limits.
We will also use the collected money to prepare the next collection and start acquiring new fabrics and making interesting and innovative new prototypes for the future.
We thank you a lot for helping us make this dream come true. If you're interested in our project but can't donate, You can share this Indiegogo campaign or our Facebook page with your friends!

Somos Edith Louise. Somos un dúo dinámico, mitad Francés y mitad Finlandés, con base en Buenos Aires. Nuestra misión es generar un cambio en la lencería de Latinoamerica y brindarte una experiencia de lencería diferente con un diseño innovador y un calce perfecto. Hace casi dos años y medio empezamos con la idea y las preparaciones de este proyecto y recién ahora logramos finalmente realizarlo. Pero, para que tus sueños de lencería se hagan realidad, todavía nos hace falta algo de ayuda! Esta campaña de Indiegogo nos permitirá pagar la ultima parte de nuestra producción y nos ayudara organizar las primeras ventas. También nos permitirá preparar la segunda colección que no esta nada lejos!
EL CONCEPTO DE LA MARCA

Edith Louise es para todas las mujeres que afirman su modernidad en su vida diaria. Trabajan, estudian, cuidan su familia, hacen algún deporte, tocan un instrumento o tienen alguna actividad artística. Cuidan sus cuerpos y nutren sus mentes. Tienen un marido, un novio, buscan el amor verdadero o solo se divierten. Se involucran en la vida de su comunidad, tienen un grupo de amigos con los cuales comparten casi todo… Para la mujer abierta y natural, Edith Louise ofrece una colección de lencería elegante y confortable que se adapte a su estilo de vida y no la abandona cuando más lo necesita. Edith Louise está hecho por mujeres, para mujeres. Es la lencería de las mujeres sensuales y espontáneas, es una marca para todas esas mujeres que no tienen miedo a mostrarse tales como son, con sus carácteres, sus pasiones, sus debilidades y sus deseos. La mujer Edith Louise es atrevida porque confía en si misma. Sabe quién es y lo que quiere. Afirma su sensatez con tintas de originalidad. Finalmente, Edith Louise es la marca embajadora de la lencería francesa con su elegancia y su minimalismo. Son los « dessous chics » cantados por Gainsbourg : es el buen gusto y la calidad à la française. Es la finura de los cortes y telas que realzan el cuerpo y lo hacen una herramienta de seducción. Es la moda parisina, el toque francés que da a todas las mujeres la fuerza de abrazar totalmente su feminidad. Nuestro objetivo más sincero es poder brindar esa perspectiva en Argentina y crear una marca fuera de lo común diseñada especialmente para vos. Defendemos los valores en los cuales creemos y esos se reflejan en nuestra lencería: modernidad, espontaneidad, sensualidad y elegancia te esperan en nuestras colecciones y en todo el espíritu de la marca.
LA PRODUCCION Y LOS INSUMOS

Todos los productos de Edith Louise están diseñados en Europa y adaptados al estilo y al mercado argentino. Utilizamos solo las materias mas finas y livianas que se sienten como la secunda piel hermosa que mereces. No te adaptas a Edith Louise, Edith Louise se adapta a vos. Valoramos las telas sutiles y suaves, que ofrecen la comodidad y el calce perfecto de la prenda. Todas las costuras están hechas con un enfoque particular en los detalles y la calidad. Pedimos tu ayuda para completar la inversión que pusimos en nuestra primera colección, su producción y presentación, para brindarte nuestros productos al máximo de su capacidad. Este dinero va a ser usado para pagar nuestras costureras el sueldo decente que merecen para su trabajo. Preferimos trabajar con ellas que con un taller mas grande y barato que no paga sus empleados de manera adecuada. Nuestro objetivo es crecer como equipo, donde todos nuestros socios, incluso nuestros proveedores de telas, costureras y modelistas, para nombrar solo algunos, podrían desarrollarse a la medida que crecemos para volverse un ensamble sin limite. También utilizaremos el dinero recaudado para preparar nuestra próxima colección y empezar a comprar nuevas telas y a hacer nuevas muestras interesantes e innovadores para el futuro.

Te agradecemos mucho por ayudarnos hacer que este sueño se vuelva realidad. Si nuestro proyecto te interesa pero no podes donar dinero, podes compartir esta campaña de indiegogo o nuestra pagina de Facebook con tus amigos!

Nearly two and a half years ago we started with the idea and preparations for the project and now we have finally arrived to the end (or to the beginning?). To make your dream lingerie come alive, we still need a little more help though!

This Indiegogo campaign will allow us to pay the last part of our production and help us set up first sales. Also we'll get to prepare the second collection that is just around the corner! THE CONCEPT OF THE BRAND  Edith Louise is for all women who assert their modernity in their daily lives. They work, study, take care of their family, play sports, music or do any artistic activities. They take care of their bodies and nourish their spirits. They have a husband, a boyfriend, they seek true love or just have fun. They are involved in their community's life, have a group of friends with whom they share almost everything ...

For the open-minded and natural women, Edith Louise offers an elegant and comfortable lingerie collection that fits their lifestyle and does not give up on them when they need it the most. Edith Louise is made by women for women. It is the lingerie of sensual and spontaneous women and a brand for all those women who are not afraid to show themselves as they truly are with their characters, their passions, their weaknesses, their desires. The Edith Louise woman is bold because she feels confident. She knows who she is and what she wants. She claims her simplicity tinged with originality.

Finally, Edith Louise is the brand ambassador of the French lingerie with its elegance and minimalism. It is the "" dessous chics "" sung by Gainsbourg: it’s the good taste and quality à la française. It is the refinement of cuts and fabrics that enhance the body and make it a tool of seduction. It is the Parisian fashion, the French touch that gives all women the strength to fully embrace their femininity.

Our most sincere goal is to be able to bring this perspective to Argentina and make a stand out brand designed specificly for you. We defend the values which we believe in and this is reflected in our underwear: modernity, spontaneity, sensuality and elegance await you in our collections and in the whole spirit of the brand.
THE PRODUCTION & MATERIALS

The Edith Louise brand is entirely designed in Europe and adapted to Argentine style and market. We use only the finest and lightest materials that feel like the fashionable second skin you deserve. You do not adapt to Edith Louise, Edith Louise adapts to you. We value sheer and soft materials, that offer the perfect comfort and fit of the garment. Everything is sawn together with great attention to details and quality.

We are asking for your help to complete the investment we put in the first collection, its production and presentation, to bring you our products at their very best. This money will be used to pay our seamstresses the decent wages they deserve for the work, instead of using bigger and cheaper production facilities that will not pay their workers fairly. Our objective is to grow as a team, where all of our partners including fabric providers, producers and pattern drafters to name a few, could expand their work along ours and become an ensemble with no limits.
We will also use the collected money to prepare the next collection and start acquiring new fabrics and making interesting and innovative new prototypes for the future.
We thank you a lot for helping us make this dream come true. If you're interested in our project but can't donate, You can share this Indiegogo campaign or our Facebook page with your friends!

Somos Edith Louise. Somos un dúo dinámico, mitad Francés y mitad Finlandés, con base en Buenos Aires. Nuestra misión es generar un cambio en la lencería de Latinoamerica y brindarte una experiencia de lencería diferente con un diseño innovador y un calce perfecto. Hace casi dos años y medio empezamos con la idea y las preparaciones de este proyecto y recién ahora logramos finalmente realizarlo. Pero, para que tus sueños de lencería se hagan realidad, todavía nos hace falta algo de ayuda! Esta campaña de Indiegogo nos permitirá pagar la ultima parte de nuestra producción y nos ayudara organizar las primeras ventas. También nos permitirá preparar la segunda colección que no esta nada lejos!
EL CONCEPTO DE LA MARCA

Edith Louise es para todas las mujeres que afirman su modernidad en su vida diaria. Trabajan, estudian, cuidan su familia, hacen algún deporte, tocan un instrumento o tienen alguna actividad artística. Cuidan sus cuerpos y nutren sus mentes. Tienen un marido, un novio, buscan el amor verdadero o solo se divierten. Se involucran en la vida de su comunidad, tienen un grupo de amigos con los cuales comparten casi todo… Para la mujer abierta y natural, Edith Louise ofrece una colección de lencería elegante y confortable que se adapte a su estilo de vida y no la abandona cuando más lo necesita. Edith Louise está hecho por mujeres, para mujeres. Es la lencería de las mujeres sensuales y espontáneas, es una marca para todas esas mujeres que no tienen miedo a mostrarse tales como son, con sus carácteres, sus pasiones, sus debilidades y sus deseos. La mujer Edith Louise es atrevida porque confía en si misma. Sabe quién es y lo que quiere. Afirma su sensatez con tintas de originalidad. Finalmente, Edith Louise es la marca embajadora de la lencería francesa con su elegancia y su minimalismo. Son los « dessous chics » cantados por Gainsbourg : es el buen gusto y la calidad à la française. Es la finura de los cortes y telas que realzan el cuerpo y lo hacen una herramienta de seducción. Es la moda parisina, el toque francés que da a todas las mujeres la fuerza de abrazar totalmente su feminidad. Nuestro objetivo más sincero es poder brindar esa perspectiva en Argentina y crear una marca fuera de lo común diseñada especialmente para vos. Defendemos los valores en los cuales creemos y esos se reflejan en nuestra lencería: modernidad, espontaneidad, sensualidad y elegancia te esperan en nuestras colecciones y en todo el espíritu de la marca.
LA PRODUCCION Y LOS INSUMOS

Todos los productos de Edith Louise están diseñados en Europa y adaptados al estilo y al mercado argentino. Utilizamos solo las materias mas finas y livianas que se sienten como la secunda piel hermosa que mereces. No te adaptas a Edith Louise, Edith Louise se adapta a vos. Valoramos las telas sutiles y suaves, que ofrecen la comodidad y el calce perfecto de la prenda. Todas las costuras están hechas con un enfoque particular en los detalles y la calidad. Pedimos tu ayuda para completar la inversión que pusimos en nuestra primera colección, su producción y presentación, para brindarte nuestros productos al máximo de su capacidad. Este dinero va a ser usado para pagar nuestras costureras el sueldo decente que merecen para su trabajo. Preferimos trabajar con ellas que con un taller mas grande y barato que no paga sus empleados de manera adecuada. Nuestro objetivo es crecer como equipo, donde todos nuestros socios, incluso nuestros proveedores de telas, costureras y modelistas, para nombrar solo algunos, podrían desarrollarse a la medida que crecemos para volverse un ensamble sin limite. También utilizaremos el dinero recaudado para preparar nuestra próxima colección y empezar a comprar nuevas telas y a hacer nuevas muestras interesantes e innovadores para el futuro.

Te agradecemos mucho por ayudarnos hacer que este sueño se vuelva realidad. Si nuestro proyecto te interesa pero no podes donar dinero, podes compartir esta campaña de indiegogo o nuestra pagina de Facebook con tus amigos!",4.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Buenos Aires, Argentina",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/edith-louise-needs-you/pica

""SWINGS seamlessly merges classic Swiss and futuristic Silicon Valley."" – Yanko Design

A breakthrough in battery life

SWINGS sets a new record in smartwatch battery life thanks to our next generation digital chipset – exclusive to SWINGS.

SWINGS’ innovative technology powers the smartwatch for 18 months of continuous use and 24 months of regular use with an easy-to-replace coin battery (CR2450). No recharging required.
column5:
craftsmanship

We've spared no expense in making SWINGS the best smartwatch.

<li>

<li>

<li>

<li>

<li>
316L stainless steel – body and bands
• Genuine leather bands
<li>
High quality silicone bands – lightweight and comfortable for sports or everyday wear

All to create a durable, stylish, and high quality smartwatch that you'll love for years.

See Features below for an overview of what you can do with SWINGS.

 What people are saying about SWINGS...
column2:
>

Why settle for 2nd best? SWINGS spares no expense in materials, craftsmanship, and features. 

 

 

Features

SWINGS is packed with hidden features like a secret agent's smartwatch.
column3:
>

Camera Control

Take selfie pictures with ease! Use the camera remote control to take selfie pictures. By opening the SWINGS app and camera, simply take a picture by pressing a button on your watch.

Music Control

Adjust your favorite tunes with your watch. The SWINGS watch connects with any music app on your phone. Stop and play music, and control the volume, and change tracks all from your smartwatch.

Auto Change Time Zones

No need to constantly adjust your watch to different time zones. SWINGS watch smart chip sensor automatically changes the time zone for you.

Disconnect Notification

If your watch disconnects from your smartphone, it will give you warning and vibrate.

Alarm

Wake up with ease! Your SWINGS watch gives you the option to wake up by an alarm or vibration mode.

Call Notification

Never miss an important call during a meeting. If a call comes in, your SWINGS watch will vibrate and the dial will indicate a call alert. Push a button on the watch to dismiss the call and immediately send it to voicemail if you're busy.

Health Tracking

Get healthy! SWINGS tracks how many steps you take during your workout and throughout the day. It uses the most advanced gyroscope system available on any smartwatch for 3x the accuracy.

Sleep Tracking

Automatically track duration and quality of sleep. Make tweaks to your sleep routine and confirm the results with SWINGS to unlock a better you.

Compass

The built-in e-compass turns one of the smaller dials into an high precision compass for navigating the wilderness or urban jungle.
column6:
>

Graph shows 24 hours of usage. SWINGS revolutionary digital chipset uses ultra-low power consumption, maximizing the battery life.

2 years, no charging

SWINGS operates up to 24 months on a standard CR2025 watch battery without charging. To replace the battery, take your SWINGS watch to any qualified jeweler or watch specialist.

Accurate fitness and sleep tracking

Most smartwatches today are created with 3 gyroscopes to provide tracking results. SWINGS takes this to a new level with 9 high precision gyroscopes for 3x the accuracy. It's the most advanced gyroscope system available on a smartwatch.

SWINGS users can track their steps, fitness and calorie burs with reminders to move when they’ve been sedentary for too long. SWINGS also automatically tracks quality of sleep when the watch is worn in bed.
column10:
>

 

Craftsmanship

SWINGS set a new bar in craftsmanship and features with Swiss analog and next generation digital components. In times of bulky wearables and connected watches, SWINGS delivers a stylish and minimalist touch with smartwatch technology.

We are excited to introduce our first collection of analog smartwatches for active men and women who travel, work and play.

World-class craftsmanship is a cornerstone for all that we make at SWINGS. Smartwatch technology with complexity and style - we're sure you’ll find your favorite.

SWINGS delivers premium quality standards. We partnered directly with the world’s leading timepiece manufacturers, who, for decades, have produced luxury watches for high-end brands that retail for over $1000. SWINGS watches are made from high grade stainless steel, offering high strength, durability and long-lasting visual appeal. The watch body is designed so you can be sure that the timepiece will fit comfortably on wrists of all sizes, both men's and women's.

SWINGS watches are crafted using only the finest materials and unwavering attention to detail: Swiss parts movement, quality leather strap, and durable stainless steel. Wear a classic look with smartwatch options!
column13:
>

 

Demo Videos

Walkthrough video showing many of SWINGS features:
column19:
showinfo=0"">

 

Technical review from a watch enthusiasts:

column1: <div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/Cy4HG9Co56A?autohide=1&amp

Recent Testimonials

I love smart technology and I also love good watches. I've been let down by terrible battery life in the smartwatches I have owned so far. To have a watch with a decent battery life makes all the difference when traveling as I often don't have any ability to charge my devices.
James Cerini

Ok, #1 sleep tracking, #2 water resistance, #3 fitness tracking and #4 design combined....what more would you want? This convinces me that this is the better replacement for my ugly blue Fitbit.
Bart Feldberg

I love the look of classic analog watches but would find the extra digital capabilities extremely useful without having to charge it every day. Finally 'THE WATCH' that takes care of everything! Everything about the features that excite me. Being a seasoned traveler, a must-have watch for my busy traveling!
Jon Ward

This looks like a much better idea than a ""smartwatch"" that just duplicates my phone and needs constant recharging. Also very nice looking watches!
Bill Layton
column2:
>

 

SWINGS watches ordered on IndieGoGo will ship at first availability. Manufacturing has already started. We expect watches to start shipping at the end of November and throughout December.
column8:
Manufacturing

SWINGS is an international collaboration with team members in New York, San Francisco, Zürich, and Beijing. Our team has designed and manufactured high-end watches and smartwatches for some of the biggest watch brands in Europe and the US. We know the challenges and requirements for manufacturing and shipping watches at scale.

SWINGS has already started the first manufacturing batch for quality assurance. The Android app is 95% complete. The iOS app is 80% complete. Both will be ready for your enjoyment in December when your SWINGS ships.

Please do not hesitate to send us a message if you have any questions or comments.

<div style=""margin-left: 30px
Shi-Taz has been the air I breathe for 25 years since I first arrived in Bali,Indonesia and started my little business,creating fashion for women.

I did what I loved and soon everyone else did too. I started selling out of everything in 36 stores Nationwide and then the Economy collapsed and one by one the stores closed and I did too. The one thing that only my closest friends knew was that I would be back when the time was right and that time is now.
<div>

I am starting over and need $10,000 to start a new production. i already have a few new stores carrying my last designs. I will be leaving Santa Monica in 2 months to go back to Bali and create what all women love,dresses and skirts that they have never seen before.  My designs are all limited editions which means you will never see anybody else wearing what you have on. One size fits all. Never do I want women to think about size .Now here is something else I am exremely passionate about,animals. There is a Foundation in Bali called BAWA. They rescue and find homes for the dogs and cats living on the streets with no hope or life. I know it's worldwide but here I can make a difference and so can you. So I am donating 25 % of all sales from Shi -Taz to them. So now you are wearing fabulous one of a kind clothing from Bali and actually making a huge difference in the lives of these helpless little creatures roaming the streets of Bali.
<div>
Even if you only have $5 every dollar helps and if money is tight and you can't help please just share this with your friends.

Cakeworthy X Disneybound have partnered up for the past two years to bring our fans unique, pop-culture inspired merchandise that you won't find anywhere else! 

This spring, we released our Mermaid Hats. All the pieces that we had manufactured sold out very quickly. Since then, we have received e-mails daily asking if we would be stocking more. We would like to give our fans the opportunity to get their hands on one of these hats but as an indie brand we don't have the capital to invest in manufacturing another order.

If we can raise a minimum $2000, we will have enough capital to manufacture another order of Mermaid Hats. For contributing to our campaign, you are pre-ordering and guaranteed to receive your very own Mermaid Hat!

Remember, if we don't raise the full amount in 7 days, everyone is refunded and the Mermaid Hats stay retired! Help us spread the word on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr and all social media!

If funded, it takes approximately a month for the hats to be manufactured (EST Mid to Late August  2014).

Notes:

When contributing, please ensure that you provide us with your shipping information and perk selection.
column4: >Donations submitted without a perk selection or above the $40 amount will be assumed to be an in-kind donation.
column7:
>If you would like two hats, please make two separate contributions. Unfortunately we cannot combine shipping.

Our Campaign
InPDUM Apparel is an economic development project of the International People's Democratic Uhuru Movement.
 
Our goal is to build a fashionable, independent and revolutionary brand that caters to lovers of Black freedom and self-determination. Putting one of the more recognizable brands of the black liberation movement on an apparel line will also promote our organization and its politics.
 
With your help, we aim to create organizational self reliance. The vision is for this project is to build an apparel line that will sustain our organization's work and put us on the path to self-determination.

All proceeds go to the production of our debut line, shipping costs and stock so we can continue to bring you our fashionable apparel.

column1: Our Perks
All Tee Shirts will also be available in women's cut.
The Indiegogo checkout process does not allow you to indicate item sizes. We will contact you towards the end of the campaign for sizing info.

Who I Am and our mission

I'm Adriano Cortinovis, I was born in 1990 in Brazil, adopted in Italy at 6 years old.

I lived in the poverty all my childhood dreaming to  do something for the others in my future. 

I lived some months in California in 2010 to emprove my english and visit the country I mostly love.  Here I created something that I was sure that would change the lives of many people.  Born Lemòde, a Fashion brand, made to help people in need, that can make the difference. A Brand born to foster solidarity around the world.

I spent 3 years of my life working for raise money to invest and begin make advertisement and to present the brand all over the world, I begun in California, then Italy,  United Kingdom, France, Switzerland and now I'm in Brasil, when one year ago I met my real brothers after 17 years of adoption.

I'm creating this campaign because I want everyone to know about my brand and all the money I will raise will be used to create stores of the Brand ( Everywhere I could, Brazil , US, Europe, Asia ) , produce new Collections and make new advertising campaigns.  Creating new business my dream is to create new jobs and most important thing donate to people in need money to build a new life, donate clothes and food. If we will raise  100'000 USD we will open stores in different countries included U.S and we will begin to help who really need, once again , as we are doing from almost 4 years with charity events and selling products. Your donation or your help could really change the story of the Brand and the life of lots of people. 

I want to bring all over the world a Brand that could be bought from everyone and at the same time people know that will help someone in need with their own purchase ! 

If you like my Idea and want to help me and my two friends in Italy and Brazil to make the difference share our values and our Brand whith people you love and people you know. 


Lemòde, The Brand born to help people in need. 

Help us make the difference, 

www.lemodecalifornia.com.br 


Adriano Cortinovis 

Founder and Owner

a.cortinovis@lemodecalifornia.com.br

Hey everyone!  I'm Edwin, I live in Los Angeles, and I am constantly pursuing art as a passion, as a career and as an overall state of being.  

I graduated from the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising in 2010 and after a string of not-so-glamorous positions both in and out of the design world, alongside heavy interest in a single pair of pants I made for myself after saying I wanted to look like Denise Huxtable from The Cosby Show one day, I have decided to finally confront the beast that has always stood before me over the last 4 years: starting my own business.  This business is Hillman harems.

Hillman harems is a movement.  A revolution in pants designed to fit into every aspect of your life.  These unique pants are created to inspire anyone to pursue everything imaginable, do it with style, and always cultivate happiness along the way!
As a contributor, you will be supporting this movement.  The pants alone will not change the world, they are merely a conduit for the message behind them
column2: that message is bravery and joy and that makes a difference.

column7: >The funding I need to begin and maintain my initial production is fairly modest considering there are many steps in the process that I am doing myself in order to cut some costs.

column1: The majority of these funds will go to purchasing the textile options the pants will be offered in, getting the patterns graded into different sizes, cutting the patterns out of the fabric, ordering labels and tags, obtaining a business license, and maintaining the website that you can use to purchase them!
Of course these contributions come with perks!  This could mean a free pair of pants, a custom fashion illustration by me, a signed copy of my book, or maybe all three!
If we don't reach the monetary goal, I will still be infinitely grateful for all of your support and every penny will still go toward bringing this goal to life
column2: it may take a bit more time, but that's okay because we're going to make this happen!

column1: If you cannot make a donation, there is still plenty you can do!  Simply help me get the word out about the campaign in any way you know how
column2: doing this will be just as equally appreciated.  Thank you!

Hi, my name is Paru. I’m the owner and founder of the iKen brand.

Inspired by my first product, iKen Watches: a build-your-own watch system, iKen Shades are a perfect combination of fashion, versatility and fun! Our patent-pending design, has polarized lenses that also give you 100% UV protection. The shades are made from 5 independent components, that you pick in the colors of your choice and put together to build your very own pair of customized shades. As the lenses are surrounded with a colored rim and paired with a frame and 2 arms in your choice of individual colors, you have the possibility of shades, with 5 colors!

iKen shades offer customization

column1: the time, and freedom of expression is a way of life. It’s in this same spirit
that iKen was created. We believe that each individual is unique, should not
have to hide, and what they wear shouldn’t either. We designed our first
product of build-your-own watches to empower you to say exactly what you want,
the way you want to.
The
word ‘iKen’, pronounced /eee-ken/ means ‘opinion’ and ‘options’ in Japanese.
Our products are bright, bold, can be built to suit your unique style, or built
to represent who/what you stand for. iKen is about being an individual. Being
who you want to be. It’s about being you.

Hey potential backers!

We have finally come up to the fourth generation of the demon faced t-shirts.  It has been a long run on the eyes and mouth shirt, but it is time to try something new!  Therefore, we are releasing the next generation of shirts.  If you are interested in getting one, this is your chance to get it a tad cheaper.  They will display Vile on shirts front with the word EVIL underneath him.

Why IndieGoGo?

I decided to use IndieGoGo for this project in-order to let those who like to use PayPal.  

Generation 3 pictured above.

Generation 4 pictured above.

For $45 you get a shirt and an original 9x12 drawing.  You can ask for almost any character.  I'll be happy to sign it if you want.



All backers get a button for their support.

Thank you for your time.
-Chris

Be the First Family on your block with Qubits!
<div>
Rendering of (1) Indiegogo Color Kit -36 Qubits 12 Bridges PLUS! 6 Extra Bridges

We will be going into production in Central Florida the mid March and when we press that first batch they will be numbered, signed and certified as the first original Qubits 2.0 kits. This campaign is to raise awareness about our toy before it even begins retail production. You can have a great toy and take part in the very first pressing of the toy.
<div>
<div>
What is our backstory?

Like every product, the steps involved from inception to completion are numerous and time consuming.  After so many years and selling so many toys, we were able to see the toys in the hands of hundreds of children. We eventually determined that our first toy could be IMPROVED upon.
<div>
Well two years later we just finished designing Qubits 2.0 - then we invested in the production of new molds, and we are doing ALL of the development right here in the USA.

Currently we are slated to begin the milling of our new mold during the month of February and the first pressing of plastic parts will be near the end of March.  So we thought about it for a while and realized that we could create a Indiegogo campaign to pre-raise money so that we could press out more plastic parts (Qubits 2.0) during the very first run. This larger order would allow us to press more pieces with more EXCITEMENT! With this crowd funding effort we will be putting out into the public a First Pressing Toy (a collectible that will be delivered with certification).

That's where you come in. Our crowd funding effort will allow you to get one of those first kits of Qubits. The packaging will also be unique to this project and have labels that declare it as one of the very first Qubits 2.0 kits.
<div>
Orlando Sentinel Newspaper Story about this Campaign
CLICK HERE to read the whole article.
Update #1 Milling of the Mold began February 6th
<div>
The carving of the metal Qubits mold has begun and it will continue via a computer program in the XV-1020A
The XV-Series is built with state-of-the art technology.
The XV-Series is built for the automotive, aerospace, electronics, medical and the mold making industries. Now it is the creator of Qubits 2.0
<div>
<div>
How do Qubits go together? What can you build?

Here is a quick video (CLICK THIS LINK http://vimeo.com/56676337 ) it shows the bike object being built, it is about 2.5 feet tall! The rest of the video shows some of the possible shape combinations (there are literally thousands) the pieces snap together and just as easilly snap apart.
Why are Qubits important?

Math and science can be puzzling to a child, but if you can put geometry in their hands, they will be able to comprehend many concepts while they ""play"". There are already many ""BLOCK"" style building toys, but their geometry is very cubic. Qubits uses the 60 degree geometry found in nature.
You see it in:
<ul>
• Snowflakes
• Honeycomb
• Rock Crystals
Just as coal can become diamonds when its atoms are rearranged, the Qubits toy helps children understand the possibilities in rearranging nature’s building blocks.
We recommend the toy for ages 5+
<div>
<ul>
• Thinking Skills
• Motor Skills
• Expression (Creativity)
• Math
<li>Shapes &amp
<div>
Another Newspaper Article - This time in the Seminole Chronicle
Did we tell you Qubits are made in the USA?

In fact the factory is located in Florida. Colorful polypropylene, the same high quality plastic as found in the mixing bowls in your kitchen cupboard. No lead, no phylates, no BPA - it is the highest quality USA sourced plastic.
------- United States Patent #7036277 --------
<div>
Experienced Toy Maker

This is the second version of this toy concept. The first version appeared on ABC Shark Tank and was licensed to Discovery Toys, LLC - With their distributorship we sold lots of kits in the USA and Canada.
<ul>
• Qubits 2.0 is already underway in Orlando, FL
• Improved playability
• Easy Snap Fit construction
Combine Qubits with your classroom science project!
Here is a photo of a solar powered spinning gizmo. 18 Qubits &
Please use all of your Indiegogo share tools on this page!
Thank you for Checking out our campaign.

I want to tryout for the Los Angeles KISS, an Arena Football League team. Since I've gotten myself into shape way back in 2009, I've always regretted not doing it earlier when I had the chance to play high school and possibly college sports. Well this seems to be the perfect opportunity to find out once and for all if a 27 year old pack a day smoker and alcohol enthusiast who likes to think he's in better shape because of those things can cut it with the big boys. You're probably thinking 'He doesn't have a shot in hell' but I have been training fairly intensely for the past two months since I moved to LA. I have ran/walked/hiked over 180 miles in that time averaging about 3 miles a day. I usually do a quick round of circuit training following the runs. I have been doing bikram yoga three days a week for the past month and regular yoga during that time as well. I have a cannon for a left arm and a 6'5"" wingspan and catch anything thrown my way so I would try out for either QB or WR. None of this guarantees I would make the team but part of this money will be used for supplements to ramp up my training regimen over the next three weeks. Mexican steroids are welcome in lieu of cash donations. The rest of the money is for the $85 registration fee, $115 or so for turf shoes and turf gear so I don't get burned up making acrobatic catches all over the field and $100 for training supplements. Any donation will get you a hug or some home cooked food. If I make the team, anyone who donates will receive game tickets if we play anywhere near where you reside. Last but not least, we are recreating an episode from It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia, which is the greatest TV show ever made. We will be tailgating the entire event, serving milk steak boiled over hard and the finest jelly beans, raw,  and things will most likely get weird. I would love for you to join us if you are in the area and if not, it's probably worth it to fly in for this awesome event. The biggest challenge is standing out in what is sure to be a very large crowd of people trying out. I plan to overcome this by being in the best shape possible and putting my 20+ years of football knowledge to good use in the time leading up to the tryout.

","I want to tryout for the Los Angeles KISS, an Arena Football League team. Since I've gotten myself into shape way back in 2009, I've always regretted not doing it earlier when I had the chance to play high school and possibly college sports. Well this seems to be the perfect opportunity to find out once and for all if a 27 year old pack a day smoker and alcohol enthusiast who likes to think he's in better shape because of those things can cut it with the big boys. You're probably thinking 'He doesn't have a shot in hell' but I have been training fairly intensely for the past two months since I moved to LA. I have ran/walked/hiked over 180 miles in that time averaging about 3 miles a day. I usually do a quick round of circuit training following the runs. I have been doing bikram yoga three days a week for the past month and regular yoga during that time as well. I have a cannon for a left arm and a 6'5"" wingspan and catch anything thrown my way so I would try out for either QB or WR. None of this guarantees I would make the team but part of this money will be used for supplements to ramp up my training regimen over the next three weeks. Mexican steroids are welcome in lieu of cash donations. The rest of the money is for the $85 registration fee, $115 or so for turf shoes and turf gear so I don't get burned up making acrobatic catches all over the field and $100 for training supplements. Any donation will get you a hug or some home cooked food. If I make the team, anyone who donates will receive game tickets if we play anywhere near where you reside. Last but not least, we are recreating an episode from It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia, which is the greatest TV show ever made. We will be tailgating the entire event, serving milk steak boiled over hard and the finest jelly beans, raw,  and things will most likely get weird. I would love for you to join us if you are in the area and if not, it's probably worth it to fly in for this awesome event. The biggest challenge is standing out in what is sure to be a very large crowd of people trying out. I plan to overcome this by being in the best shape possible and putting my 20+ years of football knowledge to good use in the time leading up to the tryout.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

If you're viewing this page thinking... ""man I wish I ordered one of those while the campaign was live!""

Fret not! 

You may have missed our Indiegogo campaign but the watches are still available on our website. AND for a limited time they are the same price as they were on Indiegogo. 

Visit our website here.
column5:
/>

A little over a year ago I started drawing up rough sketches of a crazy idea I had for a watch that was made almost entirely of reclaimed aluminum.

Why aluminum?

I was intrigued that many tech products were using aluminum in their design. But when I looked around very few other areas of design were using this fascinating metal. 

Which was wild because aluminum literally has a story to tell.

Aluminum is the most recycled/reused metal in the world. That means the aluminum in a Morveau watch lived a full life before becoming a watch. Each piece could have been expertly crafted by a master artisan into a statue in the 19th century or an airplane during a tide changing campaign in WWII.

We wanted to embrace the incredible stories that this metal has to tell within the design of the Morveau watch. This mix of a historied past with new and elegant design is perfect for our wearers who are stylish people looking to live a history worth retelling.
column6:
/>

You can now choose between sapphire blue, matte black, and/or deep red hands at no additional cost to you. Select any of the existing perk levels...

*at the completion of the campaign you will receive a survey asking which color hands you would like. 

Check out the Morveau Madness perk level to pick up all three colors.
column14:
/>




Bead-blasted Aluminum - Aircraft grade 6000 series aluminum... an extremely durable yet  lightweight metal. We chose aluminum because of its incredible look, but also because of its resistant durability. Its the perfect metal for a watch that attempts to blend a lifestyle into a physical product. Used nearly entirely throughout the watch design, you’ll see aluminum in the dial, numbers, logo, dashes, hands, crown, and the caseback.

Ultra-thin - At 7mm thick, from case back to the top of the domed sapphire crystal glass, Morveau is one of the thinnest watches on the market.

Swiss Movement - When it came time to decide on the materials for the Morveau watch we wanted only the highest quality in all aspects. For the movement we spared no expense by choosing an ETA 955-102 movement. It’s no secret that the Swiss make the best watch movements in the world and that is why we chose to work with the highest quality movements made by ETA.
column16:
/>


Scratch Resistant Sapphire Crystal - The glass is made of anti-reflective scratch resistant sapphire crystal, with the slightest curvature to create an elegant domed glass.

Easy Remove Straps

- All of Morveau straps are equipped with an easy remove spring bar. You don’t need a tool to replace straps. Since any strap goes effortlessly with the watch design, accessorizing has never been so easy. Get all four straps with your watch body and wear your Morveau during any occasion. (More strap options coming soon.)

column1: <div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe class=""embedly-embed"" height=""326"" src=""https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2F3xHmjnXLIhw%3Ffeature%3Doembed&amp
High Quality Leather and Denim - the denim is top of line selvedge denim and the leather full grain, perfectly accented with Morveau's signature sapphire blue stitching.
Water Resistant - The Morveau watch is water resistant up to 10 meters. Shower? No problem. Washing hands? No problem. Scuba Diving? Leave Morveau at home.

Individually Numbered Custom Caseback - As a special thank you to our backers we've created a custom caseback just for those who back the Morveau watch through Indiegogo. Each watch will be individually numbered as they come off the line. Your caseback will reflect which watch you received.

We had a theory about what a watch should be. Yes it should be affordable, yes it should be stylish, and versatile. But more than that… a watch should blend perfectly into my lifestyle and it should challenge me to a greater lifestyle. So when we set out to create a watch we wanted it to be aspirational
column2: at its core to be... evocative. We wanted to create a brand that represented these ideals. A brand that stood behind our customers and pushed them to greater heights. Now, 1 year after the original idea was conceived I couldn’t be more happy to present the Morveau watch and the Morveau brand.

column1: This stunning timepiece was built on a desire for excellence. Seeking excellence in developing the Morveau brand took form in 3 unique yet conjoined requirements.
We require that the watch is of the highest quality, the purchasing decision is a complete experience, and the brand is evocative for the customer.

Quality: When designing (and then ultimately building) the watch we spared no expense. Only the finest parts should be used. This is why we insisted on the top of the line aircraft grade aluminum. That’s why there’s a Swiss movement inside the watch instead of a far cheaper Japanese movement. Finally, that’s why we obsessed over every little detail in the build process, sending samples back multiple times until every aspect was perfect. Nothing less than the best would do for our watch.

Experience: When you make a decision to purchase a watch you become emotionally attached to that decision. It is the brand's responsibility to make your purchasing decision the best decision you could have made in that moment. Our burden is to ensure that when you purchase our watch it is a fully developed experience from before to after the purchase. Meaning that you receive assistance before your purchase, ease within the purchase, and lifetime customer service after you are a Morveau brand owner.
Evocative: You want to achieve greatness. We want to help you achieve greatness. Our desire is that the Morveau brand would evoke a sense of adventure and purpose in your journey.
• Case Material: 6000 series aircraft grade aluminum
• Band Material: Full Grain leather, selvedge denim, metal mesh
• Movement: ETA 955-102 Quartz
• Case Thickness: 5mm casebody
column2: 7mm to top of Sapphire glass dome

column1: • Face Diameter: 43mm
• Band Width: 20mm
• Display: Minimalistic Analog
• Water Resistance: 3 ATM (10 Metres)
• Glass: Sapphire Crystal

It was only 6 months ago that I sat at my desk in my corporate gig day-dreaming about running my own business and life some day. I wasn’t the only one. Often, it wasn’t irregular to hear from my co-workers young and old about their ideas and dreams to take control of their time and create their own businesses.

I started running the designs by my friends and family, and was just generally getting really excited about the future of this minimalistic watch idea. After a few months I had some initial engineering drawings and things were moving along. It was definitely a steep learning curve and because I was working a 9 to 5 I didn’t have a lot of time to put into developing the product and learning all that watchmaking entails. So I knew the inevitable was coming.

See, I have this belief that life was not meant to be lived on someone else's terms. If we are truly supposed to seize every moment then the best thing I can do for myself is figure out how to remove the barriers that prevent me from seizing every moment.
For me the barrier was my 9 to 5 job.

It was about this time that I went on a two week vacation to India. As I strolled through the tea plantations in Munnar, fought for my life crossing streets in Chennai, and enjoyed the beauty of the western Indian coastline I got a taste of what enjoying life on my terms would be like. I didn’t know it at the time but that trip to India would be the catapult that would sling me into quitting my job.

The India trip ended the beginning of December. Mid-February I had quit my job. Beginning of March I moved to China to take my engineering designs to a factory I had been in talks with to build my very first watch design.
This watch, which started with moonlighting a cool idea, has been a labor of love and triumph.
This watch would have never become a reality if I had not taken control of my decisions and my future and pursued what I was most excited to put my effort into.
My hope is that every wearer of a Morveau watch will carry this legacy and that the brand will evoke a sense of purpose to live life to the fullest, to… live a history worth retelling.

In 1761 an esteemed gentleman, chemist, and politician by the name of Louis-Bernard Guyton de Morveau set out on the monumental journey of producing the first systematic method of chemical nomenclature. Among the metals being named Alumine was proposed by Mr. Morveau for a relatively new and exciting metal that was yet understood.

As the refining process was developed the name for Alumine changed to Aluminum and it’s in this heritage that we pay tribute to Mr. Morveau by naming our first of a kind wristwatch after this historical titan.

After months of working with our supplier to ensure we had the best watch possible we now have a prototype that we’re proud of and more importantly a watch that is ready for the market. We have finalized the designs, agreed on a prototype, and squared away a top notch strap factory. Our supplier is ready to produce the first order of Morveau watches we just need to give them the go ahead.

Once the Indiegogo campaign has run it’s course we will initiate an order with our supplier, after which manufacturing will begin on our first order. Once manufacturing is complete we’ll move into the quality control phase where we will individually scrutinize every single piece for any defects large or small. When quality control is complete the watch moves into packaging and then shipping.

Since we had such a high standard for quality and working with a metal as unique as aluminum in order to make sure the watch stays affordable and consistent we have to put in an initial minimum order quantity.  We can’t order this first batch without your help. When you support us through this Indiegogo campaign you help us fulfill the first production run and in exchange you get a unique watch with the highest quality standard.
By pledging today, you are securing a beautiful Morveau watch and making sure you receive it as early as possible. You are also locking in the special Indiegogo price.

Our reach only goes so far beyond our networks. Please share our project on Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter or send a few quick emails to friends and family. It can go a long way to help ensure the success of this campaign!
MANUFACTURING:

One of the primary challenges when dealing with any physical product like this is complications in manufacturing. Rest assured, as we have already found reputable and highly capable suppliers for producing our watches. Everything from where we source our aluminum to the movement of the watch to final assembly, we've got it all dialed in.

We work directly with our suppliers from start to finish and even conduct all quality control in-house. And the process will remain the same as we get ready to manufacture more units post-Indiegogo campaign.
LEAD TIME &

Knowing the exact timeline for production from start to finish is never an easy thing to judge. Thanks to the relationships we've built however, we're confident that we can finish all orders within 90 days upon the conclusion of this campaign. In the case that any delays do arise all backers will be informed immediately and kept up to speed with all updates.
• Can I pledge to get more than one watch at a certain level?

• Of course you can! For each additional watch you want, simply tack on another pledge amount to your current pledge. For example, if you're in at the $125 level, add an extra $125 for each additional watch. If you want two watches at that pledge amount, you'd pledge $250.
• How do I choose my Morveau watch strap?

• At the conclusion of the campaign, we'll send you a quick survey that will ask for your preferred watch strap. We'll also ask for your physical mailing address, so we know where you'd like us to ship your Morveau gear.

Who am I?

I'm Melissa Moore, a former Science/Math teacher (10 years) turned designer. I founded Nikkuu Design in late 2010 in while still doing my day job. Although my training is in Biology (and not formally art or design), I have been designing and making art since the age of 9 years old. After almost a year of work, I built a line of products and was accepted into one of the largest design fairs in the country, New York international Gift Fair 2011.

Since the fair (about 10 months) I have gotten some of my products out into the market and there is a lot of excitement about them.  Direct consumers, interior designers, and event planners have bought and are interested in my collection.

HOWEVER, even though there is a demand, production has slowed down and can not begin again until I raise enough funds to keep things going. I have invested everything that I have into the company and people are excited about these unique products. I have also been invited to participate in several highly competitive design markets but will not be able to participate unless I have enough money to produce more inventory.
Where do you come in?
Your support and contributions would help to create:
<ul>
•   Funds to buy material to create new lighting and furniture
•  Funds to pay for some production help on making parts that my studio is not equipped for
•  Funds for some marketing materials like catalogs to send to potential buyers
What you get?
<ul>
•  Amazing free and high quality gifts that are worth 2-3 times more then the contributions that I'm asking for
• A big THANK YOU
• Satisfaction of knowing that you are participating in an amazing movement of collective support of small business

• Satisfaction of knowing that you are helping to contribute to the future of a design/education/community development after school program for Baltimore City youth.that Nikkuu profits will eventually help fund.
What else can you do to help?
If you can't contribute monetarily and you are excited about what you see, please spread the word about Nikkuu Design (www.nikkuudesign.com) and tell your friends and family about the campaign.
Thank you for your consideration and be well,

Melissa
