column4: >Hi Everybody, we are coming over from a successful Kickstarter campaign to give

column1: potential contributors a chance to get the SmartWallit Pro and anyone else who
missed out! Also for any distributors out there who are interested in reselling
the SmartWallit! Thanks again.
theawesomer:""A Bluetooth accessory for wallets. It logs when and where you opened your wallet so you can keep a record...""
Golem:""Neben dem Smartphone bleibt auch gerne das Portemonnaie liegen. Beides ist ein schmerzlicher Verlust...""
Gizmag:""Two of the most important things that you carry with you everyday are your wallet and your smartphone. One holds your money, and the other...""
Androidrundown:""I realize that I am not the only person who misplaces their wallet, but I find it hard to believe that there are people on this earth who lose theirs more consistently than I do...""
Gadgets4guys:""There is that moment when you wake up in the morning (and do a double take at what is laying next to you) and realize that you have no idea where your wallet is...""
Technode:""SmartWallit is a Bluetooth 4.0 appcessory, with a name-card-holder-shaped device and an app... ""
Wasabimountain:“At first glance the SmartWallit appears to be another wallet offering on Kickstarter, but dive into the video read what this project is...”

column2:
>What is SmartWallit?

SmartWallit is a revolutionary device that allows you to keep track of your wallet. It will prevent you from leaving your wallet behind, so you will not have to awkwardly stand at the register frantically searching for your wallet. It is able to do this by connecting with your phone through Bluetooth 4.0. In addition, SmartWallit comes with a free App for your phone, which records the time and place when you lost it. 

When you use your wallet, App will record when and where you use it. It is very useful for you to check whether you use credit card or not. If you receive credit card bill, you may often ask yourself "" Did i use the credit card in New York at 3pm on 3th, January"" So you can check that by the App's records.

If you misplace your wallet, you can make SmartWallit ring by using the App to figure out the location of your wallet.

There are so many differences between SmartWallit and SmartWallit Pro.

What is SmartWallit Pro？

SmartWallit Pro is a new generation of SmartWallit with many new features: thinner and easily inserted into your wallet, more stable connection activity and more friendly App designs, cloud synchronization supported, colorful design, no disturb mode, funny warning sound, distance view, reminder of dealing with records, Lost location view, etc.

How does it work?  

SmartWallit Pro connects with your phone through Bluetooth 4.0. All you have to do is open the SmartWallit Pro application and you will be all set. No need to dig around endlessly looking for the word Bluetooth in the Settings. Here are a few examples of how we think SmartWallit Pro will revolutionize your life.

Scenario 1: 2-way anti-lost reminder

If you leave your wallet behind, your phone will let you know. If you leave your phone behind, your wallet will let you know. Your wallet and your phone will now be responsible for each other. If you spent the whole weekend staying at home or at office, you can disable anti-lost function by App’s No Disturb Mode.

Scenario 2: Uh, where did it go?

If you misplaced your wallet, you can use the App to make your wallet ring. With a loud buzzer sound at a volume of over 85dB, you will have no trouble hearing it, even as far as 10 meters away. To allow for a more accurate hunt, the App will also show you the distance between your phone and your wallet. 

Scenario 3: When and where did you use your wallet?

When you use your wallet, SmartWallit Pro App will record this action using its proximity and light sensor to push a signal to your phone. With that information, your phone will be able to record when and where you last used your wallet.

This function introduces a brand new way to manage your finances. For example, if you make a payment, the SmartWallit Pro will ask if you would like to input payment details. Compared with other financial applications, our App gives you a frequent reminder to input those payment details. This allows you to build an accurate and complete record of the frequency and amount you spend. When reviewing your monthly spendings, the App will then be able to show you what you have bought over the last week/month/year.
column3:
>Reward Of SmartKee

We will release key anti-lost&
column4: finder accessory - SmartKee at the same time.  It will prevent you from leaving your keys behind. Also you can ring the SmartKee by App if you misplace your keys.

column1:
Reward Of Wallet

We release the USD60 reward tier: 1 SmartWallit Pro + 1 wallet. So you can insert SmartWallit Pro into the wallet to use above mentioned functions. If you don't have wallet or you'd like to change your current wallet,the reward is best choice for you. Please refer to following pictures to learn more about the wallet.

Reward Of SmartWallit Pro Special Band

If you wear beach pants in summer, you don't want to take wallet in your pocket. Then you can use the band attached with SmartWallit Pro, money and card as following figure shows.

Rewards

New Features Of SmartWallit Pro

1. Algorithm is Optimized to reduce unexpected warning

SmartWallit Pro’s distance algorithm is optimized to reduce unexpected warning. In other words, SmartWallit Pro is more stable than old SmartWallit. Some users complained that SmartWallit might disturb them even if wallet was very close to phone. Now they don’t have to worry that again.

2. Algorithm of light sensor is optimized successfully.

SmartWallit users complained that they would receive ""Your wallet is open"" when they didn't open their wallets. We spent time in digging into the problem. Then we optimized the algorithm of light sensor and solved the problem. So SmartWallit Pro would have better user experience. 

3. No Disturb Mode

When you are at office or at home, you may drop wallet on table and walk around in room. Your wallet will lost connection with your phone frequently and there will be many out of range warnings. When you enable no disturb setting, there will be no out of range warning even if you leave your wallet or phone behind. App's default no disturb interval is  21:00-07:00(next day). So when you sleep at nigh, you will not be disturbed by SmartWallit Pro again.

4. It is the thinnest anti-lost device with Li-ion polymer battery around the world

SmartWallit Pro is the thinnest anti-lost device with Li-ion polymer battery around the world. Its thickness is only 4.2mm, and you can easily insert it into your wallet. And it only weighs 10g.


5. Lost location information help you easily get wallet back

SmartWallit Pro App will record the location where you lost wallet last time. So you could open SmartWallit Pro App and figure out the location of your wallet.

6. Records will be synced to the cloud manually or automatically

When you make payment, App would record when and where you pay. Also you can input amount, category and payment way. Those records will be synced to the cloud manually or automatically. So you don’t have to worry that the records would be lost.

7. Colorful SmartWallit Pro

There are 5 standard colors of SmartWallit Pro for you choose. That will make your wallet unique. The standard colors include black, blue, pink, red and green.


There are 4 limited edition colors: light green, light blue, light pink and yellow.



8. Natural and animal voices make SmartWallit Pro funny

When your phone is far away from SmartWallit Pro, a bird will sing loudly to call your back. When SmartWallit Pro is low battery, a cute dog will bark to remind you to charge SmartWallit Pro. When you use your wallet, you could hear the sound of spring. 

9. Distance shows on App's  dashboard

When you open App, you can figure out the distance between SmartWallit Pro and your phone by the App’s dashboard.

10. Automatically remind you to deal with your everyday records

Every day, App will push you one message: ""Do you have any records that you should deal with?"" It can remind you to deal with your everyday records. The time when you receive above message can be adjusted on App's setting menu.

11. 3 Hours No Disturb Mode

If you are at office and have a meeting, you’d like not to be disturbed by SmartWallit Pro. You can temporarily disable anti-lost function for 3 hours. SmartWallit Pro App implements the function as following figure shows.


12. Reminder of luggage approaching

You could put SmartWallit Pro into luggage before you board a plane. When you get off a plane and your luggage with SmartWallit Pro is approaching to you, Your phone will push message to remind you that your luggage is approaching to you.

Specification Of SmartWallit Pro

SmartWallit Pro is a Bluetooth 4.0 device that connects with all current or future iPhone’s (4S, 5, 5S, 5C or later) and iPod Touch (5th generation or later). SmartWallit Pro also supports various Android phones that support Bluetooth 4.0 and Android 4.3, such as Samsung S(III,IV), Note (II, III) , HTC ONE, LG G2, Sony Xperia Z series, Google Nexus 4, 5, etc.

SmartWallit Pro comes in 5 colors: black, blue, pink, red and green.

SmartWallit Pro contains a 100mAh rechargeable Li-ion polymer battery. 

SmartWallit Pro also has a buzzer, which ensures that you will be able to find it in any environment, a common example being the average traffic jam (85 dB).   

SmartWallit Pro has an ambient light sensor and proximity sensor, which can sense when you use your wallet.

SmartWallit Pro’s dimensions are 80mm*57mm*4.2mm, so you can easily insert SmartWallit Pro into your wallet or purse.    

SmartWallit Pro weighs 10g. 

SmartWallit Pro consists of high quality materials, including ABS, PC.

Team members

Chase Sokolow is our market manager. Chase Sokolow graduated from New College of Florida in 2010 with a degree in Chemistry.  After graduation he moved to China to pursue a career in education.  Chase served as a professor at both the Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics and the Dalian Neusoft University of Information before moving to Shanghai to pursue a career in marketing. Chase became SmartWallit’s marketing director in 2012 and assists in their understanding of chinese market. He is charge of product concept and market.  And he has experience of defining new product, especially consumer electronics. He has many excellent ideas and would like to create innovative product. He is Apple enthusiast and would like to make APPLE accessory. Also , he is good at market.

David Newnam, software engineer, he is good at software integration and application. Before he joined SmartWallit Inc., he worked for many consumer electronics companys, such as Freescale, and he has over 8 years experience on software development. He has technical research experience ranging from Android APP to IOS  APP.

Project status

Most of the hard work related to the SmartWallit Pro has been completed. This means that we have several samples of the assembled boards and prototypes of the product. Also, we have nearly finished the coding of the iOS and Android application. After that is completed, we will work on product certification, product manufacturing, and technical support.

Project plan

November, 2013 - Prototype verification, 100 engineering samples

December, 2013- Device firmware development

March, 2014 - Mass production

April, 2014- App development finalization and release to Apple App Store (Android to come in the next month)

May, 2014- Shipment

Use of funds  

1)Production tooling and packaging design

2)Buying materials

3)iOS/Android App development

4)Device test

5)Mass production

6)Shipment

/>

RimPro-Tec® Wheel Bands™ is a dual purpose color pinstripe trim and ""5 MPH bumper for your rims"" that helps protect alloy and chrome wheels from curb scuffs. DIY installers can install them to factory fit / show car quality standards in less than an hour per vehicle.  They're available in a variety of interchangeable color inserts that swap out in seconds.

Ever kiss a curb with a pristine set of rims while pulling away from the drive thru window or ATM machine?  Let those cosmetic curb rash scuffs end up on attractive, shock absorbing, easy to repair Wheel Bands.  Save the time and cost of having to recondition expensive alloy and chrome rims.

The unique RimPro-Tec design consists of two hard plastic interlocking coils that are easily cut to length to fit a range of wheel sizes from 13"" to 22"".  The mounting track component tapes on to the face of the rim.  The color insert component quickly snaps into  the mounting track.  The only fitment requirement is a wheel design with a 1/4"" wide flat surface on the rim face for the mounting track to bond to.  (Most late model vehicles have flangeless rims that meet this one simple requirement.  Many older model wheels work as well.)  


Wheel Bands Work

Unlike painted on or vinyl tape pinstripes, Wheel Bands are not just for looks.  The foam tape backed mounting track and snap-in color insert act as a sacrificial shock absorber in low speed curb impact events.  Scuffs from a curb hits during parallel parking have to get through the tough Wheel Band material first — before any cosmetic damage can occur to a rim.

column1:
In many cases, scuffs on Wheel Bands only occur on the color inserts which can be easily snapped-out, flipped over and snapped back in good as new.  Because the two piece design of Wheel Bands is interlocking and self-reinforcing there is no need for clips or fasteners to hold the end joints together.  This means deeper scuffs can be repaired simply by splicing in new Wheel Bands material to the damaged area only.  There is no need to replace an entire Wheel Band.


Easy to Install

First time DIY'ers can install Wheel Bands to factory fit quality in less than an hour.
column5:
secure=true"" width=""566"">

Customer Feedback: I LOVE your product

column1: The results are in from our early adopters.  As predicted by our market surveys, vehicle personalization and styling is the initial attraction for many.  However, rim protection of expensive alloy wheels as a primary buying decision is more popular than anticipated.

column6:
/>""I LOVE your product and it's saved the black rims on my Cayeene S on several occasions in the last 12 months. New product is fantastic and I have recommended it to several of my friends.""

— James (Pleasanton, CA)

column1:
""They turned out great. Thanks for your help!""

— Wendy (St. Clair, MI)

""I love how the red Wheel Bands give my Honda Fit a sporty look: sets it apart from the rest. Just today a guy noticed and commented on 'what a great accent' they were to my car.""

— Rachel (Hawthorne, CA)

column6:
/>

""Heading into their second Hot Rod Power Tour, my Wheel Bands are in great shape. People notice them and I am happy to have them installed. They really add to the look of the Mustang GT, plus they are functional!""

— Austin (Parkland, FL)

/>

""The install on my 2011 Golf TDI went very easily and the results are really great. I get a lot of compliments on the appearance of my wheels.""

— Greg (Torrance, CA)

/>

""Here are pictures of my Audi A4 with the rim protectors on! Thanks! I love them!""

— Kenneth (Singapore)











Like What You See So Far? Pick a Perk Now...

column1:
Each Wheel Bands kit contains one 27.3 foot (8.3 m) continuous coil of mounting track (black or silver) and one color insert of your choice.  Customers cut the coils to length for their individual wheels.  There is enough material to outfit up to four 22"" wheels, five 19"" wheels, or six 16"" wheels. 

Pick a perk now.  After our Indiegogo campaign closes, we'll be getting back to supporters on which color combinations they want for their perks.

In the meantime, we're standing by to cover everyone's questions.

Thanks for your interest in RimPro-Tec® Wheel Bands™!
Why We're Doing an Indiegogo Campaign

Rolling forward with our new Wheel Bands EZ product...

Our current Wheel Bands product has served the vehicle personalization market well.  However, within the first year of rolling out into the marketplace, we recognized that there was an opportunity to take Wheel Bands to the killer app level by doing one thing better:

Take care of customers who know they are going to hit a curb sooner or later and want the easiest way to clean up and get their Wheel Bands looking new again.  

One of our customer's summed it up recently this way in the teslamotors.com forum:
Have had my p85 since May. When I got it, searched for rim
protection, because my personal history is that clearly I like kissing
curbs.
Found Wheel Bands and bought a black+black set. Since then I have hit 3 tires on curbs,
zero damage to the rims. The rear wheel band was actually removed from
the rim, the other two tires still have theirs.
<b>This is the worst damage done. It's just tape residue and will come
off with goo-gone.  I've never used rim protection before. These things have worked awesomely for me. So I'm sharing.

Now, some customers who just saved a few hundred dollars per event to recondition a curb scuff on a $1,000 wheel don't mind getting out the goo-gone or a hair dryer to help remove the residual foam tape before freshening up their Wheel Bands.  But, how many people would use a screen protector on their smart phone or tablet PC if removing and replacing a used scuffed up protector was viewed as a chore?  Right.  That's what we thought.

Getting a Wheel Bands design that would remove quickly is easier said than done, however.  Wheel Bands use the same highly engineered foam tape technology that keeps tape-on wheel weights attached to wheels. Installed to a properly cleaned wheel surface, Wheel Bands can be immediately driven off down the highway at any speed.  They perform for years in all common road conditions of heat and cold.  They are not coming off.

However, when hitting curbs, Wheel Bands are not an indestructible product.  They're a sacrificial product that helps avoid or reduce damage to the more expensive alloy rims underneath.  Habitual curb kissers do have to service Wheel Bands to keep them looking as good as new.  But, the same foam tape technology that keeps Wheel Bands attached
to the wheel in regular service also leaves behind a sticky, gummy residue when removing

standard Wheel Bands for repair.

The time required to clean up residual
foam tape from the wheel surface can be as much or more than the 10 to
15 minutes per wheel that it takes to initially install Wheel Bands.
Think about the time and care required to remove a double stick foam
tape from a wall hanging when moving out of an apartment or repainting a

wall.  Same hassle.

Fortunately, some foam tape manufacturers are sensitive to the residual tape issue and have developed specialty grades that can reduce or eliminate its occurrence in certain applications.  After two years of testing and performance evaluations we have identified an ""anisotropic"" foam tape that gets is what we want: excellent bonding strength in the direction of wheel rotation and curb impacts, but releasability from the wheel surface when pulling straight up off the wheel during repairs or removal.

There are tradeoffs though.  The new anisotropic tape requires an adjustment in the plastic material we use as well requiring an upgrade to our production tooling.
These are costs that make sense for us to absorb, but double checking market demand for an ""EZ"" service product is why were doing an Indiegogo campaign.

Raising Indiegogo funding with perks supported by our existing Wheel Bands product, will help defray the costs of upgrading to our Wheel Bands EZ product.  At the same time we'll be verifying the interest we believe exists for an easy to service version of Wheel Bands.  The $7,500 funding target we've set covers 10% of the costs involved with upgrading our tooling and development and performance validation testing on our new EZ tape version. 

If the funding target is not met, we will still be going forward with the production upgrades, just at a slower pace.  We do have the ability to produce Wheel Bands EZ product under pilot production conditions same as we've done to generate product we've generated for field testing.  In the event of under funding on our target, contributors, who choose the $59 Wheel Bands EZ perk will be given the option to wait an additional month or so for pilot build product, or take immediate delivery of our standard product which has an MSRP of $119.  Either way a good deal.

Our Team's Story

RimPro-Tec® Wheel Bands™ manufactured in Michigan were introduced to the North American market at the SEMA 2011 automotive accessories trade show.  We were awarded three prestigious Global Media Awards in 2011 for our new product introduction and one more Media award at SEMA 2012 for a up to 26"" wheel size version of the product.   Our Indiegogo campaign is part of gearing up for more awards at SEMA 2014 for our new Wheel Bands EZ product.

Debbie and Chris Chester lead our visioneering team.  They're a couple of transplanted entrepreneurial Brits who have been busy launching companies and great new ideas in New Zealand for over 12 years.  Be on the look out for their next up and coming product...It includes peanut flavored vitamin water from New Zealand.  (Hint: If you think that might be only something a dog would love you are on the right track.)

Steve Aiello is our marketing and operations top dog and not just because he's experienced in keeping law and order in a house with two golden retrievers.  Steve has over a decade of experience as an advertising executive handling accounts with divisions of General Motors.

Jim Capo oversees engineering development and production of Wheel Bands in a manufacturing plant certified to ISO 16949 automotive quality and management standards.  Jim has over 15 years experience running plastic parts factories supplying components for Toyota, Honda and Ford vehicles.  He and his wife Machiko enjoy visiting other people's dogs.

Greg Aylesworth is our design and packaging tsar though his preferred title is ""Admaster"".  That's the moniker he goes by running his daytime company assuring that Chrysler/Fiat's Mopar and Magneti Marelli parts divisions are using packaging that meets international packaging and distribution requirements.  Greg says he's never needed a dog because, ""Aye, that's what me staff is fer.""  (Greg sometimes wears an eye patch to work and has been know to fly the Jolly Roger on the roof of his design studio.)
We're all happy to take your questions and comments below.  Thanks for reading this far or at least scrolling to the bottom of the page.
Don't forget.  If you are excited about RimPro-Tec Wheel Bands be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools.  We appreciate your efforts on our behalf.
Cheers!

Debbie, Chris, Steve, Jim and Greg

","RimPro-Tec® Wheel Bands™ is a dual purpose color pinstripe trim and ""5 MPH bumper for your rims"" that helps protect alloy and chrome wheels from curb scuffs. DIY installers can install them to factory fit / show car quality standards in less than an hour per vehicle.  They're available in a variety of interchangeable color inserts that swap out in seconds.Ever kiss a curb with a pristine set of rims while pulling away from the drive thru window or ATM machine?  Let those cosmetic curb rash scuffs end up on attractive, shock absorbing, easy to repair Wheel Bands.  Save the time and cost of having to recondition expensive alloy and chrome rims. The unique RimPro-Tec design consists of two hard plastic interlocking coils that are easily cut to length to fit a range of wheel sizes from 13"" to 22"".  The mounting track component tapes on to the face of the rim.  The color insert component quickly snaps into  the mounting track.  The only fitment requirement is a wheel design with a 1/4"" wide flat surface on the rim face for the mounting track to bond to.  (Most late model vehicles have flangeless rims that meet this one simple requirement.  Many older model wheels work as well.)  Wheel Bands WorkUnlike painted on or vinyl tape pinstripes, Wheel Bands are not just for looks.  The foam tape backed mounting track and snap-in color insert act as a sacrificial shock absorber in low speed curb impact events.  Scuffs from a curb hits during parallel parking have to get through the tough Wheel Band material first — before any cosmetic damage can occur to a rim.

In many cases, scuffs on Wheel Bands only occur on the color inserts which can be easily snapped-out, flipped over and snapped back in good as new.  Because the two piece design of Wheel Bands is interlocking and self-reinforcing there is no need for clips or fasteners to hold the end joints together.  This means deeper scuffs can be repaired simply by splicing in new Wheel Bands material to the damaged area only.  There is no need to replace an entire Wheel Band.Easy to InstallFirst time DIY'ers can install Wheel Bands to factory fit quality in less than an hour.Customer Feedback: I LOVE your product

The results are in from our early adopters.  As predicted by our market surveys, vehicle personalization and styling is the initial attraction for many.  However, rim protection of expensive alloy wheels as a primary buying decision is more popular than anticipated.

I LOVE your product and it's saved the black rims on my Cayeene S on several occasions in the last 12 months.  New product is fantastic and I have recommended it to several of my friends.""  — James (Pleasanton, CA)
They turned out great. Thanks for your help!"" — Wendy (St. Clair, MI)

I love how the red Wheel Bands give my Honda Fit a sporty look: sets it apart from the rest.  Just today a guy noticed and commented on 'what a great accent' they were to my car."" — Rachel (Hawthorne, CA)

Heading into their second Hot Rod Power Tour, my Wheel Bands are in great shape. People notice them and I am happy to have them installed.  They really add to the look of the Mustang GT, plus they are functional!"" — Austin (Parkland, FL)
It's because I'm Irish!"" — Bill (Rochester, MI)
The install on my 2011 Golf TDI went very easily and the results are really great. I get a lot of compliments on the appearance of my wheels.""  — Greg (Torrance, CA)
Here are pictures of my Audi A4 with the rim protectors on! Thanks! I love them!"" — Kenneth (Singapore)Like What You See So Far? Pick a Perk Now...

Each Wheel Bands kit contains one 27.3 foot (8.3 m) continuous coil of mounting track (black or silver) and one color insert of your choice.  Customers cut the coils to length for their individual wheels.  There is enough material to outfit up to four 22"" wheels, five 19"" wheels, or six 16"" wheels.  Pick a perk now.  After our Indiegogo campaign closes, we'll be getting back to supporters on which color combinations they want for their perks. In the meantime, we're standing by to cover everyone's questions.Thanks for your interest in RimPro-Tec® Wheel Bands™!
Why We're Doing an Indiegogo Campaign

Rolling forward with our new Wheel Bands EZ product...Our current Wheel Bands product has served the vehicle personalization market well.  However, within the first year of rolling out into the marketplace, we recognized that there was an opportunity to take Wheel Bands to the killer app level by doing one thing better: Take care of customers who know they are going to hit a curb sooner or later and want the easiest way to clean up and get their Wheel Bands looking new again.  One of our customer's summed it up recently this way in the teslamotors.com forum:
Have had my p85 since May. When I got it, searched for rim
protection, because my personal history is that clearly I like kissing
curbs.
Found Wheel Bands and bought a black+black set. Since then I have hit 3 tires on curbs,
zero damage to the rims. The rear wheel band was actually removed from
the rim, the other two tires still have theirs.
This is the worst damage done. It's just tape residue and will come
off with goo-gone.  I've never used rim protection before. These things have worked awesomely for me. So I'm sharing.

Now, some customers who just saved a few hundred dollars per event to recondition a curb scuff on a $1,000 wheel don't mind getting out the goo-gone or a hair dryer to help remove the residual foam tape before freshening up their Wheel Bands.  But, how many people would use a screen protector on their smart phone or tablet PC if removing and replacing a used scuffed up protector was viewed as a chore?  Right.  That's what we thought.Getting a Wheel Bands design that would remove quickly is easier said than done, however.  Wheel Bands use the same highly engineered foam tape technology that keeps tape-on wheel weights attached to wheels. Installed to a properly cleaned wheel surface, Wheel Bands can be immediately driven off down the highway at any speed.  They perform for years in all common road conditions of heat and cold.  They are not coming off.However, when hitting curbs, Wheel Bands are not an indestructible product.  They're a sacrificial product that helps avoid or reduce damage to the more expensive alloy rims underneath.  Habitual curb kissers do have to service Wheel Bands to keep them looking as good as new.  But, the same foam tape technology that keeps Wheel Bands attached
to the wheel in regular service also leaves behind a sticky, gummy residue when removing
standard Wheel Bands for repair.The time required to clean up residual
foam tape from the wheel surface can be as much or more than the 10 to
15 minutes per wheel that it takes to initially install Wheel Bands.
Think about the time and care required to remove a double stick foam
tape from a wall hanging when moving out of an apartment or repainting a

wall.  Same hassle.Fortunately, some foam tape manufacturers are sensitive to the residual tape issue and have developed specialty grades that can reduce or eliminate its occurrence in certain applications.  After two years of testing and performance evaluations we have identified an ""anisotropic"" foam tape that gets is what we want: excellent bonding strength in the direction of wheel rotation and curb impacts, but releasability from the wheel surface when pulling straight up off the wheel during repairs or removal.There are tradeoffs though.  The new anisotropic tape requires an adjustment in the plastic material we use as well requiring an upgrade to our production tooling.These are costs that make sense for us to absorb, but double checking market demand for an ""EZ"" service product is why were doing an Indiegogo campaign.Raising Indiegogo funding with perks supported by our existing Wheel Bands product, will help defray the costs of upgrading to our Wheel Bands EZ product.  At the same time we'll be verifying the interest we believe exists for an easy to service version of Wheel Bands.  The $7,500 funding target we've set covers 10% of the costs involved with upgrading our tooling and development and performance validation testing on our new EZ tape version.  If the funding target is not met, we will still be going forward with the production upgrades, just at a slower pace.  We do have the ability to produce Wheel Bands EZ product under pilot production conditions same as we've done to generate product we've generated for field testing.  In the event of under funding on our target, contributors, who choose the $59 Wheel Bands EZ perk will be given the option to wait an additional month or so for pilot build product, or take immediate delivery of our standard product which has an MSRP of $119.  Either way a good deal.Our Team's Story

RimPro-Tec® Wheel Bands™ manufactured in Michigan were introduced to the North American market at the SEMA 2011 automotive accessories trade show.  We were awarded three prestigious Global Media Awards in 2011 for our new product introduction and one more Media award at SEMA 2012 for a up to 26"" wheel size version of the product.   Our Indiegogo campaign is part of gearing up for more awards at SEMA 2014 for our new Wheel Bands EZ product.

Debbie and Chris Chester lead our visioneering team.  They're a couple of transplanted entrepreneurial Brits who have been busy launching companies and great new ideas in New Zealand for over 12 years.  Be on the look out for their next up and coming product...It includes peanut flavored vitamin water from New Zealand.  (Hint: If you think that might be only something a dog would love you are on the right track.)

Steve Aiello is our marketing and operations top dog and not just because he's experienced in keeping law and order in a house with two golden retrievers.  Steve has over a decade of experience as an advertising executive handling accounts with divisions of General Motors.

Jim Capo oversees engineering development and production of Wheel Bands in a manufacturing plant certified to ISO 16949 automotive quality and management standards.  Jim has over 15 years experience running plastic parts factories supplying components for Toyota, Honda and Ford vehicles.  He and his wife Machiko enjoy visiting other people's dogs.

Greg Aylesworth is our design and packaging tsar though his preferred title is ""Admaster"".  That's the moniker he goes by running his daytime company assuring that Chrysler/Fiat's Mopar and Magneti Marelli parts divisions are using packaging that meets international packaging and distribution requirements.  Greg says he's never needed a dog because, ""Aye, that's what me staff is fer.""  (Greg sometimes wears an eye patch to work and has been know to fly the Jolly Roger on the roof of his design studio.)
We're all happy to take your questions and comments below.  Thanks for reading this far or at least scrolling to the bottom of the page.
Don't forget.  If you are excited about RimPro-Tec Wheel Bands be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools.  We appreciate your efforts on our behalf.
Cheers!
Debbie, Chris, Steve, Jim and Greg",14.0,2,"1 Campaign

Since the beginning of last year we've been working together with watch experts to make our exceptional watch designs possible.

By making multiple prototypes, we found the best swiss movements to fit our design, quality, precision and functional requirements.

 

Last year, we went on a journey to find inspiration for our new luxury watches.

First, we drove to the Ronda Headquarters in Switzerland to find a suitable high quality swiss movement. It turned out we made the right choice - now we had a supplier for the heart of our luxury watch - a reliable, high quality swiss movement.

Then we headed down to Milano, the center of fashion in Italy, to get inspired for new and adventurous designs. (Well, we also had pizza there)

To finish our trip, we decided to drive the long distance to Paris - mainly to find a unique name for our new luxury watch company. As the darkness set in over France, we came across a very small village named ""Veyreau"" and decided to stay for the night near this 100 people populated village.

We all had the feeling there was something special and elegant about this name - so back in Austria, we launched our new luxury watch company named VYREU.

 

We are working close together with one of the best watch manufacturers in the world to offer the best quality and price possible. 

For our watches we are using 316L stainless steel, durable genuine leather, swiss Ronda movements and sapphire glass.

Each of our luxury watches comes with a complete luxury package - including an acrylic glass Showcase, a watch stand, gift packaging, a hand-sealed certificate and 2 years warranty.

 

Instead of using japanese movements we are exclusively using premium Ronda movements from Switzerland for our luxury watches. 

These movements are one of the most reliable and high-end watch mechanisms of the world.

 

All our luxury watches are made with high quality, anti-reflective sapphire crystal glass.  

And here's why we only use sapphire instead of common mineral glass:  

 

 

Most luxury watches are very expensive - because of distributors, wholesalers and retails stores, that mark-up the price by up to 1000%.

By skipping these middlemen and selling directly to you, we can offer you a high-end luxury watch with a swiss movement and sapphire glass including a whole luxury package for less than €200.

 

 

 

 

The geometry of the Italian Renaissance combined with modern minimalism is what us inspired for the VYREU Milano. By reducing the design to the essential elements, we created a fashionable and never seen appearance.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For those who have a passion for ambitious and stylish luxury watches, we designed the VYREU California. A multifunctional 45 mm chronograph with date function, luminous dial elements and a pressed ""V"" shape.

We've created an adventurous but also classy look - inspired by the business life of Los Angeles surrounded by the nature of California.

 

 

 

 

 

All our straps are interchangeable and made of high-quality, durable 100% genuine leather to make sure you have the best fit possible.

 

 

 

All VYREU watches will be backed by a 2 year warranty and each of our luxury watches includes a unique certificate, with a real hand-made wax seal.

 

 

We think a luxury watch should have a special place when it's not around your wrist - and not just lay around. That's why we developed the VYREU Showcase.

The VYREU Showcase is an innovative acrylic glass made watch display, with a design inspired by the mountains of Tyrol. It includes a custom made watch stand and a holder for the certificate of your timepiece.

Place the Showcase wherever you like - in your bedroom, your dressing room or your bathroom - we guarantee, it will be a real eyecatcher.

And the best: It's included with every VYREU luxury watch.

 

 

 

 

 

 

                                                                                                                                                  

 

 

 

Press Kit

For news, blogs, websites, social media pages, magazines and more:

Please click HERE to access the VYREU press kit.

** NOW  IN STOCK - AVAILABLE TO ORDER AT FLIPSLIDE.COM.AU **

 

Why?

After 10 years working in footwear design/development in the fast fashion industry, I wanted to create something a bit more ‘slow fashion’ without the impact on the earth that fast fashion has.
• Fast fashion encourages consumers to continually buy new pieces and throw out the old. I wanted to create a classic design that wouldn't go out of fashion and could be worn season after season.
• Knowing the resources that go into the development and manufacture of these short-lived designs, it was a priority to use a natural and sustainable material with minimal components.
<li>To avoid the waste the industry creates, I needed a simple manufacturing technique that kept waste as low as possible
• I wanted to ensure that what I created was accessible to everyone as sustainable products often carry a high price tag.

So I took a step away from fast fashion to create a shoe that is kind to the earth AND still affordable. 

 

Hello flipslide

This is where the concept for Flipslide was born. We decided to create a shoe with the simplicity of the old flip-flop but with a substantial upgrade. 

Flip-flops are affordable and convenient. They’re easy to chuck on and take on holiday, and they can be manufactured with minimal waste using moulds.

They have a bit going for them, however Flipslide has more.

 
Design and Materials 

Flipslides are super simple, easy to wear and versatile, they basically go with everything.

The classic clean 2-strap slide design will make them a core piece of your wardrobe that won’t go out of fashion. 

The straps are carefully positioned for comfort and to fit a wide range of feet. They are securely attached to the sole by twistable plugs allowing the fit to be customised to your foot.

The lack of toe post (the uncomfortable part in between your toes) avoids the blisters as well as the infamous flip-flop blow-outs that leave you stranded on the hot sand. You can also chuck Flipslides on with socks
column2:
think cold mornings camping, on your way to yoga or when you’ve just forgotten to put the bins out on a wet night.

Every Flipslide component is made of natural rubber. It's sustainably sourced from rubber trees as opposed to synthetic rubber made from petroleum or the chemical based polyurethane foam you find in cheap flip-flops which is a major ocean pollutant.

Being a natural, renewable material, it’s kind to the environment and your feet. It’s waterproof and durable, whilst dense and elastic for a supportive, soft and comfortable fit.

 

Colours and sizing

We are launching Flipslide in our 3 favourite colourways
column3:
eucalyptus green, dusty rose and black. All in a clean matte finish, available in 3 sizes S, M and L which will fit a womens size 36 through to 41.

 

Risks and challenges

The hard work is done, we’ve spent two years sourcing, developing and perfecting Flipslide and are now in bulk production.

We’ve overcome the developmental hurdles, have final samples and production is underway.

We don’t expect any further speed bumps but we’ll be closely monitoring all aspects of production to ensure a timely delivery.

 

We love questions and feedback, so please don't hesitate to contact us.

Flipslide.

 

e: hello@flipslide.com.au

w: www.flipslide.com.au 
ig: www.instagram.com/flipslide_au

History

In 2015, when I crafted the original Tidashi from a rough piece of Titanium stock, I had felt the urge to step away from my computer and design something in a different way. With the use of basic tools, a simple design emerged from my hands.  A small and tactile object that has proven to be more useful in everyday life than I had expected. Along with many of the original adopters, I still use this little cutting tool on a daily basis. It really has withstood the test of time.
Clear and Cloudy
Rainbow and Midnight
The shape and name of the Tidashi is derived from a traditional Japanese utility knife, called Kiridashi-Kogatana
column2: a design recognized by its long handle and short cutting edge. In Japan this tool is still relied upon for making accurate cuts or markings on wood.

column1: EDC
Reiteration

Over the years, Tidashi users have provided me with feedback. A slight size increase has often been suggested, and I am glad to say that that is exactly what the Tidashi 2.0 is offering, resulting in a more confident grip when using the tool.
Evolution

A redesigned and more substantial silicone sheath provides just the right amount of friction for securely holding and releasing the Tidashi. It also allows for the use of larger diameter paracord and keyrings, both of which are included. It is still made from the same long lasting silicone material which has held my personal original Tidashi for all these years.
Dimensions

True to its origins, the Tidashi 2.0 is cut from grade 5 titanium, known for its toughness and corrosion resistance. It is often used in diving knives, as it is lighter than steel and able to resist even the harsh environment of salt water. The fact that this particular alloy lends itself to easy sharpening is something that I have found useful, but not essential to the Tidashi design. It is not a tool for slicing tomatoes. The blade length is simply too short for that. Its forte lies in puncturing and shallow cuts, as done when opening packages. And of course its biggest strength, as with any tool, is the fact that its size allows you to have it on you when you need it.
Always with you
Emergence

In order to increase the manufacturing accuracy and consistency of this new iteration of the Tidashi, I have decided to have its basic shape cut by CNC. This will allow me to focus more on the final finish of the Tidashi, including a unique anodizing method for bringing out the amazing colors of the natural titanium oxide layer that covers any titanium object.
Colors...

The decision to relinquish absolute control over the original Tidashi design by walking away from my computer, is also what guided me in developing a new coloring method for the Tidashi 2.0. I tried to put emphasis on naturally occurring patterns. By subtly controlling the flow of acid and electricity along the surface of the Tidashi, I was able to bring out some unique shapes and colors reminiscent of the cloudy skies over my home in the Sierra Nevada mountains. Although the process is repeatable, no two knives with this pattern will be exactly the same, just like the skies.  I was also able to recreate the original color combinations such as Rainbow and Midnight for a total of ten unique versions for you to choose from. I am showing all ten variations here, but please scroll all the way down for some more info about the new storage pouch.
1.Natural
2.Clouds
3.Midnight
4.Acid
5.Rainbow Black
6.Rainbow White
8.Black Gold
9.White Gold
10.Purple Rain
Packaging

In the past I have often spent a lot of time and energy on the packaging of my designs. And although a custom box for your Tidashi would be nice, I was recently confronted with the sheer amount of waste I was producing by doing this. In response I have decided to package the Tidashi 2.0 in a more permanent and reusable zippered Cordura pouch. It is lined in a soft plush material to protect your Tidashi not only during shipping, but also if you should choose to store it. The design in not finalized yet, but it will most likely be just like in the picture below.
Storage pouch included
Experience

After having fulfilled several campaigns and having shipped thousands of rewards, I would consider myself a veteran Indiegogo creator. I very much consider the Indiegogo experience a shared one between myself and the backers, which is why I am always very open about the project in regular updates. I also try to answer any and all questions asked in messages and in the comment section. My backers and I have traveled this path from inception to completion several times, and we have seen the highs and lows along the route. The previous project has been especially hard, and it has shown me which pitfalls to avoid in future endeavors, including the project we are embarking on now. I hope you will join us, and make the Tidashi 2.0 project another successful one.
Cheers,
Sander
Risks and challenges

If there is one thing I have learned from my previous project, it is how the complexity of a design can exponentially increase the risk of something going wrong during production. It is the main reason why I chose to keep this design as simple as the original design. It is also why I chose to keep the anodizing process in house. It is a process too delicate to hand off.

The process of manufacturing the basic shape of the Tidashi 2.0 is done by an overseas manufacturer I have worked with in the past. They have been reliable and based on the samples they provided (which are in the pictures you see here) I believe they will provide an excellent product. As the project is going live we are discussing some final details about the cutting process and final finish of the shape. I plan to perform a thorough quality control on the initial small production runs, before increasing the production volume. And if for whatever reason the manufacturer cannot continue production, I can always fall back on the equipment I acquired for making the original Tidashi, and move production in house.

The mold used for creating the silicone sheath has already been made and paid for, because I wanted to show you the result in the pictures. This means that production of the sheaths should not be the bottle neck in this project.

The pouch design is based on an existing design, and the manufacturer has indicated that it is comfortable making it. If problems should arise with the manufacturing, I would not have a problem reverting to the exact design that the manufacturer already makes on a regular basis (the only difference is a slightly different size).

I will be shipping the Tidashis anywhere in the world from the US, and although the declared value of the average shipment will be below the duty threshold of most countries, there is a chance that you will have to pay some import duties, especially on larger shipments. If you have ever ordered anything from abroad, you are probably already aware of this, and know that I have no control over this, other than keeping the declared value to a minimum. 

Although the cutting edge of the Tidashi is very short, I want every backer to be aware that there is always the possibility that the laws of your country do not allow you to carry it in public. As far as I am aware, it has never happened in the past.

In summary, I believe that the biggest risk would be delay in the expected delivery date. The reason for this is that definitive information about production quantities will not be available until after the campaign closes. This is a problem that is almost inherent to the Kickstarter system, and we'll work with it.
","History

In 2015, when I crafted the original Tidashi from a rough piece of Titanium stock, I had felt the urge to step away from my computer and design something in a different way. With the use of basic tools, a simple design emerged from my hands.  A small and tactile object that has proven to be more useful in everyday life than I had expected. Along with many of the original adopters, I still use this little cutting tool on a daily basis. It really has withstood the test of time.
Clear and Cloudy
Rainbow and Midnight
The shape and name of the Tidashi is derived from a traditional Japanese utility knife, called Kiridashi-Kogatana
column2: a design recognized by its long handle and short cutting edge. In Japan this tool is still relied upon for making accurate cuts or markings on wood.

column1: EDC
Reiteration

Over the years, Tidashi users have provided me with feedback. A slight size increase has often been suggested, and I am glad to say that that is exactly what the Tidashi 2.0 is offering, resulting in a more confident grip when using the tool.
Evolution

A redesigned and more substantial silicone sheath provides just the right amount of friction for securely holding and releasing the Tidashi. It also allows for the use of larger diameter paracord and keyrings, both of which are included. It is still made from the same long lasting silicone material which has held my personal original Tidashi for all these years.
Dimensions

True to its origins, the Tidashi 2.0 is cut from grade 5 titanium, known for its toughness and corrosion resistance. It is often used in diving knives, as it is lighter than steel and able to resist even the harsh environment of salt water. The fact that this particular alloy lends itself to easy sharpening is something that I have found useful, but not essential to the Tidashi design. It is not a tool for slicing tomatoes. The blade length is simply too short for that. Its forte lies in puncturing and shallow cuts, as done when opening packages. And of course its biggest strength, as with any tool, is the fact that its size allows you to have it on you when you need it.
Always with you
Emergence

In order to increase the manufacturing accuracy and consistency of this new iteration of the Tidashi, I have decided to have its basic shape cut by CNC. This will allow me to focus more on the final finish of the Tidashi, including a unique anodizing method for bringing out the amazing colors of the natural titanium oxide layer that covers any titanium object.
Colors...

The decision to relinquish absolute control over the original Tidashi design by walking away from my computer, is also what guided me in developing a new coloring method for the Tidashi 2.0. I tried to put emphasis on naturally occurring patterns. By subtly controlling the flow of acid and electricity along the surface of the Tidashi, I was able to bring out some unique shapes and colors reminiscent of the cloudy skies over my home in the Sierra Nevada mountains. Although the process is repeatable, no two knives with this pattern will be exactly the same, just like the skies.  I was also able to recreate the original color combinations such as Rainbow and Midnight for a total of ten unique versions for you to choose from. I am showing all ten variations here, but please scroll all the way down for some more info about the new storage pouch.
1.Natural
2.Clouds
3.Midnight
4.Acid
5.Rainbow Black
6.Rainbow White
7.Sky
8.Black Gold
9.White Gold
10.Purple Rain
Packaging

In the past I have often spent a lot of time and energy on the packaging of my designs. And although a custom box for your Tidashi would be nice, I was recently confronted with the sheer amount of waste I was producing by doing this. In response I have decided to package the Tidashi 2.0 in a more permanent and reusable zippered Cordura pouch. It is lined in a soft plush material to protect your Tidashi not only during shipping, but also if you should choose to store it. The design in not finalized yet, but it will most likely be just like in the picture below.
Storage pouch included
Experience

After having fulfilled several campaigns and having shipped thousands of rewards, I would consider myself a veteran Indiegogo creator. I very much consider the Indiegogo experience a shared one between myself and the backers, which is why I am always very open about the project in regular updates. I also try to answer any and all questions asked in messages and in the comment section. My backers and I have traveled this path from inception to completion several times, and we have seen the highs and lows along the route. The previous project has been especially hard, and it has shown me which pitfalls to avoid in future endeavors, including the project we are embarking on now. I hope you will join us, and make the Tidashi 2.0 project another successful one.
Cheers,
Sander
Risks and challenges

If there is one thing I have learned from my previous project, it is how the complexity of a design can exponentially increase the risk of something going wrong during production. It is the main reason why I chose to keep this design as simple as the original design. It is also why I chose to keep the anodizing process in house. It is a process too delicate to hand off.

The process of manufacturing the basic shape of the Tidashi 2.0 is done by an overseas manufacturer I have worked with in the past. They have been reliable and based on the samples they provided (which are in the pictures you see here) I believe they will provide an excellent product. As the project is going live we are discussing some final details about the cutting process and final finish of the shape. I plan to perform a thorough quality control on the initial small production runs, before increasing the production volume. And if for whatever reason the manufacturer cannot continue production, I can always fall back on the equipment I acquired for making the original Tidashi, and move production in house.

The mold used for creating the silicone sheath has already been made and paid for, because I wanted to show you the result in the pictures. This means that production of the sheaths should not be the bottle neck in this project.

The pouch design is based on an existing design, and the manufacturer has indicated that it is comfortable making it. If problems should arise with the manufacturing, I would not have a problem reverting to the exact design that the manufacturer already makes on a regular basis (the only difference is a slightly different size).

I will be shipping the Tidashis anywhere in the world from the US, and although the declared value of the average shipment will be below the duty threshold of most countries, there is a chance that you will have to pay some import duties, especially on larger shipments. If you have ever ordered anything from abroad, you are probably already aware of this, and know that I have no control over this, other than keeping the declared value to a minimum. Although the cutting edge of the Tidashi is very short, I want every backer to be aware that there is always the possibility that the laws of your country do not allow you to carry it in public. As far as I am aware, it has never happened in the past.

In summary, I believe that the biggest risk would be delay in the expected delivery date. The reason for this is that definitive information about production quantities will not be available until after the campaign closes. This is a problem that is almost inherent to the Kickstarter system, and we'll work with it.",24.0,0,"4 Campaigns

The product of Manzano-Design is a sophisticated, cleared-out form designed cellphone rack, which was manufactured from wood at the beginning.
Design

Manzano „Wood” revived as a cleared-out docking unit for which we have used beech tree as raw material. We took consumer demands and new trends into consideration, so we’ve created the metal „Alu” version in several colours. Thanks to it’s beautiful lines, we got a visually seductive shape as result, in which our device can always be perfectly in front of our eyes. It offers also a comfortable (in and out) handling to it’s user. It will be a spectacular accessory to your home or office , and it can be a specific gift for someone.
Our Motivation

Beyond the pleasurable shape and premium construction, we want to enhance Manzano with charging function.  As we want to stick with the cleared-out desing and practical solutions, the rack will be easily connectable to your own charging unit, so additional cables won’t be necessary.
Long term views

Besides metal we want to expand our modell range with more special materials (e.g. glass and granite). As soon as the wireless function becomes avialable in more and more devices, we are planning to develop the charging function in the rack also.

We at Manzano  are refining our product for more than a year, questing  for the most prepared  workshops, the most professional materials. As we dived deeper in to details, we were getting inspired to present the envisioned shape in various versions. (e.g. carbon decoration) Every minute of our lengthy effort worth it, because we have found the relevant partners and workshops, so now we can start the international selling with a professional team behind us. However, for the start we need YOUR help!
Manzano Carbon front...
back...

column4: >Manzano originally was made only as a rack for phones , but because of the demands of the market we have developed it. In the spirit of practicality we provided charging function also. We won’t stop here, as our creativity and dynamism leading us in the direction of further development and evolution. We can courageously state, that our product is the most designed cellphone rack.

column1: On the pictures and video you can see our prototype, which was manufactured with „wire-slashing” technology under manufactural conditions. These were produced in limited number, however we will provide an opportunity  to buy  the first pieces of the collection.

column5: >Be a part of the realization of our project! Be the first Manzano owner!

column1: The groundwork for the ""Wood"" &
column2: ""Plexi"" manufacturing is layed, now we can focus on the market introduction of the chargeable docking unit,  We want to please a broad range of mobile phone lovers with this revolutionary new product.

column1: We need your funding now, to buy a special assembly machine to be able to manufacture the Manzano ""Alu"" with charging function and also for the assembly of the special models.
Without help of the community we will not have enough capital to realize our project.
Racks in the promo video are only test products, final ones are going to be perfect.

We count on your support  from the start off!

Follow us on Facebook and Twitter... :)
Cheers, Team Manzano

WHY BAMBOO SUNGLASSES?  

 

Sunglasses have traditionally been made from harmful plastics and metals through environmentally damaging manufacturing processes.

In recent years, advancements in technology have allowed the bamboo fiber to be used in a wide range of textile and fashion applications. Bamboo is quickly becoming one of the most important plants in the world.
ABOUT JOPLINS.

We launched JOPLINS believing that there is no reason why stylish sunglasses can't also be environmentally friendly. We are making a new sustainable movement - sunglasses made of bamboo. We are willing to develop an eco-friendly business in an industry that is huge. Everyone likes and wears sunglasses. So why not be sustainable and stylish at the same time?
THE JOPLINS WAYFARERS.

FLOATS IN THE WATER

They float! Whenever you are paddle boarding, wakeboarding or even surfing, you can count on your Joplins to be floating right next to you in case you fall. :)

 

LIGHTWEIGHT

The JOPLINS Wayfarers made of bamboo, which is lighter than aluminum, acetate, wood, and polycarbonate sunglasses, is very comfortable, they almost feel weightless on your face.

 

POLARIZED LENSES W/ 9 LAYERS OF PROTECTION

UNIQUE

They are a new concept and unique! This means your sunglasses will never be quite like other pairs around.

 

RESISTANT 

 Bamboo is very resistant and is nowadays used in many applications, such as house construction, bicycles, roads, bridges, furniture, etc. It is also resistant to humidity, so you can submerge it in the water as many times as you want.

 

QUALITY DESIGN

They embody the vibe our brand wants to emanate: cool, light, and eco-friendly, while also connected with purpose and simplicity. We’ve been praised for simplicity and smoothness in everything we do. ***We also ensure attention to detail regarding quality in order to continue offering you a world-class product.***

 

DOUBLE FLEXED HINGES

The Double flexed hinges make the JOPLINS flexible, offering a better fit and comfort to your head. Whatever your head size is, we will have a pair of sunglasses for you.

 

SUSTAINABLE

Bamboo is 100% sustainable - when cutting past the first node it continues to grow normally. It is cost efficient, requires no irrigation, rarely needs replanting, grows rapidly, can be harvested in 3-5 years, grows in a wide range of environments and it produces 35% more oxygen than an equivalent stand of trees. In addition, bamboo is biodegradable.
JOPLINS IN THE NEWS

FRIENDS APPROVED

 

 

THE MANUFACTURING PROCESS
<div>

***All of our designs are individually handcrafted. We offer a 100% lifetime warranty on all of our sunglasses and will replace any pair of glasses with defects caused by materials and workmanship.***
WHAT DO CUSTOMERS SAY?

""These sunglasses should quickly make RayBans come out of fashion: Wearing the fastest growing plant on the planet on our faces should be an up and foremost trend this SS18. Thank you Joplins for your sustainable business and design. Keep up the great work!
- Emily Lancaster Collinson - England - For Product Hunt
""Besides beautiful, they are lightweight, resistant and sustainable!! My wife loved hers as well!""
- Octavio Fragata - Brazil - For Google Reviews
""The polarization is great! Also, being a victim of drowned expensive sunglasses, I really like the fact that they float :)""
- Stephan Sax - Austria - For Product Hunt
CHOOSE YOUR JOPLINS WAYFARER:
GOJI - Black Outside, Bamboo Au Natural Inside, Gray Lenses
POLAR - Black Outside, Black inside Blue Mirrored Lenses.
JOSHWELL -  Black outside, Black inside and Gray lenses.

REISES -  Brown Outside, Brown Inside, Gray lenses. 

 

WHAT WE NEED 

 

If you think the JOPLINS Wayfarers is a great idea and you want to be part of a sustainable movement and make a difference in the world while owning a pair of stylish sunglasses, back us on this project! We are now making this crowdfund because our aim with this campaign is to help with the cost of producing in larger quantities so we can keep Joplins affordable and available to all. So, we are looking for backers to support us in our journey and be part of - The Bamboo Revolution.

We are now SHIPPING. We've also partnered with shipping and warehouse companies to offer you a lower cost and fast shipping. Your order should arrive anywhere in the world within 6-14 days after shipping. 

Back us now, pledge to get one of the JOPLINS Wayfarers and join the cause, be a part of JOPLINS! Be sustainable and stylish :) Support now and get the perk that best suits you!
