The other three ‘a’ letters are meant to exhibit the core values which Alvieri stands for: artistico (artistic), altaqualità (amazing quality), and abbordabile (affordable). The Infinity shapes are drawn with different stroke thicknesses, pointing to the importance of depth in our three-dimensional design. Our watches are made in a world class factory which, for decades, has been producing luxury watches that retail around the world for over $1000. Sapphire glass  The world’s most expensive timepieces have a sapphire glass covering the dial because sapphire is extremely scratch-resistant. However, sapphire is expensive so most watches under $300 have a mineral crystal or sapphire coated instead, which isn’t as scratch resistant as sapphire crystal. Our crystal is not sapphire coated but 100% sapphire crystal! Swiss quartz movement  All Alvieri watches are powered by Ronda movements. Ronda is a high tech Swiss movement manufacturer in Switzerland and one of the best manufactures of quartz movement in the world.  Genuine Italian leather  Every Alvieri watch is paired with a genuine Italian leather strap. Italian leather is famous in the fashion industry as the best of its kind due to the quality of the leather itself.  Our logo and a unique serial number is engraved on the case back of Alvieri watch to distinguish them from one another.Firenze Classic EditionThis edition offers a clean dial for a simple, yet classy appearance. The dial accentuates a guilloché with twelve sectors of concentric texture that radiate from the center.Specifications  Function: Time only, 2 handsMovement: Ronda Swiss quartz movement Caliber 513Case size: 40mm diameter, 9mm thickCase material: Brushed/polished 316 stainless steelCrystal: Sapphire with an AR coatingStrap material: Genuine Italian leatherStrap width: 20mmWeight (with strap): 62 gramsWater resistance: 50mm / 5ATMBattery: Swiss RenataWarranty: 2 years Firenze Lunar Edition This edition features a date aperture at 6 O’ Clock and the current phase of the moon as you can see it in the sky through an aperture on the dial.Specifications  Function: Moon-phase & date indicators, two hands Movement: Ronda Swiss quartz movement Caliber 708 Case Size: 40mm diameter, 9mm thick Case material: Brushed/polished 316 stainless steelCrystal: Sapphire crystal with an AR coatingStrap material: Genuine Italian leather Strap width: 20mm Weight (with strap): 62 gramsWater resistance: 50mm / 5ATM Battery: Swiss RenataWarranty: 2 yearsWe want to say a big thank you for checking out our project. We sincerely need your support. Even if you can't support us with a pledge, why not help us by spreading the word on Twitter, Facebook and any other social network you're on. Thanks for your help! Click any of the links below to share:     If you have any concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us at hello@Alvieriwatches.com or leave a message in Indiegogo for us.",27.0,0,"1 Campaign

OUR STORY
My name is Amy and I started Bow Wow Couture with the last $20 I had at the time.
It was just me sitting at a craft table selling my stuff on Etsy.com.
3 years ago I created the original dog collar fabric flower.
People loved the flower but asked, ""What about the boys?"" So I developed a bow tie for dogs.
People liked it too.
They liked it so much that my partner Anne had to help me with my ""hobby"".
Independent pet boutiques began to order wholesale.
They ordered a lot. I needed help.
We decided it was time to invest every cent we had and just go for it.
It was a big risk.
We found a great space to lease. That's me in front of our new home the day we picked up the keys.
I really don't like photos of myself
column2: I can't believe I'm sharing this picture with you.

column1: My mom died almost 4 years ago at 59. She always told me that I could do anything.
I believed her.
So we hired two wonderful ladies to help with the sewing.
Erika is an incredible seamstress. I've learned a lot just from watching her work.
Crystal is the Bow Tie Queen. She takes great pride in her bow ties and loves her granddaughter.
With their help, and Anne's help and more hard work we decided to attend a trade show where we could show our work to pet stores.
We attended the HH Backer Christmas Trade show in Chicago.
It was a huge success. We gained more than 20 new wholesale accounts.
We were also able to add a third employee to help with shipping.
The big risk paid off.
But we needed more business. And more help.
We created a Fall/Winter 2012 line with a catalog, bought a new display and headed off to the SuperZoo 2012 pet industry trade show.
We did even better. Added 27 more accounts at the show and another 13 in the weeks that followed.
We also hired another employee. There are six of us now!
My friends, the Winko family, also help out at craft fairs and trade shows.
I think our small brand has the ability to grow into something bigger.
And that's why we need your help.
We've gained a very loyal following because of the quality of our products.
We want major retailers to see that products made in the US can be high in quality AND affordable.
We need to exhibit at a trade show where those retailers purchase products.
That trade show is called Global Pet Expo. It will take place only two hours south of us, in Orlando, Florida.
But trade shows are SUPER expensive.
We can pay for 75% of the expenses but we need your help with the rest.
We hope that you will contribute and help us keep pushing forward.
We've got some amazing perks for you.

column2: >Our Spring/Summer 2013 collection won't be available to the public unil the end of March.
>But as a thank you for contributing to our little cause we are sending you your choice of products from the the S/S 13 collection.
>You will have first dibs, even before they arrive in stores!
>You can see our current designs here. We will add pictures of perks every day under the  ""Gallery"" tab. The finalized list of styles to choose from will be available December 21.
>Please stop by our Facebook page and say Hi, we'd love any encouragement or thoughts you'd like to share with us.
>Below I've compiled a FAQ list. But feel free to email me with any questions you may have!

column1: FAQ
Who are you?
What's so great about your stuff?
<ul>
<li>
We are Bow Wow Couture, a small company committed to making high quality, handcrafted dog products. There are six of us sewing, cutting, crafting and shipping our products.
<li>

Our products are sewn by artisans. Skilled and knowledgeable, their attention to detail is what makes our products stand out. You can feel the quality of the materials. You can see the quality of the construction.
<li>
Our products are proudly handmade in the USA. Gainesville, Florida to be  exact. We buy most of our supplies from small businesses.
<li>

Our products are Ridiculously Cute. But it doesn't matter how cute our products are if they aren't built to withstand doggy use. We spent 2 years refining the quality of the materials we use inside and out to make products that are durable, functional and machine washable.
Yes, you heard right-our collars and accessories are machine washable. That's especially important in our four-dog household!
Why attend trade shows? Why do you need help?
What's the big deal about trade shows anyway?
<ul>
• To grow as a business we attend pet industry trade shows. They are big conventions where we put our products on display for retail shops, independent boutiques and buyers.

• The biggest trade show in the pet industry is called Global Pet Expo. And it's also the most expensive. We are asking for $1600 for the association dues, $2900 in booth fees, $500 towards production costs and $200 in IndieGoGo fees.
• Over 5,000 buyers from all 50 states ad 67 countries attend Global Pet Expo February 20-22, 2013.

• Trade shows are expensive (booth fees, travel expenses, printing materials, advertising, production) but they are the best way to showcase products that are high in quality like ours. Buyers can see and feel the difference in quality in person!
What are the perks of contributing?
What's in it for me?
<ul>
• Check out those perks in the right hand column. :)

• We are so excited about the perks that you get in return for supporting handmade products! Have you seen some of the fabrics from our 2013 Spring/Summer Collection? Have you ever wanted to design a dog collar? Or get your dog featured in one of our catalogs? Check out our amazing perks!

• You get the satisfaction of knowing you not only helped out a small business, you are also helping us to hire two additional employees in Gainesville. And more people working is always a good thing.
<div>
What does my contribution do?
And have you attended trade shows in the past?
<ul>
• Your contribution allows us to put our handmade products in the hands of major retailers. Help us show them that customers want better quality products carried in stores.
• A successful showing at Global Pet Expo also allows us to hire two more full time employees, a step we desperately need to take.
• We have already completed two successful trade shows in the last year. We gained 20 new wholesale accounts at our first trade show and over 40 new accounts at our second.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
What if I can't contribute right now but love your stuff?
<ul>
• SPREAD THE WORD! Share our campaign on Facebook and email it to friends. Getting the word out is just as important as a contribution!
• IndieGoGo makes it easy to share this campaign, check out the links right below our video!
• Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter!
Thank you for supporting our little shop!

Our products are Ridiculously Cute. But it doesn't matter how cute our products are if they aren't built to withstand doggy use. We spent 2 years refining the quality of the materials we use inside and out to make products that are durable, functional and machine washable.
Yes, you heard right-our collars and accessories are machine washable. That's especially important in our four-dog household!

To grow as a business we attend pet industry trade shows. They are big conventions where we put our products on display for retail shops, independent boutiques and buyers.

The biggest trade show in the pet industry is called Global Pet Expo. And it's also the most expensive. We are asking for $1600 for the association dues, $2900 in booth fees, $500 towards production costs and $200 in IndieGoGo fees.
Over 5,000 buyers from all 50 states ad 67 countries attend Global Pet Expo February 20-22, 2013.

Trade shows are expensive (booth fees, travel expenses, printing materials, advertising, production) but they are the best way to showcase products that are high in quality like ours. Buyers can see and feel the difference in quality in person!

You get the satisfaction of knowing you not only helped out a small business, you are also helping us to hire two additional employees in Gainesville. And more people working is always a good thing.

A successful showing at Global Pet Expo also allows us to hire two more full time employees, a step we desperately need to take.

Introducing the FlipSlip! The 2nd pair that EVERY woman needs.

FlipSlips are foldable designer flats on the go that can easily fit into a small purse or a pocket. We have reduced the shoe to the size of an iPhone and made it fold so that it doesn't get your purse dirty.
The FlipSlip's Unique Patented Technology is the only shoe that folds sole-to-sole and has a reversible upper so it is compressible and hygienic.

FlipSlips have a high quality neoprene upper that makes it waterproof, yet breathable for all occasions. The padded, foam cushion insole makes walking a comforting breeze. Flip Slip is TRULY an all-purpose shoe and you'ill love it!
FLIPSLIP CROWD-DESIGN PROJECT ON INDIEGOGO
We launched the Crowd-Design Project on Indiegogo to increase the designs in our foldable shoes collection and are doing so by actively involving artists from our creative community.
So how does this work exactly?

We called on designers from all over the U.S. to help us create the newest Flip Slips foldable shoes to put into production. They each had a couple of weeks to create the design and build a prototype and were given our pre-existing design to use as the base. In exchange, they received an opportunity to have fun sharing their talent with the world, receive full recognition for their work, learn about the process behind making shoes, as well as get a chance to be fairly compensated along the way
column2: each artist will receive a percent of the profit from their designs.

column1: We have the factory and all the molds, dyes and lasts needed to manufacture the shoes. All of our shoes are hand-made and we will source all the materials needed to make a high-quality replica of the original artwork. As an added bonus, by pre-ordering a pair of our designer shoes, you’ll also get to take part in the entire creative process and provide feedback on the final design, as well as receive photos and be kept posted on the progress of your shoes.
Each pair that we pre-sale puts us one step closer to meeting our funding goal!

In order to truly make this project a success, we are giving our supportive communities the opportunity to decide which shoes get put into production by pre-ordering a replica from our designer collection.

A ""winning design"" is one that meets the factory minimum of 200 pairs. If we can exceed our campaign goals (with your help) we will make more designs as we meet the factory minimums so you'll have more designs to choose from.
* In case your design does not meet minimums, at the end of the campaign we will give you the option to choose from a winning design, get our classic shoes, or we will offer a refund.
The benefits of supporting this campaign.

For as low as $15, you can get the ultra compact Pocket-FlipSlips --- it has a soft foldable sole, and it’s great for emergency back-up use. You will also get an invitation to our San Francisco Launch Party in August and make a charitable donation to Kiva.org, a non-profit on a mission to alleviate poverty by empowering entrepreneurs through micro-loans.

You can also get our Classic Flip Slips in your choice of 32 different colors! You will have a chance to vote on the top 5 colors, and ALL of our shoes come with an expandable Flip-Tote bag to carry your other shoes in.
You can take part in our Community Design Project and support our fellow designers:

You can take a look at our Designer Gallery to see each one and learn more about each design and artist. Please Hurry! The first 200 purchases for each category will receive a 15% discount on their order.

We want to bring you a high-quality, handcrafted replica of the original artwork made by each artist. Our factory is ready to go and we already have all the molds and everything we need to get going. The only thing that we need to get going is money.
We are seeking partners to help us SPREAD the love even more!
Join Us.
We’re always on the lookout for passionate individuals and calling on artists to help with our project. If you want to join our team and work together to achieve our dreams, e-mail us at

We hope you’ll love FlipSlips as much as we do. REMEMBER: There are two BIG ways you can support us, you can Like us on Facebook and [SPREAD] the word to all your friends about our project, or back us and receive a pair of our shoes!
Thanks Indiegogo! We’ll see you on the Flip Side!

--
The Benefits: Replica of Winning Design
CHOOSE FROM THE FOLLOWING CATEGORIES FROM OUR COMMUNITY DESIGN PROJECT:

Artist RaymondCho wanted to put the straps in a much more fashion forward way using thinner straps and placing them along the back and wrapping the ankle of the foot.  This metallic finish can come in gold or silver or copper or colors that utilize metallic material. Thanks for checking out our project on Indiegogo!

In order to truly make this a success, we need your help! Although this is a competition, with your help – ALL designs that meet our factory minimums will be made. All the artists can win. All of us can take one step towards achieving our dreams – together. We hope you'll support us and our fellow designers and artists.
<div>
","Introducing the FlipSlip! The 2nd pair that EVERY woman needs.

FlipSlips are foldable designer flats on the go that can easily fit into a small purse or a pocket. We have reduced the shoe to the size of an iPhone and made it fold so that it doesn't get your purse dirty.
The FlipSlip's Unique Patented Technology is the only shoe that folds sole-to-sole and has a reversible upper so it is compressible and hygienic.

FlipSlips have a high quality neoprene upper that makes it waterproof, yet breathable for all occasions. The padded, foam cushion insole makes walking a comforting breeze. Flip Slip is TRULY an all-purpose shoe and you'ill love it!
FLIPSLIP CROWD-DESIGN PROJECT ON INDIEGOGO
We launched the Crowd-Design Project on Indiegogo to increase the designs in our foldable shoes collection and are doing so by actively involving artists from our creative community.
So how does this work exactly?

We called on designers from all over the U.S. to help us create the newest Flip Slips foldable shoes to put into production. They each had a couple of weeks to create the design and build a prototype and were given our pre-existing design to use as the base. In exchange, they received an opportunity to have fun sharing their talent with the world, receive full recognition for their work, learn about the process behind making shoes, as well as get a chance to be fairly compensated along the way
column2: each artist will receive a percent of the profit from their designs.

column1: We have the factory and all the molds, dyes and lasts needed to manufacture the shoes. All of our shoes are hand-made and we will source all the materials needed to make a high-quality replica of the original artwork. As an added bonus, by pre-ordering a pair of our designer shoes, you’ll also get to take part in the entire creative process and provide feedback on the final design, as well as receive photos and be kept posted on the progress of your shoes.
Each pair that we pre-sale puts us one step closer to meeting our funding goal!

In order to truly make this project a success, we are giving our supportive communities the opportunity to decide which shoes get put into production by pre-ordering a replica from our designer collection.

A ""winning design"" is one that meets the factory minimum of 200 pairs. If we can exceed our campaign goals (with your help) we will make more designs as we meet the factory minimums so you'll have more designs to choose from.
* In case your design does not meet minimums, at the end of the campaign we will give you the option to choose from a winning design, get our classic shoes, or we will offer a refund.
The benefits of supporting this campaign.

For as low as $15, you can get the ultra compact Pocket-FlipSlips --- it has a soft foldable sole, and it’s great for emergency back-up use. You will also get an invitation to our San Francisco Launch Party in August and make a charitable donation to Kiva.org, a non-profit on a mission to alleviate poverty by empowering entrepreneurs through micro-loans.

You can also get our Classic Flip Slips in your choice of 32 different colors! You will have a chance to vote on the top 5 colors, and ALL of our shoes come with an expandable Flip-Tote bag to carry your other shoes in.
You can take part in our Community Design Project and support our fellow designers:

You can take a look at our Designer Gallery to see each one and learn more about each design and artist. Please Hurry! The first 200 purchases for each category will receive a 15% discount on their order.

We want to bring you a high-quality, handcrafted replica of the original artwork made by each artist. Our factory is ready to go and we already have all the molds and everything we need to get going. The only thing that we need to get going is money.
We are seeking partners to help us SPREAD the love even more!
Join Us.

We’re always on the lookout for passionate individuals and calling on artists to help with our project. If you want to join our team and work together to achieve our dreams, e-mail us at info@flipslip.com

We hope you’ll love FlipSlips as much as we do. REMEMBER: There are two BIG ways you can support us, you can Like us on Facebook and [SPREAD] the word to all your friends about our project, or back us and receive a pair of our shoes!
Thanks Indiegogo! We’ll see you on the Flip Side!
-- The Benefits: Replica of Winning Design
CHOOSE FROM THE FOLLOWING CATEGORIES FROM OUR COMMUNITY DESIGN PROJECT:

Originally born in Kabul Afghanistan, migrated to America in early 80's and grew-up in Chicago.
Having an Afghan background I feel it's our own responsibility to bring peace &
column2: stability to our country. My project is a small effort towards that goal. I'm not doing this for profit as each shirt will cost around $12 to be made and with shipping I figured $15 is a fair price (40 shirts x $15 = $600).

column1: The shirts will be in 4 sizes (S,M.L,XL) and it will be made on preshrunk 50/50 (cotton &
column2: polyester), the color is similar to what you see in the graphics (ash grey).

column1: I like to extend a very gracious thanks for the generosity of photographer Ivan Lo (www.IvanLo.com) in donating images taken during one of this trips to Afghanistan. They are truly unique and really captures the current state of the Afghan people, especially the children.

I also like to thank everyone is advance for your support of my project. This really is a humbling experience for me to be doing this. Also worth noting I'm a member of ASAP Chicago ""American Society of Afghan Professionals in Chicago"" for more than 10yrs. and we are one of the few non-for profit organizations working towards promoting Afghan culture in Chicagoland area (http://www.asapchicago.org/)
hamid ahang

HOCKEY WITHOUT BORDERS GLOBAL INITIATIVE

Hockey Sans Frontières (HSF) / Hockey Without Borders is a registered non-profit organization established to affect positive change in the lives of children and youth by using the values of hockey to promote health, development and peace. To maximize our impact
column2: our approach focuses on sending coaches abroad, organizing grassroots initiatives, engaging in local clinics and sending equipment to underfunded hockey communities around the world. What we discovered is that the most effective and sustainable way to have an impact on these communities is to send coaches
column3: young Canadians who could share their passion for the sport and impart their invaluable knowledge by teaching skating, coaching hockey, and coaching coaches. Since 2009 we have sent coaches to Subotica, Serbia and for the first time this year we will be sending coaches to Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina. But there are more communities that need our help.

column1: We need to raise $20,000 to launch the Hockey Without Borders Global Initiative. In January 2013, Craig and Matt will visit ten thriving hockey communities. In each community, they will conduct clinics, host various hockey events, and most importantly develop the essential partnerships needed for us to send coaches in the future. Along for the journey will be a filmmaker to capture the powerful emotions that the sport inspires and the relationships that hockey can nurture. HSF recognizes that in order to establish these partnerships with hockey communities around the world, an essential first step is to visit them. The purpose is to develop a relationship with the program organizers and assess the needs of the community.
By donating to the Hockey Without Borders Global Initiative, HSF will be able to develop ten new partnerships and in turn new communities to send the most valuable resource, coaches.
Thank you for your support!
Please visit www.hockeywithoutborders.org for our corporate sponsorship package and to inquire about other ways to get involved.
The Video
HSF in Ankara, Turkey

As part of the Hockey Without Borders Global Initiative, Craig and Matt traveled to Ankara, Turkey to run a hockey camp. To their surprise, they discovered that against odds and obstacles, a hockey community thrives in Ankara, one that exudes the same passion for the game that exists in Canada.
More Than a Game
Remarks by the President of HSF, Fred Perowne

Canadians intrinsically know that hockey is more than just a sport - it teaches many skills, values and ideals that are necessary to succeed in life. Hard work, determination, respect and teamwork are fundamental values of hockey
column2: but we also believe that these values can translate into all aspects of life. By spreading these life lessons through coaching, communities and individuals around the world will benefit.

column1:
The values learnt through hockey have changed the lives of many who have laced up a pair of skates in Canada, but those values can sometimes be taken for granted. Through this film, Canadians will be able to see firsthand the impact that the spirit of hockey can have on individuals and communities across the globe.

","HOCKEY WITHOUT BORDERS GLOBAL INITIATIVE

Hockey Sans Frontières (HSF) / Hockey Without Borders is a registered non-profit organization established to affect positive change in the lives of children and youth by using the values of hockey to promote health, development and peace. To maximize our impact
column2: our approach focuses on sending coaches abroad, organizing grassroots initiatives, engaging in local clinics and sending equipment to underfunded hockey communities around the world. What we discovered is that the most effective and sustainable way to have an impact on these communities is to send coaches
column3: young Canadians who could share their passion for the sport and impart their invaluable knowledge by teaching skating, coaching hockey, and coaching coaches. Since 2009 we have sent coaches to Subotica, Serbia and for the first time this year we will be sending coaches to Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina. But there are more communities that need our help.

column1: We need to raise $20,000 to launch the Hockey Without Borders Global Initiative. In January 2013, Craig and Matt will visit ten thriving hockey communities. In each community, they will conduct clinics, host various hockey events, and most importantly develop the essential partnerships needed for us to send coaches in the future. Along for the journey will be a filmmaker to capture the powerful emotions that the sport inspires and the relationships that hockey can nurture. HSF recognizes that in order to establish these partnerships with hockey communities around the world, an essential first step is to visit them. The purpose is to develop a relationship with the program organizers and assess the needs of the community.
By donating to the Hockey Without Borders Global Initiative, HSF will be able to develop ten new partnerships and in turn new communities to send the most valuable resource, coaches.
Thank you for your support!
Please visit www.hockeywithoutborders.org for our corporate sponsorship package and to inquire about other ways to get involved.
The Video
HSF in Ankara, Turkey

As part of the Hockey Without Borders Global Initiative, Craig and Matt traveled to Ankara, Turkey to run a hockey camp. To their surprise, they discovered that against odds and obstacles, a hockey community thrives in Ankara, one that exudes the same passion for the game that exists in Canada.

Three years ago, a group of athletes sought to create running shoes with the most shock absorbent system for maximum support, and a comfortable precise fit. Why? Simply because we all deserve it!
MAXIMUM COMFORT AND SUPPORT ARE A MUST, FORUS SHOES COME WITH OUR PATENTED POLSTARMAX 6 INSOLES.
HOW DID WE COME UP WITH FORUS?
It all started with this statement: - “ This sucks! My shoe insoles are completely worn out and I feel like I am walking and training on a board!! It hurts!! ”

After saying and thinking along these lines for over eight years we were fed up. We could not understand why better support meant spending an extra $30 for aftermarket insoles. We quickly learned that we were not alone to hope for a shoe with a standard shock absorbent system yet with incomparable comfort and engineering.

After speaking with a few podiatrists and learning that all insoles standard in shoes we purchased (even non-athletics ones) provided close to no support whatsoever, we decided to do something about it! And that’s where the journey began!
THE NYTRO 90X IN LIGHT GRAY AND NEON GREEN. 11.5 OZ FOR A STABILITY SHOE IS JUST AMAZING,ADMIT IT...
<div class=""template asset"">
IN BLACK AND NEON GREEN...IT IS GETTING INTERESTING..
WHY THE NAME FORUS? WHAT’S WITH THE LOGO?

Our philosophy is the inspiration behind the name FORUS. This brand is “for us” who want maximum support, comfort, and performance from our products, and “for us” who wish to make a difference in our communities. This alliance of community and business is symbolized in the logo: two hands interlock in a gesture of solidarity, people working together, and corporations supporting communities to create a better socially accountable business.
AND FINALLY....FOR NOW, IN BLACK AND ORANGE. AND WITH YOUR BACKING WE WILL BE ABLE TO CREATE MANY MORE FUN COLOR COMBINATIONS.
SIZES WE CURRENTLY HAVE AVAILABLE. WITH YOUR BACKING WE WILL BE ABLE TO PROVIDE MORE.
WHY GIVE BACK?

It was an evolving process to set up the base framework for FORUS philanthropic vision, simply because we wanted to find the right way to give back. We believe all corporations should be involved in the communities they serve. So FORUS forever plaged 10% of its global profits to children charities worldwide. We encourage you to watch the video in our gallery explaning FORUS philantropic Mission.
IN FACT, 10% OF THE FUNDS RAISED HERE WILL GO TOWARDS FORUS PHILANTROPIC MISSION. SO JOIN US IN CHANGING LIVES.
“What if one step towards making our world a better place did not require us to donate, but simply make the choice of a brand? “ -- FORUS Athletics.

TREND-SETTING DESIGNS -- We pride ourselves in creating shoes that answer to the needs of our advocates. We won’t pretend to know what you need. All we do is talk to specialists to learn what problems need to be addressed and we work on them. And since we don’t hesitate to CHALLENGE THE STATUS QUO, we tend to go crazy with our aesthetics and engineering design! Did someone just say function and fashion?
WE GIVE YOU THE MEMBRANE CRYPT, A NEW STANDARD IN LIGHT WEIGHT SHOES
<div class=""template asset"">
THE MEMBRANE CRYPT IN RED!
LADIES, WE HAD TO DO SOMETHING SPECIAL FOR YOU!
ARE YOU GREEN?
Need to shop for new athletics gear? Send us your used MEMBRANE CRYPT and we will recycle them for you or donate them to those in need while you get a 25% OFF on your next FORUS purchase!!!
MORE COLORS, MORE FUN!
With additional funding we will be able to offer more sizes, colors, and styles!
ANOTHER COLOR COMBINATION FOR THE MEMBRANE,HELP US EXPLORE MORE!
BLACK ON BLACK WITH A LITTLE SHADE OF GRAY...
IF WE REACH OUR GOAL ON INDIEGOGO WE WILL BE ABLE TO BRING YOU THESE COOL PRODUCTS AS WELL!
WE CALL IT THE ADV-T-PRO, WONDER WHY?

BEST TRAVELERS' BACKPACK AROUND- REMOVABLE ZIPLOG BAG FOR TOOTHBRUSH,TOOTHPASTE,ETC. THE ZIPLOG BAG IS ATTACHED WITH A VELCRO THUS EASY TO REMOVE AND EVEN EASIER RE-ATTACH. THE EXTERNAL COMPUTER/IPAD POCKET IS PLACED ON THE BACK FOR QUICK ACCESS.
THEN WE WENT A LITTLE FURTHER...WHY NOT?
WE CALL IT THE LUI-IN-BAG, IT HAS EXTERIOR POCKET FOR THOSE DIRTY OR STINKY SHOES AND FRONT THERMO POCKET TO KEEP THAT PRECIOUS LUNCH WARM!
WHY DO WE NEED THE SUPPORT OF THE INDIEGOGO FAMILY ?

We’ve been working on athletics gear for over three years now. The shoes that you see in the video and in the photos are actual FORUS shoes that have been worn and tested for the past three years. We have current Olympians that train in our shoes, as well as a dozen people who have run marathons in them.
Their feedback was incredible and now with your support we can bring FORUS shoes, the most shock absorbent, stable, trend-setting shoes available, to all of you….to the world!!
As a FORUS backer, you will help fund:
- Production of first orders to put FORUS shoes on the market!
- Produce fun color combinations you all can enjoy!
- Open new molds and provide bigger sizes!
AND THESE TOO
FAQ
A. When are we going to receive our shoes?
Our goal is to begin shipping by the end of September.
B. What comes in a FORUS shoebox?
In each box you will have the pair of shoes in a size and color you ordered, a custom stylish silicon FORUS bracelet, and an advocate DECAL to represent what you believe in!
C. Are FORUS shoes only for athletes?
No. Thanks to the support coupled with the light weight of FORUS athletics shoes, they are perfect for walking and standing for long hours.
D. What sizes does FORUS offer?
We hope to offer womens size 6 to 10 and mens size 7 to 12. However, with your support we will be able to provide up to size 15 for men!!
E. I do CROSSFIT and alternative workouts, are FORUS shoes good for me?

Yes, the middle part of the FORUS NYTRO 90 X is made of our patented bar so you will not get any burnout when coming down the ropes during CROSSFIT. The sole design is perfect for maximum support and shock absorbance while the rubber at the bottom has threads and designs that will give you maximum traction and unparalleled stability.
F. Can I wear your shoes without socks?

Yes! The upper of both the MEMBRANE CRYPT and the NYTRO 90 X are super breathable allowing enough air to flow in to reduce humidity and moisture! And because they have incredible breathability, you can walk, work, and workout in them for days and have no stinking shoes!!
G. Do you have patents for your inventions?

Yes. We have had many years of analysis, sleepless nights, and heated debates with attorneys while developing our products. As a result, we have protected ALL the cool designs and unique inventions we have in all their variations with patents, copyrights, and trademark worldwide.
H. I’m an international backer. Can you deliver to my country?
Yes! We deliver worldwide, but the shipping costs will be higher and we are not responsible for customs duties and procedures.

Thanks for supporting FORUS and let's CHALLENGE THE STATUS QUO!

column2: >Rakki is the most innovative protective headgear, soft and interactive especially designed for urban mobility. Extremely portable and protective to the impacts, with a system of integrated telephone communication.

column3: >No more stiff and bulky helmets! Rakki  is soft, light - a little more than 100 gr / 4 oz. - and soft, because it is made of Poron® XRD® Extreme Impact Protection, an innovative soft impact resistant microcellular material. When the soft foam of Poron XRD is stressed at a high rate or is impacted quickly, the material becomes firm / rigid to form a protective shell that shields the head inside from impact energy. Poron XRD Technology absorbs more impact energy at higher speeds than anything else available on the market.

column2: >In other words, it prevents the injuries of heads than any other soft protector you can find anywhere in the world. When you wear Rakki you decide to protect your head during your travel and talk by an integrated phone module. Then, when it is not needed, you can fold it and put in your back  pocket or a bag, simple and compact, flexible.
>Let your kids play, give you few minutes to watch some sequences of the backstage of the main video, that's Amazing!!
>Let your kids play using their fantasy, get them wearing RAKKI:
>See more details on www.rakki.it or ask to info@rakki.it.

>Rakki is a Soft and Foldable protective Cap made of Poron® XRD® Extreme Impact Protection, designed for all forms of urban displacement, both active and passive, playful, sporty, or even just for regular movements that are part of your daily life. But also it caters for all practices and games and sporting disciplines, amateur or professional, involving open-air activities, not only in urban but also suburban extensively.

>Walking, running, cycling, travelling, but also enjoying skateboarding, parkour, longboard, Paintball, Airsoft, Xpogo, Free Running, Power Bocking, skating, the most diverse sports activities practiced on the landscape, in water as in the snow or on the lawn, with or without wheels or boards: Rakki is for all of us.
>A small amazing revolution in the world of Urban Mobility.
>Walking through town, as doing the daily underground running, the small displacement using your bike to take your child to school,

column1: <span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column4: >such as moving to / from the workplace, alone or with other friends, these are all activities where the use of Rakki involves/gives  a considerable reduction of the possibility of injury or accident.

column1: Every year, in Europe itself, over 5,000 pedestrians die in predominantly urban mobility and over 2,000 are the cyclists deaths. About 20% of accidents in Urban Mobility has Pedestrians as object, while the highest percentage of the causes of these fatalities and carelessness concerns premature actions, inattention or no action. We are talking in total, in Europe itself, of more than 10,000 people who have injuries to carelessness in walks or for not argue actions (not stopping at a stop sign, do not comply with the traffic code), which unfortunately will add more than 7,000 deaths. Everything for carelessness! Over 45% of pedestrian casualties were admitted to hospital. Darkness is also the condition associated with the most pedestrian fatalities, more than 51% of the total. (2014, European DACOTA Project, European Commission, Directorakte-General for Mobility &

column2: >Private survey data are even more extreme, either related to pedestrians or cyclists. They reported that 92% of cyclists are not wearing a protective helmet, even though more than 85% of them understand that this carries a risk, but still 85% of them say they do not wear protection because in the headgear or helmets market there are not highly portable, comfortable and adequate head protectors. Next, as regards pedestrians, almost 100% of them do not wear head protection: 72% of them clearly understand risk includes, but always 100% of them tell they do not wear head protectors because these are too bulky, not stylistically well made, heavy, rigid, non-portable, not trendy .

column1: If we introduce outdoor activities in our analysis then numbers increase exponentially, dramatic. (European Outdoor Group. (2014). Overview of the European outdoor market).

column2: >And that's why Rakki, and why we are working on head protectors: because  one third of those above injuries cause trauma or head injuries. Rakki is a Protective Headgear but you can wear it like a simple wool beanie, it is soft, foldable, soft to the touch, but powerful and resistant to Low-Impacts, stylish and interactive.

column1: Rakki is therefore extremely competitive, versatile and unique because on one side it prevents the damages caused by the most common accidents,  lowering the of risk of injury or wounds, while on the other side it opens the way to secure communication in modern urban mobility, all in softness and with the style you are looking for.
Let’s start with the name: Rakki.

Rakki is a Japanese urban slang term, I could not find it anywhere else! It comes from a corruption of English ""Lucky"" (lucky) and is used by young Japaneses to indicate a stroke of genius or a particularly positive mood. That was what I wanted: Rakki !!

PERKS
Help us with supporting RAKKI on this campaign, you will receive amazing perks!
Features
Rakki offers itself for a market sector of over 70% of conventional fatalities, mainly in urban areas.

With Rakki we aim to reduce the percentage of damage due to the more common accidents, introducing a protective factor that helps the protection, but at the same time does not restrict the portability and communication as well does not affect the style and design.

column2: >Today, very often there is a consumer refusal in choosing effective protection because these seldom are in line with the trends of style, with clothing and because they distort the image of the person - especially if customers are teen-end and in urban mobility gear or Outdoor sports goods and apparel. Almost all people well understand the need to wear a head protection during urban mobility, whatever it is. But all the same people do not wear it even though they clearly understand the risk, because they do not have a chance to choose something protective and at the same time be soft, not bulky, not troublesome, with an excellent design, style, portable: there are now only hard and stiff head protections!

column1: With Rakki we finally have the solution!

Style, through different tissues linings as among many proposals for customizations and between several external style accessories, to easily “Create Your Rakki"", and always feel yourself taking the top trends at every opportunity, but safe, secure, innovative, creative and unique! Or even,  the latest trend, you can wear Rakki naked, N-Rakki: choose to let people see the “magic material"" hidden in your Rakki, colorful, tech, high-end, which is the maximum expression of the special microcellular material that makes Rakki.

column5: >, the basic material of Rakki. Poron XRD consists of air permeable open-cells that resist collecting moisture and perspiration on the surface of the skin. With each move, the material compresses and flexes, allow air and moisture to move freely. But when the soft foam of Poron XRD is stressed at a high rate or impacted quickly, the material becomes firm/rigid to form a protective shell that shields the head inside from impact energy. Poron XRD Technology absorbs more impact energy at higher speeds than anything else available in the market. In other words, it prevents the injuries of heads than any other soft protector you can find anywhere in the world.

column1: Communication, through the introduction of a Bluetooth Module

column2: >to make phone calls, communicate, make SOS calls, such as the introduction of an HD Camera and biometric sensors that through a special App monitors the status of your body at all times (release 2.0). Due to the thickness and density of the Poron XRD layer we can integrate in Rakki a whole range of electronic devices which are moreover bump protected just by the material itself.

column1: Poron® XRD®
Rakki is completely made of Poron® XRD® Extreme Impact Protection.

Poron® XRD® consists of air permeable open-cells that resist collecting moisture and perspiration on the surface of the skin. With each move, the material compresses and flexes, allow air and moisture to move freely.

Due to its open cell structure, Poron® XRD® retains a “like-new” softness, flexibility and cushioning effect while resisting the tendency to bottom out and break down under multiple impacts. Therefore, PORON material returns to its original form and performance after each impact, as if you are using it for the first time – every time.

When you’re risking it all, you need protective gear you can count on. Poron® XRD® Technology is engineered to be soft and flexible – so you can move freely and in comfort, but is also durable and provides unbeatable, repeated impact protection that performs when you need it most. No other protective material can offer this combination of benefits!

When the soft foam is stressed at a high rate or impacted quickly, the foam material instantaneously reaches the point when the urethane momentarily ""freezes"" - like water freezing into ice. When this happens, the material becomes firm/rigid to form a protective shell that shields the head inside from impact energy. Poron® XRD® Technology absorbs more impact energy at higher speeds than anything else available in the market. In other words, it prevents head injuries than any other soft protector you can find anywhere in the world.

So, if subjected to both single or multiple impacts, Poron XRD reacts simply ""hardening and returning soft"", even several times, while the time it takes for this transformation is imperceptible, not obvious.

Poron XRD is, moreover, at least 40% better performant than the best performing of its competitors, at least 70% more than the normal elastomers used as shock absorption, Neoprene, EVA, orange materials, etc.

Furthermore, Poron XRD distinguishes itself in the field of shock-absorber because it is completely breathable and antimicrobial. These are very important factors for a product used in contact with the skin 24 hrs per day, every season, latitude, altitude and environmental condition, water, snow, mud.

We have also micropunched the layer of PoronXRD to help still greater breathability and also to allow the use in water sports, where we can predict a complete immersion of Rakki and where it is necessary a fast and complete emptying of the protective hat - for example further on a fall from a Kiteboard or a Windsurf.

Internally Rakki is covered with a durable water repellent and highly comfortable fabric, with a high performance against spontaneous sweating. In fact the yarns of Silver help the dispersion of the vapor of perspiration towards the outside, through the open cells structure and the microholes on the whole surface of Poron XRD.

column2: >Over the basic inner liner with Silver yarn Rakki provides you with a special waterproof
column4: > that in the cold winter days helps retain heat around the head eliminating moisture of the steam produced.

column1: Rakki also offers a series of functional and stylistic accessories that enriches the style of the project and will complete its technological value.

Rakki offers a number of External Cap-Cover that can be applied to the cap base through some simple clip buttons that allow you to change in a flash your style: from a urban beanie to a PA cover for water sports or a freeze repellent one in the cold and snow. With Rakki, just changing your cap-cover, you can always renew your style and to present yourself the best at every opportunity.
A clip placed onto the top of the various cover also allows you to choose to enrich your Rakki with POM-POMS, pins or other accessories. That’s Amazing!
FEATURES
Sizes

Rakki comes in 4 different sizes, in order to have it for everyone who has wisely decided to protect himself and thus enjoy the most 'full heartedness and freedom in his movements. From child to adult Rakki is for all. Choose your  size in the table below and order  your Rakki Cap now.
Refraction

Rakki also offers an important element of passive safety: the refraction. Rakki not only has reflective stripes on the back as trivially many hats or protective helmets offer, but everywhere, either strips that wrap and refract, front, side or rear, so that even a light projection of a headlight of a car coming from a side street, in the dark of winter nights, brightens your Rakki and communicates that you're there, preventing accidents and bringing you home safely.
Rakki Range is made of two basic models, offered in two different thickness of Poron XRD layer, and a limited edition one.
N-Rakki In the basic naked version, N-Rakki, offers the same features of Rakki but lacks internal electronics ( as low as $ 129 ).
Rakki In the full version Rakki has a Bluetooth module to call in absolute mobility, using an autoresponder or via a 3-keys keypad placed on the nape ( as low as $ 159 ).

column3: > This limited edition has a bluetooth to call in absolute mobility, Ceramic Fur lining and external cover of aramidic fiber  ( as low as $ 299 ).

column1: Technical specifications
Dimensions folded: 12x18x4 cm (423/32 x 73/32 x 137/64 in)
Weight: 112 grams (0.24 pounds - 4 Oz)
Bluetooth V 3.0 + EDR
Frequency: 2.402 GHz - 2.480 GHz
Lyon Battery 3.7 V / 140 mA
Battery: 5000mAh LiPo
Stand-by time: 60 Hrs
Continuous working time: 3.5 Hrs
Recharge from empty to full in about 60 minutes
Material: Poron® XRD®

My name is Bernardo. For many years I have dedicate myself to the design and development of protective products for the head, in every area, for each use and sport, from bike to motorbike, to extreme sports like Paintball as work DPI.
My profession has taken me to travel and learn more about numerous metropolitan areas in the world, and I guarantee you that my attention is focused mainly on two factors:
1- we move our bodies in the cities in which we live in, but without safety
2- head protection offered by the market do not pay attention to our needs

column2: >The above issues led me to some few simple considerations:

column1: 1- we need more safety and protection at all times of our urban journeys
2- we require a head protection not bulky and rigid, but foldable and storable and stylish

column2: >Every day each of us spends an average of

column1: I needed an impact resistant Head Gear, but also that would be soft, flexible, foldable and compact, lightweight. For all this I used an extraordinary material made available to me from a smart and capable company: I have found and tested the Poron XRD. Amazing! I had everything: I designed it, developed it, structured, tested: we are now ready to produce Rakki and offer them to everyone.
I asked for help from friends and colleagues who have helped me in the choice of possible manufacturing systems as surface treatments.

We have thus chosen special seams, resistant to salt water and UV rays, high-performance yarn in order you to wear Rakki at salt sea and in every possible condition. We defined different shapes and opted for the simplest solutions and usable ones, despite having investigated numerous options.
We also analysed the necessary surface drilling to help quick water escaping that may need in water sport after a water fall with N-Rakki, the correct diameter of holes, spacing, densities.
After a year of testings and prototyping we built the final version of Rakki that in my opinion is so cute and tech, respondent to every goal I had.
GOALS

The material Poron XRD has contraindications?
Absolutely no. Poron XRD has no contraindication for contact with the skin, and indeed is antimicrobial and antibacterial.
Where is the Bluetooth phone module?
The bluetooth module is embedded in the back of the Rakki, integrated in the thickness of the material. Earphones and microphone are also integrated into the material, clearly in specific positions.
Can I change the bluetooth module alone?
Not in this first release. As we aim to make interchangeable electronic, we would like to achieve this option as stretched goal.
Is Rakki suitable for kids?
Yes, of course it is recommended. We have a size that is good for the children and we are activating partnerships for external cover with drawings for children.
I want Rakki, what do I have to do?
Just click on Rakki Perk paying with PayPal or Credit Card
What does Early Rakki mean?
It means that the Rakki is the same, but if you order it early Rakki costs less !! Hurry up and order your Rakki!
Is Rakki as protective as a motorcycle helmet?
No. Rakki is not a protective helmet and can not be worn in place of an approved helmet for a motorcycle.
Is Rakki certified as a bicycle helmet?
No. Rakki is not a certified or homologated bicycle helmet and we do not want it to be! It has to be worn in place of a soft beanie, but protective.
How can I add shipping fee to my order?
Just add a $ 17 dollar contribution (without perk) with headquarters in Europe, or $ 30 contribution (without perk) with international headquarters.
What if I change address after placing an order?
Before we ship anything we will ask  you to confirm by emailing us your address, so please do not worry if you've moved since you ordered
If there are any questions you would like  to ask, please do so in the comments section.
We will keep These updated FAQ.
RISK AND CHALLENGES

We want to produce Rakki and spread it to all markets. We are confident that we can produce Rakki respecting scheduled timing. Normally design, prototyping and product development timing will take the risk and possibility of some stops due to some processes of development, that inevitably lead to a delay of the time of production and delivery. That's why we preferred to made all the development and pre-production at our risk and investment before submitting Rakki to everyone, so as to cancel every possible risks of delay due to the development, as above. We will manufacture, we will test the product and we will give you your Rakki respecting the maximum schedule.
All risks related to delays in the development as the risks related to delays in pre-series have already been taken and addressed.
Today we have a product fully tested in over hundreds copies and ready to be manufactured.

Some risks of delay in the delivering of future releases if achieveing the Stretched Goals may be regarded, as we have not directly tested the introduction of the electronic implementations, HD Camera, sensors and App development first, although now we have a long experience and we have  already analyzed it with suppliers.
In addition, a structured plan of management and costs of the development of production assures us that we will not be in the situation of a sudden raise in production costs.

","Rakki is the most innovative protective headgear, soft and interactive especially designed for urban mobility. Extremely portable and protective to the impacts, with a system of integrated telephone communication.

No more stiff and bulky helmets! Rakki  is soft, light - a little more than 100 gr / 4 oz. - and soft, because it is made of Poron® XRD® Extreme Impact Protection, an innovative soft impact resistant microcellular material. When the soft foam of Poron XRD is stressed at a high rate or is impacted quickly, the material becomes firm / rigid to form a protective shell that shields the head inside from impact energy. Poron XRD Technology absorbs more impact energy at higher speeds than anything else available on the market.

In other words, it prevents the injuries of heads than any other soft protector you can find anywhere in the world. When you wear Rakki you decide to protect your head during your travel and talk by an integrated phone module. Then, when it is not needed, you can fold it and put in your back  pocket or a bag, simple and compact, flexible.
Let your kids play, give you few minutes to watch some sequences of the backstage of the main video, that's Amazing!!
Let your kids play using their fantasy, get them wearing RAKKI:
See more details on www.rakki.it or ask to info@rakki.it.

Rakki is a Soft and Foldable protective Cap made of Poron® XRD® Extreme Impact Protection, designed for all forms of urban displacement, both active and passive, playful, sporty, or even just for regular movements that are part of your daily life. But also it caters for all practices and games and sporting disciplines, amateur or professional, involving open-air activities, not only in urban but also suburban extensively.

Walking, running, cycling, travelling, but also enjoying skateboarding, parkour, longboard, Paintball, Airsoft, Xpogo, Free Running, Power Bocking, skating, the most diverse sports activities practiced on the landscape, in water as in the snow or on the lawn, with or without wheels or boards: Rakki is for all of us.
A small amazing revolution in the world of Urban Mobility.
Walking through town, as doing the daily underground running, the small displacement using your bike to take your child to school,
such as moving to / from the workplace, alone or with other friends, these are all activities where the use of Rakki involves/gives  a considerable reduction of the possibility of injury or accident.
STATISTICS

Every year, in Europe itself, over 5,000 pedestrians die in predominantly urban mobility and over 2,000 are the cyclists deaths. About 20% of accidents in Urban Mobility has Pedestrians as object, while the highest percentage of the causes of these fatalities and carelessness concerns premature actions, inattention or no action. We are talking in total, in Europe itself, of more than 10,000 people who have injuries to carelessness in walks or for not argue actions (not stopping at a stop sign, do not comply with the traffic code), which unfortunately will add more than 7,000 deaths. Everything for carelessness! Over 45% of pedestrian casualties were admitted to hospital. Darkness is also the condition associated with the most pedestrian fatalities, more than 51% of the total. (2014, European DACOTA Project, European Commission, Directorakte-General for Mobility & Transport).

Private survey data are even more extreme, either related to pedestrians or cyclists. They reported that 92% of cyclists are not wearing a protective helmet, even though more than 85% of them understand that this carries a risk, but still 85% of them say they do not wear protection because in the headgear or helmets market there are not highly portable, comfortable and adequate head protectors. Next, as regards pedestrians, almost 100% of them do not wear head protection: 72% of them clearly understand risk includes, but always 100% of them tell they do not wear head protectors because these are too bulky, not stylistically well made, heavy, rigid, non-portable, not trendy .
If we introduce outdoor activities in our analysis then numbers increase exponentially, dramatic. (European Outdoor Group. (2014). Overview of the European outdoor market).

And that's why Rakki, and why we are working on head protectors: because  one third of those above injuries cause trauma or head injuries. Rakki is a Protective Headgear but you can wear it like a simple wool beanie, it is soft, foldable, soft to the touch, but powerful and resistant to Low-Impacts, stylish and interactive.

Rakki is therefore extremely competitive, versatile and unique because on one side it prevents the damages caused by the most common accidents,  lowering the of risk of injury or wounds, while on the other side it opens the way to secure communication in modern urban mobility, all in softness and with the style you are looking for.
Let’s start with the name: Rakki.

Rakki is a Japanese urban slang term, I could not find it anywhere else! It comes from a corruption of English ""Lucky"" (lucky) and is used by young Japaneses to indicate a stroke of genius or a particularly positive mood. That was what I wanted: Rakki !!
PERKSHelp us with supporting RAKKI on this campaign, you will receive amazing perks!
Features
Rakki offers itself for a market sector of over 70% of conventional fatalities, mainly in urban areas.

With Rakki we aim to reduce the percentage of damage due to the more common accidents, introducing a protective factor that helps the protection, but at the same time does not restrict the portability and communication as well does not affect the style and design.

Today, very often there is a consumer refusal in choosing effective protection because these seldom are in line with the trends of style, with clothing and because they distort the image of the person - especially if customers are teen-end and in urban mobility gear or Outdoor sports goods and apparel. Almost all people well understand the need to wear a head protection during urban mobility, whatever it is. But all the same people do not wear it even though they clearly understand the risk, because they do not have a chance to choose something protective and at the same time be soft, not bulky, not troublesome, with an excellent design, style, portable: there are now only hard and stiff head protections!
With Rakki we finally have the solution!

Style, through different tissues linings as among many proposals for customizations and between several external style accessories, to easily “Create Your Rakki"", and always feel yourself taking the top trends at every opportunity, but safe, secure, innovative, creative and unique! Or even,  the latest trend, you can wear Rakki naked, N-Rakki: choose to let people see the “magic material"" hidden in your Rakki, colorful, tech, high-end, which is the maximum expression of the special microcellular material that makes Rakki.

Protection, through the use of Poron XRD, the basic material of Rakki. Poron XRD consists of air permeable open-cells that resist collecting moisture and perspiration on the surface of the skin. With each move, the material compresses and flexes, allow air and moisture to move freely. But when the soft foam of Poron XRD is stressed at a high rate or impacted quickly, the material becomes firm/rigid to form a protective shell that shields the head inside from impact energy. Poron XRD Technology absorbs more impact energy at higher speeds than anything else available in the market. In other words, it prevents the injuries of heads than any other soft protector you can find anywhere in the world.
Communication, through the introduction of a Bluetooth Module

to make phone calls, communicate, make SOS calls, such as the introduction of an HD Camera and biometric sensors that through a special App monitors the status of your body at all times (release 2.0). Due to the thickness and density of the Poron XRD layer we can integrate in Rakki a whole range of electronic devices which are moreover bump protected just by the material itself.
Poron® XRD®
Rakki is completely made of Poron® XRD® Extreme Impact Protection.

Poron® XRD® consists of air permeable open-cells that resist collecting moisture and perspiration on the surface of the skin. With each move, the material compresses and flexes, allow air and moisture to move freely.

Due to its open cell structure, Poron® XRD® retains a “like-new” softness, flexibility and cushioning effect while resisting the tendency to bottom out and break down under multiple impacts. Therefore, PORON material returns to its original form and performance after each impact, as if you are using it for the first time – every time.

When you’re risking it all, you need protective gear you can count on. Poron® XRD® Technology is engineered to be soft and flexible – so you can move freely and in comfort, but is also durable and provides unbeatable, repeated impact protection that performs when you need it most. No other protective material can offer this combination of benefits!

When the soft foam is stressed at a high rate or impacted quickly, the foam material instantaneously reaches the point when the urethane momentarily ""freezes"" - like water freezing into ice. When this happens, the material becomes firm/rigid to form a protective shell that shields the head inside from impact energy. Poron® XRD® Technology absorbs more impact energy at higher speeds than anything else available in the market. In other words, it prevents head injuries than any other soft protector you can find anywhere in the world.

So, if subjected to both single or multiple impacts, Poron XRD reacts simply ""hardening and returning soft"", even several times, while the time it takes for this transformation is imperceptible, not obvious.

Poron XRD is, moreover, at least 40% better performant than the best performing of its competitors, at least 70% more than the normal elastomers used as shock absorption, Neoprene, EVA, orange materials, etc.

Furthermore, Poron XRD distinguishes itself in the field of shock-absorber because it is completely breathable and antimicrobial. These are very important factors for a product used in contact with the skin 24 hrs per day, every season, latitude, altitude and environmental condition, water, snow, mud.

We have also micropunched the layer of PoronXRD to help still greater breathability and also to allow the use in water sports, where we can predict a complete immersion of Rakki and where it is necessary a fast and complete emptying of the protective hat - for example further on a fall from a Kiteboard or a Windsurf.

Internally Rakki is covered with a durable water repellent and highly comfortable fabric, with a high performance against spontaneous sweating. In fact the yarns of Silver help the dispersion of the vapor of perspiration towards the outside, through the open cells structure and the microholes on the whole surface of Poron XRD.

Over the basic inner liner with Silver yarn Rakki provides you with a special waterproof Ceramics soft fur that in the cold winter days helps retain heat around the head eliminating moisture of the steam produced.
Rakki also offers a series of functional and stylistic accessories that enriches the style of the project and will complete its technological value.

Rakki offers a number of External Cap-Cover that can be applied to the cap base through some simple clip buttons that allow you to change in a flash your style: from a urban beanie to a PA cover for water sports or a freeze repellent one in the cold and snow. With Rakki, just changing your cap-cover, you can always renew your style and to present yourself the best at every opportunity.
A clip placed onto the top of the various cover also allows you to choose to enrich your Rakki with POM-POMS, pins or other accessories. That’s Amazing!
FEATURES
Sizes

Rakki comes in 4 different sizes, in order to have it for everyone who has wisely decided to protect himself and thus enjoy the most 'full heartedness and freedom in his movements. From child to adult Rakki is for all. Choose your  size in the table below and order  your Rakki Cap now.
Refraction

Rakki also offers an important element of passive safety: the refraction. Rakki not only has reflective stripes on the back as trivially many hats or protective helmets offer, but everywhere, either strips that wrap and refract, front, side or rear, so that even a light projection of a headlight of a car coming from a side street, in the dark of winter nights, brightens your Rakki and communicates that you're there, preventing accidents and bringing you home safely.
Range
Rakki Range is made of two basic models, offered in two different thickness of Poron XRD layer, and a limited edition one.
N-Rakki In the basic naked version, N-Rakki, offers the same features of Rakki but lacks internal electronics ( as low as $ 129 ).
Rakki In the full version Rakki has a Bluetooth module to call in absolute mobility, using an autoresponder or via a 3-keys keypad placed on the nape ( as low as $ 159 ).
X-Rakki This limited edition has a bluetooth to call in absolute mobility, Ceramic Fur lining and external cover of aramidic fiber  ( as low as $ 299 ).
Technical specifications
Dimensions folded: 12x18x4 cm (423/32 x 73/32 x 137/64 in)
Open size: 18x18x18cm (73/32 x 73/32 x 73/32 in)
Weight: 112 grams (0.24 pounds - 4 Oz)
Bluetooth V 3.0 + EDR
Frequency: 2.402 GHz - 2.480 GHz
Lyon Battery 3.7 V / 140 mA
Battery: 5000mAh LiPo
Stand-by time: 60 Hrs
Continuous working time: 3.5 Hrs
Recharge from empty to full in about 60 minutes
Material: Poron® XRD®

My name is Bernardo. For many years I have dedicate myself to the design and development of protective products for the head, in every area, for each use and sport, from bike to motorbike, to extreme sports like Paintball as work DPI.
My profession has taken me to travel and learn more about numerous metropolitan areas in the world, and I guarantee you that my attention is focused mainly on two factors:
1- we move our bodies in the cities in which we live in, but without safety
2- head protection offered by the market do not pay attention to our needs
The above issues led me to some few simple considerations:
1- we need more safety and protection at all times of our urban journeys
2- we require a head protection not bulky and rigid, but foldable and storable and stylish

Every day each of us spends an average of 120 minutes for the pure displacement from home to workplace and 152 minutes, on average, for the necessary movements in the city. To this data must be added statistically 112 minutes/person/day in the open air activities, games and sporting. We take approximately 384 minutes/day for commuting into the city: almost 6,5 hours of Urban Mobility, a very very high percentage.

I thought about how I could study a protective element but that also ‘do not distract the person who is wearing it’, due to the statistics that told that most of the injuries were due to inattention and distraction. And I thought I had to incorporate at least one phone in my new project, and so I did.
In addition, I added the ability to send voice messages and listen to music until you get the chance to shoot video in HD and to monitor the values ​​of your body, to following releases.

I needed an impact resistant Head Gear, but also that would be soft, flexible, foldable and compact, lightweight. For all this I used an extraordinary material made available to me from a smart and capable company: I have found and tested the Poron XRD. Amazing! I had everything: I designed it, developed it, structured, tested: we are now ready to produce Rakki and offer them to everyone.
I asked for help from friends and colleagues who have helped me in the choice of possible manufacturing systems as surface treatments.

We have thus chosen special seams, resistant to salt water and UV rays, high-performance yarn in order you to wear Rakki at salt sea and in every possible condition. We defined different shapes and opted for the simplest solutions and usable ones, despite having investigated numerous options.
We also analysed the necessary surface drilling to help quick water escaping that may need in water sport after a water fall with N-Rakki, the correct diameter of holes, spacing, densities.
After a year of testings and prototyping we built the final version of Rakki that in my opinion is so cute and tech, respondent to every goal I had.

We want to make Rakki the most convenient for everyone, but we need your help to cut costs and to offer Rakki accessible to all. Our manufacturers are ready to start mass production. Now we need your help to start production of Rakki.

Press & Reviews
We are building the Media Press Kit with high-resolution photos and press releases that will be updated on these pages just for the campaign.
The material Poron XRD has contraindications?
Absolutely no. Poron XRD has no contraindication for contact with the skin, and indeed is antimicrobial and antibacterial.
Where is the Bluetooth phone module?
The bluetooth module is embedded in the back of the Rakki, integrated in the thickness of the material. Earphones and microphone are also integrated into the material, clearly in specific positions.
Can I change the bluetooth module alone?
Not in this first release. As we aim to make interchangeable electronic, we would like to achieve this option as stretched goal.
Is Rakki suitable for kids?
Yes, of course it is recommended. We have a size that is good for the children and we are activating partnerships for external cover with drawings for children.
I want Rakki, what do I have to do?
Just click on Rakki Perk paying with PayPal or Credit Card
What does Early Rakki mean?
It means that the Rakki is the same, but if you order it early Rakki costs less !! Hurry up and order your Rakki!
Is Rakki as protective as a motorcycle helmet?
No. Rakki is not a protective helmet and can not be worn in place of an approved helmet for a motorcycle.
Is Rakki certified as a bicycle helmet?
No. Rakki is not a certified or homologated bicycle helmet and we do not want it to be! It has to be worn in place of a soft beanie, but protective.
How can I add shipping fee to my order?
Just add a $ 17 dollar contribution (without perk) with headquarters in Europe, or $ 30 contribution (without perk) with international headquarters.
What if I change address after placing an order?
Before we ship anything we will ask  you to confirm by emailing us your address, so please do not worry if you've moved since you ordered
If there are any questions you would like  to ask, please do so in the comments section.
We will keep These updated FAQ.

All risks related to delays in the development as the risks related to delays in pre-series have already been taken and addressed.

Some risks of delay in the delivering of future releases if achieveing the Stretched Goals may be regarded, as we have not directly tested the introduction of the electronic implementations, HD Camera, sensors and App development first, although now we have a long experience and we have  already analyzed it with suppliers.

About The Designer

Portland-based jewelry designer Leeann Molinari is the visionary behind this stunning art locket design. While she's been creating as long as she can remember, Leeann used to split her energy between a full-time job as a dental assistant and her passion for all things handmade. Finally, she took a leap of faith, quit her day job, and vowed to follow her dreams of opening a clothing and accessories boutique. That leap of faith eventually led to the line we know today - thank goodness Leeann is one brave lady!
With original designs on each locket base, Molinari's pieces are truly wearable works of art, fresh and charming while still maintaining the classic lines of days gone by.
About Curio Road

Curio Road (www.curioroad.com) is a company that discovers and promotes superstar up-and-coming designers. Founded in 2012, today we work with over 150 designers in categories from jewelry to decor to fashion. Our newest project is to help make design affordable to everyone by working with visionary small designers and manufacturers to create limited-edition product runs at amazing prices.

Living in a culture where shoes are taken off before entering any residence, numerous restaurants that require sitting on the ground, and sometimes even the office place, taking off and putting on your shoes can become cumbersome and annoying. Especially when your shoes are high-tops or if the laces are especially long.

column1: <span>Plus, we all know the annoyances and risks
of having loose or extra long laces that can be tripped on or caught in

escalators, doors, etc. Some alternatives are to tie




the knot on the inside of
the tongue, or double knot the shoes to prevent unraveling, but these can still
get looks as you yank your foot out or are annoying to undo and retie every
time you take off your shoes. So, are you a slave to your double knots too?
<span>To solve these issues, we came up with
various different ways to prevent lace unraveling or dealing with long laces,
but we weren’t satisfied with their functionality or design.
<span>In the end, we raised the question, how can
we connect both sides of the laces and prevent unraveling without using tips.

And thus, we came up with TIPPIN.
TIPPIN comes from the idea of removing those annoying TIPs and
connecting both sides of your laces using PINs. TIP + PIN = TIPPIN
<span>In the end, we were able to take these two
ideas and come up with a design that would be a great solution to these
everyday problems.
<span>TIPPIN’s magnets are strong

and allow easy one-touch use for all your laced shoes.
Special techniques were applied in creating TIPPIN for

a more complete and stronger product using neodymium magnets.
As easy as it is to take off your shoe by stepping on

the hell of the other, it’s just as easy to put them back on with a snap.
To create the perfect shape with the perfect
functionality, foot bends, curves, and contours from several sample groups were
taken to come up with the perfect size and shape for TIPPIN.

TIPPIN was designed with the idea that “Simple is Best” and is easily customizable for each user’s individual needs in a variety of fashions.
Just for our Indiegogo backers, we have designed

special custom packaging labels.
TIPPIN is secure enough to keep your shoes on while
running, but easy to take off with little effort. The built-in magnets along
with TIPPIN’s design was created to be strong enough for any physical activity,
but easy enough to take off and put on.
TIPPIN comes in a variety of colors that
can match any color or style and comes in either a 4-hole or 6-hole design.

<div style=""display: inline !important

<b><div>

All items are free shipping. All order types, colors, tape selection will be collected AFTER funding is complete. Please wait for surveys to be sent out AFTER the funding deadline. Color related comments and address information left on our page will not be collected.

With any campaign, there are always risks associated with production and scheduling. When we reach the mass manufacturing phase, unexpected issues may arise that must be dealt with going from small-scale prototype production to full-scale manufacturing. We promise our backers that we will do our best to fulfill our schedule as best as we can.
Q. Does TIPPIN work with all shoes?
A. If your shoes have laces, TIPPIN should work. Not all
shoes will be as easy to put on or take off if, for example, you have really
thick tongued shoes or the shoes are high-tops as the opening on high-tops is
narrower than other shoes.
Q. Can TIPPIN be used in all
activities?
A. TIPPIN can be used for the gym, running, basketball, etc.
For more extreme sports where having your shoes tightly laced is critical,
TIPPIN is not recommended.
Will TIPPIN ever lose its magnetic power?
A. No, TIPPIN uses
neodymium magnets and unlike ceramic magnets, they will not lose their strength
as time progresses.
Q. Will I get injured by TIPPIN closing on my fingers?
A. Absolutely not. The magnets are strong, but not enough to
damage your fingers.
Q. Will TIPPIN come in other colors?
A. Our initial concept and design included the four colors
that you see. For now, these are the only available colors. In the future, we
plan on expanding our color options.

","Living in a culture where shoes are taken off before entering any residence, numerous restaurants that require sitting on the ground, and sometimes even the office place, taking off and putting on your shoes can become cumbersome and annoying. Especially when your shoes are high-tops or if the laces are especially long.
Plus, we all know the annoyances and risks
of having loose or extra long laces that can be tripped on or caught in
escalators, doors, etc. Some alternatives are to tie the knot on the inside of
the tongue, or double knot the shoes to prevent unraveling, but these can still
get looks as you yank your foot out or are annoying to undo and retie every
time you take off your shoes. So, are you a slave to your double knots too?

various different ways to prevent lace unraveling or dealing with long laces,
but we weren’t satisfied with their functionality or design.

we connect both sides of the laces and prevent unraveling without using tips.

GET LASHEVAN FREE!

How to Share LASHEVAN with your Friends:

STEP 1:  Log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or sign up by creating an account.

STEP 2: Click the ""Link"" icon on the top left of the page to get your personal URL OR share through social media by simply clicking the ""Facebook"" or ""Twitter"" buttons with your URL pre-loaded.

STEP 3: When you click on the share tool on the campaign page, you will automatically get a post or tweet that is set-up with your personal URL.

How to Track your Results:

STEP 1: Sign into your Indiegogo account.

STEP 2: Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.

STEP 3: Click on the “My Profile” option.

STEP 4: Click on the tab that says “Referrals” to see the number of referrals and contributions that you have collected. 

STEP 5: Gather up to 5 funders to claim your Reward!
