in the area you need it most.
Say goodbye to sweatiness and embarrassing pants adjustments with

column5: >The secret to Lashevan’s separation is a silicon band, which keeps the 3D structural design of the underwear intact. On your front, this allows Lashevan to gently keep your penis, scrotum and thighs from rubbing against one another. On your rear as well, the band maintains the underwear’s structure, preventing clinging on your buttox. This structural distortion technology resists creasing and unwanted stretching while conforming to your body.
>Stuffiness and sweatiness in your crotch region is not just uncomfortable,

column1: it can lead to significant physical and emotional changes.
Low testosterone in males can lead to
reduced sex drive and sperm production, but those aren’t the only physical
symptoms. Testosterone also lowers your body’s ability to regulate fat and
hampers the build up of muscle mass and bone density.
Emotionally, low testosterone can affect
your confidence and general sense of well-being. This can lead to depression,
lowered motivation and insomnia.
Testicular function is hindered with even a
1℃ increase in temperature. Lashevan maintain your scrotum temperature at
approximately 33.5℃, which is a little lower than your average
body temperature and the ideal temperature for testosterone maintenance.
Through an infrared thermographic camera
test, we found that Lashevan’s significant cooling effect lowers scrotum
temperature by 2 to 3℃ lower than other underwear
Lashevan’s fabric is intricately cross-stitched together using Tencel
fibres derived from natural eucalyptus leaves. This 100% natural material has
natural cooling properties and is highly breathable thereby preventing
bacterial growth. This material is also highly flexible allowing it to contour
to your body’s movements no matter how physical the activity.
<div>
The silicon band is also intertwined with patented Deotech threads from
Japan. This deodorizing textile helps your skin maintain a balanced pH, thereby
combating odors that occur when your skin becomes to alkaline or acidic.
Deotech doesn’t mask odor chemically, and therefore combats stench while
leaving in pleasant laundry scents. Deotech also does not lose its deodorizing
properties despite repeated washes.

Asian Cultural Expressions (ACE for short) is  a charity fashion show that is held annually at New York University. It is open to all – students, non-students and parents alike – and since its establishment 32 years ago, it is the largest and longest running charity fashion show held on campus. Yves Saint Laurent, Superdry and Brooks Brothers are among the many designer brands who have worked with us in the past.

Every year, the show donates its proceeds to a cause or organization. Our beneficiary of choice this year is MOCA, the Museum of Chinese in America, an up and coming private museum that opened in 1980 and recently moved to a location near Chinatown. Although they are not a traditional charity, they do a lot to bring awareness to the Asian American community and culture in New York through exhibitions and programs. They actively host cultural events, projects and talks by notable speakers for people of all ages.
We want to help Muse reach its full potential as a fashion show, so please help us raise the money to make this the show you will never forget!
<div style=""text-align: center
<div>Your generous donations will go to catering, stage &amp
column2: production and fees for our headline performer as shown above.

column1: In return, you will get unique perks depending on the amount you donate, from gift bag items, to your name in the program for the show!
column2: >For more information, please check out the perks section.

column1: <span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >*Unfortunately donations will not be tax deductible because NYU is unable to process online donations. If you would like to make a tax deductible donation via check,
column3: >please email melinda.wang@nyu.edu for details about sending us a check. Thank you!

column1:
The Impact

Your contribution to the show means more funding goes to the Museum of Chinese in America, so that they can continue to make Chinese American history accessible to the general public, ranging from scholars to young children, from community members to international tourists. It also means better entertainment, better food and a better fashion show for all of you!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute to the fund, please
column2: >share our campaign through Facebook, Twitter, and even by word of mouth. Every little bit counts!

column1: ","Asian Cultural Expressions (ACE for short) is  a charity fashion show that is held annually at New York University. It is open to all – students, non-students and parents alike – and since its establishment 32 years ago, it is the largest and longest running charity fashion show held on campus. Yves Saint Laurent, Superdry and Brooks Brothers are among the many designer brands who have worked with us in the past.

Every year, the show donates its proceeds to a cause or organization. Our beneficiary of choice this year is MOCA, the Museum of Chinese in America, an up and coming private museum that opened in 1980 and recently moved to a location near Chinatown. Although they are not a traditional charity, they do a lot to bring awareness to the Asian American community and culture in New York through exhibitions and programs. They actively host cultural events, projects and talks by notable speakers for people of all ages.
We want to help Muse reach its full potential as a fashion show, so please help us raise the money to make this the show you will never forget!
What We Need & What You Get*
Your generous donations will go to catering, stage & production and fees for our headline performer as shown above.
In return, you will get unique perks depending on the amount you donate, from gift bag items, to your name in the program for the show! For more information, please check out the perks section.

*Unfortunately donations will not be tax deductible because NYU is unable to process online donations. If you would like to make a tax deductible donation via check, please email melinda.wang@nyu.edu for details about sending us a check. Thank you!

The Impact Your contribution to the show means more funding goes to the Museum of Chinese in America, so that they can continue to make Chinese American history accessible to the general public, ranging from scholars to young children, from community members to international tourists. It also means better entertainment, better food and a better fashion show for all of you!
Other Ways You Can Help Even if you can't contribute to the fund, please share our campaign through Facebook, Twitter, and even by word of mouth. Every little bit counts!",4.0,0,"2 Campaigns

The Intro

'ARE YOU WHEEL?' is an ambitious project that aims to transform the multi-purpose and sustainable kitchen device R2B2 into a market ready product whilst involving your skills and ideas in the design process. Our dream is to make kitchen and household devices more sustainable, more environmentally-friendly and more independent from costly energy sources giving us a greener, less cluttered world.
The Story

Every task in the kitchen has its own associated appliance - grinding coffee, chopping herbs, mixing drinks - which means that as products break down, give up or simply go out of fashion then our electronic waste mountain grows ever higher.

With a desire to counteract this trend, Christoph Thetard concentrated on the design and production of sustainable appliances for his final year project at the Bauhaus University in Weimar, Germany. His mission was not to make electronic devices more 'environmentally friendly' but to eradicate the electronic element entirely.
 
R2B2 stands for a new generation of multifunctional, sustainable kitchen devices. Containing kitchen utensils, a coffee grinder and a hand blender the machine is built from easy to maintain, hard-wearing materials. It is highly functional yet due to its simple construction it can easily be dismantled, cleaned and serviced. The machine's aesthetic is simple, natural and timeless. Most importantly it couldn't be easier to use
column2:
chopping herbs, grating cheese or mixing cocktails can all be accomplished with a just a few pedal kicks.
 
The heart of the machine is a manually-powered flywheel which not only drives the appliances but also acts as an energy storage device.  
 
The coffee grinder functions as both a mill and storage for the beans. It features a porcelain mill and two glass containers
column3: a 300g-capacity storage unit for the beans and storage for the ground coffee.

column1:
The mixer is a multi-functional item and aims to do as many jobs as possible using the least number of parts. The interchangeable utensils include knife blades, a whisk and different adapters for slicing, blending and chopping.

The hand blender has a number of interchangeable heads ranging from a cappuccino creamer to an egg beater, an ice-crusher to a vegetable mixer.  
 
'ARE YOU WHEEL?' is a both a marketing tool and a forum. We want to develop a ready-to-market machine with standard attachments included whilst at the same time opening up the process to the public, encouraging them to join us with their own ideas and suggestions. We want to harness the power of the crowd and let people's

column1:
The Impact

Our dream is to revolutionise the way we think about kitchen and other household devices, making them more sustainable, environmentally friendly and ultimately independent from electricity - worldwide!

R2B2 will help to reduce greenhouse gas emission by its characteristics in many ways:
• Electricity will be avoided totally
• No electrical waste will be produced
• Reducing CO2 emmission due local production

R2B2 will be environmental friendly and sustainable in usage, production, packaging and distribution.
We will also implement a transparent system that allows our customers to comprehend their savings in CO2 before buying and while using our product. Additional a crowdsourcing and customization approach ensures that only attachments are produced which are demanded by the costumers.

<div>
Common Problems Solved

Getting your baby warm, dry and fully bundled after each bath may sound easy but all parents know – it's more like mission impossible.  We worry that we'll drop our slippery baby as we fumble with the towel.  We fret that they'll catch a cold because one side of the towel is too short to cover them.  No matter what, it's a feat not to get drenched!
3 innovative details come together in our towel design to resolve some of the most common problems and concerns that other apron- and baby-towels face today:
<div>
✗   Velcro straps can catch on hair or ruin clothes in the dryer
✗   Bottom or top hood placement makes it difficult to hold &
✗   Multi-tasking towels are either too cheaply made or way too pricey!
✗   Hood placement at the bottom of the apron towel or behind the neck makes                it hard to securely hold and bundle the baby with one hand while reaching for              the hood.
<div>
Why We Need Your Help!
Although Otteroo launched just 2 years ago, we have grown exponentially! We have our enthusiastically buzzed-about
column4: utm_campaign=Indiegogo%20Cradling%20Towel"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Otteroo infant neck floatie and it's been a success but we're not stopping there!  We are always striving to create ingenious baby bath- and development-promoting products.  Right now, we need your help and support to make our new innovation a reality.

column1: At Otteroo, the moms, soon-to-be moms, aunties and our head honcho PANK (Professional Aunt No Kids) have been brainstorming, talking to all our mommy friends and working hard on design details to develop a towel that would make bath time – well, Easy Peasy and Fun.

INTRODUCING THE OTTEROO EASY PEASY CRADLING TOWEL!  In order to launch it into the marketplace, we need to have enough pre-sales and support from you so that we can raise the funds ($12,000) to produce the towels.
Obsession Over Design Details
KEY DESIGN POINT ONE: Patent-Pending One-Hand Release Buckle
This unique patent-pending buckle keeps the towel firmly in place around the mommy's neck until it's time to snap it off with just one hand.

An extra layer of cotton fabric covers the retractable buckle straps to make it comfortable for you and the baby. Unlike Velcro closures, it doesn't snag onto other clothes in the wash or get tangled in hair.
KEY DESIGN POINT TWO: Hood on the Side

The side placed hood design allows moms to cradle the baby in a natural position while allowing you to hold the baby, snap off the apron buckle and bundle the baby all with the other free hand. The side placement also accommodates the growth of the baby for a longer time as it allows for the full diagonal length of the towel (45 inches) to be used without it being curtailed by the neck straps.
KEY DESIGN POINT THREE: Absorbent 100% Pure Cotton

Made of luxuriously soft yet absorbent 100% cotton terry velour, we went further to ensure comfort by adding an extra inner lining inside the hood to cover the embroidery so it does not irritate the baby's sensitive skin. An additional
column2: >layer of fabric also covers the retractable straps

column1: The towel is cut wide at 32 x 32 inches to generously cover the growing baby and also keep you dry from all the splashing and wiggling.
Drying, bundling and cuddling your baby after each bath can be Easy Peasy and oh so fun now.
Our Journey to the Perfect Baby Towel
<div><span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
What started off as an idea became our newest obsession.  We longed to create THE perfect towel that parents needed and wanted for their baby's bath times without any of the hassles.
KEY POINT #1

Our first challenge was to discover the easiest way to put the apron towel on, and then take it off after the bath, without having to fumble. We immediately nixed Velcro, knowing that it feels very rough on the baby's soft skin and even rougher on mom's hair and other fabrics in the dryer.
First we tried a button design, but it was clumsy and hard to take off with one hand...
Next, we tried an eye-hook closure. However, it was too hard to open and close with just one hand – a necessity when you are holding your baby in your other arm.

We finally chose to go with a classic snap-release buckle system BUT, we weren't happy with the harder-to-push or unreliably weak buckles that existed out there. We looked all around for quite some time and finally found a one-handed release buckle that we truly loved.

KEY POINT #2

Then, we were back to the drawing board to work on our ideal

column2: >We first tried an Otteroo-blue cotton fabric with yellow lining, but discovered that the color faded with frequent washing and the idea of color coming out didn't seem very healthy for the baby's skin. We decided to go with pure, clean white.

column1: For the fabric material, we selected a luxurious, 100% cotton terry velour fabric that was plush and soft without forgoing on the absorbency and drying rate.  We thought about regular old terry cotton but we thought it was too thin and not comfy enough, and thick cotton velour on its own took a long time to dry.

KEY POINT #3

Where to place the hood was a big decision for us.  We realized that if we kept the hood vertical to the apron buckle side, it would limit the length of the baby that this towel can bundle.  It also makes it harder to get the baby into a cradling position.  

Placement on the side corner resolved these issues.

KEY POINT #4

Finally, we went through multiple drawings of getting our mascot OTTO's face and paws just right.
Our first design had a larger, kid-sized hood and sewn on paws that came off easily.
With embroidered paws just above the orange border, we finally had our spectacular EASY PEASY CRADLING TOWEL.  Hooray!
Timeline

After re-reviewing, testing, tweaking and re-testing our samples, we are excited to finally have the perfect towel that meet our highest standards!  We are ready to push the ""go"" button on the production as soon as we achieve our campaign goal of $12,000.
<div>

Depending on how quickly the goal is reached, we can have the towels ready for shipment by earliest May 15th and latest May 30th. We will notify you with the final ETA date as soon as we go into production.
But... Life Happens
We expect no delays but as with life, things just happen. Storms, custom delays, hiccups and otto-riffic shark attacks...
In these cases, we promise that we will let you know as soon as we know. We want to make sure that you continue to stay confident in your support of Otteroo the entire way through!

Common Problems Solved

Getting your baby warm, dry and fully bundled after each bath may sound easy but all parents know – it's more like mission impossible.  We worry that we'll drop our slippery baby as we fumble with the towel.  We fret that they'll catch a cold because one side of the towel is too short to cover them.  No matter what, it's a feat not to get drenched!
3 innovative details come together in our towel design to resolve some of the most common problems and concerns that other apron- and baby-towels face today:
✗   Velcro straps can catch on hair or ruin clothes in the dryer
✗   Bottom or top hood placement makes it difficult to hold & wrap the baby
✗   Multi-tasking towels are either too cheaply made or way too pricey!
✗   Hood placement at the bottom of the apron towel or behind the neck makes                it hard to securely hold and bundle the baby with one hand while reaching for              the hood.
Why We Need Your Help!

Although Otteroo launched just 2 years ago, we have grown exponentially! We have our enthusiastically buzzed-about Otteroo infant neck floatie and it's been a success but we're not stopping there!  We are always striving to create ingenious baby bath- and development-promoting products.  Right now, we need your help and support to make our new innovation a reality.

At Otteroo, the moms, soon-to-be moms, aunties and our head honcho PANK (Professional Aunt No Kids) have been brainstorming, talking to all our mommy friends and working hard on design details to develop a towel that would make bath time – well, Easy Peasy and Fun.

INTRODUCING THE OTTEROO EASY PEASY CRADLING TOWEL!  In order to launch it into the marketplace, we need to have enough pre-sales and support from you so that we can raise the funds ($12,000) to produce the towels.
Obsession Over Design Details
KEY DESIGN POINT ONE: Patent-Pending One-Hand Release Buckle
This unique patent-pending buckle keeps the towel firmly in place around the mommy's neck until it's time to snap it off with just one hand.

An extra layer of cotton fabric covers the retractable buckle straps to make it comfortable for you and the baby. Unlike Velcro closures, it doesn't snag onto other clothes in the wash or get tangled in hair.
KEY DESIGN POINT TWO: Hood on the Side

The side placed hood design allows moms to cradle the baby in a natural position while allowing you to hold the baby, snap off the apron buckle and bundle the baby all with the other free hand. The side placement also accommodates the growth of the baby for a longer time as it allows for the full diagonal length of the towel (45 inches) to be used without it being curtailed by the neck straps.
KEY DESIGN POINT THREE: Absorbent 100% Pure Cotton

Made of luxuriously soft yet absorbent 100% cotton terry velour, we went further to ensure comfort by adding an extra inner lining inside the hood to cover the embroidery so it does not irritate the baby's sensitive skin. An additional layer of fabric also covers the retractable straps of the buckle to ensure all-around cuddliness.
The towel is cut wide at 32 x 32 inches to generously cover the growing baby and also keep you dry from all the splashing and wiggling.
Drying, bundling and cuddling your baby after each bath can be Easy Peasy and oh so fun now.
Our Journey to the Perfect Baby Towel
What started off as an idea became our newest obsession.  We longed to create THE perfect towel that parents needed and wanted for their baby's bath times without any of the hassles.
KEY POINT #1

Our first challenge was to discover the easiest way to put the apron towel on, and then take it off after the bath, without having to fumble. We immediately nixed Velcro, knowing that it feels very rough on the baby's soft skin and even rougher on mom's hair and other fabrics in the dryer.
First we tried a button design, but it was clumsy and hard to take off with one hand...
Next, we tried an eye-hook closure. However, it was too hard to open and close with just one hand – a necessity when you are holding your baby in your other arm.

We finally chose to go with a classic snap-release buckle system BUT, we weren't happy with the harder-to-push or unreliably weak buckles that existed out there. We looked all around for quite some time and finally found a one-handed release buckle that we truly loved.
KEY POINT #2Then, we were back to the drawing board to work on our ideal design.

We first tried an Otteroo-blue cotton fabric with yellow lining, but discovered that the color faded with frequent washing and the idea of color coming out didn't seem very healthy for the baby's skin. We decided to go with pure, clean white.

For the fabric material, we selected a luxurious, 100% cotton terry velour fabric that was plush and soft without forgoing on the absorbency and drying rate.  We thought about regular old terry cotton but we thought it was too thin and not comfy enough, and thick cotton velour on its own took a long time to dry.

KEY POINT #3Where to place the hood was a big decision for us.  We realized that if we kept the hood vertical to the apron buckle side, it would limit the length of the baby that this towel can bundle.  It also makes it harder to get the baby into a cradling position.  Placement on the side corner resolved these issues.
KEY POINT #4Finally, we went through multiple drawings of getting our mascot OTTO's face and paws just right.
Our first design had a larger, kid-sized hood and sewn on paws that came off easily.
With embroidered paws just above the orange border, we finally had our spectacular EASY PEASY CRADLING TOWEL.  Hooray!

Introduction
Helen is smart fashion bracelet that keeps you notified of important daily matters.

It is fashion-oriented. Helen's design is focused on traditional form of fashion without 'techie' components such as LED or screen. Helen's strap-changeable mechanism allows you to easily switch to  various straps that diversify your fashion aesthetic.

It is designed to prioritize what you encounter on a daily basis through Helen's easy-to-use, yet smart, notification functions. The setting can be done within a minute without any technical knowledge. You get notified on important notifications only from your valuable people.
Stay simple.
Lifestyle

column1: Fashion
<h3><span style=""font-weight: normal

""We don't wear the same accessories every day. 
  We diversify our fashion and style in accord with trends, moods, and occasions.""
Yes, Helen is strap-changeable for your fashion uniqueness. Our strap-changing mechanism is designed to be operable by anyone and can be complete within 20 seconds.
1. Turn the tip of the H to the right about halfway along the body.
2. Pull the strap upward.
3. Stick the new strap into the hole and repeat (1).

You can easily switch to a different strap style through such a simple operation. Whether you are at work, at a party, or on a date, you can variate fashion aesthetic with  different straps. We also plan to collaborate with fashion brands and designers. Don't forget to check our website for more information!
<h3><span style=""font-weight: normal
""Design your own. Spread your design. And be unique.""

Our custom strap platform - Project Café - is a place for custom straps. Whether a designer or not, you can design your own straps, set sales targets, and sell them to other Helen users. Not only are you given with various colors and patterns to finalize design, but also you are always welcome to upload your self-designed patterns.
Not willing to design? Don't worry. You can purchase various straps with different colors and designs offered in the Café.

Call you back after 4pm."", to the caller.

The 12-hour watch is also based on a Swiss Made movement. This is, in particular, an automatic (self-winding) movement with 26 jewels and date function on top of hours, minutes and seconds. The very same movement is used by some models by: Maurice Lacroix, TAG Heuer , Christopher Ward, Bulgari, Oris and Alpina.

#YOURTIME is made of stainless steel (316L grade), it has a Diamond Like Carbon (DLC) coating treatment for achieving a super resistant black matte finish, it showcases the most resistant crystal made of Sapphire and just to make sure every moment is viable the watch is also resistant to water (10atm/100m).

The 38mm case has a sophisticated and elegant silhouette yet it is boldly shaped to resist extreme activities. The custom made bracelet subtly reminds the brand logo which is also visible on: dial, crown, back case and buckle.
column91:

The 24-hour variant of #YOURTIME shows two times 12 hours within the dial (double-XII system). The anti-meridian (am) hours are on the left hand side and the post-meridian (pm) hours are on the right hand side. The zenith for the sun is reached at 12:00 and is at the top of the dial as indicated by the applied silver sun icon.

column1: The Award

We are pleased to announce that #YOURTIME Luxury Timepiece have been awarded the Silver A' Design Award in the category of Jewelry, Eyewear and Watch Design by the grand jury panel of the A’ Design Award &
column2: Competition which consists of internationally influential press members, established designers, leading academics and prominent entrepreneurs.

column1: The A' Design Awards are the world’s most influential and largest design awards, presented each year in Italy. It is a great honour for us to receive this prestigious award and we would like to thank all of our friends and partners for their support and help along the way.
This award gives recognition to the excellence of design on the international stage.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px

What are the dimensions of the watch? #YOURTIME watch has a 38mm case diameter and it is 10 mm thick (without glass) – the bracelet is 144 mm long and the case 46mm for a total circumference of 190mm - however we are adding two extra links in the box to reach a total of 210mm.

I have a big wrist. How do I know the watch fits me? The easiest way to figure that out would be to measure your wrist circumference. The watch can fit wrists up to 190mm with the basic configuration. However, if your wrist is bigger we have added two extra links that can get the total circumference to about 210mm and if you need more you can write to info@toddandmarlon.com. Conversely if your wrist is smaller you can easily remove some links at the nearest watch store.

Does the black color come off? The watch is DLC (diamond like carbon) coated – this is the best and most durable treatment used only by real luxury watch manufacturers. For reference this treatment is superior to the most commonly used standard PVD (Physical Vapor Deposition) treatment.

Are shipment and duty/taxes included? Your watch-pledge includes shipment anywhere in the world locations served by our logistic partner but it does NOT include your local import duties and taxes if you live outside the US. Unfortunately due to the complexity of the different duty/tax regimes across the world we cannot manage that cost.
More questions? If you have more question, you can always ask the project creator directly or feel free to e-mail to info@toddandmarlon.com.
<span style=""font-size: 24px
With any project, there are always risks associated with manufacturers not being able to deliver products on time, or design decisions causing the project to be delayed or halted all together.
Todd &
column2: Marlon have minimized these risks by funding prototype production hence ensure that all design elements are finalized and manufacturers are ready to craft your timepiece. Please note that while design has been finalized, the supply of watch hands is not yet secured hence we might see slightly different hands in the final execution.

column1: They have also instructed the manufacturers to start production (you might have noticed the images of boxes production) and take the funding risk from their side so to minimize the time risk on your side. This also means that watches will be manufactured even if the campaign is not successful.
Finally, Todd &
column2: Marlon work with a professional fulfillment company for deliveries. However, local customs can hamper a good delivery experience, which is out of our control. They will try to prevent custom problems via ensuring the packages have the right documentation in place.

column1: <div>
","Todd & Marlon is a luxury watch brand
established in New York in 2015. The company ultimate mission is to accompany
people with an Entrepreneurial Spirit in their daily journey so to make it
easier and more enjoyable.
Their watch collection named #YOURTIME, in fact,
has been inspired by the entrepreneurial spirits to sustain entrepreneurs. In this
context Todd & Marlon work very closely with the non-profit organization
Spark Microgrants to enable entrepreneurs in rural areas.

Todd & Marlon watches are designed by Italians and crafted by Swiss people. The first collection includes two models both Swiss Made: a traditional 12-hour watch with an Automatic movement and more peculiar 24-hour watch with a quartz movement.

#YOURTIME watch collection won the 2016 A’ Design Award by the grand jury panel which consists of internationally influential press members, established designers, leading academics and prominent entrepreneurs.

The TWO collections are available in four colors combinations: all black, black and deep blue, black and fiery red, black and rose pink. Each of them has his own name and specific character! You can either choose one of them or get the four to use in different occasions in your life. We have recently decided to expand the collection with the more traditional 12-hour Automatic watch which will be available in the very same 4 color combinations. Here below the all black version (hands placeholders only). More images will be shared once new prototypes are ready.Todd & Marlon have selected a Swiss Made movement because of the quality and Quartz for its reliability and accuracy. The 12-hour watch is also based on a Swiss Made movement. This is, in particular, an automatic (self-winding) movement with 26 jewels and date function on top of hours, minutes and seconds. The very same movement is used by some models by: Maurice Lacroix, TAG Heuer , Christopher Ward, Bulgari, Oris and Alpina.#YOURTIME is made of stainless steel (316L grade), it has a Diamond Like Carbon (DLC) coating treatment for achieving a super resistant black matte finish, it showcases the most resistant crystal made of Sapphire and just to make sure every moment is viable the watch is also resistant to water (10atm/100m).The 38mm case has a sophisticated and elegant silhouette yet it is boldly shaped to resist extreme activities. The custom made bracelet subtly reminds the brand logo which is also visible on: dial, crown, back case and buckle.The 24-hour variant of #YOURTIME shows two times 12 hours within the dial (double-XII system). The anti-meridian (am) hours are on the left hand side and the post-meridian (pm) hours are on the right hand side. The zenith for the sun is reached at 12:00 and is at the top of the dial as indicated by the applied silver sun icon.The 12-hour Automatic dial is built on two levels with circular brushing – silver half-hour marks are applied and numbers are double printed.
The hands in both models have a red insert with SuperLuminova - one of the best material (if not the best) to give luminescence at night.
In order to keep the first collection memorable we are planning to number the first 300 watches in the case back.Watches produced after the first 300 will not be numbered.

Details matter! we have carefully hidden the connections between the links in the bracelet. Few links toward the closure have still visible connections and those are screws (not simple pins) to ensure best performances and to allow adjustment of the bracelet length.

Todd & Marlon and Spark MicroGrants non-profit organization focused on enabling community-driven entrepreneurial projects, proudly announced a collaboration aimed at helping entrepreneurs where they need the most.    Todd & Marlon will donate a percentage of the profit to Spark MicroGrant. The more watches we sell the more entrepreneurs we will help!!!
PLAY

Shipping is complimentary – entirely offered by Todd & Marlon for any destination served by our logistic partner. However, international customers are responsible for taxes and duties charged by their respective countries.
You might visit http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-and-tax-calculation/ to estimate your duty charges (we ship from US).
NY State Customers: please add 8.875% to your pledge account for NY State Sales Taxes.

The below schedule is as much realistic as possible. Manufacturers confirmed the schedule is realistic and contains slack to cover the normal, inevitable small delays. If Todd & Marlon can do it quicker, they will! In case something unforeseen that influences the schedule happens they will communicate openly about it.
Important to note that the production has already started (boxes are already produced).

column1: Todd & Marlon - You Choose, #YOURTIME, Don't Inherit

The Award

We are pleased to announce that #YOURTIME Luxury Timepiece have been awarded the Silver A' Design Award in the category of Jewelry, Eyewear and Watch Design by the grand jury panel of the A’ Design Award & Competition which consists of internationally influential press members, established designers, leading academics and prominent entrepreneurs.

The A' Design Awards are the world’s most influential and largest design awards, presented each year in Italy. It is a great honour for us to receive this prestigious award and we would like to thank all of our friends and partners for their support and help along the way.
This award gives recognition to the excellence of design on the international stage.

What are the dimensions of the watch? #YOURTIME watch has a 38mm case diameter and it is 10 mm thick (without glass) – the bracelet is 144 mm long and the case 46mm for a total circumference of 190mm - however we are adding two extra links in the box to reach a total of 210mm.

I have a big wrist. How do I know the watch fits me? The easiest way to figure that out would be to measure your wrist circumference. The watch can fit wrists up to 190mm with the basic configuration. However, if your wrist is bigger we have added two extra links that can get the total circumference to about 210mm and if you need more you can write to info@toddandmarlon.com. Conversely if your wrist is smaller you can easily remove some links at the nearest watch store.

Does the black color come off? The watch is DLC (diamond like carbon) coated – this is the best and most durable treatment used only by real luxury watch manufacturers. For reference this treatment is superior to the most commonly used standard PVD (Physical Vapor Deposition) treatment.

Are shipment and duty/taxes included? Your watch-pledge includes shipment anywhere in the world locations served by our logistic partner but it does NOT include your local import duties and taxes if you live outside the US. Unfortunately due to the complexity of the different duty/tax regimes across the world we cannot manage that cost.
More questions? If you have more question, you can always ask the project creator directly or feel free to e-mail to info@toddandmarlon.com.
Risks and challenges
With any project, there are always risks associated with manufacturers not being able to deliver products on time, or design decisions causing the project to be delayed or halted all together.

Todd & Marlon have minimized these risks by funding prototype production hence ensure that all design elements are finalized and manufacturers are ready to craft your timepiece. Please note that while design has been finalized, the supply of watch hands is not yet secured hence we might see slightly different hands in the final execution.

They have also instructed the manufacturers to start production (you might have noticed the images of boxes production) and take the funding risk from their side so to minimize the time risk on your side. This also means that watches will be manufactured even if the campaign is not successful.

Finally, Todd & Marlon work with a professional fulfillment company for deliveries. However, local customs can hamper a good delivery experience, which is out of our control. They will try to prevent custom problems via ensuring the packages have the right documentation in place.",47.0,0,"2 Campaigns
|","New York, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/award-winning-design-t-m-luxury-watches/pica

0,"

Our Products

We have created an origami-inspired line of transportable products for every kind of individual style, bringing creativity and fashionable expression into the realm of backpacks and tote bags today.
column7:
showinfo=0"">

 

Exclusive, Limited Designs By Industry-Leading Artists

We partnered with industry-leading artists to create designs that each bring their own unique expression and styles of art and design.

We are thrilled to work with Ashley G, who is known for creating abstract and brushstroke designs with sophisticated or monochrome color palettes, and Carolyn Suzuki, who is known for her playful prints that start from pencil sketches. We are also excited to collaborate with Kelly Ventura, who is known for her fresh florals, prints, and hand-painted patterns, using watercolor paints.

Collectively, we created a final pool of over 30 different designs that ranged in styles, colors, and prints, and opened the voting up to the public to select the final 3 - Navy Tidal, Pink Breeze, and Black Swans.

Convertible Backpack

This light-weight, yet durable, backpack is stored in a pouch. Expand it to full-size to carry your stuff whilst on the go. It's great for urban adventures, hikes, the gym, and everyday exploration.
column8:
>

Convertible Tote Bag 

This lined large tote bag is stored in a pouch. Expand it to full-size and get the perfect bag for all your daily and trip essentials. It's great for day trips, shopping, the gym, and kids and baby necessities. The tote also easily attaches to luggage to serve as a carry-on.
column9:
>

 

Essentials Pouch Set

These lined pouches are a must for organizing things in your backpack, tote bag, and any other bag. They're great for storing makeup, wallets, hair accessories, mom emergency kits, and more.
column10:
>

 

Giving Back: 1% For Education 

We believe in the importance of giving back. Today, nearly 800 million people are illiterate, and two-thirds of that statistic are women and girls. Studies have shown that literacy is critical to eradicating poverty, improve infant mortality rates, address gender inequality, and create sustainable development. So for every sale, we will donate 1% of profits to support global children's literacy and girls' education.

Please note that per Kickstarter guidelines, we cannot use this crowdfunding project to raise funds for charity. We are committed to giving back to support global literacy and will notify our backer community.

Thank You For Your Support! 

We appreciate your support in helping make these products a reality. The artists have completed their designs, and we have prototypes of each product. With your monetary support, we’ll be able to get these into products into production and bring more beauty and style to travel goods.

We’d also appreciate your help in sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Please post the campaign URL on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of Kaleido Concepts, the smoother our launch period will go.

Your support means so much to us! We can’t wait to get these products to you.

Risks and Challenges

We have many years of experience developing and manufacturing high-quality products. We are confident in the people we’re working with to bring these products to life and into your hands, and therefore our ability to deliver the products to you when we say we will. 
 
However, sometimes despite our best efforts, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time, or products can get stuck in customs or ports. 
 
Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. 

We'll do our best and update you frequently about our progress. If there are any challenges along the way, we'll let you know!

Kaleido Website

Products are now available at www.kaleidoconcepts.com

""Frollein Tongtong"" ist Synonym für einen in Berlin weit verbreiteten Titel des ""frechen Mädchens von Nebenan"".
""Frollein Tongtong"" is the synonymously Name for the ""cheeky Girl next Door"".
The Idea
""Frollein Tongtong"" ist ein Berliner Projekt, das
sich vor geraumer Zeit aus einer kleinen Idee heraus entwickelt hat. Ich
bekam gerade unser zweites Baby, und war auf der Suche nach bequemer
Babykleidung, möglichst auf ökologischer Basis, die nicht einschneidet
wenn man das Baby im Tragetuch oder in der Tragehilfe transportiert.
Ausserdem sollte sie länger tragbar sein, und viel Platz zum Strampeln
lassen.

""Frollein Tongtong"" is a Berlin Project that was born out of an idea. I just gave birth to our second Baby, and i was searching for comfortable Baby Fashion, preferebly on ecologically Base, that had to fit perfectly when you carry the baby in a babysling. Besides it should be wearable, and give place to move inside.

Ich wollte das ganze mit dem Thema Upcycling verbinden. Upcycling bedeutet, dass zum Großteil getragene und nicht mehr benötigte Stoffe zum Einsatz kommen, diese werden zu anderen Kleidungsstücken verarbeitet, und dürfen somit noch einen zweiten Frühling erleben. Man kann Kleidung nicht neu erfinden, aber man kann sie
verändern. Ich wollte Babyklamotten schaffen die mitwachsen, und günstig
sind. Daraus entwickelten sich die Mitwachshosen: sie sind aufgrund
ihrer Bündchen über mindestens drei Kleidergrößen tragbar, und optisch
noch dazu ein absoluter Knaller. Darüber hinaus fertige ich Röcke an,
Tücher, kleine Taschen, und andere Bekleidungsstück für
Mini-Erdenbürger.

I wanted to connect it all with Upcycling, which means that a large part of the material you´re using is already used. These 2nd Hand Textiles get used to be born into new Baby or Children´s Clothing. You can´t invent Pants again, but you can change them. I wantetd to create Babyclothing which grows with every Babymonth, and also is payable. On the basis of the welts i createt the expandable Pants: the welts are foldable, so these pants are wearable for a long time, most of them more than 3 dress sizes.
Ich möchte mich hauptberuflich mit der Idee befassen, Baby- und Kinderkleidung zu schaffen die
<ul>
• bequem für das Baby ist
• dem Geldbeutel nicht weh tut
• die Resourcen spart
• die der Umwelt nicht schmerzt.

Für dieses Projekt benötige ich Hilfe in Form von Spenden.

I wanna deal full time with the idea of creating Baby and Children´s Clothing which is
• comfortable for the Baby
• doesn´t hurt Mom´s Wallet
• save Resources
• doesn´t injure the Environment
For this Project I´ll need Help in Form of Donations.
Was wir brauchen
What we need
Um dieses Projekt zu verwirklichen benötige ich Startkapital, das ich aus meinen eigenen Mittel momentan nicht erbringen kann.

Arbeitsmaterialien, zum Beispiel in Form einer Overlockmaschine. Diese Maschine sorgt dafür dass die Kleidung qualitativ hochwertig verarbeitet ist, die Nähte ordentlich verschlossen sind und sich nicht auftrennen. Zur Zeit arbeite ich mit einer 30 Jahre alten Gritzner 535 Nähmaschine, die über diese Funktion in leicht veränderter, aber nicht in formvollendeter Version verfügt.

Des weiteren benötige ich unter anderem Bündchenstoffe:                                         diese umklappbaren Bündchen verleihen den einzelnen Teilen ihre lange Tragbarkeit über mehrere Kleidergrößen, und ersparen den Mamis einen monatlichen Neukauf.
Ich möchte dieses Projekt zu einem Kleinunternehmen aufbauen das sich
voller Stolz präsentieren kann. Hierfür benötige ich eine Website, die
einen kleine Onlineshop beherbergt.
We will need start-up capital to realize this Project, which i can´t adduce out of my own resources.

Working Material, for example in Form of a Overlockmachine. This Machine makes a high-quality Seam. It locks the Seam and makes sure that the Stitches don´t open anymore. I´m working with a 30 Years olf Gritzner 535, which doesn´t have this Function in the way i would need it.
I also need welt textiles: these foldable welts lend these uniques their durable existence through differend dress sizes, which save Mothers from a monthly purchase.
I want to build this Project into a small business, so it can present itself with full pride. For that i´ll need a Website which includes a small Onlineshop.
Die Auswirkung
The Effect

Ich bin Tag und Nacht mit Leidenschaft bei ""Frollein Tongtong"" am Werk, und überlege ständig was zu verbessern ist, wo es noch hakt, suche Lösungen und versuche sie umzusetzen. Finanziell bin ich nun an meine Grenzen gestoßen, und kann mich allein nicht erweitern. Ich möchte ""Frollein Tongtong"" zu einem kleinen Label machen, das gern gekauft und getragen wird, und wieder ein bisschen Vertrauen in den Slogan  ""Made in Germany"" gewinnen lässt.

I´m Night and Day with all my Heart and Passion on ""Frollein Tongtong"", and always think about what to improve, i search for Solutions and try to implement them. I´m at my financial limits now, i can´t expand on my own. I want ""Frollein Tongtong"" transform into a Label which People love to by and Baby´s love to wear, and bring back the Trust into ""Made in Germany"".
Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Other Ways to help

Ich freue mich natürlich auch sehr über Sachspenden :).
Aber falls gerade niemand eine Overlockmaschine zu Verschenken hat, tut es auch das Verlinken meiner Kampagne. Ich danke jedem einzelnen von Euch für das Lesen, und überlegen ob und wie er das Projekt unterstützen kann.

I´m always happy about all kind of donations :).
But if no one having a Overlockmachine to giveaway, you also help me with sharing the Link to my Campaign. I´m thanking every single one of you for reading, and thinking about if and how he/she can support this Project!

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div data-id=""13979623""><figure style=""margin: 0px

Our Indiegogo campaign is over, but you can still get your own Findster Duo at www.getfindster.com !
 

Even the most well-behaved furry friend will jump at the chance to explore the unknown when the opportunity comes. It’s like magic, actually... just a moment of distraction, the slightest opportunity and BAM! – they’re nowhere to be seen!

Findster Duo is the next generation of pet tracking devices, giving your escape artists the freedom they desire while assuring your pet peace of mind!
column4: >
column8:
'/>

Findster Duo is pet locator that uses high-precision GPS to track the location of your pet in real-time. Using the Findster App, you can check your pet's position on the map and you’ll know exactly where to look!
column12:
'/>

Our App includes a built-in Radar, which shows the distance from your pet and guides you right to its location. Finding your best buddy becomes so easy that it almost feels like cheating at hide and seek!
column13:
>

So now you know that you’ll be able to find Mr. Tail-wagger if he decides to go on one of his little solo expeditions… but how can you be sure that he isn’t chasing the ducks down near the lake? Using GPS fences, that’s how! They’re easy to create and extremely effective. There are two types: Security Zones (where you want your pet to stay) and Danger Zones (where you want your pet to avoid!). Simple.
column14:
>

If either type of fence is breached you are immediately alerted, giving you time to react. This way you can relax, because you know what your furry friend is up to! With Findster Duo, you’ll never be caught off guard again.
column15:
>

There’s also another type of GPS fence, specifically designed for W-A-L-K-S: the Virtual Leash. The Virtual Leash centers on your position and moves with you. if you’re walking your pet without a leash but he strays too far from your defined range, you receive an immediate notification. Time to call him closer!
column16:
>

Ever come home after a satisfying walk with your four-legged companion and want to track your path? With Findster Duo you can revisit your walks and past locations, and even analyze your performance in detail – right to the number of steps and paws you both walked!
column17:
>

But that’s not all - Findster Duo is also a pet activity tracker that provides you with key data and information, helping you assure that your pets’ needs are met. Maybe she’s been resting all day and needs some extra exercise, or maybe seems more tired than usual and could use some rest. Either way, Findster Duo will let you know with timely alerts on your smartphone.
column18:
>

And because fun should always be a part of life, Challenges and Leaderboards are at your disposal! If you’ve always bragged about your Labrador being the fastest dog in the state of Texas, or you’re just curious about how he performs compared with other Labs, this is your chance to find out!
column19:
>

Findster Duo was designed to make keeping up with your pets' life as practical as possible - even when you’re not present. Using the Findster App, you can share access to your pet with your family and friends and monitor his safety from anywhere. You can also use this feature to make sure your Pet Walker is not just talking the talk, but actually walking the walk! Sharing is caring, and it’s never been easier.
column20:
>

Have more than one pet? No problem - with Findster Duo you can monitor up to 5 pets at the same time using extra Findster modules. So whether you just really love dogs or you walk them for a living, you can ensure that all of them are safe. No one gets left behind!
column21:
>

Knowing where your pet is and what she’s doing is great - but we're going beyond that. Findster Duo is the first product that rewards you for keeping your pet healthy.

Findster Duo measures each step and mile she walks, and you can access discounts on her favourite food by reaching milestones. Not only does your dog benefit from all her regular exercise, but your wallet does as well!

You can also get reminders when your pet’s food is running out, so you never forget when it is time to refill.
column22:
>

Findster Duo does not require cell coverage / SIM Card to work – the system is independent of Telcos. This means that there are no geographical barriers! This is why you can use it anytime and anywhere, without restrictions!

This also makes Findster Duo the first GPS pet tracker without monthly fees! Why should you keep paying for something you’ve already bought? We feel that this mindset is outdated, and Findster Duo was born out of our desire to provide an alternative. No extra payments or fees whatsoever – pay once, use it forever!
column23:
>

 
Our App will be available for iOS and Android, and we're curently using each platform’s native maps (Google Maps on Android, Apple Maps on iOS). They’ll be available offline, so that you can use the system even if you’re completely off-the-grid!

If we reach $200,000 in funding, we’ll be adding a new map type that highlights green zones! The difference between the current maps and the new one is visible: while the native maps focus on urban environments, the Green Zones map highlights natural landscapes like parks and other open areas.

This new map type will also be available offline, and the entire planet will be represented. It will be particularly useful in urban areas - you’ll easily know what is the closest green space regarding your current location and it will let you discover new places to explore with your buddy!
column24: >
column25: >(Resized gif - view original)
column26:
>

There are two physical modules, one for your furry friend (Pet module) and another for you (Guardian module). They are wirelessly connected to each other, and all you need to make them work is the Findster App!

Here is a short demo video where you can actually see Findster Duo's main functionalities in action:
column28:
wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">

The modules are rechargeable (a USB charger is included), lightweight and highly precise. Most importantly, the Pet modules are sturdy enough to accompany your best friends on the craziest of adventures!
column29: >

column2: >(Resized gif - view original)
column3:
>

You may be asking yourself, “Why are two modules needed”? At the core of Findster Duo is the MAZE technology. Developed entirely by our team, it allows both modules to communicate wirelessly in a range of up to 2 miles (3.2 km), eliminating the need for a cellular connection to send the GPS coordinates - effectively removing the need for monthly fees!
column4:
>

The Pet module can be attached to any collar using the included Velcro strap. This method of attachment provides versatility without sacrificing security.

As for the Guardian module, you can carry it in your pocket and forget that it exists. It's as simple as that!
column6:
>

The original Findster system first came about in 2014. We put our idea to the test by creating a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo. It was a success, backed by over 1200 supporters from all over the world (over 50 countries!). We completed the system’s development, mass produced it and delivered it.
column7:
wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">

Since then, we’ve been communicating closely with our backers, listening to their experiences and using their insights in order to create a new and upgraded version of the Findster GPS pet tracking device. One that doesn't just focus on location - but goes beyond that.

That's actually the reason behind Findster Duo's name: using the system, you track your pets' whereabouts using GPS and monitor their wellness through their activity levels. It's a 2-in-1 winning combo! Plus it is actually the second edition of the Findster system, which fits nicely as well.

Other notable improvements regarding the first version of the system include:

column1: <li>
Higher GPS precision at a faster update rate: We redesigned the Hardware configuration to make this possible.
<li>
Longer communication range: with our new Maze protocol and our newly designed antennas, we managed to double the communication range.
<li>
Longer battery life: A larger battery is included, and we developed new battery-saving algorithms.

column2:
>

Much like the Avengers, our team consists of a bunch of superheroes who have united their powers for the greater good. The main difference being that, well, we don't have actual superpowers... But we're passionate about what we do and have the will to make a difference!
column3:
>

Since 2016, Findster is alumni of HAX - the world’s #1 Hardware Startup accelerator! They’ve helped bring over 65 products to market in the last 3 years, so they have a lot of experience with this process. They'll help us with manufacturing, to make sure everything goes smoothly! You can read more about HAX here.

We're also a part of the European Space Agency's Business Incubation Centre (ESA BIC). They provide us with comprehensive technical support, and their knowledge on space technology is helping us improve our system's GPS precision - plus their advanced equipment elevates our testing procedures to a different level. You can read more about ESA here.

So we’ve got a solid base, the blueprints for the improvements and the tools to implement them - now we just need your help to turn our project into a reality!
column4:
> 

 

","Our Indiegogo campaign is over, but you can still get your own Findster Duo at www.getfindster.com ! Even the most well-behaved furry friend will jump at the chance to explore the unknown when the opportunity comes. It’s like magic, actually... just a moment of distraction, the slightest opportunity and BAM! – they’re nowhere to be seen!Findster Duo is the next generation of pet tracking devices, giving your escape artists the freedom they desire while assuring your pet peace of mind!     Findster Duo is pet locator that uses high-precision GPS to track the location of your pet in real-time. Using the Findster App, you can check your pet's position on the map and you’ll know exactly where to look! Our App includes a built-in Radar, which shows the distance from your pet and guides you right to its location. Finding your best buddy becomes so easy that it almost feels like cheating at hide and seek! So now you know that you’ll be able to find Mr. Tail-wagger if he decides to go on one of his little solo expeditions… but how can you be sure that he isn’t chasing the ducks down near the lake? Using GPS fences, that’s how! They’re easy to create and extremely effective. There are two types: Security Zones (where you want your pet to stay) and Danger Zones (where you want your pet to avoid!). Simple. If either type of fence is breached you are immediately alerted, giving you time to react. This way you can relax, because you know what your furry friend is up to! With Findster Duo, you’ll never be caught off guard again. There’s also another type of GPS fence, specifically designed for W-A-L-K-S: the Virtual Leash. The Virtual Leash centers on your position and moves with you. if you’re walking your pet without a leash but he strays too far from your defined range, you receive an immediate notification. Time to call him closer! Ever come home after a satisfying walk with your four-legged companion and want to track your path? With Findster Duo you can revisit your walks and past locations, and even analyze your performance in detail – right to the number of steps and paws you both walked! But that’s not all - Findster Duo is also a pet activity tracker that provides you with key data and information, helping you assure that your pets’ needs are met. Maybe she’s been resting all day and needs some extra exercise, or maybe seems more tired than usual and could use some rest. Either way, Findster Duo will let you know with timely alerts on your smartphone. And because fun should always be a part of life, Challenges and Leaderboards are at your disposal! If you’ve always bragged about your Labrador being the fastest dog in the state of Texas, or you’re just curious about how he performs compared with other Labs, this is your chance to find out! Findster Duo was designed to make keeping up with your pets' life as practical as possible - even when you’re not present. Using the Findster App, you can share access to your pet with your family and friends and monitor his safety from anywhere. You can also use this feature to make sure your Pet Walker is not just talking the talk, but actually walking the walk! Sharing is caring, and it’s never been easier. Have more than one pet? No problem - with Findster Duo you can monitor up to 5 pets at the same time using extra Findster modules. So whether you just really love dogs or you walk them for a living, you can ensure that all of them are safe. No one gets left behind! Knowing where your pet is and what she’s doing is great - but we're going beyond that. Findster Duo is the first product that rewards you for keeping your pet healthy.Findster Duo measures each step and mile she walks, and you can access discounts on her favourite food by reaching milestones. Not only does your dog benefit from all her regular exercise, but your wallet does as well!You can also get reminders when your pet’s food is running out, so you never forget when it is time to refill.Findster Duo does not require cell coverage / SIM Card to work – the system is independent of Telcos. This means that there are no geographical barriers! This is why you can use it anytime and anywhere, without restrictions!This also makes Findster Duo the first GPS pet tracker without monthly fees! Why should you keep paying for something you’ve already bought? We feel that this mindset is outdated, and Findster Duo was born out of our desire to provide an alternative. No extra payments or fees whatsoever – pay once, use it forever! Our App will be available for iOS and Android, and we're curently using each platform’s native maps (Google Maps on Android, Apple Maps on iOS). They’ll be available offline, so that you can use the system even if you’re completely off-the-grid!If we reach $200,000 in funding, we’ll be adding a new map type that highlights green zones! The difference between the current maps and the new one is visible: while the native maps focus on urban environments, the Green Zones map highlights natural landscapes like parks and other open areas.This new map type will also be available offline, and the entire planet will be represented. It will be particularly useful in urban areas - you’ll easily know what is the closest green space regarding your current location and it will let you discover new places to explore with your buddy!(Resized gif - view original)       There are two physical modules, one for your furry friend (Pet module) and another for you (Guardian module). They are wirelessly connected to each other, and all you need to make them work is the Findster App!Here is a short demo video where you can actually see Findster Duo's main functionalities in action:The modules are rechargeable (a USB charger is included), lightweight and highly precise. Most importantly, the Pet modules are sturdy enough to accompany your best friends on the craziest of adventures!

column1: (Resized gif - view original) You may be asking yourself, “Why are two modules needed”? At the core of Findster Duo is the MAZE technology. Developed entirely by our team, it allows both modules to communicate wirelessly in a range of up to 2 miles (3.2 km), eliminating the need for a cellular connection to send the GPS coordinates - effectively removing the need for monthly fees!The Pet module can be attached to any collar using the included Velcro strap. This method of attachment provides versatility without sacrificing security.As for the Guardian module, you can carry it in your pocket and forget that it exists. It's as simple as that!  The original Findster system first came about in 2014. We put our idea to the test by creating a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo. It was a success, backed by over 1200 supporters from all over the world (over 50 countries!). We completed the system’s development, mass produced it and delivered it.Since then, we’ve been communicating closely with our backers, listening to their experiences and using their insights in order to create a new and upgraded version of the Findster GPS pet tracking device. One that doesn't just focus on location - but goes beyond that.That's actually the reason behind Findster Duo's name: using the system, you track your pets' whereabouts using GPS and monitor their wellness through their activity levels. It's a 2-in-1 winning combo! Plus it is actually the second edition of the Findster system, which fits nicely as well.Other notable improvements regarding the first version of the system include:
Higher GPS precision at a faster update rate: We redesigned the Hardware configuration to make this possible.
Longer communication range: with our new Maze protocol and our newly designed antennas, we managed to double the communication range.
Longer battery life: A larger battery is included, and we developed new battery-saving algorithms.

Much like the Avengers, our team consists of a bunch of superheroes who have united their powers for the greater good. The main difference being that, well, we don't have actual superpowers... But we're passionate about what we do and have the will to make a difference! Since 2016, Findster is alumni of HAX - the world’s #1 Hardware Startup accelerator! They’ve helped bring over 65 products to market in the last 3 years, so they have a lot of experience with this process. They'll help us with manufacturing, to make sure everything goes smoothly! You can read more about HAX here.We're also a part of the European Space Agency's Business Incubation Centre (ESA BIC). They provide us with comprehensive technical support, and their knowledge on space technology is helping us improve our system's GPS precision - plus their advanced equipment elevates our testing procedures to a different level. You can read more about ESA here.So we’ve got a solid base, the blueprints for the improvements and the tools to implement them - now we just need your help to turn our project into a reality!",26.0,2,"5 Campaigns
|","San Francisco, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/findster-duo-gps-pet-tracker-without-monthly-fees/pica

Pluviophiles Unite!

We’re the Rhode Island outerwear company with the
will to make a great product here in the US. Five years ago, we introduced the
Cleverhood – a bike-ready rain cape that offers style and performance. Today we
have thousands of customers with a positive rain-or-shine attitude in cities all over the world.
We’re embarking on a new venture that we hope will
create more pluviophiles (rain lovers). Our new line of
Cleverlites are streamlined versions of our flagship Cleverhoods. They are lower-priced
with simpler features but offer a fresh, distinctive style for people on the
move. You can hop on a bike in our rain capes. They also keep your stuff dry.
With our different colors and fabrics, you can meet the rain with a joy that’s
lacking in an umbrella.
Importantly, our new Cleverlites will adhere to the
same level of craftsmanship that has distinguished all our stuff. Our big breakthrough with this line is our collaboration
with experienced garment workers in nearby Fall River.
Our Fall River Collaboration
We’re hoping to raise $15,000 to support the introduction
of our new line of Cleverlites with the help of our new collaborators in Fall
River, MA. Once upon a time, Fall River was one of the textile capitals of the
world. That’s history but today the city is working to re-invent itself. We’re quite excited to be a part of that.
The truth is that families here have been in the
textile business for generations. There is a lot of untapped knowledge in Fall
River. Headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, we’ve embraced the qualities
of our Creative Capital. Our neighbors in Fall River are skilled garment
workers and it’s a big advantage for us to collaborate so closely.
We Aim to Deliver a Win-Win-Win for Everyone
We value local production and high quality. In turn, we intend to offer our customers the value of craftsmanship -- plus style. We’re

offering some big incentives that should help us get production moving.

Get a Cleverlite or two and save 30% or more over the market price.
Our Cleverlites are made with two fabric options and colors (see below):
• Strong, lightweight ripstop
• Sturdy, brushed microfiber
We'll connect to get your color (and size) preference before we ship.
<div>
All Cleverlites offer a distinctive combination of style and performance.
<ul>
• Solid color options
• Easy to don and doff
• Covers backpacks, shopping bags and stuff
• Elastic cinch to adjust the hood and thumb-loops for bike commuters
• Reflective chevrons
• Pack easily into a handy mesh bag (included)
<li>Sizes are Small (under 5'2)
You're ready to go -- rain-or-shine -- with a Cleverlite.
Risks or Challenges?
We’re a family business and are excited to make this line of Cleverlites work. All our incentives and perks are
guaranteed. We appreciate your confidence in us and value your personal support.
We will produce these capes in
Fall River with no short-cuts or comprises. Our fund-raising efforts will
support our further development in production, sourcing and design. Not to
mention, helping to pay the video guys and keeping our Twitter and marketing
channels open and full of good cheer.

Shipping

Perks will ship out within 5-10 business days. Shipping is free for US supporters. Unfortunately, there's a cost for International shipments, which we are able to slightly subsidize. This doesn't account for tariffs or custom duties that some countries have.
One Last Thing
Cleverhoods make good gifts by the
way. So, in case you’re thinking about someone else, please share the news about our campaign. That’s valuable to us. Use the handy Indiegogo share tools

if you like or just ring up your favorite reporter with the hot scoop.

Find us on your favorite social network. We're out there and happy to engage with you.

Glad you asked! The Ryder, TWIG edition, is a signature edition of our already-popular Ryder line, redesigned from the ground up! As the winner of the 2006 and 2014 Mavericks Surf Contest, the 2008 Red Bull Big Wave Africa, and the 2014 Big Wave World Tour Champion, Twiggy is a sportsperson always on the move and we are excited to be able to design a pair of glasses that keep him going in style and comfort.

 The TWIG edition is an exciting blend of non-oil based Italian organic acetate and forest certified bamboo delicately combined to create fusion sunglasses made from 100% organic and recyclable materials.
The end result? A beautifully crafted product that lives
up both Twiggy’s active lifestyle and our dedication to

create affordable, high-quality sustainable products.

Some of our styles to choose from!

Citizens
of the world unite! The CaliSons team invites you to join our mission!
By choosing to accept, you will be supporting our innovative team that
is working around the clock to bring you the freshest designs available.
We want you to join the CaliSons nation so we can continue to hook you
up with top of the line sunglasses and gear minus the high sticker
prices. Join us now, and be part of our epic Venice Beach culture!
<figure style=""margin: 0px
stoked to announce our latest product in collaboration with Grant
“Twiggy” Baker, 2014 Big Wave World Tour Champion of the year! We’ll be
releasing and launching his signature edition Sunglasses, The Ryder,
TWIG Edition, designed from the ground up, featuring imported slab-cut
Italian acetate, 2mm CR39 polarized UVA/B lenses, and hand-finished
bamboo temples. A portion of the net revenue raised through this

campaign will be donated to the LIV orphan village!

Thanks so much!
- Jason &
is a cornerstone of the CaliSons philosophy and business model, so
giving back to charity and to others is incredibly important to us. 10%
of the revenue generated from this campaign will be donated to the South
African Orphanage, Liv Village. The vision of the Baker Family, Liv
village is at the forefront of sustainability, providing services
including 83 acres of land, 150 homes and 1000 children with education,

farms, health care and childhood development, just to name a few.

For more information about Liv Village Orphanage and their dedication to sustainability, head to www.liv-village.com.

Our vision is simple
column2: design and produce the highest quality,

column1: coolest shades around while focusing on innovation and sustainability.
Venice, CA based CaliSons is an Eyewear brand with a truly global
vision. Being native sons of California, Co-Founders Jason Tong and
Mario Velasco grew up heavily influenced by the local art, skate and
surfing scene and, in 2013, launched CaliSons with a flagship store and
design studio on the world-famous Venice boardwalk. We draw our
inspiration from what surrounds us and the end-result is a unique mix of
the So-Cal lifestyle with a splash of international flare.
The CaliSons collection is edgy and modern with a nostalgic touch of
60’s surfer style making it an instant California classic. Our eyewear
is available through select retailers in California, Hawaii, Canada and
online at www.CaliSons.com.
Below are some issues which could be considered risks to some. Please read carefully in the event that any of these apply to you.
VAT is not included with international shipments, please be advised VAT changes by region.
Wood is a natural product and some flaws cannot be predicted with variability in wood grains.
We feature a CR39, UVA/B 2mm lens which is too heavy to allow the glasses to float — your eye health is more important to us and these glasses are designed for an active lifestyle.

CaliSons and its manufacturing facilities meet the strict rules regarding impact testing and eye health standards. Each shipment is required to be approved by FDA prior to importation and distribution.

All production takes place in our partner factory in South East China, while the materials we source from Italy and other parts of the world, such as the Canadian Maple or Italian Acetate. Bi-annually we inspect the facility itself, while inspecting each shipment. Quality is in the management of the materials and the process!
<div>

All production takes place in our partner factory in South East China, while the materials we source from Italy and other parts of the world, such as the Canadian Maple or Italian Acetate. Bi-annually we inspect the facility itself, while inspecting each shipment. Quality is in the management of the materials and the process!",30.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Venice Beach, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-twig-organic-acetate-and-bamboo-sunglassees/pica

column2: >Kid's and Men's Wooden Bowties
column6: >
column90:
>

 

Stamatis Nedilakis, the founder of 27 Wooden Accessories was born in Alexandroupolis, Greece in 1981.

Artist, designer, professional volleyball player and amateur d.j. during his high school years.
​
He studied in the University Dept. of Design and Wood and Furniture Technology where he familiarized with the structure and technology of wood and furniture, marketing, industrial design and computer design.

​
​After graduating in 2004, he began working for big Greek and Multinational firms in the field of house construction, traditional furniture, cabinet and door making, acquiring the following positions: -Procurement manager -Design dept. Manager  -Quality control manager for ISO 9001:2000. -Production manager (CNC production line) -Technical support manager -Production coordination, procurement and design. 

In 2014 he designs his first wooden bowtie for his private collection. Soon, through word of mouth, his creation becomes talk of the town and the first shipments realize. The volume of production increases and Stamatis Nedilakis with his wife Ermina Kehagia decide to take the next step. 27 Wooden Accessories is a reality. Today, five years later, their company specializes in the production of handmade wooden bowties, glass specs, watches, cufflinks, ladies’handbags, jewelry and the new “mini me” line.

The wood types used for these creations are Oak, Meranti, Walnut, Rosewood, Niangon, Wenge, Padauk, Etimoe, Olive, Zebrano, Ebony, Iroko and in conjunction with other materials aim to highlight the beauty of wood. The combination of expertise and love for wood proved to be successful. The main aspect of the production is that any customer can request a unique design and receive products that reflect his clientele, with different materials and engravings (for the bowties) proof that everything is truly handmade and crafted in Greece.

Stamatis Nedilakis loves music, painting and animals and that is why two cats, Grey and Orange, are always in his workshop, considered to be the mascots of 27 Wooden Accessories.

Our initial campaign for 2014 has ended. IndieGoGo now has an option to leave our campaign open for contributions. If you would like to donate to our conference to keep it going for years to come, we appreciate any amount. Thank you!
column2:
>OTHER WAYS TO HELP

We realize that not everyone can contribute financially, but there are certainly numerous ways you can assist without a financial commitment!

column1: • Volunteer your services to our cause!
• Get the word out! Involved in an alternative fashion group? Pass along our website or campaign to get more people aware.

• Tell brands, designers, and vendors you know about RuffleCon and how you want to see them there! Special guests will not come out if they don't think there is interest - make sure you are vocal and say, ""We want you here!""
• Share our social media accounts on yours, and share our campaign here to encourage others to back the event.

Thank you for taking the time to read all of this, and we hope to see you all at RuffleCon!

My name is Matt Randolph (**hello!) and I am here to appeal to you to help me set up what has long been an ambition of mine to put my skills and assets learnt throughout university into play and set up my first collection of innovative womenswear, initially to be sold on the website ASOS.

All about me, okay, So I graduated from Nottingham Trent University (in the UK) with a degree in Fashion design. I came out even poorer than when I went in. I knew what I wanted but I had to return home, after a while, to my parent's house in a picturesque little village in the peak district (near Sheffield). Beautiful and charming and perfectly idyllic - if you're retired!!

I know exactly what I want from life and how to attain it but it's all down to that vicious catch 22! .. No money and in the wrong place at the wrong time. If one of those can be achieved then surely I can get a little bit further to my dream than without either! I have a very strong support system from a variety of people and incredible design ideas just itching to be manufactured and produced!

Right, where exactly is all this money going to go, I hear you ask your screen. I will need approximately just £8,000 to get this business up in the air. This is buying fabric and getting a manufacturer to produce it for me - trust me, it's costly stuff! Hopefully, the more I sell, the more money I make and the more independant I can be -- that's the plan anyway!
My 'dream' has already been partly achieved as I recently set up my business officially, so there's no denying that this business plan now has to happen!
Any extra money, which may not be much, will be a contribution towards marketting ideas I have lined up - fashion videos, shows and the like.

Obviously, money is very very supportive and I wouldn't be able to thank you all enough. However, for those who want to support another way - please follow on facebook (www.facebook.com/mattrandolph2013), twitter (www.twitter.com/MR_2013)and check out my website (www.mrconcept.co.uk) and get fashionables to do the same!

I am, at the minute, just one guy, which a big idea to tackle and an innovative line up of womenswear and hopefully become something of a known fashion person myself.. all I need is you (and possibly a few friends and family!)
Thanks for reading!
