Short Summary

Keep your baby safe, from the first moment inside Mommy’s belly. StimElation is the only “smart wearable” in the maternity space. It provides: protection, support (for Mommy and Baby), early learning and health monitoring. It’s everything a parent (or auntie, or best friend) wants for a baby, from the very start.

StimElation is the dream come true for Dana Hawes, an educator and loving father of two beautiful children. Dana created the StimElation system with the goal of bonding with his son and daughter before they were born in spite of his hectic work schedule. The StimElation line is based on a washable cloth mesh product that—unlike current “baby belts” and “baby sound systems”—can be worn from conception to the 10th centimeter. Imagine that! Even when you are planning to have a baby, you can take important steps to protect your little one from harmful radiation, EMFs (Electromagnetic Frequencies, for example, from microwaves and appliances, home and business wireless connections, random mobile WiFi hotspots, Bluetooth device connectivity in homes and vehicles and cell phone towers) and electromagnetic radiation. When you're pregnant, you’ll want to use your smartphone and laptop to share all your good news! No need to worry about Baby’s well-being, StimElation will help keep your baby safe and sound.

The most important aspect of our product is protecting your baby from the invisible threats of EMFs and tracking your vital health signs. But there’s more! Our app lets parents, grandparents and other special people in Baby’s life create early bonds by recording bedtime stories or singing to the Baby. The washable speakers are positioned to optimize safety, stimulation and learning in utero—based on 20 years of research, and made safe by a comfortable blend of proprietary specialized fabrics.
What We Need &

We are so excited to bring this product to market that we can hardly contain ourselves! If you or someone you love is pregnant or planning or trying… this is perfect timing. Production is in process—even our eco-friendly packaging is in the works.
Our projected date to release this awesome product is Mother’s Day 2014
column2: however, early adopters will have bragging rights to this innovative baby shower gift up to six weeks before the general public can purchase it on the leading direct-marketing television network.

column1: We need your help to bring the product to market. It’s already a sure deal in terms of safety, patents pending and garment design and your contributions will assist us in securing production minimums of our first iterations. We’re raising $100,000 to bring three levels of products to market.
<ul>

• “StimElation-Safe” is shaped like mid-calf yoga pants, with a higher waist to shield your entire abdomen from potential exposure to harmful radiation, and made of our proprietary mesh safety fabric that also shapes your changing physique in ways that will accentuate your figure.
<li>“StimElation-Safe &amp
column2: Sound” incorporates music and your voice through washable speakers that are fit into the garment. Baby is not only safe, but also beginning to learn in the world’s most natural, and beautiful classroom.

column1: <li>“StimElation-Safe &amp
column2: Sound Supreme” adds a monitor that tracks important health data and safely transfers vital statistics to your mobile devices and computer.

column1: Thank you for being a part of this amazing project!
The Impact

Imagine a safe haven for babies everywhere. One of our dreams is to provide the StimElation products to young women facing unexpected pregnancies, to help empower these women to bring healthy, happy babies into our world.
Other Ways You Can Help
Help us build our customer community
column2: feel free to share this campaign on your favorite social media network. If you have ideas for groups that might like to endorse this, or celebrity moms, media, mailing lists, newsletters, please email our team, directly: support@stimelation.com.

column1: Contest Winners: @tasha_anne92 (7/31), @kaylamariee826 (8/3), @mom_in_training (8/4).
With your support, StimElation will prove to be the NEXT BIG THING.

column5: '>Lasst uns diese Liebe zur Natur mit einem absolut modernen und für Dich individuellen Designobjekt
column11: '>verbinden. Auf unserer Homepage könnt ihr bald - ähnlich wie bei bekannten T-Shirt Gestaltern - eigene Motive, Namen und Logos einreichen und so, mit nur wenigen Klicks ein personalisiertes

column1: • Mit einer Höhe von ca. 130 cm ist das TURMFEUER ein absoluter Blickfang in deinem Garten, deiner Grill-Party, deiner Hochzeit, deinem Geburtstag, deinem Unternehmen und als Geschenk für deine Freunde. Die natürliche Rost-Patina sorgt für dein unverwechselbares Objekt. Ein einzigartiges Geschenk!

• Ein solcher Deko-Artikel in einer derartigen soliden Ausführung ist bei deinem nächsten Garten-Event das Highlight! Wir kennen es aus eigener Erfahrung.
  • Wir haben das Know-How dein individuelles Design auf dem 2mm Stahl zu erstellen und können die dafür nötigen Maschinen bedienen.
• In der Feuer-Version gibt es eine Anfeuer- und Reinigungsklappe.
• In Zukunft folgt eine exklusive Edelstahl-Variante.
English:
We all love fire and light!

Let us combine our love for nature with this modern and your own individually design TURMFEUER. In the future you will be able to upload your own graphics with your name and logo. As easy as clicking. This way you'll be able to create your own personalized TURMFEUER.
<div><span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)

• The TURMFEUER is a real eyecatcher, standing at approximately 4'3'', great in any garden a real conversational piece. The TURMFEUER is an absolute must at any of your future events such as weddings, company events, parties, etc. Defenitely a unique gift.
• The natural rust-patina makes it distinct and no two are alike.
• We have the knowledge to create your own individual design on the 2 mm thick steel.
• In the fire-version there is an easy accessible door for starting your fire and cleaning the ashes.
• In future we'll be offering a stainless steel version.
<div style=""text-align: center
<div>
<div>
<div>
German:
<ul>
• die erste große Produktionscharge von 300 Einheiten in vier verschiedenen Designs fertigen.
<li>
die Mitarbeiter für Marketing, Vertrieb, Design und Produktion einstellen.
<li>
<span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >eine interaktive und benutzerfreundliche Homepage für individuelle Design- und Gestaltungswünsche programmieren, ähnlich wie bei bekannten T-Shirt-Druck Homepages.

column1: • unsere Marketing-Stratedie weiter ausbauen, um mehr Kunden zu erreichen.
• Das TURMFEUER verstärkt auf dem amerikanischen Markt anbieten.
English:
<div>
<ul>
• Our first goal is to manufacture 300 units in four different designs.
• To create our support staff in marketing, sales, design and manufacturing.
• Build an interactive and userfriendly homepage to design your individually TURMFEUER.
• To grow our marketing strategies to reach more customers.
• We plan to offer the TURMFEUER on the American market.
<div>
<div>
<div>
German:
<ul>
• Unterstütze uns jetzt und du bist bei den Ersten, die ein TURMFEUER von uns erhalten. Sei der erste Trendsetter bei deiner nächsten Grillparty und bringe deine Freunde zum Staunen.
• Ein Lagerfeuer gehört in diesem sicheren TURMFEUER in jeden Garten.
• Jeder Grill- und Barbecue-Fan wird bei Dunkelheit von dem brennenden und Wärme spendenden TURMFEUER begeistert sein, insbesondere in der kalten Jahreszeit beim angesagten Wintergrillen.
• Durch die natürlich auftretende Patina ist das TURMFEUER auch bei Tageslicht ein absoluter Blickfang. Beim Sonnenuntergang wird durch die ausgeklügelte verschließbare Service-Öffnung angefeuert.
• Durch die Service-Öffnung ist die Reinigung ein Kinderspiel.
Derzeit besteht unser Unternehmen aus drei Mitarbeitern. Eine unserer Stärken ist es immer ehrlich zu sein und nichts zum Verkauf anzubieten, dass wir nicht liefern können.
<div>
English:
<ul>
• With your support, you will not only get one of the first TURMFEUER built, but you will enable us to grow our company and realize our vision.
• Be the first to have a TURMFEUER  in your neighborhood.
• At night, everyone will be fascinated by this flaming warm TURMFEUER .
• Beacause of the natural patina, the TURMFEUER  is an eyecatcher. When you start your fire your guests will be drawn like moths to a flame.
• The TURMFEUER is easy to clean and maintain.
At the present time our company consists of three team-members. One of our strong values is to be honest and never offer something that we can not deliver.
<div>
<div>
<div>
<div>
German:
Empfehle uns auf Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, etc.
<div>
English:
Like us on social network such as Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, etc.
","German:
Wir alle lieben Feuer und Licht!

Lasst uns diese Liebe zur Natur mit einem absolut modernen und für Dich individuellen Designobjekt TURMFEUER verbinden. Auf unserer Homepage könnt ihr bald - ähnlich wie bei bekannten T-Shirt Gestaltern - eigene Motive, Namen und Logos einreichen und so, mit nur wenigen Klicks ein personalisiertes TURMFEUER gestalten.

Mit einer Höhe von ca. 130 cm ist das TURMFEUER ein absoluter Blickfang in deinem Garten, deiner Grill-Party, deiner Hochzeit, deinem Geburtstag, deinem Unternehmen und als Geschenk für deine Freunde. Die natürliche Rost-Patina sorgt für dein unverwechselbares Objekt. Ein einzigartiges Geschenk!

Ein solcher Deko-Artikel in einer derartigen soliden Ausführung ist bei deinem nächsten Garten-Event das Highlight! Wir kennen es aus eigener Erfahrung. Wir haben das Know-How dein individuelles Design auf dem 2mm Stahl zu erstellen und können die dafür nötigen Maschinen bedienen.
In der Feuer-Version gibt es eine Anfeuer- und Reinigungsklappe.
In Zukunft folgt eine exklusive Edelstahl-Variante.
English:
We all love fire and light!

Let us combine our love for nature with this modern and your own individually design TURMFEUER. In the future you will be able to upload your own graphics with your name and logo. As easy as clicking. This way you'll be able to create your own personalized TURMFEUER.

The TURMFEUER is a real eyecatcher, standing at approximately 4'3'', great in any garden a real conversational piece. The TURMFEUER is an absolute must at any of your future events such as weddings, company events, parties, etc. Defenitely a unique gift.
The natural rust-patina makes it distinct and no two are alike.
We have the knowledge to create your own individual design on the 2 mm thick steel.
In the fire-version there is an easy accessible door for starting your fire and cleaning the ashes.
In future we'll be offering a stainless steel version.
German:
die erste große Produktionscharge von 300 Einheiten in vier verschiedenen Designs fertigen.
die Mitarbeiter für Marketing, Vertrieb, Design und Produktion einstellen.
eine interaktive und benutzerfreundliche Homepage für individuelle Design- und Gestaltungswünsche programmieren, ähnlich wie bei bekannten T-Shirt-Druck Homepages.
unsere Marketing-Stratedie weiter ausbauen, um mehr Kunden zu erreichen.
Das TURMFEUER verstärkt auf dem amerikanischen Markt anbieten.
English:
Our first goal is to manufacture 300 units in four different designs.
To create our support staff in marketing, sales, design and manufacturing.
Build an interactive and userfriendly homepage to design your individually TURMFEUER.
To grow our marketing strategies to reach more customers.
We plan to offer the TURMFEUER on the American market.
German:
Unterstütze uns jetzt und du bist bei den Ersten, die ein TURMFEUER von uns erhalten. Sei der erste Trendsetter bei deiner nächsten Grillparty und bringe deine Freunde zum Staunen.
Ein Lagerfeuer gehört in diesem sicheren TURMFEUER in jeden Garten.
Jeder Grill- und Barbecue-Fan wird bei Dunkelheit von dem brennenden und Wärme spendenden TURMFEUER begeistert sein, insbesondere in der kalten Jahreszeit beim angesagten Wintergrillen.
Durch die natürlich auftretende Patina ist das TURMFEUER auch bei Tageslicht ein absoluter Blickfang. Beim Sonnenuntergang wird durch die ausgeklügelte verschließbare Service-Öffnung angefeuert.
Durch die Service-Öffnung ist die Reinigung ein Kinderspiel.
Derzeit besteht unser Unternehmen aus drei Mitarbeitern. Eine unserer Stärken ist es immer ehrlich zu sein und nichts zum Verkauf anzubieten, dass wir nicht liefern können.
English:
With your support, you will not only get one of the first TURMFEUER built, but you will enable us to grow our company and realize our vision.
Be the first to have a TURMFEUER  in your neighborhood.
At night, everyone will be fascinated by this flaming warm TURMFEUER .
Beacause of the natural patina, the TURMFEUER  is an eyecatcher. When you start your fire your guests will be drawn like moths to a flame.
The TURMFEUER is easy to clean and maintain.
At the present time our company consists of three team-members. One of our strong values is to be honest and never offer something that we can not deliver.

eStyle-List
The Problem
<ul>
• No easy way exists for people to RENT OUT their wardrobes to others for the purpose of generating income.
• Buying clothing and accessories that you use and wear only a handful of times can work out to be very costly.
• There is no hassle free, cost effective way to RENT items in London from other people.
The Solution
A Web platform allowing users to rent out their items to individuals where:
<ul>
• OWNERS can make money by renting out their unused or rarely used clothing and accessories.
• RENTERS can save money.
• Create a fashion sharing, cost saving culture in that city.
Peer to Peer Fashion Renting
Do you have wardrobes full of clothing, shoes and accessories which you hardly wear?
Do you buy clothing, shoes and accessories that you maybe only wear a handful of times or even once for a special occasion?
List your wardrobe - Make Money
Rent a wardrobe - Save Money

We want to provide a new way for individuals to access fashion, for entrepreneurs to develop a business and for our users to connect and build fashion sharing communities. eStyle-List will bring together women, rental boutiques and fashion designers with women who love fashion and want access to an unlimited wardrobe without paying the high costs.

Using a seamless platform, eStyle-List wants to create opportunities for small boutique owners, up and coming fashion labels and individuals to set up and run their own rental boutiques whilst allowing our users to have access to a large variety of clothing and accessories in the most cost effective way possible.
Value Propositions of eStyle-List
<ul>
• eStyle-List will operate as a transaction facilitator between owners and renters who are looking for a cheaper alternative to buying designer or higher end high-street items.

• Enables owners to list their items on the website and earn rental income. eStyle-List is taking underutilised assets (clothing, bags, shoes) and allowing the owners to turn these assets into an income.
• The platform will incorporate a rating and review system for both owners and renters. Profiles and user reviews will help to build trust and reputation amongst the community.
• Gives a cost effective solution to customers who need a specific product, but don’t want full ownership, to rent out items rather than buying them at full price.

• A recent research report done by Future Market Insights expects the global online clothing rental market to be valued at US$ 1.9 billion by the end of 2026, indicating the growing preference of renting over owning and gaining instant access to ever changing fashion trends.
How will it work?
<ol>
• The Owner uploads photos and details of their item on to the eStyle-List website.
• Users can search for items and browse available options according to rental dates, categories, sizes, designers etc.
• The duration of rental and delivery date is chosen and item is rented through eStyle-List.

• The item is collected from the owner by our own couriers and packaged and delivered to the renter. Our couriers then collect the item at the end of the rental period, have the item cleaned (optional) and returned back to the owner. The owner will get paid by eStyle-List with our commission deducted.
<h3>What We Need &amp
<ul>
• Funding of £10,000 is required to complete the eStyle-List online platform.

• Your donations will support the development of the eStyle-List website which will launch in 2017. If we exceed our target, we will use the additional funds to enhance overall user experience and stimulate business growth.

• We have a range of attractive perks on offer for your generous donations to our campaign. Please note that as eStyle-List will initially launch in London, deliveries of orders will only be in the London area however deliveries and collections are not limited to residential addresses only and will include office addresses too . We will be expanding to other areas and cities as soon as possible.
<h3>Risks &amp
<ul>

• For eStyle-List to be successful we need to create a critical mass of users on both sides of the value chain so there is a sufficient supply of products and equally a high demand for products. We will achieve this by building an exceptionally user friendly web platform and incorporate an efficient payment processing system that will allow users to easily list and rent products. eStyle-List will have an in-house delivery network which gives complete flexibility for our users in terms of collections and deliveries, further adding to the ease and simplicity of listing and renting out items. Overall we will build a platform which will create a seamless, simple user experience and facilitate painless, trustworthy transactions.

• We also need to make sure our users have trust in each other, owners of items to trust that their items will be returned to them in the same condition and renters to trust that the items they receive are of a good condition and standard. This will be achieved through our rating and review system, we will encourage all users to rate and review each other after a rental to build a reputable and trustworthy community. We will also hold security deposits in case of damage to items and provide refunds and returns to further protect our users.

• Finally, we have a great team with a wealth of experience in the technology, finance and corporate space to develop,launch and successfully run eStyle-List. We will build a valuable product to serve our customers needs through feedback and engagement from you, our users.

column2: >Check out our brand new website : www.untracedgolfing.com

column1: <h3 style=""text-align: center
Redefining golf. Thought for game-changers.
Hi, we are Untraced.
We only have one dream : making golf attractive, inclusive and fun.
To make this a reality, we will question, challenge, rethink and ultimately improve the traditional codes of golf... starting with the dress code.
Today, we are delighted to introduce you to our brand new golf jacket and polo!
Designed based on your feedback, for both women and men and thought to answer the ultimate needs of golfers, we hope you’ll love them!
Introducing...
Why are we doing this ?
Because today, more than 75% of golfers across the world are men over 45...
Ridiculous right!?
While golf is an amazing sport, it carries around this image of a dusty « hobby for rich old men » that we are so eager to change.
Golf is vivid, colourful and full of challenges. It is perfect for self-development, and offers a real chance to connect with both nature and people. Everyone needs that!
When this project first started, we wanted to get to the heart of the problem. We chatted to a lot of non-golfers, asking the same question to all of them: Why don’t you play golf?
The answers were enlightening. We’ve picked out some of the best for you.
<div>
As we chatted with all of you, we realised that today’s golf dress code is a pain and needs a revamp from a cliche to something fun, attractive and practical.

But most importantly, we realised that there is a huge lack of environmentally-responsible golf brand out there today. While golf is all about nature, the golf textile industry doesn’t reflect that. Let’s change it!
Join our adventure &
Your jacket and polo in 3 key points
What's your style?
You have the choice between 2 jackets and 4 polos for women and men.
Hi, we are Arthur and Alexandra, and we created Untraced!
For the last 12 months, we’ve put all our heart and energy into raising this project from the ground.

Making golf accessible everywhere in the world, to everyone in the world, is going to be tough but we truly love the vision and, with your support, we hope to be able to question a lot of other codes!

We have built Untraced for people who are eager to challenge the status quo, break the rules and change things. We want to be part of those who bring solutions and have the sport reflect the ethos of our modern society.
Everything is in the name: UN is for freedom, and TRACED symbolizes the past.
So let's do this friends!
Join the movement!
Special Thanks
Friends and family: you guys rock my world!
Viviane Lipskier: thank you for your timeless support and DNVB insights!
Team: you guys are amazing!
Alexandra: http://www.alexandradean.ca/
Nicolas (video): https://nicolaspodesta.com/
Kurt (photography) : https://www.kurtmichael.com/
Bondi golf Club: thank you for your generosity! You perfectly symbolize the spirit of our brand. Your golf club and team are absolutely great! https://www.bondigolf.com.au/cms/
Any more questions?
Check our FAQ or contact us directly. We will be super happy to help you!
Risk and Challenges
Manufacturing Risks: All pieces are in place, the materials lined up and we’ve put the necessary steps and checks in place to ensure a smooth and efficient production process.

Shipping Risks: We are confident we will ship by the projected dates. However, things get a bit crazy sometimes and shit happens : a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance happen or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our fulfillment process.

Other Unknown Risks: There are other things we don’t or can’t know unfortunately. But regardless of what may or may not come to be, we promise to maintain open and honest communication with you. Please do not hesitate to contact us, ask questions or give feedbacks. We will be more than happy to answer them all!
Check out our brand new website : www.untracedgolfing.com

Clearwaters is an environmentally friendly footwear brand designed &
column2:
developed in the United Kingdom. The footwear industry is one of the largest contributors to climate change, with over 20 billion pairs ending up in landfill every year. We have made it our mission to revolutionise footwear by diverting ocean plastic towards the creation of our products.

Our first development is our minimalist inspired slipper, ethically designed to help combat plastic pollution within our oceans. Each component of the slipper has been designed with our planets health in mind, and we’ve worked tirelessly to bridge the gap between sustainability and accessibility. What good are sustainable products if they’re so expensive that most people can’t afford them? Sustainability isn't just about the materials used. Our slippers are manufactured in Spain, in fair working conditions. 

Each of our slippers uppers are made from the raw material PET(which derives from the recycling of plastic bottles), and old clothing yarns. In fact each pair of slippers is made from up to 5 'post consumer' recycled plastic bottles taken from the ocean, diverting waste from landfills and lessening dependency on fossil fuels. 

Our slippers use the highest quality certified organic cotton (GOTS) for our sock – not only making the slippers irresistibly soft and cozy, but also environmentally friendly!

We care about where our materials come from. Organic cotton is farmed without the use of pesticides, which are responsible for killing wildlife, contaminating rivers &
column3:
killing a reported 16,000 people per year. 

Sustainable natural rubber is farmed ethically. We support the protection of biodiversity and water resources, improving yields, and increasing supply chain transparency and traceability. Unlike brands using synthetic rubber, that's made using petrochemicals – a by-product of crude oil refining. 

Sizes &
column4:
Styles: The way Indiegogo works is you'll get to pick any size and colour when the campaign ends. So don't worry, go ahead and pledge and you'll be hearing from us soon! 

Meet the founders:

Risks and challenges

We have already successfully produced and delivered our first crowdfunding project earlier this year. This Indiegogo project is to release a number of new colour options and a brand new style with a heel strap. We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you.

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><h2 style=""text-align: center
column3: >You can now get Stand4s and new designs at www.stand4socks.com
column5: >

column2: >So much more than just 'another' pair of socks

column1: Bamboo socks are kind to both wearer and planet alike. Bamboo is super soft, antibacterial and moisture wicking, keeping feet fresher and healthier. Bamboo also naturally grows rapidly, requiring no pesticides or fertilisers. It also provides greater yields than cotton, requiring only 10% of the same amount of land and little water.

But also each pair also stands out for a different global cause, raising awareness by starting conversations through the 'cause logo' on the ankle. Innovating on the famous 'buy one, give one' model, each pair also has a tangible impact. Just one pair plants 10 trees, or another vaccinates 3 kids against measles or, clears landmines, provides education and so much more. One pair = One Impact.

column2: >Every pair of socks is linked to an international cause, a non-profit and a measurable impact. From every pair of socks you purchase our charity partners fulfil the tangible impact. Picking out socks in the morning will no longer be a boring process - you select what you Stand4 each day.

column1: These socks have tangible impacts all over the world in over 14 different countries on over 11 different causes.  Stand4's socks are designed to be bold and noticed through over 20 limited edition designs allowing you to share the impact that your socks have had every single day. What will you Stand4?

Each pair has a cause logo embroided on the outside of the ankle, intentionally visible to show the global cause your socks support. This could be from gender equality to education, clean water and much more - with the intention of showing the world what you 'Stand4'!

column2: >
>(Yes! We are making socks from bamboo, and they are more advanced than other socks!)

>We have worked for years on creating the most advanced sock possible, that's both stylish and durable. We aim to provide the best functionality and comfort to the wearer, whilst also having the smallest possible impact on the environment.

column1: We align with the United Nations Global Goals. These are the biggest challenges the world is collectively facing to end poverty by 2030. Our socks currently have a tangible impact on 11 of the 17 goals. With two designs for each goal, we deliver impacts in over 14 different countries.
HUNGER: Landmines - Mines Advisory Group (MAG)

MAG helps people to be safe from landmines and unexploded ordnance (UXO), free from danger, free from fear. We find landmines before children do. Just one pair of socks can remove unexploded landmines and UXO from 1 metre squared of land and destroy them, enabling communities to grow more food and make a better living.
Good Health: Child Mortality - Women &

Every year, over three million children die before their 5th birthday. A large number of these deaths are from conditions that are treatable or preventable. Just one pair of Stand4 Socks vaccinates three children against measles in Bangladesh.
Quality Education: Primary Education - WarChild

Right now 75 million children are out of school in 35 crisis-affected countries. WarChild seeks to protect, educate and stand up for the rights of children caught up in war. Just one pair of Stand4s educates a child for 12.5 days affected in countries such as Iraq, Afghanistan and Jordan.
Gender Equality: Domestic Violence Safe-house - Womankind

In no country in the world do women enjoy the same rights or opportunities as men. WomenKind seek to challenge this through support, strengthening rights and building a movement for change. Just one pair of Stand4s can provide a night in a safe house in Ethiopia for a women and her children from domestic violence.
Clean Water &
column2: Sanitation: Safe Water - Water.org
column4: >

column1: Water is a fundamental human need, yet 663 million people worldwide lack access to safe water. Making water safe, accessible and cost effective in every country for every person, just one pair of Stand4s provides a year's safe water for one person in Ghana.
Goal 7 - Affordable &
column2: Clean Energy:  - Power Up Gambia (PUG)

column1: In remote parts of Gambia it isn't a lack of hospitals, doctors or even equipment that leads to a high number of unnecessary deaths, but rather the lack of power for hospitals to operate. By simply adding renewable solar panels to rural hospitals, just one pair of socks can power a whole hospital for a night, saving lives and the planet.
Decent Work &

In a lot of developing countries, traditional financial systems are not commonplace. Micro loans are small loans to entrepreneurs. This could help a farmer in rural India to yield a better crop, or a women in Vietnam who wants to buy a sewing machine to grow her business. Each pair of Stand4s will create a $1 loan, we will pool this money and ask our backers where we should invest this pot. Once repaid, we will invest it over and over again in amazing projects.
Climate Action: Sustainable Land Use - Stand4 Partners

Planting trees in around the world in countries like Uganda and Gambia helps not only the planet and soil quality, but it also creates jobs and opportunities. Through battling deforestation where trees are cut down for farming, or fuel, just one pair of Stand4s plants 10 trees.
Eradicating Homelessness: Support - Stand4 Socks &

We chose to add homeless awareness socks outside of the UN Global Goals to also support a cause closer to home. Unfortunately, homelessness is on the rise in many developed countries. Even in the US has 550k registered homeless people. One pair purchases mean one thick pair antibacterial pair is donated directly to someone in need.

Josh started Social Enterprise Stand4 Socks at the age of 24 after making an off the cuff comment with friends of ""imagine if socks could change the world?"".  Most saw it as a joke, but Josh saw it differently. Pretty much everyone needs socks, but typically they are a dull, poorly made afterthought. So, he set about creating bold, high-quality, ethically made socks which start conversations about causes that matter. But he didn't stop there: inspired by TOMS shoes, he wanted each pair he sold to have an impact, but knew giving socks to people around the world was not the answer.

He saw the framework of the United Nations Global Goals, the biggest issues the world collectively is facing to eradicate poverty by 2030. Josh aligned his socks with causes from these goals, having impacts in multiple countries and for multiple causes from day one.

Shortly after launching, Josh won Bronze as Great British Social Entrepreneur of the Year, which gave him the confidence that this was not such a crazy idea. Stand4 has developed slowly but now we need your help to scale this ambitious dream!

>Our socks are all designed in the UK and manufactured in Europe. We only use Sedex Audited Factories to produce our socks. All of our yarns come from  BSCI or Oeko-tex accredited suppliers. The packaging for our socks is also only made using FSC paper, from sustainable forests and recycled card.

>The costs of this and the minimum orders are high. However, we wouldn't make our socks any other way. This is why we need your help to bring this new product development to reality. We have created and tested the product and now need to raise at least £10k to purchase the yarns. Hopefully creating the worlds best socks, which also have a huge impact to the lives of others!

column1: What sizes do the socks come in?
Two sizes you can select from after the campaign ends.
How do I choose which designs I want?
After the campaign ends all backers will be sent a simple order form. You will select which designs you want and the size.
Can I choose multiple designs and sizes?
You can mix and match different designs, or get multiple of the same design &
Do you ship internationally?
We do! After backing simply let us know where we will be sending the socks too,
Can I select a design but support a different cause?
No, the cause logo and packaging are linked to the specific cause that sock is supporting,
","Sorry you missed us!  You can now get Stand4s and new designs at www.stand4socks.com
So much more than just 'another' pair of socks

Bamboo socks are kind to both wearer and planet alike. Bamboo is super soft, antibacterial and moisture wicking, keeping feet fresher and healthier. Bamboo also naturally grows rapidly, requiring no pesticides or fertilisers. It also provides greater yields than cotton, requiring only 10% of the same amount of land and little water.

But also each pair also stands out for a different global cause, raising awareness by starting conversations through the 'cause logo' on the ankle. Innovating on the famous 'buy one, give one' model, each pair also has a tangible impact. Just one pair plants 10 trees, or another vaccinates 3 kids against measles or, clears landmines, provides education and so much more. One pair = One Impact.

Every pair of socks is linked to an international cause, a non-profit and a measurable impact. From every pair of socks you purchase our charity partners fulfil the tangible impact. Picking out socks in the morning will no longer be a boring process - you select what you Stand4 each day.

These socks have tangible impacts all over the world in over 14 different countries on over 11 different causes.  Stand4's socks are designed to be bold and noticed through over 20 limited edition designs allowing you to share the impact that your socks have had every single day. What will you Stand4?

Each pair has a cause logo embroided on the outside of the ankle, intentionally visible to show the global cause your socks support. This could be from gender equality to education, clean water and much more - with the intention of showing the world what you 'Stand4'!
(Yes! We are making socks from bamboo, and they are more advanced than other socks!)

We have worked for years on creating the most advanced sock possible, that's both stylish and durable. We aim to provide the best functionality and comfort to the wearer, whilst also having the smallest possible impact on the environment.

We align with the United Nations Global Goals. These are the biggest challenges the world is collectively facing to end poverty by 2030. Our socks currently have a tangible impact on 11 of the 17 goals. With two designs for each goal, we deliver impacts in over 14 different countries.
HUNGER: Landmines - Mines Advisory Group (MAG)

MAG helps people to be safe from landmines and unexploded ordnance (UXO), free from danger, free from fear. We find landmines before children do. Just one pair of socks can remove unexploded landmines and UXO from 1 metre squared of land and destroy them, enabling communities to grow more food and make a better living.
Good Health: Child Mortality - Women & Children First

Every year, over three million children die before their 5th birthday. A large number of these deaths are from conditions that are treatable or preventable. Just one pair of Stand4 Socks vaccinates three children against measles in Bangladesh.
Quality Education: Primary Education - WarChild

Right now 75 million children are out of school in 35 crisis-affected countries. WarChild seeks to protect, educate and stand up for the rights of children caught up in war. Just one pair of Stand4s educates a child for 12.5 days affected in countries such as Iraq, Afghanistan and Jordan.
Gender Equality: Domestic Violence Safe-house - Womankind

In no country in the world do women enjoy the same rights or opportunities as men. WomenKind seek to challenge this through support, strengthening rights and building a movement for change. Just one pair of Stand4s can provide a night in a safe house in Ethiopia for a women and her children from domestic violence.
Clean Water & Sanitation: Safe Water - Water.org

Water is a fundamental human need, yet 663 million people worldwide lack access to safe water. Making water safe, accessible and cost effective in every country for every person, just one pair of Stand4s provides a year's safe water for one person in Ghana.
Goal 7 - Affordable & Clean Energy:  - Power Up Gambia (PUG)

In remote parts of Gambia it isn't a lack of hospitals, doctors or even equipment that leads to a high number of unnecessary deaths, but rather the lack of power for hospitals to operate. By simply adding renewable solar panels to rural hospitals, just one pair of socks can power a whole hospital for a night, saving lives and the planet.
Decent Work & Economic Growth: Micro Finance & Loans - Kiva Platform

In a lot of developing countries, traditional financial systems are not commonplace. Micro loans are small loans to entrepreneurs. This could help a farmer in rural India to yield a better crop, or a women in Vietnam who wants to buy a sewing machine to grow her business. Each pair of Stand4s will create a $1 loan, we will pool this money and ask our backers where we should invest this pot. Once repaid, we will invest it over and over again in amazing projects.
Climate Action: Sustainable Land Use - Stand4 Partners

Planting trees in around the world in countries like Uganda and Gambia helps not only the planet and soil quality, but it also creates jobs and opportunities. Through battling deforestation where trees are cut down for farming, or fuel, just one pair of Stand4s plants 10 trees.
Eradicating Homelessness: Support - Stand4 Socks & Local Partners

We chose to add homeless awareness socks outside of the UN Global Goals to also support a cause closer to home. Unfortunately, homelessness is on the rise in many developed countries. Even in the US has 550k registered homeless people. One pair purchases mean one thick pair antibacterial pair is donated directly to someone in need.

Josh started Social Enterprise Stand4 Socks at the age of 24 after making an off the cuff comment with friends of ""imagine if socks could change the world?"".  Most saw it as a joke, but Josh saw it differently. Pretty much everyone needs socks, but typically they are a dull, poorly made afterthought. So, he set about creating bold, high-quality, ethically made socks which start conversations about causes that matter. But he didn't stop there: inspired by TOMS shoes, he wanted each pair he sold to have an impact, but knew giving socks to people around the world was not the answer.

He saw the framework of the United Nations Global Goals, the biggest issues the world collectively is facing to eradicate poverty by 2030. Josh aligned his socks with causes from these goals, having impacts in multiple countries and for multiple causes from day one.

Shortly after launching, Josh won Bronze as Great British Social Entrepreneur of the Year, which gave him the confidence that this was not such a crazy idea. Stand4 has developed slowly but now we need your help to scale this ambitious dream!

The vision of Stand4 has always been to help create a world where every purchase, however big or small, has a positive impact on the world.... and if we can do that with socks then surely we can do it with anything, right?

Our socks are all designed in the UK and manufactured in Europe. We only use Sedex Audited Factories to produce our socks. All of our yarns come from  BSCI or Oeko-tex accredited suppliers. The packaging for our socks is also only made using FSC paper, from sustainable forests and recycled card.

The costs of this and the minimum orders are high. However, we wouldn't make our socks any other way. This is why we need your help to bring this new product development to reality. We have created and tested the product and now need to raise at least £10k to purchase the yarns. Hopefully creating the worlds best socks, which also have a huge impact to the lives of others!
Want your socks gift packaged? No problem just let us know on your order confirmation form after the campaign ends for complimentary gift boxing!

We are all unique, globally valuing causes differently. Whether it's the United Nations Global Goals such as 'no equalities' or 'climate action', or other causes such as eradicating cancer or homelessness. What matters to you, and do you Stand4?
Share it with the world using #istand4
Want to join #istand4?
Send an email to josh@stand4socks.com for a free digital pack!
GET STAND4S HERE NOW

Just email us directly - contact@stand4socks.com
When will the socks be delivered?
We expect by late July early August to have the socks with everyone.
What sizes do the socks come in?
Two sizes you can select from after the campaign ends.
How do I choose which designs I want?
After the campaign ends all backers will be sent a simple order form. You will select which designs you want and the size.
Can I choose multiple designs and sizes?
You can mix and match different designs, or get multiple of the same design & cause. Fully up to you!
Do you ship internationally?
We do! After backing simply let us know where we will be sending the socks too,

No, the cause logo and packaging are linked to the specific cause that sock is supporting,",42.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: If “wearable tech” is the next frontier, Baggizmo can take you there today – by helping you wear your tech properly. Even when it's full, it appears slim and feels comfortable – thanks to its elegant, form-fitting design. It looks good in combination with a range of styles – business, sporty, casual or formal.

It's not just a bag for your gizmos, but it offers a unique way in how the bag is worn from the beginning. It uses brilliant design to provide a simple and stylish solution for the man who cannot go anywhere without his gadgets. Baggizmo puts all your technology at your fingertips – by placing it under your arm.

Easy to wear, highly functional with numerous compartments specially designed to look slim even when it’s full, made ergonomically with high-quality innovative materials which will make you look good, feel good and carry on with your day.

----------

You can wear Baggizmo while driving, riding a bike, attending a meeting or dining out. You can wear it above or below a suit jacket. This means you won't spoil the lines of your tailored clothing by stuffing the pockets with bulky gadgets. 

Baggizmo is the first bag of its kind, tailored for men and their gizmos, both functional and fashionable.

----------

Baggizmo has achieved high ergonomy

Baggizmo is designed by the design collective, Manufakturist.

Our designers tested various body positions in which the bag has to function in a way that the gadgets are easy accessible and that the bag doesn’t move around the body in uncontrolled directions. They were careful to arrange objects according to weight, so that one part of the bag would not outweigh another.

Baggizmo’s shape has been conditioned around a polygonal pattern that has enabled the good grip of the bag to the torso, while the possibility of regulating the length of the straps provides customization depending on a man's proportions.

The bag's dimensions have been kept to a minimum due to the content of each compartment, thus limiting the ""overload"" which threatens its stability on the body and comfort of wearing and using Baggizmo.

----------

Truly a bag of tricks!

Baggizmo’s design smartly merges tech-aware and contemporary urban fashion, promoting a new trend in wearing tech devices among men.

----------

----------
THE NEW WAY OF HOW THE BAG IS WORN – MOBILE
Baggizmo offers a unique way in how the bag is worn from the beginning. There is no need to take it off during many of your daily activities - while you are driving a car, riding a bike, having a meeting or enjoying dinner in a restaurant.

----------
STAYS SLIM FIT EVEN WHEN IT’S FULL

Even when it’s full, Baggizmo's shape stays slim, following the lines of the body thanks to an adjustable (and comfortable) padded shoulder strap and the bag's material.

----------
UNIQUE – FITTING VARIOUS OUTFITS!

You can wear Baggizmo over a T-shirt, shirt, then under or over a jacket or a business suit.
It looks aesthetically pleasing in various outfits – whether it's casual, sporty, business or smart!

----------
GREATER COMFORT

Special attention has been given to the thickness of the straps in order to achieve greater comfort. The width of the straps was defined with respect to the width of the average man's shoulders.

----------
THE GADGETS ARE EASY ACCESSIBLE
The bag was designed to allow easy access to the gadgets following the natural angle of entry of a hand reaching inside for objects.
Baggizmo is available in both Left and Right Sided Options.

----------
RATIONALLY ORGANIZED SPACE

The space in Baggizmo is rationally organized - the direction and the size of the compartments depend on the size of its corresponding device – which are: a tablet, two smartphones, keys, wallet, power stick, pencil and a pad of paper, etc.

<div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe class=""embedly-embed"" height=""326"" src=""https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2FOvyWM3_Ed_I%3Ffeature%3Doembed&amp

----------
NFC TAG INTEGRATED
The Baggizmo has integrated an NFC tag in the top front pocket.
NFC (near field communication) is a wireless technology which allows for transfer of data such as texts or numbers and transfer to another NFC device, such as a mobile phone.

There's a whole set of different data types you can store on an NFC tag. You may choose to store a web address, a vCard ID, a LinkedIn profile link, a Dropbox share, a telephone number etc. For example, rather than share your business cards at a conference simply pass on your information via NFC enabled smartphones.

An NFC tag doesn't require batteries and it's durable and waterproof. It can be reprogrammed, so you can change the information you want to transfer, depending on your needs. It can be reliably read by most devices and mobile phones.

----------
NO MORE TANGLED CABLES – CONNECTED
In between the compartments there are specially tailored (hidden) passages which allow the charging of a tablet with a power stick or connecting a phone with headphones. A pocket for headphones is placed on the padded shoulder strap. It helps avoid tangled cables while you have your headphones as close as you need – as you sit, walk or drive.

----------
IT DOESN'T MOVE AROUND!
The bag doesn’t move around the body in uncontrolled directions. The compartments designed for the corresponding device are carefully arranged according to weight, so that one part of the bag would not outweigh another.

----------
UNIQUE - STABILITY ACHIEVED BY FIXING IN A SINGLE POINT
Baggizmo is fixed in a single point (over one shoulder), but the arrangement of elements (compartments and device weight ratio) take the brunt of the bag (gravity) so that it is fixed to the body during usual body movements (walking, sitting, standing up, gently tilting etc.). In this way the bag does not slip to one side, although it is strapped only to one shoulder.

Stability during high level body's activity
For more active body movements (running, sharp leans forward as on a bike, jumping etc.), stability is additionally achieved by using the strap that secures the bag diagonally across the torso and positions it below the left arm. The bag is then additionally fixed in the second point by using a buckle (bike hook shackle) that attaches to the pants, belt or back pocket.

----------
IT'S SAFE
All the compartments have internal cushioning and are also lined with several layers of material that provide special protection against mechanical or heat damage.
 

----------
MATERIALS AND ORIGINAL DESIGN ELEMENTS
Comfort and wearing convenience have also been determined by the choice of quality materials that cling to the body, but still allow the circulation of air between the bag and the body.

----------

Baggizmo is made of quality and innovative materials that provide special protection against mechanical or heat damage.

----------
The Innovative textile Baggizmo is made from Schoeller®-dynatec, an innovative material that is abrasion resistant, fall protection, breathable, 2-way--stretch, UV stops, wind and water repellent. The material is made of hard wearing fabric with good protective properties and a high level of stability. It is pleasant to the touch and can cope with heavy demands and has an attractive appearance.

Schoeller® (Switzerland, EU) produces highly-functional fabrics and innovative textile technologies for sport, work, lifestyle, fashion  and office furnishings. They pay close attention to ecological safety and good design. Innovation in the design of fabrics had won them awards and put them in a leading position in pioneering changes.

Back of the bag
The back of the Baggizmo bag is made from breathable mesh material from Schoeller®-spirit fabrics. It’s cosy and comfortable, has good breathability and perfect weather protection. Its special mesh structures ensure ventilation combined with good protection.
 

Baggizmo buckles
The buckles are an original Baggizmo design produced in the EU (Croatia) just for this bag. The buckles are made from Zamak, part of the zinc aluminium alloy family, with a satin nickel surface treatment. Both buckles, silver or black matt finishing, have a really nice metal look and feel. The matt finishing is achieved with a high performance cataphoretic lacquer with improved wear resistance.

Inner lining material - microfiber
This ultra-fine fiber is lightweight, durable, but soft and electrostatic. It is very good to use for gadget pockets, because the material is often used to clean screens. And your Baggizmo gadget pockets will ensure that your screens are always clean.

Baggizmo straps
The straps are made in the EU (Belgium) of a superb mixed composition weave with a soft fiber feel but are rugged and unusually resistant at
the same time.
 

Baggizmo tailoring
Baggizmo is tailored from more than 30 parts of fabric with 90 separate actions that must be performed to a ready-sewn bag. In some parts of the bag Baggizmo has 6 layers of materials and internal cushioning to be combined. Due to the complex and highly functional design, Baggizmo has a total of 12 layers of materials in a bag thickness of only one centimeter (0.4 inch).
 

----------
Baggizmo is made in the EU.

Baggizmo is available in three different colors:
Jet Black, Ash Gray and Cardinal Red.
$135 / One Baggizmo bag in Jet Black color. _ Add $15 for the bike hook shackle, $5 for gift pack. FREE shipping!
$135 / One Baggizmo bag in Ash Gray color.  _ Add $15 for the bike hook shackle, $5 for gift pack. FREE shipping!
$135 / One Baggizmo bag in Space Cadet Blue color. _ Add $15 for the bike hook shackle, $5 for gift pack. FREE shipping!
$135 / One Baggizmo bag in Cardinal Red color. _ Add $15 for the bike hook shackle, $5 for gift pack. FREE shipping!

$250 / 2 Baggizmo bags + 2 bike hook shackle + 1 gift pack. SAVE $45 with this Baggizmo pack! You will get an email to select your bag color (Jet Black, Cardinal Red or Ash Gray), buckle color (silver or black) and strap color (black, gray, pattern black or pattern gray). SAVE $45 / FREE shipping!
 

$15 / Once you get hooked on Baggizmo, you will need bike hook shackle when riding a bike. Add $15 for the bike hook shackle and leave us a note.
 

$5 / One elegant textile gift packaging bag. Just insert Baggizmo in the textile gift bag, write your personalized message on the compliments card and you’r ready for giving it as a gift. Add $5 for for gift pack and leave us a note.

_
Your order will be sent within 5 – 7 working days of receiving your support.
_
2 Baggizmo package backers need to response to the survey first or leave chosen combination by comment.
_
If you would like some other color combination or lefty bag, please contact us by e-mail on info@baggizmo.me

We will send you the tracking number as soon as the package is sent, so please check your e-mail. If you have any questions please feel free to contact us by Indiegogo or on info@baggizmo.me
 

.

Smartly designed everyday carry bag
 

Here are some samples of common everyday carry items you can fit in the Baggizmo EDC bag, depending on your specific needs and habits.

Get Baggizmo and test which EDC items you can fit inside!

.
You can’t have a great project without a great team.
And even if we could, we wouldn’t want to
column2: ) That is way we gathered a team of top-notch professionals to deliver you the best possible brand and product.

column1: The project was initiated and is led by Ladislav Juric, an IT manager and also Founder Institute graduate. He is a gadget freak and never leaves his home without all of his gadgets. He needed a bag that he could fit them all into and keep them safe and organized. He didn’t find any of the regular backpack or bulky EDC bags suitable. After an accident in which his tablet was crushed – he decided to start this adventure and create the only EDC bag he will ever need – Baggizmo.

So, when we started this project the only everyday carry bags for men were bulky and not functional to wear every day in various professional or private situations. Our main focus was to develop an advanced, more functional and aesthetically pleasing way of carrying things under a man’s arm.

Ladislav Juric, Founder of Baggizmo
Izvorka Juric, Chief Design Officer, Branding


Manufakturist, a design collective: Mia Bogovac, Matea Bronic, Masa Milovac and Kristina Volf, Product design
Tomislav Petkovic / KoArt, Production

Vanja Blumensajn / Señor, Brand communication

Mladen Saric , Brand photography
Luka Vucic, Video production
Stela Kovacic, Ivan Goran Zunar, Designers
Teo Drempetić Conkic, Everyday people photography
Tatjana Bartakovic, Public Relations

and Mirko Susnic, Edi Budimilic, Robert Lesac, Jelena Gvozdanovic, Caffe Atrium, Igor Pavlovic, Zlatko Kelemenic, Neven Zulijani, Tea Subat, Dalibor Suster, Eugen Kramaric, Ivan Hecimovic, Neil Arun, Peter Hopwood and Robert Sucic who helped us in many ways.

We have invested a lot of effort, time and passion in the preparation of the presentation materials for Baggizmo. It was very demanding, but fun and exciting process, and we hope that we have managed to convey all the benefits of Baggizmo.
We would like to thank the whole team for their effort and enthusiasm

Questions?

If you have any questions or concerns, please shoot us an email at info@baggizmo.me and we will answer as soon as possible!

----------

Any help spreading the word would be AWESOME.

Please share our story to anyone you think might appreciate the project.
It would mean the world to us.

Share our campaign through the Indiegogo share tools. Sharing is caring!

We can’t tell you how much we appreciate you supporting us and telling the world about Baggizmo! With your help this bag is pretty much ... in the bag!

----------

Baggizmo is registered trademark of Motus Vis Inc., OH, USA. Copyright © 2014.

A pocket for headphones is placed on the padded shoulder strap. It helps avoid tangled cables while you have your headphones as close as you need – as you sit, walk or drive.

----------IT DOESN'T MOVE AROUND! The bag doesn’t move around the body in uncontrolled directions. The compartments designed for the corresponding device are carefully arranged according to weight, so that one part of the bag would not outweigh another.

----------UNIQUE - STABILITY ACHIEVED BY FIXING IN A SINGLE POINTBaggizmo is fixed in a single point (over one shoulder), but the arrangement of elements (compartments and device weight ratio) take the brunt of the bag (gravity) so that it is fixed to the body during usual body movements (walking, sitting, standing up, gently tilting etc.). In this way the bag does not slip to one side, although it is strapped only to one shoulder.

Stability during high level body's activityFor more active body movements (running, sharp leans forward as on a bike, jumping etc.), stability is additionally achieved by using the strap that secures the bag diagonally across the torso and positions it below the left arm. The bag is then additionally fixed in the second point by using a buckle (bike hook shackle) that attaches to the pants, belt or back pocket.

----------IT'S SAFE All the compartments have internal cushioning and are also lined with several layers of material that provide special protection against mechanical or heat damage. ----------MATERIALS AND ORIGINAL DESIGN ELEMENTSComfort and wearing convenience have also been determined by the choice of quality materials that cling to the body, but still allow the circulation of air between the bag and the body. ----------Baggizmo is made of quality and innovative materials that provide special protection against mechanical or heat damage.

----------The Innovative textile Baggizmo is made from Schoeller®-dynatec, an innovative material that is abrasion resistant, fall protection, breathable, 2-way--stretch, UV stops, wind and water repellent. The material is made of hard wearing fabric with good protective properties and a high level of stability. It is pleasant to the touch and can cope with heavy demands and has an attractive appearance.

Schoeller® (Switzerland, EU) produces highly-functional fabrics and innovative textile technologies for sport, work, lifestyle, fashion  and office furnishings. They pay close attention to ecological safety and good design. Innovation in the design of fabrics had won them awards and put them in a leading position in pioneering changes.Back of the bag The back of the Baggizmo bag is made from breathable mesh material from Schoeller®-spirit fabrics. It’s cosy and comfortable, has good breathability and perfect weather protection. Its special mesh structures ensure ventilation combined with good protection. Baggizmo buckles The buckles are an original Baggizmo design produced in the EU (Croatia) just for this bag. The buckles are made from Zamak, part of the zinc aluminium alloy family, with a satin nickel surface treatment. Both buckles, silver or black matt finishing, have a really nice metal look and feel. The matt finishing is achieved with a high performance cataphoretic lacquer with improved wear resistance.

Inner lining material - microfiberThis ultra-fine fiber is lightweight, durable, but soft and electrostatic. It is very good to use for gadget pockets, because the material is often used to clean screens. And your Baggizmo gadget pockets will ensure that your screens are always clean.Baggizmo strapsThe straps are made in the EU (Belgium) of a superb mixed composition weave with a soft fiber feel but are rugged and unusually resistant atthe same time.  Baggizmo tailoringBaggizmo is tailored from more than 30 parts of fabric with 90 separate actions that must be performed to a ready-sewn bag. In some parts of the bag Baggizmo has 6 layers of materials and internal cushioning to be combined. Due to the complex and highly functional design, Baggizmo has a total of 12 layers of materials in a bag thickness of only one centimeter (0.4 inch). ----------
Baggizmo is made in the EU.
Baggizmo is available in three different colors:Jet Black, Ash Gray and Cardinal Red.

You can’t have a great project without a great team.
And even if we could, we wouldn’t want to
column2: ) That is way we gathered a team of top-notch professionals to deliver you the best possible brand and product.

column1: The project was initiated and is led by Ladislav Juric, an IT manager and also Founder Institute graduate. He is a gadget freak and never leaves his home without all of his gadgets. He needed a bag that he could fit them all into and keep them safe and organized. He didn’t find any of the regular backpack or bulky EDC bags suitable. After an accident in which his tablet was crushed – he decided to start this adventure and create the only EDC bag he will ever need – Baggizmo.

So, when we started this project the only everyday carry bags for men were bulky and not functional to wear every day in various professional or private situations. Our main focus was to develop an advanced, more functional and aesthetically pleasing way of carrying things under a man’s arm.

Ladislav Juric, Founder of BaggizmoIzvorka Juric, Chief Design Officer, BrandingManufakturist, a design collective: Mia Bogovac, Matea Bronic, Masa Milovac and Kristina Volf, Product designTomislav Petkovic / KoArt, Production Vanja Blumensajn / Señor, Brand communicationMladen Saric , Brand photographyLuka Vucic, Video productionStela Kovacic, Ivan Goran Zunar, DesignersTeo Drempetić Conkic, Everyday people photographyTatjana Bartakovic, Public Relations

and Mirko Susnic, Edi Budimilic, Robert Lesac, Jelena Gvozdanovic, Caffe Atrium, Igor Pavlovic, Zlatko Kelemenic, Neven Zulijani, Tea Subat, Dalibor Suster, Eugen Kramaric, Ivan Hecimovic, Neil Arun, Peter Hopwood and Robert Sucic who helped us in many ways.

We have invested a lot of effort, time and passion in the preparation of the presentation materials for Baggizmo. It was very demanding, but fun and exciting process, and we hope that we have managed to convey all the benefits of Baggizmo.
We would like to thank the whole team for their effort and enthusiasm

Questions?If you have any questions or concerns, please shoot us an email at info@baggizmo.me and we will answer as soon as possible!----------Any help spreading the word would be AWESOME.Please share our story to anyone you think might appreciate the project.It would mean the world to us.Share our campaign through the Indiegogo share tools. Sharing is caring!We can’t tell you how much we appreciate you supporting us and telling the world about Baggizmo! column1: We're on a mission: to help girls play sports by creating awesome athletic bags for women.
Sports address many issues girls worldwide face. Studies show a girl who plays sports:
<ul>
• Is less likely to get pregnant or engage in risky sexual behavior
• Is less likely to stay in an abusive relationship
• Has reduced risk of breast cancer, diabetes, osteoporosis and other chronic diseases
• Achieves higher levels of education, and does better in school and work
• Gains confidence, positive body image, resilience, and leadership skills
• Is less likely to suffer from depression
Improving girls’ lives in these ways has a ripple effect, impacting communities and... the world.
Collaborating with a former designer for Betsey Johnson and bagmaker from Quiksilver, we spent over a year creating a functional, yet fashion-forward bag that meets the needs of active women.

Our first line is made of macen, the ""material of the people"" in Activyst’s birthplace of Nicaragua and used for everything from hammocks, to harvesting coffee, to transporting goods. Activyst bags are durable, waterproof, have awesome features, and are pretty cute to boot.
Active Bag Features
Our pride and joy, the Active Bag, has pockets for your shoes, yoga mat, laptop and personal items.

Through bag sales, we fund non-profits providing sports opportunities to girls worldwide. Having worked in international development, we know that each non-profit partner will have unique needs and goals
column2: so we structure bag sales around meeting those specific needs.

column1: Nicaragua Project (Soccer Without Borders)

Through hitting our 25K milestone in this campaign, we raised funds to help Soccer Without Borders (SWB) Nicaragua build a soccer field and support their community center. These projects address a significant barrier to girls' sports in Nicaragua: lack of safe spaces. SWB Nicaragua reaches 130 girls and women ages 7-25, and serves close to 1,200 girls through school outreach.
Uganda Project (Soccer Without Borders)

SWB also has soccer programs for teenage girls in Uganda. It's difficult to keep the girls enrolled, because of outside responsibilities and pressures to find work. Through our 50K milestone in this campaign, we've raised funds to incorporate vocational training classes into the program, adding value for the girls and ensuring they continue to prioritize involvement in the soccer program.
Ethiopia Project (Girls Gotta Run)

Bekoji is an Ethiopian village that has a history of producing world-class distance runners (you've probably seen them in the Olympics). The Girls Gotta Run Foundation is working to make female running a part of this culture. In closing out this campaign at 68K, we will be able to help support the training and funding of Bekoji's first ever female coach!

Here's how this works: you contribute, and at the end of this campaign, we go into production and then ship you your awesome ""perk"" (in most cases, a bag). We also get the funding to our partners to make the above projects happen. So pick one of the perks below and let's do this!
The Signature Perk: The Active Bag

Our little baby all grown up - we can remember when it was just a prototype. It reflects a focus on functionality (with pockets for about everything) and simple, bold design. You can use it for the gym, or rock it while walking to work or around town. 18 x 12.5 x 7.5, and available in both colors above.
Other Perks
Out and About Tote Bag

This all-purpose tote combines classic tote lines with the lively color pop of the macen we love. It has an interior zip pocket and two slip pockets, and is super-versatile for the gym or everyday use. Measures 17 x 12 x 6, and available in our turquoise color combo and coral color combo.
Freshen Up Cosmetic Bag

This cosmetic bag can fit your shampoos, make-up, hair brush, and other items you use to freshen up. It has an interior zip pocket to keep things organized. It comes in our bright turquoise color combo and coral color combo, and may brighten up your day too. Measures 12 x 6.5 x 2.5.
The ""Activyst Weekend"" in California

A weekend of awesome in Manhattan Beach, CA (near LA): You'll stay 4 days and 3 nights at a beach pad 2 blocks from the water, have an ocean view and deck, and get 2 yoga classes, a surf lesson, use of 2 beach cruisers, and an Active Bag. Restaurants, shops, and endless activity are in walking distance.  We're excited to share one of our favorite places, and hopefully meet you too!

We have backgrounds in international development, business, and law. Katie has worked as a corporate attorney, and with the WHO in Nicaragua on a project promoting gender equality in sport. Leigh worked with a non-profit in international development, before getting her MBA and focusing on sustainable business practices within multiple companies. Blair also has a law degree, and has spent years doing management consulting in the U.S. and abroad.
We love connecting with people passionate about this cause. You can find us online and get in touch with us through the links below. Thanks for helping more girls play!
Website: www.activyst.com
Email: hi@activyst.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/activyst
Twitter: www.twitter.com/activyst #activyst #HelpGirlsPlay
Pinterest: www.pinterest.com/activyst
Learn more about the team:  www.activyst.com/team
I'm having trouble with Paypal or am not sure that my payment went through.  What can I do to complete my contribution?

Sorry to hear about the difficulty!  If you're having any trouble at all contributing via Paypal, or if you want to confirm that your payment went through, please contact us at hi@activyst.com.  We'll do everything we can to smooth it out and make it as simple as possible for you!
How do I pick my bag color?
Don't fret! Here is how Indiegogo works: we receive your contact information when you contribute, and after the campaign, we'll reach out to have you confirm the color you'd like.
What's the timeline for receiving the bags?

Given the many moving parts coming together for the first time in this inaugural production run, we've estimated that we will ship the bags your way in November. Thank you for your support and patience during the process of building this company!

How much of profits goes to girls' sports projects?

We get asked this a lot and here's the short answer: at least 10%. We've studied our finances and know we can contribute 10% and still be sustainable (we need to give our little company what it needs to grow and ""learn to fish"", so we can continue supporting girls' sports into the future).

The long answer: we want to contribute more than 10%, but can't know yet whether that's possible, and if so, what %.  Here is where the uncertainty comes in: we won't know our production numbers until this campaign is complete.  A large production run means lower costs per bag, and an increased margin for donations.  Lower production numbers means we're working with less margin.  And there are always unexpected start-up costs for which we need to account.

The bottom line is we're a go for 10%, and are working to increase this number as we transition out of start-up phase and approach economies of scale.
Can you explain more about the bag cost?

We've learned SO much about bag production, and hope that sharing some info sheds light on the price point.  We've got a bit of a ""triple whammy"" situation: (i) we're making this run in the U.S. (which we love, but is costly) (ii) we're not producing in huge numbers like the big brands out there (which means higher cost per bag)
column2: and (iii) we build in a donation (we're committed to having it be a meaningful percentage).  For Indiegogo, we're also including shipping costs.

column1: And then there's the fact that our bags are legit!  We wanted to make products that are quality enough to stand on their own, independent of the cause. The Active Bag is a highly technical bag with many compartments, is sewn together out of 19 different fabric pieces, and includes over 20 different supplies (thread, zipper, snap, velcro... it's loco!)

In the end, the Active Bag that has all the features that the leading brands' bags do (you know who they are), and, despite our many ""whammies"", is competitively priced with them too.

The idea

Getting a breakthrough in fashion can often be difficult for brand new designers starting their own line. It can be extremely challenging to go from production to finding retailers and customers to buy your collection.

Recognising that there are so many undiscovered talents out there, is the first step into the future. To contribute to giving new, up-and-coming designers an opportunity to showcase their collections on international level, Janet + George was created.

Janet + George is a cross-border online fashion store with a focus on emerging fashion designers. With the Janet + George web shop, we will reach out to designers that are at the beginning stages of establishing their collection. Through an innovative platform (www.janetandgeorge.com)
column2: Janet + George will sell collections of up-and-coming designers to online consumers. We transform seasonal fashion for style-savvy consumers, allowing them to discover new labels that have not yet made it to mass production.  Acting as up-and-coming fashion designer’s very own online sales and presentation channel, Janet + George will support these designers to create a buzz for their new line through effective marketing campaigns.

column1: The selection of designers are cherry-picked, in order to ensure the highest quality in terms of design, material, and tailoring. The range includes high-end womenswear, menswear, shoes and accessories. Not only will customers have access to our innovative web shop, which offers them the opportunity to mix-and-match items to get the desired look, they are also assisted with pre-created looks, and have the ability to let their friends share and advice them in their findings. Customers can shop directly through the Facebook shop, mobile devices, and apps. The product image view is enhanced with video shoot of models showing the clothes and accessories, together with the ability for 3D viewing and zoom-in.
Who’s behind it?

Linda Nuamah! Born in Ghana and raised in the Netherlands I grew up between two cultures, two continents, and between two worlds. At home I was lost between being Dutch and African. By embracing both cultures, I found a balance between those two worlds, which guides me through life, and my professional career.

I have a degree in fashion retail and business. During my studies I worked for several fashion retail stores in Amsterdam. After my studies I changed careers into talent recruitment. Years later I took the risk in the midst of the economic crisis and started my own business. I have had the opportunity to work with talented and inspiring people from across the globe, and have acquired skills to spot emerging talents. I believe in chasing after your dreams, doing what you love, and helping others any way you can! I’m the founder of Janet + George.
We need your help

For the past year we have been working on the Janet + George business model, designing the website, and engaging with up-and-coming design talents from across the globe. The next step is to successfully start-up Janet + George, implement the website, collaborate with the designers, and market their collections. To be able to do this we need a $30,000 funding. That’s why we are asking you to help us make this happen!
The impact of your contribution

By contributing to Janet + George you will not only assist in creating this platform for finding emerging designer labels, you will also be helping new, up-and-coming fashion designers to emerge and grow at a steadily increasing rate.
Your help is highly appreciated. If we don’t reach our entire goal, your funds will be used to implement the website for its launch.
Other Ways You Can Help

Any help that you can provide is welcome. Please help us to get the word out and promote our campaign. Use the IndieGoGo share tools, and spread our campaign among your network.

","The idea

Getting a breakthrough in fashion can often be difficult for brand new designers starting their own line. It can be extremely challenging to go from production to finding retailers and customers to buy your collection.

Recognising that there are so many undiscovered talents out there, is the first step into the future. To contribute to giving new, up-and-coming designers an opportunity to showcase their collections on international level, Janet + George was created.

Janet + George is a cross-border online fashion store with a focus on emerging fashion designers. With the Janet + George web shop, we will reach out to designers that are at the beginning stages of establishing their collection. Through an innovative platform (www.janetandgeorge.com)
column2: Janet + George will sell collections of up-and-coming designers to online consumers. We transform seasonal fashion for style-savvy consumers, allowing them to discover new labels that have not yet made it to mass production.  Acting as up-and-coming fashion designer’s very own online sales and presentation channel, Janet + George will support these designers to create a buzz for their new line through effective marketing campaigns.

column1: The selection of designers are cherry-picked, in order to ensure the highest quality in terms of design, material, and tailoring. The range includes high-end womenswear, menswear, shoes and accessories. Not only will customers have access to our innovative web shop, which offers them the opportunity to mix-and-match items to get the desired look, they are also assisted with pre-created looks, and have the ability to let their friends share and advice them in their findings. Customers can shop directly through the Facebook shop, mobile devices, and apps. The product image view is enhanced with video shoot of models showing the clothes and accessories, together with the ability for 3D viewing and zoom-in.
Who’s behind it?

Linda Nuamah! Born in Ghana and raised in the Netherlands I grew up between two cultures, two continents, and between two worlds. At home I was lost between being Dutch and African. By embracing both cultures, I found a balance between those two worlds, which guides me through life, and my professional career.

I have a degree in fashion retail and business. During my studies I worked for several fashion retail stores in Amsterdam. After my studies I changed careers into talent recruitment. Years later I took the risk in the midst of the economic crisis and started my own business. I have had the opportunity to work with talented and inspiring people from across the globe, and have acquired skills to spot emerging talents. I believe in chasing after your dreams, doing what you love, and helping others any way you can! I’m the founder of Janet + George.
We need your help

For the past year we have been working on the Janet + George business model, designing the website, and engaging with up-and-coming design talents from across the globe. The next step is to successfully start-up Janet + George, implement the website, collaborate with the designers, and market their collections. To be able to do this we need a $30,000 funding. That’s why we are asking you to help us make this happen!
The impact of your contribution

By contributing to Janet + George you will not only assist in creating this platform for finding emerging designer labels, you will also be helping new, up-and-coming fashion designers to emerge and grow at a steadily increasing rate.
Your help is highly appreciated. If we don’t reach our entire goal, your funds will be used to implement the website for its launch.
